1a1(dkon brtsegs): @#/ /dkon brtsegs cha pa bzhugs so/ /
1b1(dkon brtsegs): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya su s+thi ta ma ti de ba put+t+ra pa ri pr-i ts+tshA nA ma ma hA yA na
1b2(dkon brtsegs): sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba
1b3(dkon brtsegs): theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'
1b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom
2a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la/ dge slong drug khri nyis stong gi dge
2a2(dkon brtsegs): slong gi dge 'dun chen po mngon par shes pa mngon par shes pa dgra bcom pa sha stag dang / 'jam
2a3(dkon brtsegs): dpal dang / seng ge'i tog la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bzhi khri nyis stong la/ byang chub sems
2a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob dang /
2a5(dkon brtsegs): spobs pa brtsegs dang / gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang / lhun po brtsegs dang / lhun po'i rgyal
2b1(dkon brtsegs): mtshan dang / rab tu mi sgul dang / don rab sems dang / legs par bsam pa sems dang / sems dpa' ba dang / sems
2b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi blo gros dang / sems bzang po dang / nor bu brtsegs dang / ri 'joms rgyal po dang / lag na rin po che dang / sems
2b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rin po che dang / lag na rin chen phyag rgya dang / rtag tu lag bteg dang / rtag tu lag brkyang dang / rtag tu brtson dang /
2b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can sgrol dang / brtson 'grus mos pa dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa la gnas pa dang / smon lam 'phags
2b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / lag na sgron ma dang / sems mnyam pa dang / ngan song spong dang / mya ngan gyi mun pa thams cad 'joms pa
2b6(dkon brtsegs): dang | brtson pa mi gtong dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / rdo rjes rnam par gnon dang / mtha' yas rnam par gnon dang /
3a1(dkon brtsegs): dpag med rnam par gnon dang / mi g.yo gnas kyis rnam par gnon dang / nam mkha' mdzod dang /
3a2(dkon brtsegs): blo gros dam pa dang / khyad par blo gros dang / blo gros 'phel dang / 'gro grub dang / sa 'dzin dang / zla 'od dang / zla ba'i tog
3a3(dkon brtsegs): dang | 'od kyi tog dang / 'od dpal dang / snang ba thob pas rnam par gnon dang / seng ge ltar rnam par gnon pas mngon
3a4(dkon brtsegs): par bsgrags pa'i sgra dang / spobs pa thogs med dang / spobs pa bzhad pa dang / spobs pa dpa' ba dang / rnam par
3a5(dkon brtsegs): gnon pa dang / nyi zla'i 'od zer mog mog por byed pa'i 'od dang / dmigs med dang / blo gros dpe med dang / rtag tu
3a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhad dges dbang po dang / nor bu dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / bud med rnam bsgyur go cha dang /
3b1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu snang ba dang / rnam par snang byed dang / mes byin dang / tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgra skad zab mo dang / de dag
3b2(dkon brtsegs): la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzhi khri nyis stong dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi
3b3(dkon brtsegs): mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / de dag dang gzhan yang lha'i bu drug khri tsam dang yang thabs gcig go/ lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas dang / lha'i bu mtshams bzang dang / lha'i
3b4(dkon brtsegs): bu dbang phyug chen po dang / lha'i bu blo gros bzang po dang / de dag la sogs pa thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i lha'i bu bdun khri sum
3b5(dkon brtsegs): stong dang yang thabs gcig go / lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po lhun po dang / de dag la sogs pa thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa
3b6(dkon brtsegs): la yang dag par zhugs pa'i lha ma yin gyi dbang po nyi khri dang yang thabs gcig go / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po zla ba dang / klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang / de
3b7(dkon brtsegs): dag la sogs pa thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i klu'i rgyal po drug khri dang yang thabs gcig go / de dag dang / gzhan yang
4a1(dkon brtsegs): lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po 'bum phrag du ma dang /
4a2(dkon brtsegs): dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dag dang thabs gcig ste/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor
4a3(dkon brtsegs): cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston to/ /de'i tshe na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa rang gi gnas khang na 'dug pa/ gcig pu dben par gyur cing / nang du yang dag 'jog
4a4(dkon brtsegs): la zhugs pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ sems med cing sems dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur
4a5(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa dran zhing shes bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las langs so/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa langs ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa
4a6(dkon brtsegs): dag rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas 'du shes kyi rnam par rtog pa yid la byed pa 'di lta
4a7(dkon brtsegs): bu 'di skyes te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni brgya la brgya lam na ste/ 'di lta ste/ dper
4b1(dkon brtsegs): na| u dum wa ra'i me tog brgya la brgya lam na 'jig rten du 'byung ba de bzhin du gang dag skye ba'i sdug bsngal zad par bya ba'i phyir zhi ba gsal ba/ brtag tu med pa/ rtog ge dang bral ba/
4b2(dkon brtsegs): zab pa shes par dka' ba'i chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang brgya la brgya lam na 'jig rten du 'byung ngo / /sangs
4b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas 'byung ba med pa na ni chos mnyan pa yang med do/ /chos mnyan pa med na ni sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal zad pa yang med pas bdag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
4b4(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar song ste/ zhu ba zhus pa ji lta bus sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsgrub par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i
4b5(dkon brtsegs): gang zag rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag la nem nur med cing the tshom med par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / 'jig
4b6(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di'i sems can 'di dag ni 'dod chags che ba/ zhe sdang che ba/ gti mug che ba/ dkar po'i chos dang bral ba/ mi dge ba'i chos dang ldan pa/ glen pa/ blun
4b7(dkon brtsegs): pa| mi gus pa/ sangs rgyas dang bral ba/ chos dang bral ba/ dge 'dun dang bral ba sha stag yin pas/ ci nas kyang sems can 'di dag gis chos thos nas shes rab kyi mig
5a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par dag par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i zhu ba zhu'o snyam mo/ /de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi phyogs bcu'i
5a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la chos nyan par 'gyur ba dang / gang dag zab mo'i bzod pa 'di la lus kyis mngon du byed par 'gyur ba 'bum phrag mang po dag
5a3(dkon brtsegs): kyang bsdu bar bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa kun du snang ba dri ma med pa bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs so/ /'jam dpal
5a4(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur pa kun du snang ba dri ma med pa bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas de'i mod la shar phyogs dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
5a5(dkon brtsegs): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag mnyen pa/ 'jam pa/ rnam par dag pa/ 'od gsal ba/ dri ma med pa/ yongs su dag pa'i 'od chen po'i snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to/ /'od
5a6(dkon brtsegs): de dang snang ba des/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ 'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun pa mun nag dang / ri'i rtse mo dang / shing ljon pa dang / ri dang / khor yug dang / btang bzung dang /
5a7(dkon brtsegs): btang bzung chen po dang / gangs dang / ri rab dang / lhun po chen po gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad snang ba chen pos gsal bar gyur to/ /de nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig
5b1(dkon brtsegs): rten na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gang dag bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag la rang rang gi bsnyen bkur bdag gis zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
5b2(dkon brtsegs): sngon ma thos/ ma mthong ba'i 'od 'di lta bu yid du mchi ba/ 'di ltar 'od gsal ba'i snang ba chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du 'byung ba 'di/ bcom ldan 'das/ rgyu ni gang lags/
5b3(dkon brtsegs): rkyen ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'od 'dis bdag cag sems dang ba dang / lus sim pa chen po dang ldan zhing / sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti
5b4(dkon brtsegs): mug dag kyang kun du mi 'byung lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang gis 'od 'di lta bu bkye ba 'di su'i mthu lags/ 'di su'i byin gyis rlabs lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang /
5b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bsnyen bkur ba de dag la cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na lha'i sgra dang / klu'i sgra dang / gnod
5b6(dkon brtsegs): sbyin gyi sgra dang / lha ma yin gyi sgra dang / nam mkha' lding gi sgra dang / dri za'i sgra dang / mi'am ci'i sgra dang / lto 'phye chen po'i sgra dang / mi'i sgra dang / mi ma yin pa'i sgra dang / bya'i sgra
5b7(dkon brtsegs): dang | ri dwags kyi sgra gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mi grag par gyur to/ /rlung gi sgra dang / chu'i phung po'i sgra dang / rgya mtsho chen po'i shugs kyi sgra dang / rol mo'i sgra dang /
6a1(dkon brtsegs): klu'i dbyangs kyi sgra gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mi grag par gyur te/ 'ga' yang sgra mi 'byin cing thams cad zhi ba dang / rab tu zhi bar gyur
6a2(dkon brtsegs): to| |yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur ba de dag gis lan gnyis lan gsum du 'di skad ces gsol to/ /skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la
6a3(dkon brtsegs): bde ba dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi skye bo phal po che'i don dang / sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gis 'od 'di lta bu bkye zhing / des sangs rgyas kyi zhing
6a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad snang bar gyur pa 'di su'i mthu lags pa bshad du gsol/ de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi sangs rgyas bcom
6a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis gsung gi sgra dbyangs gcig tu bsdus nas/ gsung gi 'phrin las brjod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig ci lta ba bzhin du
6a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang de bzhin du gsung zhing / de dag gis gsung gi 'phrin las sgra dbyangs gcig tu bsdus pa de lta bu des bsnyen bkur ba de dag la bka' stsal to/ /sangs rgyas
6a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de dag gi gsung brjod pa des/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kun du gang bar gyur te/ lha dang mir bcas pa'i sil snyan 'bum phrag mang po dag
6b1(dkon brtsegs): kyang sgra mngon par 'byin cing / rol mo'i sgra dag kyang ma dkrol bar sgra grag par gyur to/ /rol mo'i sgra de dag las mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang ldan pa'i
6b2(dkon brtsegs): sgra 'byung zhing / stong pa nyid kyi sgra dang / mtshan ma med pa'i sgra dang / smon pa med pa'i sgra dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sgra dang / rnam par grol ba'i sgra dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi
6b3(dkon brtsegs): sgra dang / de bzhin nyid kyi sgra dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i sgra dang / sbyin pa'i sgra dang / tshul khrims kyi sgra dang / bzod pa'i sgra dang / brtson 'grus kyi sgra dang / bsam gtan gyi sgra dang /
6b4(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi sgra dang / nges pa'i sgra dang / phan pa'i dngos po'i sgra dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyi sgra dag dang / de lta bu dang mthun pa'i chos
6b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi sgo 'bum phrag du ma dag gi sgra byung bar gyur to/ /sgra byung ba de dag gis sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med pa/ grangs med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
6b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub dang / nyan thos nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas nyid dang / brgya byin nyid dang / tshangs pa nyid dang / 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid yongs su 'grub pa las phyir mi
6b7(dkon brtsegs): ldog par gyur to/ /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bsnyen bkur ba de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu dag/ 'di lta bu'i gtam dris pas khyed la
7a1(dkon brtsegs): ci zhig bya'i thong zhig/ 'od 'di ni ji tsam du bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / ji tsam du bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sbyin pa'i tshogs dang /
7a2(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi tshogs kyis yongs su sbyang ba byas pa yin te/ 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
7a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyis ma yin no/ /gal te de bzhin gshegs pas 'od 'di'i bsngags pa brjod par gyur na/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad 'di la rmongs par 'gyur
7a4(dkon brtsegs): ro| |'od 'di ni byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / gtang snyoms thams cad kyis yongs su bsgos pas yongs su tshim par byed pa ste/ 'od 'di'i bsngags pa brjod
7a5(dkon brtsegs): par gyur na/ bskal pa'am/ bskal pa las lhag par yang bsngags pa brjod pa'i mthar phyin par sla ba ma yin no/ /rigs kyi bu dag/ de lta mod kyi/ 'on kyang legs par
7a6(dkon brtsegs): nyon la rab tu yid la gzung zhig dang / khyed la bshad par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur ba de dag gis lan gnyis lan gsum du 'di skad ces
7a7(dkon brtsegs): gsol to/ /skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'grub par bgyi ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das
7b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis rang rang gi bsnyen bkur ba de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu dag /
7b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde
7b3(dkon brtsegs): bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de snyigs
7b4(dkon brtsegs): ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gnas par 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis gzir ba'i sems can mi gus pa/ dbang po rtul ba/ ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa
7b5(dkon brtsegs): dang bral ba/ nyon mongs pa can gyi las la spyod pa de lta bu'i sems can rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
7b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas te chos ston to/ /rigs kyi bu dag/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten
7b7(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams mi mjed de na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa zhes bya ba mthu che ba/ shes rab che ba/ brtson 'grus che ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang
8a1(dkon brtsegs): dag par ston par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par gzengs bstod pa/
8a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha'i go 'byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ma'i go 'byed pa/ chos
8a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi gzhi rab tu 'byed pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa/ chags pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa/ thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa/ gzungs thob pa/
8a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa zhig 'dug pa de/ 'di lta ste/ sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'grub par bya ba dang / byang chub
8a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
8a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas shAkya thub pa de la chos kyi zhu ba zhu bar 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu dag/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa des/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos bstan
8a7(dkon brtsegs): pa de nyan cing 'du bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dag phyogs bcu nas bsdu ba'i phyir/ 'od 'di bkye ste/ rigs kyi bu dag/ snang ba chen po 'jig rten du
8b1(dkon brtsegs): byung ba 'di'i rgyu ni de yin/ rkyen ni de yin no/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur ba de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
8b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas nas 'od 'di lta bu 'gyed lags/ bka' stsal pa/ ting nge 'dzin kun du snang ba dri
8b3(dkon brtsegs): med bkod pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de ting nge 'dzin de la gnas nas 'od 'di lta bu 'gyed do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas bcom
8b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das rnams ni 'di ltar gsal ba/ 'di ltar rnam par dag pa/ 'di ltar lus dang sems dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' bar bgyid pa'i 'od 'di lta bu 'gyed par mi mdzad
8b5(dkon brtsegs): lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag/ byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' bskul ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas
8b6(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' dkrigs phrag
8b7(dkon brtsegs): bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ga la ba der song ste/ lhags nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
9a1(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sngon ma mthong /
9a2(dkon brtsegs): ma thos pa yon tan du ma dang ldan pa'i 'od 'di lta bu dang / snang ba 'di lta bu dang / 'bar ba 'di dag ga las mchis/ su'i 'od lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / sangs rgyas
9a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu dag/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na bcom ldan
9a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ /de na byang chub sems
9a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa zhes bya ba zhig 'dug pa des 'di lta ste/ phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsdu ba'i phyir 'od 'bar ba 'di lta bu 'di bkye'o/ /de
9a6(dkon brtsegs): skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag bcom
9a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / zhu ba dang
9b1(dkon brtsegs): zhu blag bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de dang / de las gzhan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag kyang blta ba'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed
9b2(dkon brtsegs): der mchi'o/ /bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag/ de'i dus la bab par shes na dengs shig/ de nas de'i mod la phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' dkrigs phrag bye ba khrag khrig 'bum
9b3(dkon brtsegs): phrag dpag tu med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid la/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi stobs po che'i lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba'am/ brkyang pa
9b4(dkon brtsegs): las bskum pa tsam la rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag nas mi snang bar gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lhags par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' la la dag ni
9b5(dkon brtsegs): me tog gi char dag mngon par rab tu 'bebs shing / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der lhags
9b6(dkon brtsegs): so| |la la dag ni phye ma dang / byug pa dang / me tog phreng dang / spos kyi char dag dang / me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / tsam pa ka dang / a ti mug
9b7(dkon brtsegs): ta ka dang / skya snar dang / d+ha nu ska ri dang / sna ma'i me tog dang / bA ra shi ka dang / bA ra shi ka chen po dang / mnad ra ba dang / mnad ra ba chen po dang / pa ru sha ka dang / pa ru sha ka chen
10a1(dkon brtsegs): po dang / zla mdog dang / zla mdog chen po dang / zla mdog rab mdzes la sogs pa me tog gi rigs rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char dag dang / spos kyi char
10a2(dkon brtsegs): dag dang / phreng ba'i char dag dang / phye ma'i char dag mngon par rab tu 'bebs shing / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
10a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der lhags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' la la dag ni sil snyan 'bum phrag du ma dag rab tu gsil zhing / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
10a4(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der lhags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' la la dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la bstod pa'i sgra dbyangs re
10a5(dkon brtsegs): res kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su sgra skad kyis go bar 'byed cing lhags te/ de lta bu'i bkod pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis bcom ldan 'das de
10a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der lhags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir
10a7(dkon brtsegs): lhags ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can dmyal ba dang /
10b1(dkon brtsegs): dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sems can gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad nye bar zhi bar gyur to/ /sems can gang la yang 'dod chags kyis gnod pa med/
10b2(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang gis ma yin/ gti mug gis ma yin/ nga rgyal gyis ma yin/ phrag dog gis ma yin/ ser snas ma yin/ 'chab pas ma yin/ khro bas ma yin/ yongs su gdungs pas ma
10b3(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ sems can thams cad byams pa'i sems dang / mchog tu dga' ba'i sems dang ldan par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' dkrigs phrag bye ba khrag khrig 'bum
10b4(dkon brtsegs): p hrag dpag tu med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong
10b5(dkon brtsegs): ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan
10b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas steng gi bar snang la lus mi snang bar byas te/ lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/
10b7(dkon brtsegs): rang rang gi smon lam las byung ba'i pad+ma kha dog sna tshogs 'dab ma 'bum phrag du ma dang ldan pa'i pad+ma'i snying po dag la skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas gnas
11a1(dkon brtsegs): brtan 'od srung chen pos chos kyi cho 'phrul chen po ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba de dang / me tog gi char dang / spos kyi char dang / phye ma'i char de dag dang / sil
11a2(dkon brtsegs): snyan 'bum phrag mang po sgra 'byin pa de dag dang / snang ba chen po de yang mthong / gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di me tog dag gis pus mo nub tsam du khebs par
11a3(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa yang mthong / 'khor phal po che lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi
11a4(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma de dag thams cad kyi lus gser gyi kha dog lta bur snang ba dag kyang mthong ngo / /de nas gnas
11a5(dkon brtsegs): brtan 'od srung chen po stan las langs te/ chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo
11a6(dkon brtsegs): sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /rab dga' bde ba stsol ba shin tu dri ma med pa'i zhal/ /mi yi dam pa stobs bcu
11a7(dkon brtsegs): yon tan brgya dag nges bsags pa/ /bsam yas gzhal du ma mchis yid gnyis mun pa sel ba po/ /sa bla lha yul rnam par rgyu ba khyod dang mtshungs ma mchis/ /bskal pa khrag
11b1(dkon brtsegs): khrig brgyar sbyin dang dul ba legs par spyad/ /bde gshegs khyod kyi tshul khrims mtshungs pa ma mchis gnas ma mchis/ /bzod stobs shin tu stobs dang ldan pa stobs bcu'i
11b2(dkon brtsegs): stobs ldan pa/ /yon tan mnga' ba 'dzum mdzad bdag gi the tshom bsal du gsol/ /sems can sdug bsngal gzigs nas bskal pa brgya dag rnam spyad kyang / /skyo zhing spong ba mi
11b3(dkon brtsegs): mnga' dgyes pa gzhal du ma mchis brnyes/ /sras dang sras mo btsun mo rgyal srid spyan dang sna tshogs btang / /sbyin dgyes thams cad gtong ba bdag gi the tshom bsal du gsol//
11b4(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis sngon chad chibs dang glang po shing rta dpung chung stsal/ /gtong la dgyes pas dbu dang na bza' khrag khrig brgya yang btang / /thub pas zhal zas gtsang nan de bzhin pho brang
11b5(dkon brtsegs): dkor yang stsal/ /sbyin dang gtong la rtag tu dgyes pa bde gshegs khyed la zhu/ /stong pa'i chos rnams nges par bsten zhing thugs la legs dgongs pas/ /rdul bral sku lus
11b6(dkon brtsegs): gtubs kyang sdug bsngal 'khrugs pa mi mnga' zhing / /gsungs zhes zhus na bzod pa gsung ba'i stobs la brtson pa yi/ /yon tan mnga' ba rdul dang bral ba khyod la zhu bar 'tshal/ /
11b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags zhe sdang dag gis rab dkrugs rmongs shing kun dkris la/ /bdag tu 'du shes brtson pa'i sems can sdug bsngal gzigs nas ni/ /thugs rje bskyed nas bskal pa brgya
12a1(dkon brtsegs): dag srid pa 'dir spyad pa/ /dpa' bo lam rab ston par mdzad pa bdag gi skyabs gyur cig/ bde gshegs legs pa mdzad pa khyod ni 'gro la thogs mi
12a2(dkon brtsegs): mnga'/ /spyad pa legs par spyad pas rdzu 'phrul zhabs dang ye shes brnyes/ /bdag dang sems can rnam par bshig cing stong pa'i chos la brtson/ /shin tu dri ma ma mchis bsam
12a3(dkon brtsegs): bsgom bdag gi the tshom khum/ /khyod kyis sngon ni sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus dang / /bsam gtan shes rab snying rje byams pa mtshungs pa ma mchis bsten/ /khyod
12a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab chu 'dzin rgya mtsho bzhin/ /'byung gnas bzang po shin tu gnas pa bdag gi skyabs gyur cig /rdul bral khyod kyi sku lus dum bu dum bur bcad cing
12a5(dkon brtsegs): ni| |srang la bcal ba mdzad cing dam dum lhag grol ma lus par/ /sku kun ril gyis btang ste phug ron phrug gu gcig ma btang / /rdul bral 'od mdzad thugs rje mnga' ba the tshom gcad
12a6(dkon brtsegs): du gsol/ /lha tshogs gnas pa'i ri bo g.yos shing dgung ni rdib gyur la/ /lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyi gnas mal rgya mtsho bas gyur cig /mkha' la gnas shing rgyu ba'i dgung zla dog
12a7(dkon brtsegs): sar lhung gyur kyang / /rgyal ba grags pa mdzad pa khyod ni log pa'i tshig mi gsung / /de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis
12b1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ snang ba chen po 'jig rten du byung zhing ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i mtshan ma rgya chen po 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di'i rgyu
12b2(dkon brtsegs): ni gang lags/ rkyen ni gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'od srung / 'di lta bu'i gtam dris pas
12b3(dkon brtsegs): khyod la ci zhig bya'i thong zhig / 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa ma yin no/ /gal te de bzhin gshegs pas gnas 'di bstan par gyur na lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di
12b4(dkon brtsegs): la rmongs shing bslad par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pas skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i slad du bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol
12b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'od srung / de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la gzung zhig dang / bshad par bya'o/ /
12b6(dkon brtsegs): gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar mnyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'od srung / 'di na
12b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa kun du snang pa dri med bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de'i mthus phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung bye ba'i bye ma snyed dag
13a1(dkon brtsegs): 'od kyis snang bar byas nas/ 'od des phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' dkrigs phrag bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab
13a2(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par bskul te/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lhags nas/ de dag gis da gzod nga'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byas te/ nga la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ steng gi bar
13a3(dkon brtsegs): snang la ta la srid tsam na pad+ma dgal 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi
13a4(dkon brtsegs): mthus| me tog gi char 'di lta bu 'di dag rab tu bab cing spos kyi char dag dang / phye ma'i char 'di dag kyang rab tu bab la/ sil snyan 'bum phrag mang po dag kyang ma dkrol bar sgra 'byin lags
13a5(dkon brtsegs): sam| bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung / de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi mthus me tog gi char 'di lta bu 'di dag rab tu bab cing spos kyi char dag
13a6(dkon brtsegs): dang | phye ma'i char 'di dag kyang rab tu bab la/ sil snyan 'bum phrag mang po dag kyang ma dkrol bar sgra 'byin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di na byang chub sems dpa'
13a7(dkon brtsegs): 'ga' yang mi gda'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung / de dag ni nyan thos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas dag gis blta bar mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
13b1(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung / 'di ltar nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying rje chen po gang dang / byams pa chen po gang dang / phan par 'dod pa gang dang / spyod pa gang
13b2(dkon brtsegs): la gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab gang la gnas pa de la mi gnas
13b3(dkon brtsegs): shing byang chub sems dpa' gang la spyod pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa de la yang mi spyod pa'i phyir ro/ /'od srung / byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya
13b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pas de dag ni nyan thos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas dag gis blta bar mi nus te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gzigs pa kho nar zad
13b5(dkon brtsegs): do| |'od srung / rigs kyi bu de dag ni 'di ltar sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang re zhig
13b6(dkon brtsegs): mi mthong na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis mthong bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas med do/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan
13b7(dkon brtsegs): pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' chos du dag dang / spyod pa ci 'dra ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta bu dag dang ldan na byang chub
14a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa thob par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung / byang chub
14a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa thob par 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ lhag pa'i bsam pa la yang dag par
14a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba dang / snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / mtshan ma thams cad rnam par 'jig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
14a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la lhag par dmigs shing de la rlom sems med pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la lhag par dmigs pa med cing de las ye shes yongs su tshol ba dang /
14a5(dkon brtsegs): lus dang srog kyang yongs su gtong na dngos po gzhan dag lta ci smos te/ bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang / tshogs dpag tu med pa yongs su 'dzin cing / tshogs des
14a6(dkon brtsegs): rlom sems med pa dang / sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dpag tu med pa yongs su rdzogs par byed
14a7(dkon brtsegs): cing pha rol tu phyin pa de dag la rtog pa med pa dang / bdag gis sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyis chos rnams la bkod nas/ phyis byang chub kyi shing drung du 'gro bar
14b1(dkon brtsegs): bya'o snyam yang sems can rnams dang byang chub mi dmigs pa ste/ 'od srung / byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin lus thams cad
14b2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'jig pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji tsam du bcom
14b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pas nam yang sems 'ga' yang ma bskyed pa'i legs par gsungs pa gsung ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das/
14b4(dkon brtsegs): ngo mtshar lags te/ bdag gis sems can thams cad dgra bcom pa nyid kyi chos rnams la yang dgod par bgyi na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags/ bcom
14b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung / de lta bas na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par mi nus
14b6(dkon brtsegs): te| ting nge 'dzin de'i ming yang mi shes na snyoms par 'jug par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te de ni gnas med do/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od
14b7(dkon brtsegs): srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag blta bar bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ skyes bu dam pa de
15a1(dkon brtsegs): lta bu de dag mthong bar dka' ba'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'ongs kyi bar du khyod re zhig
15a2(dkon brtsegs): sdod cig dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag ting nge 'dzin de las ldang zhing de'i 'og tu mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /'od srung / de lta mod kyi khyod nyid ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi gnas thob
15a3(dkon brtsegs): pa yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag spyod lam ji lta bus gnas par rtogs shig /de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ byang chub sems
15a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' de dag spyod lam ji lta bus gnas pa blta ba'i phyir de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / rang gi stobs bskyed pas ting nge 'dzin nyi khri la snyoms par zhugs shing rnam par langs
15a5(dkon brtsegs): kyang de dag ma mthong ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi 'ong ba dang 'gro ba yang ma shes/ de dag gi gnas dang rab tu gnas pa yang ma shes/ ci byed pa dang / ci ston pa dag kyang
15a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyis thams cad du ma shes/ ma mthong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar bdag
15a7(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin nyi khri la snyoms par zhugs kyang byang chub sems dpa' de dag ma mthong ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das/ ngo mtshar lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ shin tu ngo mtshar
15b1(dkon brtsegs): lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag da dung thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob par de ltar zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsgrubs pas kyang de lta lags na/ byang chub sems
15b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' gang dag thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob pa dag lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo su zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
15b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu sems bskyed par mi bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid kyi slad du go cha 'tshal bar bgyid pa
15b4(dkon brtsegs): de ni| go cha legs par 'tshal ba lags pas ting nge 'dzin 'di ni slad kyis kyang yongs su gtang bar mi bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung / de bzhin no/ /ji skad
15b5(dkon brtsegs): smras pa de bzhin te/ 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa yang ma yin na/ sems can gzhan dag gi lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas gnas brtan shA ri'i bu 'di snyam
15b6(dkon brtsegs): du sems te/ bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab can rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag spyod lam ci lta bus gnas pa bdag gis brtag
15b7(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas gnas brtan shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de dag blta ba'i phyir/ ting nge 'dzin sum khri la snyoms par zhugs shing / rnam par langs kyang de dag gi
16a1(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma yang shes par ma nus so/ /de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag blta bar bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas
16a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas brtan rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' de dag blta ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / rang gi stobs bskyed pas/ ting nge 'dzin bzhi khri la snyoms par zhugs shing rnam par langs kyang
16a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba yang ma shes/ 'greng ba yang ma mthong / 'chag pa yang ma mthong / 'dug pa yang ma mthong / nyal ba yang ma mthong ste/ de dag blta bar ma nus so/ /de nas gnas
16a4(dkon brtsegs): brtan rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pas nyon
16a5(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa ma mchis par gnas pa rnams kyis mchog tu bstan te/ bdag zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnams thob pa lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gal te gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig
16a6(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams 'di rnga bo che'i sbubs gcig tu gyur cing / gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig shos kyang rnga bo che'i sbubs gcig tu gyur la/ der mi la la zhig skyes nas
16a7(dkon brtsegs): der ri rab tsam gyi rnga shing thogs te/ bdag ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu mdun du mchis nas/ sug las gzhan mi bgyid par bskal pa'i bar du rgyun mi 'chad
16b1(dkon brtsegs): par rnga bo che de gnyis brdungs par gyur kyang / bcom ldan 'das/ bdag nyon mongs pa ma mchis par gnas pa'i slad du de ltar bsgrubs te zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnams thob pa la re zhig bskal pa
16b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das par gnas pa'i rnga bo che de gnyis kyi sgra de dag bdag gi rna ba'i rnam par rig pa tsam du yang grags par mi 'gyur na/ des ting nge 'dzin de las bslangs pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ de ni gnas
16b3(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis lags na/ bcom ldan 'das nyon mongs pa ma mchis par gnas pa de lta bu dang ldan zhing ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag blta ba'i slad du ting nge 'dzin
16b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhi khri la snyoms par zhugs shing rnam par langs kyang de dag ma mthong ste/ de dag gi gnas kyang mi 'tshal lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye
16b5(dkon brtsegs): shes de lta bu yongs su tshol ba na/ sems can re re'i slad du bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sems can dmyal ba chen por bsreg par gyur kyang spro bar bgyi zhing / bcom ldan 'das /byang
16b6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa de lta bu yongs su gtang bar mi bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te bdag len pa ma mchis par zag pa rnams las sems
16b7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol bar ma gyur na ni/ bdag slad ma'i mtha'i mur thug par 'khor bar spyod cing / de lta bu'i theg pa chen po yang yongs su spong bar mi bgyid do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
17a1(dkon brtsegs): kyis gnas brtan rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rab 'byor khyod kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa de lta bus tshig de skad smras pa legs so/ /legs
17a2(dkon brtsegs): so| |rab 'byor/ khyod gal te phung po 'di dag nyid kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar ma gyur du zin na/ khyod dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid gang+gA'i klung gi bye
17a3(dkon brtsegs): ma snyed byed du 'jug cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
17a4(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag mang ba yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ rab
17a5(dkon brtsegs): 'byor/ nan gyis dper byas te/ gal te sems can de dag thams cad dge slong rab 'byor dang / shA ri'i bu dang / 'od srung chen po ci 'dra ba de lta bu'i shes pa dang ldan par gyur
17a6(dkon brtsegs): la| rab 'byor/ nyan thos chen po de lta bu de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag blta ba'i phyir/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar brtags kyang mthong bar mi
17a7(dkon brtsegs): nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos gang dag la spyod pa de dag la mi spyod pa'i phyir te/
17b1(dkon brtsegs): rab 'byor/ de ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas ma yin no/ /bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ lha dang mi'i skye dgu rnams las srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong bla na med
17b2(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gnas 'di nyid na 'dug pa 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag
17b3(dkon brtsegs): khrig 'bum phrag mang po 'di dag 'dus kyi/ bdag gis lha 'bum phrag mang po dag kyang bsdu bar bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe/ ji lta bu'i rdzu
17b4(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byas na 'di lta bur 'gyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba 'dus byas pas/ pad+ma shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam/ 'dab ma ni gser/ sdong bu
17b5(dkon brtsegs): ni dngul/ snying po ni rin po che dpal gyi snying po/ ze ba ni be DUR+Ya las byas pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi mngon par sprul cing / pad+ma de dag la byang chub sems dpa'i
17b6(dkon brtsegs): lus gser gyi kha dog lta bu/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa/ dpal dang ldan pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa/ gzi brjid dang ldan pa/ 'od gsal ba dag
17b7(dkon brtsegs): pa pad+ma'i snying po dag gi dbus na skyil mo krung gis 'dug pa'i lus gzugs dag kyang mngon par sprul to/ /de nas pad+ma de dag rgyal chen bzhi'i lha'i ris nas bzung ste/ sum
18a1(dkon brtsegs): cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs 'khor dang / tshangs pa'i
18a2(dkon brtsegs): mdun na 'don dang / tshangs chen dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang / bsod nams skyes
18a3(dkon brtsegs): dang | 'bras bu che dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / 'og min gyi lha'i ris kyi bar dang / de bzhin du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
18a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i rgyal chen bzhi'i lha'i ris ther 'bum nas/ 'og min gyi lha'i ris kyi bar 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas ji snyed pa
18a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad du 'dong zhing sgra sgrogs par byed/ dbyangs rjod par byed/ yang dag par skul bar byed de/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus gzugs de dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
18a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rnam par rgyu ba'i tshe/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma'i rtsa lag rnams/ /'jig rten du ni lan 'ga' 'byung / /u dum wa
18a7(dkon brtsegs): ra'i me tog ltar/ /sangs rgyas de bzhin shin tu dkon/ /shAkya seng ge mi yi mchog /de ni 'jig rten 'dir byung ste/ /sdug bsngal thams cad zad byed pa'i/ /chos ni yang dag
18b1(dkon brtsegs): de stan mdzad/ /lha yi 'dod pa yi dga' la/ /ji snyed yun ring spyad byas na/ /gang du tshor ba myong gyur pa'i/ /ngan song rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur/ /ji srid 'dod pa rnams bsten pa/ /sred pa
18b2(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhing rab tu 'phel/ /khams gsum 'khor ba'i srog chags la/ /bde ba yod pa ma yin no/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba rab dkon dang / /khom pa dam pa rnyed nas ni/ /gang dag bdag med
18b3(dkon brtsegs): mi rtogs pa/ /de dag sdug bsngal zad mi 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas blta pa'i phyir deng la/ /chos kyi dam pa mnyan par gyis/ /'jig rten 'dren pa 'das 'og tu/ /phyis dus 'gyod par ma byed
18b4(dkon brtsegs): cig| mi rnams gang dag rtag myos shing / /'jigs chen bdud kyi zhags pa yi/ /bag med spyod par byed rnams la/ /thar pa yod par ga la 'gyur/ /da ni 'di skad smra bar bya/ /bsod
18b5(dkon brtsegs): nams byas pa'i sems can gang / /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' ba'i/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas dang myur phrad byos/ /gang dag byams pa bsam yas pa'i/ /'jig rten mgon rnams ma
18b6(dkon brtsegs): gtogs par/ /sems can rnams kyi skyabs gzhan med/ /dpung gnyen gzhan yang yod ma yin/ /skyob pa shAkya seng ge yis/ /tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ /bskal pa bye
18b7(dkon brtsegs): bar spyad mdzad nas/ /ye shes dam pa brnyes nas ni/ /gang la sems can mi dmigs shing / /srog dang gang zag yod min pa'i/ /chos mchog zhi ba zab mo dang / /mthong bar
19a1(dkon brtsegs): dka' ba rab tu ston/ /rtag pa dang ni de bzhin du/ /chad pa'ang rab tu spangs gyur cing / /mtshan ma thams cad spangs pa'i chos/ /srog chags rnams
19a2(dkon brtsegs): la ston par mdzad/ /gang la 'jig rten mi gnas pa'i/ /stong nyid mtshan ma med pa dang / /smon pa byed pa ma yin pa'i/ /yang dag mtha' ni rab tu ston/ /rtags med mtshan ma yod
19a3(dkon brtsegs): min zhing / /skye med 'byung ba med pa dang / /'ong ba med cing 'gro med pa'i/ /chos ni mkhas pa ston par mdzad/ /zag med 'byung ba yod min zhing / /rang bzhin gyis ni dngos med
19a4(dkon brtsegs): dang | |bltar med mtshan ma yod min pa/ /ston dang rlom pa'i sems mi mnga'/ /sems can gang yang skye med cing / /'ga' yang 'chi ba yod ma yin/ /mya ngan 'das pa'ang
19a5(dkon brtsegs): gang yang med/ /sems can 'byung ba'ang yod ma yin/ /skad kyis chos rnams bstan byas kyang / /skad la brten pa yod min zhing / /yi ge rnams dang bral ba'i chos/ /mi yi
19a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa ston par mdzad/ /gang la rlung ni mi gnas shing / /chu dang me yang mi dmigs la/ /sar yang rtog pa med pa'i chos/ /spyan dang ldan pa ston par mdzad/ /gzugs dang
19a7(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba 'du shes dang / /'du byed rnams dang rnam shes ni/ /stong zhing phung po lnga po dag /dngos po med pa ston par mdzad/ /mig dang rna ba sna dang ni/ /lce dang lus dang de bzhin
19b1(dkon brtsegs): yid| |rang bzhin stong par ston mdzad kyang / /stong pa de yang dmigs su med/ /gzugs dang sgra dang dri rnams dang / /ro dang reg bya yid 'ong ba/ /de dag rnam par rtog pas bskyed/ /rtog
19b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa yin/ /de ltar sangs rgyas skyob pa ni/ /srog chags rnams la chos ston gyi/ /gang dag sdug bsngal thar 'dod pa/ /de dag rnams 'dren drung du shog /de nas byang chub
19b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i sprul pa de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis chos bstan pas/ 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i
19b4(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu rnams las lha bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go / lha'i bu khri nyis stong gis ni 'dod chags dang bral ba rjes
19b5(dkon brtsegs): su thob bo/ /lha'i bu sa ya phrag gsum dang nyis 'bum ni byang chub tu sems skyes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i lha'i bu khris ni mi skye ba'i chos la
19b6(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i lus gzugs de dag gis/ lha'i bu gang dag yang dag par bskul ba de dag las/ lha'i bu 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs
19b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste/ lhags
20a1(dkon brtsegs): nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod de/ lha'i
20a2(dkon brtsegs): me tog ut+pa la dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / mnad ra ba dang / mnad ra ba chen po dang / phye ma dang / spos dang / byug pa dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par
20a3(dkon brtsegs): gtor to/ /steng gi bar snang la yang lha'i glu dbyangs mang po dag rab tu len par gyur to/ /de'i tshe na gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gang du lha'i bu gzi brjid che
20a4(dkon brtsegs): ba| gzi brjid che ba dag gis khyab par ma gyur pa'i sa phyogs tha na 'khar ba gzugs pa'i gtod tsam yang med pa de snyed kyi lha'i bu dag 'dus par gyur cing / gling chen po bzhi
20a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang me tog dag gis pus mo nub tsam du khebs par gyur to/ /de nas lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas dang / lha'i bu mtshams bzang dang / lha'i
20a6(dkon brtsegs): bu dri med dang / lha'i bu ngo tsha shes pa'i nor can zhes bya ba lha bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug po thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag gis
20a7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gnas ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gnas kyi phyi rol nas
20b1(dkon brtsegs): lan bdun bskor ba byas te/ me tog mnad ra ba'i char dag mngon par rab tu phab bo/ me tog mnad ra ba'i char de dag gis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gnas su me tog gi phung po
20b2(dkon brtsegs): 'phang du dpag tshad bcu pa kun nas gnas par gyur to/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byin gyis brlabs so/ /ci lta bu byin gyis brlabs na/ 'di lta bur 'gyur ba'i byin gyi
20b3(dkon brtsegs): rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pas/ stong gsum gyis stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i steng gi bar snang la me tog gi dra ba kun nas bkram par gyur to/ /me tog gi 'od des
20b4(dkon brtsegs): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di kun tu khyab par gyur to/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa rang gi gnas nas byung ste smon lam las byung ba'i stan la 'dug
20b5(dkon brtsegs): go |de nas lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs so/ /lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyis kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
20b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs so/ / //bam po gnyis pa/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag
20b7(dkon brtsegs): su dang lhan cig tu dri ba bstan pa bshad par bya/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gzhi rnams dang / shes par dka' ba'i gzhi rnams dang / gnas pa med pa'i gzhi rnams dang / spros pa
21a1(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i gzhi rnams dang / spros pa dang bral ba'i gzhi rnams dang / brjod du med pa'i gzhi rnams dang / brtan du med pa'i gzhi rnams dang / zab mo'i
21a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhi rnams dang / bden pa'i gzhi rnams dang / chags pa med pa'i gzhi rnams dang / mi phyed pa'i gzhi rnams dang / stong pa nyid kyi gzhi rnams dang / mtshan ma med pa'i gzhi
21a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / smon pa med pa'i gzhi rnams dang / de bzhin nyid bstan pa'i gzhi rnams dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i gzhi rnams dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi rnams dang /
21a4(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs pa med pa'i gzhi rnams dang / blang ba med pa'i gzhi rnams dang / dor ba med pa'i gzhi rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi gzhi rnams dang / chos kyi gzhi rnams dang / dge
21a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dun gyi gzhi rnams dang / ye shes yongs su rdzogs pa 'thob pa'i gzhi rnams dang / khams gsum pa mnyam pa nyid kyi gzhi rnams dang / chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i
21a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhi rnams dang / chos thams cad skye ba med par bstan pa'i gzhi rnams dang / seng ge'i gzhi rnams dang / dpa' bo'i gzhi rnams dang / gzhi med pa'i gzhi de dag bstan pa
21a7(dkon brtsegs): na snod du gyur pa ni su yod snyam mo/ /de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di snyam du sems te/ lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas 'di ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba lhag par
21b1(dkon brtsegs): byas pa/ zab mo la bzod pa thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa yin gyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag 'di dang lhan cig tu dri ba bstan pa bshad par bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas
21b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha'i bu/ khyod ni zab mo la bzod pa thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa yin na/ bcom ldan
21b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyi spyan sngar kho bo dang lhan cig tu dri ba bstan pa bshad par nus sam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces
21b4(dkon brtsegs): smras so/ /'jam dpal/ gal te khyod gsung bar mi mdzad/ brjod par mi mdzad/ 'don par yang mi mdzad/ yi ge yang mi brjod/ sgra yang mi gsan pa lta na/ bdag gis de bzhin
21b5(dkon brtsegs): bstan par bgyi'o/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ gal te khyod nyan par mi byed/ 'dzin par mi byed/ 'chang bar mi byed/ kun chub par mi byed/ sems par mi byed/ rig par
21b6(dkon brtsegs): mi byed/ rnam par rig par mi byed/ len par mi byed/ gtong bar mi byed cing / thos nas kyang gzhan dag la ston par mi byed pa lta na/ kho bos kyang de bzhin du bstan par bya'o/ /de ci'i
21b7(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ni yi ge med pa/ sems med pa/ sems dang bral ba ste/ gang gis ming brjod cing / ming de yang g.yo ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /lha'i bus
22a1(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ lha'i bu 'di dag ni/ khyod las chos bstan pa nyan par 'tshal gyi/ sa phyogs 'di nyid du khyod kyis lha'i bu 'di dag la chos kyi
22a2(dkon brtsegs): bka' mchid gsungs shig/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ kho bo ni nyan par 'dod pa rnams la chos ston par mi byed de/ 'dzin par 'dod pa rnams la yang ma yin no/ /de
22a3(dkon brtsegs): ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu/ bdag tu 'dzin na nyan 'dod par 'gyur la/ sems can du 'dzin pa dang / srog tu 'dzin pa dang / gang zag tu 'dzin na nyan 'dod par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /
22a4(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu/ gang la ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa yod pa de ni 'di snyam du 'di ni ston par byed pa'o/ /bdag ni nyan pa'o/ /'di ni bshad par bya'o snyam du sems pas/ de ni chags
22a5(dkon brtsegs): pa gsum gyis chags pa yin te/ gsum gang zhe na/ bdag tu dmigs pa dang / sems can du dmigs pa dang / chos su dmigs pa'o/ /lha'i bu/ gang la ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga
22a6(dkon brtsegs): yir 'dzin pa med pa de ni 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas chos ston par byed de/ rnam par rtog par mi byed/ sems par mi byed/ rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de la 'khor gsum
22a7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ bdag tu dmigs pa med cing rnam par rtog par mi byed/ rlom sems su mi byed/ sems par mi byed pa de dang / chos smra bar dmigs pa med cing
22b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rtog par mi byed/ rlom sems su mi byed/ sems par mi byed pa dang / chos su dmigs pa med cing rnam par rtog par mi byed/ rlom sems su mi byed/ sems par mi byed pa ste/
22b2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu/ gang dag de ltar nyan pa de dag ni mnyam par nyan pa yin te/ mi mnyam pa ma yin no/ /lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ ci nas kyang mi ldog pa nyid kyi slad
22b3(dkon brtsegs): du bstan pa bshad pa legs so/ / legs so/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ ci rung rnam par ma rtog cig/ byang chub sems dpa' gang ldog pa de ni byang chub mngon par rdzogs
22b4(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshang rgya ste/ byang chub kyang dmigs su med do/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ gang las ldog/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ 'dod chags las grol go/ zhe
22b5(dkon brtsegs): sdang las ldog go/ gti mug las ldog go/ sred pa las ldog go/ ma rig pa las ldog go/ 'khor bar skye ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis kyi bar las ldog go/ rgyu las ldog lo/
22b6(dkon brtsegs): lta ba las ldog go/ ming las ldog go /gzugs las ldog go /'dod pa'i khams las ldog go/ gzugs kyi khams las ldog go/ gzugs med pa'i khams las ldog go /nyan thos
22b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyod pa las ldog go / rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa las ldog go/ /rtog pa las ldog go/ 'dzin pa las ldog go /mtshan ma las ldog go /dngos por 'dzin pa las ldog go /chad
23a1(dkon brtsegs): par lta ba las ldog go / rtag par lta ba las ldog go/ blang ba las ldog go /dor ba las ldog go /bdag tu 'du shes pa las ldog go/ sems can du 'du
23a2(dkon brtsegs): shes pa las ldog go / srog tu 'du shes pa las ldog go /gang zag tu 'du shes pa las ldog go/ yid la byed pa dag las ldog go/ chags pa dag las ldog go/ phyin ci log dag
23a3(dkon brtsegs): las ldog go/ 'jigs tshogs las ldog go /'jig tshogs la lta ba las ldog go/ 'jig tshogs kyi rtsa ba las byung ba'i lta ba'i rnam pa drug cu rtsa gnyis las ldog go /sgrib pa dag
23a4(dkon brtsegs): las ldog go / phung po lngar 'dzin pa las ldog go/ phyi dang nang gi skye mched thams cad las ldog go /khams rnams las ldog go /sangs rgyas su 'du shes pa las ldog go /chos su
23a5(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes pa las ldog go / dge 'dun du 'du shes pa las ldog go /bdag sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/ /bdag chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /bdag sems can grol bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /
23a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag bdud 'dul bar 'gyur ro/ /bdag ye shes thob par 'gyur ro snyam pa'i 'du shes de dag las ldog go /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la rtog par mi byed do/ /sangs
23a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la rtog par mi byed do/ /dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams la rtog par mi byed do/ /mtshan ma rnams la rtog par mi
23b1(dkon brtsegs): byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing bkod pa rnams la rtog par mi byed do/ /nyan thos kyi dge 'dun phun sum tshogs pa la rtog par mi byed cing rtog pa thams cad las ldog ste/ lha'i bu/ de ltar
23b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' gang de las ldog pa de ni mi ldog pa yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ gang las mi ldog go/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ sangs rgyas kyi ye
23b3(dkon brtsegs): shes las mi ldog go/ stong pa nyid las mi ldog go/ mtshan ma med pa las mi ldog go/ smon pa med pa las mi ldog go /de bzhin nyid las mi ldog go /chos kyi dbyings las mi ldog
23b4(dkon brtsegs): go| yang dag pa'i mtha' las mi ldog go/ mnyam pa nyid las mi ldog go /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ de skad ces byang chub sems dpa' gang rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa
23b5(dkon brtsegs): dang | yongs su rtog pa'i chos de dag las ldog pa des na ldog pa zhes bya'o zhes gsungs pa de/ ci gang dag las ldog pa'i chos de dag mchis pa zhig gam/ 'on te ma mchis pa
23b6(dkon brtsegs): zhig gam/ 'on te mchis pa dang ma mchis pa zhig gam/ 'on te mchis pa yang ma lags/ ma mchis pa yang ma lags pa zhig lags/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ gang
23b7(dkon brtsegs): dag las ldog pa'i chos de dag ni yod pa yang ma yin/ med pa yang ma yin/ yod pa dang med pa yang ma yin/ yod pa yang ma yin med pa yang ma yin pa yang ma yin no/ /lha'i bus
24a1(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ 'o na gang las ldog/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ yang dag pa ma yin par 'dzin pa dang / legs pa ma yin par 'dzin
24a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / log par 'dzin pa gang yin pa de 'dzin par mi byed/ yongs su gtong bar mi byed/ mtshan mar mi byed pa de'i phyir ldog pa zhes byas te/ de ni yod par yang bstan par mi bya/
24a3(dkon brtsegs): med par yang bstan par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal te yod pa dang med pa las ldog par gyur na/ de ni skyon du gyur pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal te yod pa las ldog
24a4(dkon brtsegs): par gyur na rtag par 'gyur la/ med pa las ldog par gyur na chad par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag pa dang chad pa'i phyir chos ston par mi mdzad de/ sangs rgyas
24a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos bstan pa ni rtag pa'i phyir yang ma yin/ chad pa'i phyir yang ma yin no/ /lha'i bu/ de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni sngon ma byung bar gyur pa'o/ /zhes 'du
24a6(dkon brtsegs): shes kyis yod pa ma yin par yongs su shes par zad kyi/ de la ni chad pa yang med/ rtag pa yang med de/ lha'i bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ldog pa yin no/ /bstan pa 'di
24a7(dkon brtsegs): bshad pa na lha'i bu khris mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /de nas lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam
24b1(dkon brtsegs): dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / zhu ba dang zhu blag bgyi ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar bzhud kyi gshegs
24b2(dkon brtsegs): so| |'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu rnam par rtog pa la ma spyod cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ni kho bos blangs zin to/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs
24b3(dkon brtsegs): pa de gang na bzhugs/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ de ni kho bo'i mdun na bzhugs so/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ de mi gda'o/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i
24b4(dkon brtsegs): bu| gal te khyod kyis thams cad mthong na/ des de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ ci slad du de skad ces de bzhin gshegs pa de ni
24b5(dkon brtsegs): kho bos blangs zin te/ de ni kho bo'i mdun na bzhugs so zhes gsung / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ kho bo'i mdun zhes bya ba ci zhig yin snyam/
24b6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ nam mkha'i khams lags so/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa de yang 'di lta ste/ nam mkha'i khams yin no//
24b7(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i phyir nam mkha' ji lta bu yin pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang de lta bu yin pas/ nam mkha' dang de bzhin gshegs
25a1(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med pa'i phyir ro/ /lha'i bu/ de lta bas na khyod de bzhin gshegs pa blta bar 'dod na/ mtha' 'di khong du chud par
25a2(dkon brtsegs): bya zhing cung zad kyang rnam par brtag par mi bya'o/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ de'i tshe khang pa brtsegs pa gru bzhi lham pa/ ka pa bzhi pa cha mnyam pa/ shin tu 'byes pa/
25a3(dkon brtsegs): mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa sum khri nyis stong mngon par sprul to/ /khang pa brtsegs pa de dag tu rin po che'i khri stan lha'i dpag bsam shing las byung ba'i gos kyis bshams pa dag
25a4(dkon brtsegs): kyang sprul cing / khri stan re re la yang byang chub sems dpa'i lus gzugs skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa dag sprul to/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
25a5(dkon brtsegs): pas| ci lta bu'i byin gyi rlabs nas/ 'di lta bur 'gyur ba'i byin gyis brlabs pas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni rnam par spyod pa'i pad+ma gang dag
25a6(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de dag dang / khang pa brtsegs pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la lan gsum
25a7(dkon brtsegs): bskor ba byas te/ steng gi bar snang la bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la snang bar byed cing / phyogs bzhi kun nas 'khor bar 'khod do/ /de nas pad+ma de dag la
25b1(dkon brtsegs): 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa gang dag yin pa de dag dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dag na 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das
25b2(dkon brtsegs): la sgra dbyangs mthun par tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /gang+gA'i bye snyed bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ /sangs rgyas bye ba phrag mang khyod kyis mchod/ /byang chub mchog gi
25b3(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa btsal mdzad pas/ /de slad mi mchog khyod ni mdzes pa lags/ /thub pa mtshan gyis yongs su spras gyur pa/ /sku mchog srid pa gsum na lhang nge ste/ /'dren pa gang la ming dang srog
25b4(dkon brtsegs): dang ni/ /gang zag ma mchis chos ni 'gro la ston/ /rnam par 'dren pas sbyin dang tshul khrims spyad/ /bzod dang brtson 'grus de bzhin bsam gtan bsten/ /khyod kyis shes rab srid gsum
25b5(dkon brtsegs): thogs mi mnga'/ /ye shes mthar byon khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig chos rje lha dang mis mchod pa'i/ /'jig rten 'dren pa la ni 'dun 'gyur zhing / /stong pa nyid la mos par bgyid pa
25b6(dkon brtsegs): yi| |mi de 'jig rten dag gi 'dren par 'gyur/ /gang dag sngon byung de bzhin gshegs pa dang / /gang dag phyogs rnams bzhugs pa'i 'dren pa dag /de dag gis ni mtshan med stong
25b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos/ /rang bzhin mtshan nyid ma mchis rtag tu bsgoms/ /'di la rang bzhin sems can gang yang ni/ /skye dang 'chi ba dmigs su ma mchis shing / /'ong ba ma mchis 'gro
26a1(dkon brtsegs): ba ma mchis te/ /chos rnams thams cad nam mkha' ji bzhin no/ /ci ltar mi yis sgyu ma bstan gyur pa/ /snang yang de bzhin nyid du ma mchis ltar/ /de
26a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin chos rnams sgyu ma 'dra ba dang / /rmi lam lta bur bde bar gshegs pas bstan/ /gang zag la las gang+gA'i bye snyed kyi/ /'jig rten khams rnams 'dir ni sbyin byas dang / /
26a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dus byas stong par bzod pa gang lags pa/ /bzod pa de ni sbyin las khyad par 'phags/ /byang chub 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /bskal pa bye ba gang+gA'i bye snyed du/ /
26a4(dkon brtsegs): me tog spos dang de bzhin zas skom dag/ phul nas mi mchog sangs rgyas mchod pa bas/ /gang gis gang la ming dang srog dang ni/ /gang zag ma mchis de 'dra'i chos 'di dag /
26a5(dkon brtsegs): thos nas de la 'od gsal bzod thob pa/ /de yis mi rnams dam pa mchod pa lags/ /gang la ming dang gang zag 'du shes mchis/ /bskal pa bye ba mang por zas skom dang / /
26a6(dkon brtsegs): shing rta dpung chung khri stan sbyin bgyid kyang / /des ni 'gro ba grol bar mi thob bo/ /mi mchog gang dag mya ngan 'das pa dang / /de dag gis kyang sems can ma bkrol ba/ /mkhas
26a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal stong pa yi/ /chos rnams de ltar mkhyen pas rnam par grol/ /sangs rgyas 'byung dang yul du gnas pa dang / /de bzhin bstan la dad pa thob pa dka'//
26b1(dkon brtsegs): mi yi srid pa'ang rnyed par dka' bas na/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi bstan la legs brtson gyis/ /mi khom brgyad po thams cad rnam spangs shing / /khom pa phun sum rnyed dka' thob 'gyur la/ /bde
26b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs bstan la dad pa rnyed gyur pa'i/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis rig pa'i rnal 'byor spyod/ /sgra la 'chel zhing 'dug par ma byed par/ /chos thos gyur nas rtag tu nan tan gyis/ /khyed kyis
26b3(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu dgon pa'i gnas brten la/ /des ni mi rnams dam par 'gyur bar byos/ /chos smra'i dge bshes gang yin bsten gyis la/ /sdig pa'i grogs la lan 'ga'ang ma bsten cig /sems
26b4(dkon brtsegs): can kun la sems ni mnyam gyis la/ /sems can de la nam yang ma rloms shig /tshul khrims ldan dang mang du thos gyis la/ /rtag tu phyag dar khrod dang bsod snyoms spyod/ /g.yel
26b5(dkon brtsegs): ba med par shing drung bsten gyis la/ /bskus te bor ba mchog la ma smod cig /'dus byas 'di dag thams cad 'dus byas min/ /mtshan nyid gcig cing smig rgyu 'dra ba yi/ /dam
26b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i don gyi mu gcig shes gyis la/ /myur du gzhal yas byang chub reg par gyis/ /phung po lnga rnams sgyu ma bzhin du ltos/ /nang gi skye mched drug dang phyi yi drug /de dag grong
26b7(dkon brtsegs): stong 'dra bar gsungs pas na/ /de la nam yang bsten par ma byed cig /'dod chags zhe sdang rang bzhin stong pa nyid/ /gti mug nga rgyal yongs su rtog pas bskyed/ /rtog pa de
27a1(dkon brtsegs): yang ma byung 'byung med par/ /de ltar shes na 'dren pa rnams su 'gyur/ /de nas sprul pa de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras pa na/ 'khor de las
27a2(dkon brtsegs): srog chags nyi khri nyis stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/ /dge slong lnga brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /dge
27a3(dkon brtsegs): slong sum brgya ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go / dge slong ma sum stong yang chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba
27a4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par dag go/ dge bsnyen bdun stong dang / dge bsnyen ma stong dang / lha'i bu nyi khri bdun stong yang chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go /
27a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sum brgyas ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos te/ g.yos/
27a6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ ldeg/ rab tu ldeg /kun tu rab tu ldeg go /de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas
27a7(dkon brtsegs): brtan shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos pa dang / byang
27b1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i lus gzugs pad ma dag dang / khang pa brtsegs pa 'di dag na mchis pa 'di rnams chos zab mo 'di lta bu ston par bgyid pa dang / 'khor 'di yang snang ba chen pos
27b2(dkon brtsegs): khyab par gyur pa dang / lha'i bu bye ba phrag 'di snyed 'dus pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po 'dus pa 'di dag su'i mthu lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
27b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i mthu yin te/ des bkod pa 'di lta bu 'di dag kun
27b4(dkon brtsegs): du snang ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar deng de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi chos
27b5(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs zhu zhing zhu blag byed par 'gyur
27b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de
27b7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor 'dus pa 'di na mi gda'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu khyod re zhig sdod cig dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de/ de'u re bdud kyi dkyil 'khor
28a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dang / bdud kyi gnas thams cad dang / bdud thams cad zil gyis gnon cing / bkod pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der
28a2(dkon brtsegs): 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so//
28a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas de'i mod la stong
28a4(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na bdud kyi gnas bye ba brgya phrag ji snyed pa de dag thams cad mog mog por gyur to/ /bdud sdig can de dag kyang rang rang gi
28a5(dkon brtsegs): lus rgas shing gtugs la 'khogs par gyur nas/ lag pa 'khar ba la brten cing 'gro bar gyur to/ /de dag gis lha'i bu mo rnams kyang rgas shing gtugs la 'khogs
28a6(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pa dang / rang rang gi gzhal med khang dag kyang rnyings shing rab tu 'jig la/ mun pa mun nag tu gyur pa mthong ngo / /de nas bdud sdig can de dag skrag cing dngangs
28a7(dkon brtsegs): la yi chad cing sgyid lug ste/ spu'i khung bu zing zhes byed par gyur nas 'di snyam du rnam par rtog ste/ gang gis bdag cag bdud kyi gnas rnams 'di lta bu'i gnas skabs
28b1(dkon brtsegs): su gyur pa 'di'i rgyu ni gang yin/ rkyen ni gang yin/ bdag cag 'di nas 'chi 'pho zhing med pa'am/ gcig tu mi 'gyur grang snyam mo/ /bdud de dag gis rnam par rtog pa de lta bu de skyes ma
28b2(dkon brtsegs): thag tu/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas lha'i bu sprul pa ther 'bum sprul te/ bdud de dag gi mdun du bkod do/ /de nas lha'i bu sprul pa de dag gis bdud sdig can de dag la 'di
28b3(dkon brtsegs): skad ces smras so/ /grogs po dag/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa zhes bya ba de da ltar bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jig
28b4(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa de'i mthu yin te/ khyed la 'tshe ba gang yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur gyi/ ma skrag cig /lha'i bu/ sprul pa de dag gis tshig de
28b5(dkon brtsegs): skad ces smras ma thag tu de nas bdud sdig can de dag gis sgra de yang thos/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i ming yang thos nas yang rgya cher dngangs shing skrag ste/ bdud kyi gnas de
28b6(dkon brtsegs): dag thams cad kyang rab tu g.yos so/ /de nas bdud sdig can de dag gis lha'i bu sprul pa de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /grogs po dag /yongs su skyobs shig /de nas lha'i bu
28b7(dkon brtsegs): sprul pa de dag gis bdud sdig can de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /grogs po dag /yongs su ma 'jigs shig /khyed cag deng la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
29a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der song zhig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje dang ldan pa de ni sems can
29a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs par gyur pa rnams la mi 'jigs pa stsol bar mdzad do/ /de nas lha'i bu sprul pa de dag gis tshig de skad ces smras nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas bdud sdig
29a3(dkon brtsegs): c an 'khor bdud sdig can 'bum phrag ther 'bum du ma dang bcas pa de dag thams cad rgas shing gtugs la 'khogs shing lag pa 'khar ba la brten bzhin du 'dong zhing skad
29a4(dkon brtsegs): cig thang cig yud tsam cig la/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der song ste lhags nas/ bcom
29a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la thams cad kyis sgra skad mthun par 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag mi sdug pa'i rnam pa 'di dag las yongs su bskyab tu gsol/ bde
29a6(dkon brtsegs): bar gshegs pa bdag cag bskyab tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum gyi mtshan yongs su bsgrags pa ni mi mngon lags kyi/ 'jam dpal gzhon
29a7(dkon brtsegs): nur gyur pa gcig pu'i ming ni de lta ma lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i ming thos na bdag cag 'jigs shing dngangs la skrag par gyur te/ 'chi
29b1(dkon brtsegs): 'pho ba snyam du 'chal cing ma mchis par 'gyur ba snyam du 'tshal ba'i slad du'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud sdig can de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /bdud sdig can
29b2(dkon brtsegs): dag / de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ ji ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yongs su smin pa dang / rnam par dbye ba med par sems can rnams kyi don byas pa dang /
29b3(dkon brtsegs): byed par 'gyur ba de ltar sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum gyis kyang sems can rnams kyi don ma mdzad/ mi mdzad pas/ de'i phyir ji ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gcig pu'i ming
29b4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bsgrags pa de ltar/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum gyi mtshan yongs su bsgrags pas ni khyed cag sdug bsngal zhing rnam par 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
29b5(dkon brtsegs): la bdud sdig can de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag 'di lta bu'i lus 'khogs pa 'dis nyam thag cing ngo tsha lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das/ sngon
29b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag gi kha dog rgyas par gyur pa gang lags pa de lta bu 'tshal lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyed cag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ma 'ongs kyi bar du re

30a1(dkon brtsegs): stan las langs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag du mas kyang yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar/ lha'i bu 'bum phrag du ma dang / klu dang / gnod

30a3(dkon brtsegs): la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar po'i char dag rab tu 'bebs pa sha stag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ bkod pa chen po dang / rnam par rtse ba chen pos

30a7(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin bsgrubs pa de de bzhin gshegs pa gang las thos/ khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin de bsgrubs nas ni ji srid cig lon/ 'jam
30b1(dkon brtsegs): dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang gi tshe bdag gis ting nge 'dzin bsgrubs pa de thos shing / bdag gis ting nge 'dzin de bsgrubs pa de'i tshe na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang

30b3(dkon brtsegs): de'i mtshan ci/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yang ches bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ grangs ma mchis
30b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yang ches grangs ma mchis pa 'das pa de'i tshe/ de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa me tog mnad ra ba'i dri zhes bgyi ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig
30b5(dkon brtsegs): rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byung ste/ de ting nge 'dzin bsgrubs pa de gsung bar gyur nas/ de

31a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa'i ting nge 'dzin de thob ste/ nyi shu gang zhen/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags rnam par

33a1(dkon brtsegs): bsgrubs so/ /bstan pa 'di bshad pa na 'khor de las byang chub sems dpa' khri ni ting nge 'dzin de bsgrubs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan shA ri'i

36a7(dkon brtsegs): bar gnang na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa
36b1(dkon brtsegs): dang | bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'jam dpal khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa de bzhin gshegs pa la zhus shig dang / ngas zhus
36b2(dkon brtsegs): pa de dang de nyid kyi lan gdab pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des bcom
36b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i
36b4(dkon brtsegs): slad du byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'jam dpal/ chos
36b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rtog pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/ /'jam dpal/ gang dag rtogs pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i chos thams cad po
36b6(dkon brtsegs): de dag gang zhe na/ 'jam dpal/ 'di la byang chub sems dpas mig rtogs par byed do/ /rna ba rtogs par byed do/ /sna rtogs par byed do/ /lce rtogs par byed do/ /lus rtogs par
36b7(dkon brtsegs): byed do/ /yid rtogs par byed do/ /'jam dpal/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas mig rtogs par byed/ ji ltar rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid rtogs par byed ce na/
37a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal/ 'di la byang chub sems dpas mig rang bzhin gyis stong zhes bya bar rtogs par byed kyang rtogs so snyam du rnam par mi rtog go /rna ba dang /
37a2(dkon brtsegs): sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid rang bzhin gyis stong zhes bya bar rtogs par byed kyang rtogs so snyam du rnam par mi rtog go /gzugs rnams dang / sgra rnams dang / dri rnams
37a3(dkon brtsegs): dang | ro rnams dang / reg bya rnams dang / chos rnams rang bzhin gyis stong zhes bya bar rtogs par byed kyang rtogs so snyam du rnam par mi rtog go /'jam dpal/ gzhan yang
37a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag rtogs par byed do/ /ji ltar rtogs par byed ce na/ stong pa nyid dag tu rtogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma med pa dag tu rtogs
37a5(dkon brtsegs): par byed do/ /smon pa med pa dag tu rtogs par byed do/ /'dod chags dang bral ba dag tu rtogs par byed do/ /zhi ba dag tu rtogs par byed do/ /dben pa dag tu rtogs par byed do/ /
37a6(dkon brtsegs): dngos po med pa dag tu rtogs par byed do/ /g.yo ba med pa dag tu rtogs par byed do/ /skye ba med pa dag tu rtogs par byed do/ /'ong ba med pa dag tu rtogs par byed do/ /'gro ba
37a7(dkon brtsegs): med pa dag tu rtogs par byed do/ /ngo bo nyid med pa dag tu rtogs par byed do/ /bdag po med pa dag tu rtogs par byed do/ /rnam par rig pa med pa dag tu rtogs par byed do/ /shes
37b1(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa dag tu rtogs par byed do/ /mthong ba med pa dag tu rtogs par byed do/ /ma skyes pa dag tu rtogs par byed do/ /spros pa med pa dag tu rtogs par byed do/ /bdag gi med pa
37b2(dkon brtsegs): dag tu rtogs par byed do/ /rtog pas kun nas bslang ba dag tu rtogs par byed do/ /rnam par rtog pas kun nas kun nas bslang ba dag tu rtogs par byed do/ /rten cing 'brel par
37b3(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba dag tu rtogs par byed do/ /sgyu ma lta bu dag tu rtogs par byed do/ /rmi lam lta bu dag tu rtogs par byed do/ /mig yor lta bu dag tu rtogs par byed do/ /brag ca lta bu
37b4(dkon brtsegs): dag tu rtogs par byed do/ /chu shing gi snying po lta bu dag tu rtogs par byed do/ /ring du mi gnas pa dag dang / snying po med pa dag dang / gsog dag dang / gsob dag tu rtogs
