66b2(dkon brtsegs): gnyis su med pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze zhes bgyi na/ ji tsam
66b3(dkon brtsegs): gyis na dge sbyong dang / bram ze zhes bgyi/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ gang dge sbyong yang ma yin/ bram ze yang ma yin pa de ni dge sbyong dang / bram ze zhes bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe
66b4(dkon brtsegs): na| lha'i bu/ gang 'dod pa'i khams la yang mi chags/ gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams la yang mi chags pa de ni dge sbyong yin no zhes kho bo smra zhing / lha'i bu/ gang mig
66b5(dkon brtsegs): las mi 'dzag/ rna ba las mi 'dzag/ sna las mi 'dzag/ lce las mi 'dzag/ lus las mi 'dzag/ yid las mi 'dzag pa de ni dge sbyong yin no zhes kho bo smra la/ lha'i bu/ gang la
66b6(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa med cing gnas par gdags pa med pa dang / kun du gnas pa med cing kun du gnas par gdags pa med pa de ni dge sbyong yin no zhes kho bo smra ba'i phyir dang / lha'i bu/ gang
66b7(dkon brtsegs): las kyang ma 'ongs gang du yang mi 'gro la/ rma med cing rma dang bral ba de ni bram ze yin no zhes kho bo smra ba'i phyir ro/ /gang dag dge sbyong yang ma yin/ bram ze yang ma yin pa de ni dge sbyong dang /
67a1(dkon brtsegs): bram ze zhes bya'o zhes bya ba'i tshig de bstan pa de ni de yin no/ /de nas 'khor de nyid du byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan bzhi sgom pa/ mngon par shes
67a2(dkon brtsegs): pa lnga thob pa lnga zhig 'dus par gyur pa de dag da dung bzod pa thob pa ma yin pas gnas shing snyoms par 'jug par byed/ gnas shing rnam par ldang bar byed de/ byang chub sems
67a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' de dag gis sngon pha bsad pa dang / ma bsad pa dang / dgra bcom pa bsad pa'i sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran cing / de dag la las kyi rnam par smin pa de'i las kyi lhag ma yod
67a4(dkon brtsegs): pas| de dag sems yongs su gdung ba des chos zab mo dag la mi bzod cing / bdag nyid la brten te rnam par rtog pa kho nar byed de/ de dag gi 'di lta ste/ chos la bzod pa ma thob
67a5(dkon brtsegs): pas kun nas ldang ba de rnam par gnon par mi nus so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' lnga po de dag gdul ba'i dbang gi phyir 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
67a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems bsdu bar mdzad do/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas lag pa g.yas pas ral gri blangs te legs par
67a7(dkon brtsegs): brdar nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su brgyugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te/ /'jam dpal/
67b1(dkon brtsegs): nga ni bsad zin cing legs par bsad zin gyi/ thong zhig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal/ skyes bu gang dag gis gang gi tshe gsod do snyam pa'i sems skyed par byed pa'i sems
67b2(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa de'i tshe de dag gis yun ring po nas bsad pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' lnga dag 'di snyam du sems te/ chos thams cad ni sgyu ma lta bu ste/ 'di la bdag gam/
67b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can nam/ srog gam/ gang zag gam/ shed las skyes sam/ shed bu ni 'ga' yang med do/ /'di la pha yang med/ ma yang med/ sangs rgyas kyang med/ chos kyang med/
67b4(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun yang med/ 'di la gang mtshams med par byed par 'gyur ba yang 'ga' yang med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di ni mkhas pa/ mdzangs pa/
67b5(dkon brtsegs): yid gzhungs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod pa/ bsngags pa zab mo la bzod pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la
67b6(dkon brtsegs): lhag par bya ba byas pa/ chos thams cad rab tu 'byed pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa/ ci lta ba bzhin du chos ston pa/ yang dag par smra ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gus pa dang bcas
67b7(dkon brtsegs): pa yin na/ de mtshon rnon po thogs te de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der rgyug cing / de bzhin gshegs pa yang de skad ces/ 'jam dpal/ nga ni bsad zin cing / legs par
68a1(dkon brtsegs): bsad zin gyi thong zhig ces gsungs pa'i phyir te/ gal te 'di la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba dang / chos zhes bya ba dang / dge 'dun zhes bya ba dang / pha zhes
68a2(dkon brtsegs): bya ba dang / ma zhes bya ba dang / dgra bcom pa zhes bya ba'i chos ther zug tu gnas pa 'ga' zhig yongs su 'grub par 'gyur na ni mtshams med par 'dzin pa de la nges par 'byung ba
68a3(dkon brtsegs): yang yod par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ gang gi phyir chos de dag ni med la/ log pa/ yang dag pa ma yin par bzung ba/ stong pa/ sgyu ma lta bu yin pa de'i phyir/ 'di la gang byed
68a4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba'am/ gang la byed par 'gyur ba'i byed pa 'ga' yang med do snyam mo/ /byang chub sems dpa' lnga po de dag gis de ltar shes pas/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa
68a5(dkon brtsegs): thob par gyur nas/ de dag dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis ta la bdun srid tsam du nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ mngon par 'phags nas bcom ldan 'das
68a6(dkon brtsegs): la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /chos kun sgyu ma lta bu ste/ /yongs su rtog pa kun nas bskyed/ /'di la grub ba ma mchis te/ /chos 'di thams cad
68a7(dkon brtsegs): stong pa lags/ /bdag tu 'du shes rmongs pa rnams/ /log par yongs su rtog par bgyi/ /sngon gyi mthar ni mi bzad pa'i/ /sug las bgyis ba de yang dran/ /tshe rabs snga ma
68b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams su ni/ /pha ma sbyin gnas bkum gyur cing / /dge slong dgra bcom bkum pa yi/ /sug las shin tu mi bzad bgyis/ /sug las de yi rnam smin gyis/ /sdug bsngal tshor
68b2(dkon brtsegs): ba myong gyur zhing / /'gyod pa skyes par gyur pa ni/ /chos thos pas na rnam dag gyur/ /grags chen zug rngu 'byin pa yis/ /bdag cag 'gyod pa bsal mdzad pas/ /gang la nyon
68b3(dkon brtsegs): mongs ma mchis pa'i/ /chos dbyings rjes su rtogs par gyur/ /sangs rgyas thabs la mkhas pa ste/ /thub pa thabs kyi mkhyen pa mnga'/ /thabs des sems can thams cad kyi/ /
68b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyod pa dag ni rnam par bsal/ /chos rnams rang bzhin stong pas na/ /'di la sangs rgyas chos dang yang / /dge 'dun mi dmigs 'di la ni/ /pha ma ma mchis dgra bcom min//
68b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di la 'gum pa ma mchis te/ /'gum pa 'ga' yang mchis ma lags/ /mnyam nyid ci bzhin 'byung ba ste/ /de ni chos rnams mtshan nyid lags/ /'jam dbyangs shes rab
68b6(dkon brtsegs): chen po pa/ /chos rnams pha rol phyin pa yis/ /mtshon cha rnon po thogs nas ni/ /sangs rgyas ga la bzhugs par brgyugs/ /sangs rgyas ci bzhin mtshon de bzhin/ /de dag gnyis
68b7(dkon brtsegs): ka mtshan nyid gcig / mi skye 'byung ba ma mchis te/ /'di la 'gum pa 'ga' ma mchis/ /mtshon thogs pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi
69a1(dkon brtsegs): zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag rnam pa drug tu rab g.yos shing / sa chen po g.yos pa yang 'jig rten du byung bar gyur to/ /de nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
69a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag la rang rang gi bsnyen bkur ba dag gis zhus pa/ bcom ldan
69a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das gang gis dog sa chen po g.yos pa 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba 'di su'i mthu lags/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag/ 'jig
69a4(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba chos ston to/ /'jig rten gyi khams
69a5(dkon brtsegs): mi mjed de na byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa zhig 'dug pa des/ 'di lta ste/
69a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag 'dul ba'i dbang gis phyir shes rab kyi ral gri'i mtshon rnon po thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de ga la ba de
69a7(dkon brtsegs): logs su brgyugs so/ /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi shes rab kyi mtshon las brtsams te/ ci nas kyang sems can dpag tu med pa dag mig rnam par dag pa
69b1(dkon brtsegs): dang | sems rnam par grol ba dang / bzod pa skyes pa dang / byang chub la zhugs par gyur pa de lta de ltar chos bstan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas kyang 'khor de na sems
69b2(dkon brtsegs): can las dang po pa dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba/ rnam par rtog pa mang ba gang dag 'khod pa de dag gis mtshon de mi mthong zhing / chos bstan pa de yang mi thos pa de ltar byin gyi rlabs kyis byin
69b3(dkon brtsegs): gyis brlabs so/ /de nas gnas brtan shA ri'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal khyod kyis ston pa bgrongs pa'i phyir brtul pa'i las mi bzad
69b4(dkon brtsegs): pa mngon par 'dus byas pa de khyod la gang du rnam par smin par 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ kho bos las mi
69b5(dkon brtsegs): bzad pa de lta bu ni byas na/ de gang du rnam par smin par 'gyur pa'i gnas ni mi shes so/ /btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ de ltar mod kyi/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu las gang du rnam par smin par 'gyur ba
69b6(dkon brtsegs): der kho bo'i yang rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu yang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog la/ chos thams cad kyang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog
69b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar de btsun pa nyid la dri'i/ khyod ci ltar bzod pa de ltar ston cig/ btsun pa/ mtshon dmigs su yod dam/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ 'jam

70b1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' de dag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su bltas so/ bltas pa na phyogs bcu kun gyi rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag nas 'jam dpal

71b1(dkon brtsegs): skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ci nas kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha mar gyur pa na spyod par 'gyur zhing / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dag gi rna lam

76a5(dkon brtsegs): gang | |de ni 'dren pas bdag la gsungs/ /gang gis mdzes par 'gyur ba lags/ /gang gis rdzus te skye bar 'gyur/ /skye ba dran par ji ltar 'gyur/ /thub pa chen pos lung bstan
76a6(dkon brtsegs): gsol/ /de dag lhag bsam ye shes kyis/ /mkhyen nas sangs rgyas lung bstan pa/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod gang zhes/ /khyod kyis dris pa de bstan to/ /bzod pa yis ni mdzes
76a7(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ /tshangs par spyad pas brdzus te skye/ /chos kyi sbyin pas skye ba dran/ /gzhon nu de ltar shes par gyis/ /gang gis sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan/ /dpe byad bzang po brgyad
76b1(dkon brtsegs): cu dang / /gser mdog 'dra ba'i lus 'gyur zhing / /de mthong sems can dga' bar 'gyur/ /sbyin pa kun gyis mtshan du 'gyur/ /byams pas de bzhin dpe byad bzang / /sems can kun la sems
76b2(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pas/ /rgyal ba gser gyi mdog 'drar 'gyur/ /gzungs ni gang gis thob par 'gyur/ /gang gis ting 'dzin skye 'gyur lags/ /gzung ba'i tshig tu gang gis 'gyur/ /thub pa chen pos
76b3(dkon brtsegs): bstan du gsol/ /chos la bzod pas gzungs rnams thob/ /sems bsgoms pas ni ting 'dzin skye/ /kyal ba'i tshig rnams spangs byas na/ /gzung bar 'os pa'i tshig tu 'gyur/ /dran dang ldan
76b4(dkon brtsegs): par ji ltar 'gyur/ /thub pa ji ltar blo gros ldan/ /ji ltar chos spyad 'gyur ba lags/ /skyes bu dam pa mkhas cis 'gyur/ /g.yo med pas ni dran ldan 'gyur/ /don la sems pas blo gros
76b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan| |gus dang bcas pas chos spyod 'gyur/ /chos kyi mtshan nyid rtogs pas mkhas/ /'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar ni/ /las gang gis ni skye bar 'gyur/ /'jig rten mgon gyi mngon sum
76b6(dkon brtsegs): du| |zhu ba zhu bar ji ltar 'gyur/ /gang gis chos kyi sbyin pa la/ /nam yang bar chad mi byed pa/ /de ni des na myur rab tu/ /'jig rten mgon dang phrad par 'gyur/ /gang gis mi khom spong bar
76b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ /gang gis bzang 'gror mchi 'gyur lags/ /skye ba kun du skye ba na/ /bag mchis par ni ji ltar 'gyur/ /dad pas mi khom spong bar 'gyur/ /tshul khrims kyis ni bzang 'gror 'gro/ /stong pa
77a1(dkon brtsegs): nyid ni bsgom byas na/ /rtag tu bag dang ldan par 'gyur/ /thub pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /ji ltar las rnams dag par 'gyur/ /ji ltar bdud kyi rnyis mi
77a2(dkon brtsegs): thogs/ /ji ltar chos kyis phongs 'gyur spong / /rnam par grol bas las rnams dag /brtson 'grus kyis ni bdud 'dul 'gyur/ /ci smras de bzhin byed pas na/ /chos kyis phongs pa spong bar
77a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ /ka la ping ka'i sgra snyan dang / /tshangs pa'i dbyangs 'drar ji ltar 'gyur/ /thub pa mos pa sna tshogs kyis/ /sems can rnams ni gang gis dga'/ /bden par smra bas tshangs pa'i dbyangs//
77a4(dkon brtsegs): ngag rtsub spangs pas sgra snyan 'gyur/ /kyal pa'i tshig dang phra ma rnams/ /spangs pas sems can dga' bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar tshe ring 'gyur ba lags/ /bro nad nyung bar ji ltar 'gyur/ /rnam
77a5(dkon brtsegs): par 'dren pa gang gis na/ /g.yog 'khor rnams ni mi phyed 'gyur/ /gsod pa mi byed tshe ring 'gyur/ /mi 'tshe bas ni nad nyung 'gyur/ /mi mthun pa dag sdum byas na/ /g.yog 'khor rnams ni
77a6(dkon brtsegs): mi phyed 'gyur/ /don rnams ji ltar 'grub 'gyur lags/ /gang gis longs spyod nyams mi 'gyur/ /gang dang gang du skye ba der/ /dbang cher grags par ji ltar 'gyur/ /chags pa med pas
77a7(dkon brtsegs): don rnams 'grub/ /ser sna med pas longs spyod 'phel/ /gang dang gang du skye ba der/ /phrag dog med pas dbang cher grags/ /ji ltar lha yi mig thob 'gyur/ /lha yi rna ba ji ltar thob/ /sems
77b1(dkon brtsegs): can 'chi 'pho skye ba dag / 'dren pa gang gis 'tshal bar 'gyur/ /mar me byin pas mig thob 'gyur/ /rol mo'i sgra yis rna ba dag /'chi 'pho skye shes ye shes kyis/ /de bas de ltar 'grub par 'gyur//
77b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa byang chub sems dpa' yi/ /zag pa gang gis bas par 'gyur/ /tshe rabs snga dran cis 'gyur lags/ /rdzu 'phrul ci yis thob par 'gyur/ /bzhon pa byin pas rdzu 'phrul thob/ /dran pa bsgoms
77b3(dkon brtsegs): pas rjes su dran/ /mtha' gnyis rab tu spangs byas na/ /zag pa zad par reg par 'gyur/ /gang gis zhing ni phun sum tshogs/ /cis ni dge 'dun phun sum tshogs/ /gang gis phun sum tshogs
77b4(dkon brtsegs): 'od 'gyur/ /gang gis phyogs bcur lhang nger gda'/ /smon lam gyis ni phun sum zhing / /bsdu bas dge 'dun phun sum tshogs/ /'dir ni rin chen gdugs phul bas/ /phyogs bcur lhang nge
77b5(dkon brtsegs): snang bar 'gyur/ /chos rnams thams cad bsdu ba ni/ /chos gang gis ni 'thob par 'gyur/ /gang dang gang du skye ba der/ /byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba 'thob/ /sems can thams cad thar bya'i
77b6(dkon brtsegs): phyir| |byang chub don du sems btud pa/ /des na chos rnams bsdu ba'ang thob/ /des ni dga' ba'ang 'thob par 'gyur/ /bslab pa ci 'drar bslabs pa dang / /sems ni ci 'drar bsgoms pa yis//
77b7(dkon brtsegs): thub pa chen po khyod 'dra ba'i/ /ston pa thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur/ /sems can ma lus thams cad la/ /mnyam pa'i sems nyid bslabs pa dang / /mnyam par sems ni bsgoms pas na/ /
78a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad zil gnon rgyal bar 'gyur/ /skye ba kun du byang chub sems/ /rmi lam na yang sems de ni/ /'dor mi 'gyur na ma nyal tshe/ /smos ci 'tshal ba gang gis 'gyur/ /
78a2(dkon brtsegs): grong dang grong khyer rnams su'am/ /gang du gnas pa'i yul rnams su/ /byang chub la ni yang dag 'dzud/ /de na sems 'dor mi 'gyur ro/ /gang dang gang du skye bar yang / /ji lta stobs ni cher 'gyur
78a3(dkon brtsegs): zhing | |rtag tu mthu yis 'phags pa dang / /bdud rnams bye bas mi tshugs 'gyur/ /'dir ni snying po lnga byin zhing / /skrag la mi 'jigs byin na ni/ /gang dang gang du skye bar yang / /des na stobs ni
78a4(dkon brtsegs): cher 'gyur te/ /rtag tu mthu yis 'phags pa dang / /bdud rnams bye bas mi tshugs so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa de/ /'jig rten mgon gyis mngon sum du/ /lung bstan pa 'di thos nas su/ /
78a5(dkon brtsegs): seng ge yid ni dga' bar gyur/ /seng ge grogs dang lhan cig tu/ /'di skad kyi ni tshig smras te/ /spyod pa brtan pa 'di la ni/ /bdag cag rjes su bslab par bgyi/ /de nas sangs rgyas 'dzum mdzad de/ /
78a6(dkon brtsegs): stong gsum po yang g.yos gyur nas/ /ma pham pas ni sangs rgyas la/ /ji zhig slad du 'dzum mdzad pa/ /thub chen lung bstan gsol zhes zhus/ /de skad zhu ba zhus pa dang / /ma pham pa la sangs
78a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyis/ /'di skad ces ni bka' stsal to/ /gang gis phyir ni 'dzum mdzad pa/ /ma pham nga las 'dir nyon cig /sangs rgyas bye ba brgyad cu dang / /gzhan yang khrag khrig phrag bcu la/ /byang
78b1(dkon brtsegs): chub don du 'dus nas ni/ /mi yi 'dren pa rnams la mchod/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog /mar me mdzad pa tshun chad du/ /bram ze'i khye'u 'di dag rnams/ /nga yis yongs su smin
78b2(dkon brtsegs): par byas/ /snang ba chen zhes bya ba yi/ /bskal pa chen por 'byung 'gyur te/ /de dag bskal pa gcig de la/ /rnam par 'dren par 'gyur ba ste/ /ye shes tog gi rgyal mtshan zhes/ /'jig rten
78b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa rnams su 'gyur/ /'od dpag med kyi bkod pa ltar/ /de dag gi yang de 'drar 'gyur/ /byams pa nas ni bzung nas su/ /bskal pa sum brgya tshang bar ni/ /de yi bar du dus kun du/ /rtag tu
78b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas phrad par 'gyur/ /'di dag byang chub thob pa yi/ /ming ni gang su thos pa rnams/ /de dag thams cad 'jig rten du/ /kun mkhyen gang zag mtshungs med 'gyur/ /gang zhig lung bstan
78b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di thos nas/ /mos pa skyed par byed pa ni/ /'jig rten gsum po 'di dag ni/ /de dang mtshungs pa'i bsod nams med/ /gang gis bskal pa drug stong du/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams thams cad du//
78b6(dkon brtsegs): rin chen rnams kyis bkang byas nas/ /byang chub phyir 'dir byin pa bas/ /gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di/ /thos nas byang chub phyir 'jug na/ /sngar smos pa yi bsod nams kyis/ /grangs dang
78b7(dkon brtsegs): char yang mi phod do/ /chos 'di bshad pa'i tshe na ni/ /'jig rten mgon po'i mthu yis ni/ /lha rnams me tog char pa 'bebs/ /stong gsum po yang g.yos par gyur/ /seng+ge grogs dang bcas
79a1(dkon brtsegs): pa yis/ /mngon par shes pa lnga thob nas/ /nyin bdun bar du mchod byas te/ /bstan pa la ni rab tu byung / /de dag kun gyis ting 'dzin 'thob/ /zad mi shes kyi gzungs
79a2(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'thob/ /sems can rnams kyi don byed de/ /sangs rgyas chos la 'dzud par byed/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na sems can bye ba phrag brgyad cu byang chub mchog la zhugs so/ /bcom

79a4(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ 'phags pa seng ges zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/
79a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dus pa sum cu rtsa bdun pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dA na shI la dang / mu ne warma dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te
79a6(dkon brtsegs): skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o/ / //rgya gar skad du/ AR+Ya sarba bud+d+ha ma hA ra ha s+yo pA ya kau sha l+ya dz+nyA nod ta ra bo d+hi satwa pa ri pr-i ts+tshA pa ri brta nA ma ma hA
79a7(dkon brtsegs): yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang chen thabs la mkhas pa byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dam pa'i zhus pas le'u zhes bya ba theg pa chen
79b1(dkon brtsegs): po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal
79b2(dkon brtsegs): bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ slob pa dang mi slob pa'i dge slong brgyad stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
79b3(dkon brtsegs): chen po khri drug stong thams cad kyang mngon par shes pas mngon par shes pa/ gzungs thob pa/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa/ mngon par shes pa bsgrub pa la mkhas pa/ mi skye ba'i chos
79b4(dkon brtsegs): la bzod pa thob pa/ yon tan 'bum phrag du ma dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyem red kyi dus kyi tshe/ nang du
79b5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas ring po ma lon par 'khor 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston te/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du
79b6(dkon brtsegs): dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang pa yang dag par ston to/ /de'i tshe na byang chub sems
79b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pa zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus te 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pa stan las
80a1(dkon brtsegs): langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas ba'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud
80a2(dkon brtsegs): nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs dbye bar gnang na/ bcom ldan 'das

80b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin no zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

81a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni gang gi tshe dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa la zan kham gcig tsam sbyin par byed na yang / de yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems
81a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis sbyin par byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs par bya bar yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir ro/ /de rgyu gnyis kyis ni sems can thams
81a4(dkon brtsegs): cad la yongs su bsngo bar byed de/ gnyis gang zhe na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang / yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa nyid kyis te/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
81a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa ni gzhan gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'dus

81a7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bsngo ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des byang chub kyi sems dang bral ba'i sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag gang dag yin pa de dag kyang zil gyis gnon par byed la/ len pa po gang dag yin pa de dag
81b1(dkon brtsegs): kyang zil gyis gnon par byed de/ rigs kyi bu/ de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

81b3(dkon brtsegs): bzung ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bsam pas yongs su bzung zhing yongs su bsdus nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad la 'bul bar byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad la

81b5(dkon brtsegs): tog phreng dang / spos dang / phye ma dang / byug pa bdag gi dang bcas shing yongs su bzung ba dang bcas pa gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyi dri rlung gis btab pa'i ngad de dag kyang byang chub sems
81b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' thabs mkhas pas sangs rgyas thams cad la 'bul bar byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bdag dang sems can thams cad kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir
81b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bsngo bar byed do/ /de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i
82a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dpag tu med pa thob par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu/ de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ /rigs kyi
82a2(dkon brtsegs): bu| gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ sems can sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ba gang ji snyed pa

82a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bar byed do/ /de dge ba'i rtsa ba des sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bde ba'i yo byad rnams 'thob par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu/ de yang byang chub
82b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa gcig la
82b2(dkon brtsegs): phyag byas/ bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ mchod par byas/ bsnyen bkur byas nas/ 'di ltar so sor rtog par byed de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi dbyings gcig las nges

82b4(dkon brtsegs): shes gcig pa dang / rig pa gcig pa yin no zhes so sor rtog par byed do/ /des de ltar so sor brtags nas 'di ltar shes par byed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig la phyag byas/ bkur stir
82b5(dkon brtsegs): byas| bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas/ bsnyen bkur byas pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas pa dang / bkur stir byas pa dang / bla mar byas pa dang / ri mor
82b6(dkon brtsegs): byas pa dang / mchod pa byas pa dang / bsnyen bkur byas par 'gyur ro snyam du shes par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa ni phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
82b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das de dag gi mchod pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad bsam pas yongs su bzung nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bar byed de/ rigs kyi bu /de yang byang chub
83a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas
83a2(dkon brtsegs): pa ni gang gi tshe blo rtul bar gyur na yang de bdag nyid khyad du gsod par mi byed cing / zhum par mi byed par/ de tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam la yang mi 'jug
83a3(dkon brtsegs): par mi byed cing / de 'di ltar so sor rtog par byed de/ tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig po 'di'i don gang yin pa de ni/ gsung rab tu gtogs pa thams cad kyi don yin
83a4(dkon brtsegs): no zhes so sor rtogs par byed do/ /des de ltar tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig kha ton du bslabs nas/ zhum pa med pa'i sems kyis snying rje chen po bskyed de/ rnyed pa dang /
83a5(dkon brtsegs): bkur sti dang / grags pa 'dod pa med pas grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag tu skye bo mang po la tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad
83a6(dkon brtsegs): pa de rgya cher yang dag par ston par byed cing / 'di ltar smon lam 'debs par yang byed de/ sems can gang su dag gis bdag tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di thos par gyur pa
83a7(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs par yang byed do/ /de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thabs la mkhas pas yongs su zin
83b1(dkon brtsegs): pa des sems can thams cad kun dga' bo ltar mang du thos par 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa nyid kyang 'thob par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'
83b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa ni gal te brgya la brgya lam na/
83b3(dkon brtsegs): dbul por gyur na yang / des tha na gzhan gyi las kyang byas te/ kha zas nal ze gang tsam yang blangs nas zhum pa med pa'i sems kyis dge 'dun nam/ gang zag la 'bul bar yang byed
83b4(dkon brtsegs): do| |phul nas kyang de 'di ltar so sor rtog par byed de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sems rgya chen pos byin na sbyin pa yang rgya chen por 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pas na/ 'di ltar bdag gi
83b5(dkon brtsegs): sbyin par byed pa'i chos 'di ni chung mod kyi/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyis byin pas dpag tu med par 'gyur ro snyam du so sor rtog par byed do/ /de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
83b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi sems tshad med par gyur pa des kha zas nal ze gang tsam po de sbyin par byed cing / bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag dang / sems can thams cad/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bcom
83b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ji lta ba bzhin du skyes bu chen po'i mtshan ro bro ba'i mchog 'grub par 'gyur zhing / lag
84a1(dkon brtsegs): na rin po che 'grub par gyur cig ces yongs su bsngo bar byed do/ /de dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa des/ byang chub kyi sems
84a2(dkon brtsegs): dang 'bral ba'i sems can rnams kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po yang zil gyis gnon par 'gyur la/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan ro bro ba'i mchog kyang 'grub par
84a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ lag na rin po che yang 'grub par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu/ de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang
84a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni/ gal te nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa ba rnams dang lhan cig gnas par
84a5(dkon brtsegs): gyur kyang de dag la dga' bar mi byed cing / gal te byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen bkur lhag pa dag yod la/ bdag
84a6(dkon brtsegs): la de lta ma yin par mthong na yang de rgyu gnyis kyis bdag la rtog par byed de/ gnyis gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' las nges par byung ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
84a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams yin la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams nges par 'byung ba ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams yin no/ /snyam du bdag nyid la rtog par byed cing / de 'di ltar so
84b1(dkon brtsegs): sor rtog par byed de/ 'di dag la bsnyen bkur ba lhag pa dag yod mod kyi/ 'on kyang 'dir ni bdag nyid shin tu mchog dang / shin tu gtso bo yin gyi 'di dag ni ma yin no/ /'di dag ni
84b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi pha'i nor gyi phung po la yongs su spyod par byed pa yin pas/ bdag gis 'di dag la dga' bar yang mi bya la/ 'di dag la phrag dog kyang mi bya'o snyam du so sor rtog par byed do//
84b3(dkon brtsegs): des lhag pa'i bsam pas sems bskyed pa des/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur byas kyang khengs par mi 'gyur la bsnyen bkur ma byas kyang zhum par mi 'gyur zhing / sems
84b4(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad la thugs mnyam pa kun tu 'dzin par mdzad pa lta bu'i rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba spangs pa thob par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu/ de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
84b5(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni sbyin pa byin pas kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad
84b6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /ji ltar yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni gang gi tshe slong mo ba mthong na de thams cad
84b7(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa nyid la dmigs te/ ser sna'i sems tshar gcod par byed cing / gtong ba chen po yang spel bar byed la/ sbyin no snyam pa'i sems kyang skyed par byed pa gang yin pa de ni de'i sbyin
85a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/ /tshul khrims yang dag par blangs shing tshul khrims dang ldan pa la sbyin par byed pa dang / sems can tshul khrims 'chal
85a2(dkon brtsegs): pa gang dag yin pa de dag tshul khrims la 'god par byed cing sbyin pa byin nas/ 'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'god par byed pa gang yin pa de ni de'i
85a3(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/ /byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang / ma 'dres pa'i sems dang / mi 'khrugs pa'i sems dang / le lo med pa'i sems dang / rnyog
85a4(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa'i sems dang / snyoms pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa gang yin pa de ni de'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/ /bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bldag pa dang /
85a5(dkon brtsegs): myang ba dag la mngon par gus pa yang dag par grub par byed cing rtsol bar byed pa dang / lus kyis zhal ta byed pa dang / sems kyis zhal ta byed pa dang / ldang ba dang / 'gro ba dang / 'ong bar
85a6(dkon brtsegs): byed pa gang yin pa de ni de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/ /sbyin pa gang yin pa de la sems rtse gcig pa nyid dang / dga' ba dang / yid bde ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba'i
85a7(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa dang / rnam par g.yeng ba med pa gang yin pa de ni de'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/ /sbyin pa sbyin nas chos nyid kyi rjes su yang dag par gzhol bar byed de/ sus byin/
85b1(dkon brtsegs): su la byin/ ci zhig byin/ 'di'i rnam par smin pa sus myong bar 'gyur zhes chos nyid kyi rjes su yang dag par gzhol bar byed cing / des de ltar yongs su btsal nas kyang gang gis byin pa dang /
85b2(dkon brtsegs): gang la byin pa dang / ci zhig byin pa dang / de'i rnam par smin pa myong bar byed pa'i chos 'ga' yang mi dmigs pa gang yang yin pa de ni de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu/
85b3(dkon brtsegs): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa sbyin pa byin pas kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan
85b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
85b5(dkon brtsegs): thabs la mkhas pas/ sbyin pa gang gis sems can rnams kyang 'khor ba las yongs su 'dzin par bgyid la/ sbyin pa de nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang yongs su 'dzin
85b6(dkon brtsegs): par bgyid pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pas de ni ngo mtshar lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de de
85b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni/ thabs la mkhas pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas sbyin pa
86a1(dkon brtsegs): chung ngu yang chen por byed la/ chen po ni dpag tu med pa dang / grangs med par byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
86a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po ye shes dam pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni gal te brgya la brgya lam
86a3(dkon brtsegs): na| sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang ngam/ sems kun du rmongs pas nyes pa byung na yang / 'di ltar so sor slob ste/ gal te bdag phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched 'di dag
86a4(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur na ni da ltar bdag gis yongs su gdung bar bya dgos par 'gyur bas/ bdag gis 'di ltar go cha bgo bar bya ste/ bdag sems
86a5(dkon brtsegs): can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bar du 'khor bar 'khor bar bya ba la bdag gis sems zhum par mi bya/ 'jigs par mi bya/ sems skrag par
86a6(dkon brtsegs): mi bya| yongs su gdung bar mi bya zhing / ci lta ci ltar 'khor bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / nyes pa 'di yang chos bzhin du phyir bya zhing /
86a7(dkon brtsegs): phyin chad kyang nyes pa mi 'byung bar bya ba dang / bdag gis sems can thams cad kyang nyes pa las dbyung ba'i phyir chos bstan par bya'o zhes go cha gyon par byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ yongs
86b1(dkon brtsegs): su brtag pa nye bar bzung na/ byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba ni gal te rtsa ba'i nyes pa bzhi po thams cad byung bar gyur na yang thabs la mkhas pa des sel bar byed na/ rigs kyi bu
86b2(dkon brtsegs): nga ni byang chub sems dpa' la nyes pa med ces smra'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pas 'di skad ces
86b3(dkon brtsegs): gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nongs pa dang bcas pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ltar byang chub sems
86b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' so sor thar pa'i bslab pa la slob par byed pa na/ bskal pa 'bum gyi bar du rtsa ba dang 'bras bu za bar byed cing / sems can thams cad kyis legs par smras pa dang / nyes par
86b5(dkon brtsegs): smras so cog bzod par byed du zin kyang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag gis gnas par gyur na/ rigs kyi bu/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rtsa ba'i nyes
86b6(dkon brtsegs): pa lci ba zhes bya ba'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag rtsa ba'i nyes pa byung bar gyur pa ni phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched de dag nyid kyis yongs
86b7(dkon brtsegs): su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i skal ba med pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag ma bshags/ ma spangs kyi bar
87a1(dkon brtsegs): du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i skal ba med cing / sangs rgyas kyi sa thob par 'gyur ba'i
87a2(dkon brtsegs): skal pa med de/ de ni gnas med do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni
87a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyi ston pa lags te/ mi mkhyen pa'am/ ma gzigs pa'am/ thugs su ma chud pa'am/ mngon sum du ma mdzad pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' lags mod kyi/ 'on
87a4(dkon brtsegs): kyang de bzhin gshegs pas 'di skad ces dge slong gi nyes pa byung ba mthong na/ bcab par mi bya bar tshangs par spyod pa gzhan dag gam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar smos
87a5(dkon brtsegs): shig ces bka' stsal lags pas/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po 'dir mthar chags su bsod snyoms kyi slad du mchi ba na/ grong khyer
87a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan zhig na byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po zhes bgyi ba khri'i steng na bud med cig dang lhan cig mchis pa mthong ba de dag byams pa dang ldan pa dang / nongs
87a7(dkon brtsegs): pa ma mchis pa'i sems kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol lags so/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos tshig de skad ces gsol nas/ ring po ma lon par de nas de'i mod las chen po
87b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar steng gi bar snang la ta la bdun srid tsam
87b2(dkon brtsegs): du 'phags te 'dug nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ nyes pa'i chos dang ldan pa bar snang la 'dug par
87b3(dkon brtsegs): nus snyam mam/ kun dga' bos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de ni mi nus so/ /byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo/ 'on kyang de
87b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa mngon du gyur pa 'di la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyes pa'i chos dang ldan pa dris shig / de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo/ yul yul por gyur nas/ bcom
87b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis gtso bo chen po 'di lta bu la nongs pa yongs su glengs pa gang
87b6(dkon brtsegs): lags pa'i nongs pa la nongs par 'chags shing mchis na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi nongs pa la nongs par bshags pa gang lags pa de/ nongs pa la nongs par yongs su
87b7(dkon brtsegs): gzung du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo khyod theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i skyes bu dam
88a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dag la nyes pa'i 'du shes ma bskyed cing / kun dga' bo/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag gcig pu zla med par zhi gnas kyis
88a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas pas gnas par byed pa ni zag pa zad pa mngon sum du bya ba la bar chad med par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ kun dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas
88a3(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ldan pa bud med kyi 'khor dam pa'i nang na 'dug cing dga' ba dang / rtse ba dang / dga' mgur spyod par byed pa yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la
88a4(dkon brtsegs): bar du gcod pa med par rig par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni dkon mchog gsum po'o/ /gsum gang
88a5(dkon brtsegs): zhe na| sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la ma bkod pa'i g.yog 'khor gang yin
88a6(dkon brtsegs): pa de mi 'dzin pa'i phyir ro/ /kun dga' bo/ gang gi tshe khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral ba
88a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis rtse ba dang / dga' ba dang / dga' mgur spyod par byed pa mthong na/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis skyes bu dam pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa lta bu'i dbang
88b1(dkon brtsegs): po lnga dang ldan zhing gnas pa yin par shes par bya'o/ /kun dga' bo/ gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po khri gcig gi steng na bud med dang lhan cig 'dug
88b2(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pa yang nyon cig / kun dga' bo/ bud med de ni 'das pa'i dus na tshe rabs lnga brgyar byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po'i chung mar gyur te/ de sngon gyi tshul
88b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin ma yin pa de nyid kyis rigs kyi bu de la lhag par sems kyis 'brel par gyur kyang / byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po de'i dpal dang / gzi brjid dang / tshul khrims
88b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi stobs bskyed pa mthong nas/ gnas ngan len gyi tshig brjod par ma nus nas de gcig pu dben par 'dug pa na 'di lta bu'i sems bskyed par gyur te/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' tshogs
88b5(dkon brtsegs): can rab mchog rgyal po bdag dang lhan cig khri gcig gi steng na 'dug par gyur na bdag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas byang
88b6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal pos sring mo de'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das pa dang snga dro'i dus kyi tshe sham thabs dang /
88b7(dkon brtsegs): chos gos bgos te/ lhung bzed thogs nas mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so/ /de mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu ba na/ sring mo
89a1(dkon brtsegs): de'i khyim ga la ba der zhugs nas/ nang gi sa'i khams gang yin pa dang / phyi rol gyi sa'i khams gang yin pa'i sa'i khams de dag ni gcig pa yin pa'i
89a2(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi sgo 'dis/ des sa dang mnyam pa'i sems kyis lag pa g.yas pas sring mo de bzung ste khri gcig la 'khod do/ /'khod ma thag tu des de'i tshi tshigs su bcad pa 'di yang smras
89a3(dkon brtsegs): so| |sangs rgyas 'dod pa bsngags mi mdzad/ /de ni byis pa'i spyod yul yin/ /'dod la sred pa spangs byas na/ /mi mchog sangs rgyas rnams su 'gyur/ /kun dga' bo/ de nas sring mo
89a4(dkon brtsegs): des tshigs su bcad pa de thos nas dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba skyes te/ khri de las babs nas byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po'i rkang pa la gtugs te/ de'i tshe tshigs su
89a5(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /'dod gang sangs rgyas smad pa dag /slan chad don du gnyer mi bgyid/ /'dod la sred pa spangs bgyis nas/ /mi mchog sangs rgyas 'grub gyur cig/
89a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi sems kyis gang bsams pa'i/ /nongs pa de ni khyod la 'chags/ /srog chags kun la sman slad du/ /bdag ni byang chub 'dun pa bskyed/ /kun dga' bo/ de ltar byang
89a7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal pos thabs la mkhas pa des/ sring mo de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par gzengs
89b1(dkon brtsegs): bstod/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par rab tu bzhag nas stan las langs te song ngo / /kun dga' bo/ de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i khyad par la ltos/ kun dga' bo/ nga ni sring mo
89b2(dkon brtsegs): de 'di nas shi 'phos nas bud med kyi lus bsgyur te/ bskal pa grangs med pa 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu 'das pa'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
89b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas kun nas ldang ba dang bral ba zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / des byang chub 'thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na yang sems can mi dge pa'i
89b4(dkon brtsegs): kun nas ldang ba'i sems dang ldan pa 'ga' yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar lung ston to/ /kun dga' bo/ rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni 'khor gang bzung na
89b5(dkon brtsegs): log par ltung ba'i chos su 'gyur ba de 'dzin par mi byed par rig par bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po bar snang de las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das
89b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpas ni thabs la mkhas pa dang / snying rje
89b7(dkon brtsegs): chen po la gnas par bgyi lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ 'di la bdag ni 'di snyam du/ gal te byang chub sems dpas ni sems can gcig gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par
90a1(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa'i slad du 'di lta bu'i nongs pa 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / nongs pa ji lta bu byung bas bskal pa 'bum gyi bar du sems can dmyal ba chen
90a2(dkon brtsegs): por bsreg par 'gyur yang / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpas ni nongs pa 'byung ba de dang / sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de la spro bar bgyi lags kyi/
90a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can gcig po de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su btang ba la ni ma lags so snyam du sems lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog
90a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa/ legs so/ /legs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po de lta bu dang ldan pa ni nyes pa'i chos dang yang ldan par mi
90a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur la/ nyes pa thams cad spong bar yang byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ ngas mngon par shes pa'i phyir te/ sngon 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches
90a6(dkon brtsegs): grangs med pa/ rgya che ba dpag tu med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol tu gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u skar ma zhes bya ba zhig byung bar gyur te/ des
90a7(dkon brtsegs): lo bzhi khri nyis stong gi bar du nags 'dab dag tu tshangs par spyad pa spyad nas de lo bzhi khri nyis stong po de dag 'das pa dang rgyal po'i pho brang legs 'byor ces bya bar zhugs so/ /de
90b1(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer chen po der zhugs pa na tshong dpon gyi bu mo zhig gis bram ze'i khye'u gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa blta na sdug pa de mthong nas/ de 'dod pa la 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris
90b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems kyis bram ze'i khye'u de'i mdun du rab tu brgyugs te rkang pa la gtugs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de nas bram ze'i khye'u skar ma des bu mo la 'di skad ces smras so/ /sring mo khyod ci 'dod/
90b3(dkon brtsegs): des de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bram ze'i khye'u/ kho mo ni khyod 'tshal lo/ /des de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /sring mo kho bo ni 'dod pa rnams don du gnyer ba ma yin gyi/ kho bo ni tshangs
90b4(dkon brtsegs): par spyod pa yin no/ /des de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bram ze'i khye'u gal te khyod dang lhan cig tu 'grogs par mi 'gyur ba lta na bdag 'gum par 'gyur lags so/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u
90b5(dkon brtsegs): skar ma 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ bdag gis lo bzhi khri nyis stong gi bar du tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas/ deng brtul zhugs gzhig pa 'di ni bdag gi tshul dang mthun pa ma yin
90b6(dkon brtsegs): no snyam nas/ des bu mo de mthus spangs te bor nas gom pa bdun bor ba dang / de gom pa bdun pa la gnas pa'i tshe snying rje skyes par gyur nas/ 'di ltar bdag gi brtul zhugs bshig
90b7(dkon brtsegs): ste sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar gyur kyang / bdag gis sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur pa de bzod par bya zhing / bu mo 'di bde bar 'gyur ba dang 'chi ba'i dus byed
91a1(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur bar bya gor ma chags snyam mo/ /rigs kyi bu/ de nas bram ze'i khye'u skar ma de de nas phyir log ste lag pa g.yas pas bu mo de bzung nas/ de la 'di
91a2(dkon brtsegs): skad ces smras so/ /bzang mo/ longs shig dang / kho bos khyod ci 'dod pa bzhin du bya'o/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u skar ma de lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du de'i khyim na gnas nas/ yang mngon
91a3(dkon brtsegs): par byung ste/ tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi bskyed nas/ de nas shi 'phos ma thag tu tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes par gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u skar
91a4(dkon brtsegs): ma zhes bya bar gyur ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod yid gnyis dang / the tshom za bar gyur na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i
91a5(dkon brtsegs): khye'u skar ma zhes bya ba der gyur to/ /shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma ni de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon gyi bu mor gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu/ ngas snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa
91a6(dkon brtsegs): des cung zad tsam zhig 'dod pa dang ldan par byas pas kyang bskal pa khrir 'khor ba bsnyil zhing spangs par gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu/ sems can gzhan dag gi sems can dmyal
91a7(dkon brtsegs): par 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i las gang yin pa de yang byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa la tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ba la ltos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang
91b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ gal te dge slong shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u 'gal gyi bu dag thabs la mkhas
91b2(dkon brtsegs): pa yin par gyur na ni/ dge slong ko ka li ka yang sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ ngas mngon par shes pa'i phyir te/ sngon 'das pa'i
91b3(dkon brtsegs): dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig gi gsung rab la dge slong dri med ces bya ba chos smra ba zhig byung bar gyur to/ /de dgon pa'i
91b4(dkon brtsegs): phug cig la gnas so/ /de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba na drang srong lnga brgya zhig kyang gnas te/ de'i tshe na dus ma yin par sprin chen po 'dus shing char chen po bab par gyur to/ /de nas bud med
91b5(dkon brtsegs): gnyis shig grong bar gyi lam na 'dug pa de gnyis char pa de bskyab pa'i phyir/ dge slong dri med gnas pa'i phug tu zhugs te/ phug de nas phyir byung ba dang / drang srong lnga brgya tsam po de dag gis
91b6(dkon brtsegs): bud med gnyis dge slong dri med kyi phug nas phyir byung ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang drang srong lnga brgya tsam po de dag 'di snyam du/ e ma'o dge slong dri med 'di ni sdig pa 'dod pa/ mi tshangs par spyod
91b7(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no snyam nas tha ba dang zhe sdang gi 'du shes skyes par gyur to/ /de nas dge slong dri med kyis drang srong lnga brgya tsam po de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ de'i tshe steng gi
92a1(dkon brtsegs): bar snang gi nam mkha' la ta la bdun srid tsam du mngon par 'phags te 'dug pa drang srong de dag gis mthong nas/ de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag
92a2(dkon brtsegs): gi bstan bcos dag las ni mi tshangs par spyod pas ni steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags te 'dug par mi nus so zhes 'byung ngo snyam nas/ de dag gis de'i mod la dge slong dri
92a3(dkon brtsegs): med kyi rkang pa la yan lag lngas gtugs te nyes pa la nyes par bshags so/ /rigs kyi bu/ gal te dge slong dri med de'i tshe steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te 'dug par ma
92a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur na ni/ drang srong lnga brgya tsam po de dag rang rang gi lus de nyid kyis sems can dmyal ba chen por lhung bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong
92a5(dkon brtsegs): dri med ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod yid gnyis dang / the tshom za bar gyur na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa
92a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong dri med ces bya bar der gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu/ rnam grangs des khyod kyis 'di ltar gal te dge slong shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u 'gal gyi bu gnyis de'i tshe steng
92a7(dkon brtsegs): gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags te 'dug par gyur na ni/ dge slong ko ka li ka yang sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ rnam grangs des kyang
92b1(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis 'di ltar gang du byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa'i ye shes 'jug par 'gyur ba de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma yin par rig par bya'o/ /rigs
92b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu| 'di lta ste/ dper na/ smad 'tshong ma sgyu rtsal drug cu rtsa bzhi'i bya ba shes shing legs par lobs pa ni de'i 'og tu nor 'dod pa'i phyir/ skyes bu gzhan gyi drung du ci nas kyang bdag
92b3(dkon brtsegs): nyid yongs su btang zhing dga' ba ston pa dang / ji srid du skyes bu des las 'dod pa don thams cad ma bsgrubs kyi bar du de la yo byad thams cad sri bar mi byed pa de lta de ltar de gnas par byed
92b4(dkon brtsegs): do| |de nas don bsgrubs zin pa'i 'og tu de la mi lta/ mi sems par spong bar byed cing / de gzhi de las 'gyod pa'i sems gcig tsam yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ rigs kyi
92b5(dkon brtsegs): bu| byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa yang thabs la mkhas pa des sems can 'di dag yongs su smin par bya'o zhes bya bar shes te/ rnam grangs des sems can de dag gi
92b6(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du drung du sbyor bar byed cing de dag la yo byad thams cad kyang mi sri bar byed do/ /sems can rnams kyi dge ba la dga' bas bdag nyid kyang yongs su gtong bar
92b7(dkon brtsegs): byed kyi/ yo byad la dga' bas ni ma yin no/ /gang gi tshe kye ma sems can 'di dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba byas par gyur ba dag ste/ 'di dag gis phyir yongs su nyams par byed mi nus par shes
93a1(dkon brtsegs): nas ni de'i 'og tu 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang rtsed mo thams cad la mi lta bar spangs te/ 'gro zhing de de dang 'brel ba'i sems la gnas par mi byed
93a2(dkon brtsegs): do| |rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mes yongs su gdungs pa'i sa bon rnams ni kha dog yongs su nyams par med kyang / myu gu 'byung ba'i skal ba ni med pa de bzhin
93a3(dkon brtsegs): du| rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / bdag med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
93a4(dkon brtsegs): phyin pas yongs su gdungs na de 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad la yongs su spyod par byed kyang / log par ltung bar 'gro ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa yongs su 'dzin par mi
93a5(dkon brtsegs): byed la/ sangs rgyas kyi kha dog las yongs su nyams par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i srog chags bung ba ni me tog
93a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad las dri snom zhing ro myang bar byed kyang / gang la yang rtag pa'i 'du shes sgom par mi byed/ gnas kyi sred pa skyed par mi byed cing / de dag las dri dang / 'dab ma dang /
93a7(dkon brtsegs): sdong bu dang / me tog 'phrog par mi byed pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa yang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ 'dod pa'i
93b1(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba dang rtsed mo thams cad la yongs su longs spyod par byed kyang / de dag la rtag pa'i 'du shes sgom par yang mi byed/ gnas kyi sred pa skyed par yang mi byed la/ bdag kyang smas par
93b2(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur/ gzhan yang smas par mi 'gyur bar byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nya pa shin tu legs par bslabs pa ni srad bu gcig la gzan ma btags te/ mchil pa
93b3(dkon brtsegs): byas nas mtsho chen po'i nang du 'dor ro/ /de srad bu legs par bsrungs pa gcig po des gang gi tshe 'dod pa de'i tshe na ma mtsho chen po nas mchil pa de 'dren par byed pa de bzhin du/ rigs
93b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu| byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa yang stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / bdag med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsgoms
93b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems can thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brtan par gtad pas/ 'dod pa'i 'dam chen por 'jug par byed kyang / de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems legs par bsrungs pa
93b6(dkon brtsegs): des| gang gi tshe 'dod pa de'i tshe na 'dod pa'i khams spangs te tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu rig sngags dang / gsang sngags
93b7(dkon brtsegs): 'chang pa ni/ rgyal po'i mi rnams kyis gzung ste zhags pa lnga'i chings mas bcings par gyur kyang de ni gang gi tshe 'gro bar 'dod pa de'i tshe rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi stobs bskyed pa
94a1(dkon brtsegs): gcig gis chings ma de dag thams cad bcad nas/ gang du 'gro bar 'dod pa der 'gro bar byed pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' thabs
94a2(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas pa yang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ gang gi tshe 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po de dag gis dga' ba myong bar byed cing de dag dang 'dre bar gnas par byed cing / de
94a3(dkon brtsegs): gang gi tshe 'dod pa de'i tshe na shes rab rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi stobs bskyed pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems legs par bsrungs pa gcig gis 'dod pa'i yon
94a4(dkon brtsegs): tan lnga'i chings ma de dag thams cad rab tu bcad de/ de nas shi 'phos nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'phong gi slob dpon
94a5(dkon brtsegs): legs par bslabs pa zhig ral gri rnon po ras bcos bus dkris pa gcig thogs te/ mgron po mang po sgrol bar byed pa de na sems can mi mkhas pa 'phong gi shes pa'i bya ba mi shes
94a6(dkon brtsegs): pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ 'phong gi slob dpon de la snying rje che ba dang / brnyas pa'i 'du shes skyed par byed cing / tshig 'di skad ces gzhu yang med/ ral gri yang med/ dong pa yang
94a7(dkon brtsegs): med| 'khor yang med pa 'dis ni 'gron po 'di dag bsgral bar mi nus te/ 'dis ni bdag nyid kyang thar bar byed mi nus na/ 'gron po thams cad bsgral ba dang / chom rkun pa'i sde pham
94b1(dkon brtsegs): par bya bar lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas med pas 'di ni tshul ma yin pas 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes kyang zer bar gyur la/ de nas 'phong gi slob dpon de 'brog dgon par song ste/ chom rkun pa'i
94b2(dkon brtsegs): tshogs lhags par gyur pa na/ mda' gzhu thogs te/ go cha srab bgos nas mtshon cha de gzas te/ chom rkun pa rnams la 'debs par byed cing / des chom rkun pa de dag thams cad srog dang
94b3(dkon brtsegs): phral nas yang mtshon cha lag tu len par byed pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa yang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
94b4(dkon brtsegs): phyin pa'i mtshon cha legs par thogs te/ thabs la mkhas pas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis dga' ba dang rtse ba dang dga' mgur spyod par byed pa de ni/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa gang
94b5(dkon brtsegs): dag de'i thabs la mkhas pa'i shes pa de khong du ma chud pa de dag gis de mthong ba'i tshe de dag de la ma dag pa dang snying rje skyed par byed cing / tshig 'di skad ces 'di ltar bag med pa'i
94b6(dkon brtsegs): gnas pas gnas pa 'dis ni bdag nyid kyang thar par byed mi nus na/ sems can thams cad bsgral ba lta ci smos shing / bdud kyi sde pham par byed pa lta ga la 'gyur te/ de ni gnas med
94b7(dkon brtsegs): pas de ni tshul ma yin pas 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes kyang zer mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa dang / shes rab kyis legs par yongs su zin pa ni gang gi tshe 'dod pa de'i
95a1(dkon brtsegs): tshe na| shes rab kyi mtshon des nyon mongs pa'i dra ba thams cad bral zhing rab tu gtubs nas/ shes rab dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing bud med dang
95a2(dkon brtsegs): bral ba dang / 'khrig pa dang bral ba shin tu yongs su dag pa dag tu 'gro bar byed do/ /gtam 'di brjod par gyur pa de'i tshe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' bar byed
95a3(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ba mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs par gyur te/ de mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms spyod pa na/ tshong dpon zhig gis khyim du phyin pa
95a4(dkon brtsegs): dang | tshong dpon de la bu mo dpal yon can gyi mchog ces bya ba phyug chung zhig yod par gyur pa khang bzang gi steng na 'dug pa des/ dge slong de'i skad thos nas bsod snyoms thogs te/
95a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' dga' byed ga la ba der song ngo / /de nas bu mo dpal yon can gyi mchog gis byang chub sems dpa' dga' byed mthong ma thag tu 'dod chags kyis kun nas
95a6(dkon brtsegs): dkris pa'i sems kyis dpe byad las byad bzhin dang / sgra skad dang / kha dog gi mtshan ma bzung ba dang / de 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris pa'i sems dang / 'dod chags kyis kun nas
95a7(dkon brtsegs): bslangs pa'i sems dang / 'dod chags kyis yongs su gtugs pa'i sems dang / 'dod chags kyis yongs su gdungs pa'i sems kyis bsregs pas lus rdul bar gyur nas/ 'greng
95b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' dga' byed kyang bu mo dpal yon can gyi mchog mthong nas/ tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa 'di lta ste/ 'dod
95b2(dkon brtsegs): chags dang bcas pa'i sems skyes par gyur nas/ yud tsam zhig na de la dran pa 'di lta bu skyes par gyur te/ chos gang la chags par 'gyur ba'i chos de gang yin/ ci mig mig la chags
95b3(dkon brtsegs): sam/ mig ni chags pa ma yin te/ g.yo ba med pa/ byed pa med pa/ sems pa med pa/ 'dus byas pa/ rim pa bdun pa/ sha'i ri lu yin te/ mig de ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir te/ sems
95b4(dkon brtsegs): par mi byed/ tshor bar mi byed do/ /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / pags pa dang / mdog dang / sha yang de dang 'dra ste/ des rkang mthil yan chad klad pa man chad kyi
95b5(dkon brtsegs): bar la so sor brtags na nang dang / phyi rol na gang chags par 'gyur ba'am/ sdang bar 'gyur ba'am/ rmongs par 'gyur ba'i chos 'ga' yang ma dmigs so/ /des ma dmigs nas 'dod
95b6(dkon brtsegs): chags kyi sems de dang bral bar gyur cing / des sems kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor brtags pas/ chos thams cad ma skyes par rig nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par
95b7(dkon brtsegs): gyur to/ /de dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis steng gi bar snang la ta la bdun srid tsam du mngon par 'phags te/ mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas nam
96a1(dkon brtsegs): mkha' de nyid nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo // //bam po gnyis pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
96a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed steng gi bar snang las ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar chags pa med par 'ong ba gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo
96a3(dkon brtsegs): la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed steng gi bar snang las ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar chags pa med par 'ong bar mthong ngam/
96a4(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed
96a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dis ni 'dod chags kyi sems la brten te/ chos thams cad yongs su btsal pas/ bdud kyi sde btul cing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to/ /de nas bu mo dpal yon can gyi mchog 'chi
96a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dus byas na bud med kyi lus spangs te/ mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skyes pa'i lus thob cing / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes so/ /skyes ma thag tu de la
96a7(dkon brtsegs): rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i gzhal med khang dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa yang byung bar gyur/ de'i rim gro byed pa'i bsnyen bkur ma lha'i bu mo khri bzhi stong yang nye bar gnas par
96b1(dkon brtsegs): gyur to/ /de'i mod la des bdag gis las ci zhig byas shing bsags pas 'dir skyes par gyur snyam du bsams pa dang / de 'di snyam du gyur te/ bdag ni mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por tshong
96b2(dkon brtsegs): dpon gyi bu mor gyur pa las/ de na bdag gis kun tu chags pa'i sems kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed la bltas pa dang / bdag 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi kun
96b3(dkon brtsegs): nas dkris pa'i sems kyis 'chi ba'i dus byas nas bud med kyi lus brjes te/ bdag gis 'dir skyes pa'i lus thob cing / bdag la 'byor pa dpag tu med pa 'di lta bu dag kyang byung bar
96b4(dkon brtsegs): gyur to snyam nas/ sngon gyi las rjes su dran pa'i shes pa yang skyes par gyur to/ /de nas lha'i bu de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'dod chags kyi sems las kyang rnam par smin pa 'di lta bu 'byung
96b5(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur na/ bdag gis dad pa'i sems kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed la phyag byas shing bsnyen bkur byas na lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ bdag 'dod
96b6(dkon brtsegs): pas dga' ba dang / rtse ba dang / dga' mgur spyod cing / bag med pa'i gnas pas gnas pa ni bdag gi tshul dang mthun pa ma yin zhing mi rigs kyi/ bdag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba
96b7(dkon brtsegs): dang | byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed ga la ba der 'gro bar bya gor ma chag snyam mo/ /de nas lha'i bu des 'khor lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig tu lha'i me tog dang / spos
97a1(dkon brtsegs): dang | me tog phreng dang / byug pa dag thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed ga la ba der song nas/ kha
97a2(dkon brtsegs): dog shin tu 'phags pa shin tu 'phags pa'i snang ba chen pos rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal snang bar byas te/ lha'i me tog dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dag gis bcom ldan
97a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
97a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi rkang pa la yang mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo pug pug por sbyar
97a5(dkon brtsegs): nas| de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/ /sangs rgyas mi mchog rnams ni bsam mi khyab/ /byang chub mchog la zhugs rnams bsam mi khyab/ /bde gshegs rnams kyi chos
97a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang bsam mi khyab/ /grags chen rnams kyi spyod pa'ang bsam mi khyab/ /mnyan yod du ni bdag sngon bu mor gyur/ /tshong dpon bu mo dpal yon mchog ces bgyi/ /mdzes shing thog mar phyug
97a7(dkon brtsegs): chung gyur pa lags/ /pha ma'i glo bar mchi zhing rab tu byams/ /sangs rgyas sras po smad par ma gyur pa/ /mthu chen dga' byed ces bgyi gang lags pa/ /bsod nams spyod cing mnyan yod
97b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyu ba'i tshe/ /de ni bdag gi pha yi khyim du mchis/ /skad snyan yid du mchi ba thos gyur nas/ /bdag chags sems kyis bsod snyoms thogs nas ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras po gang lags
97b2(dkon brtsegs): pa| |dga' byed mthu chen ga la mchis par mchis/ /mthong ma thag tu bdag ni 'dod chags dang / /ldan pa tshul bzhin ma lags sems skyes te/ /gal te ji ltar bsam bzhin ma mjal na/ /srog
97b3(dkon brtsegs): la mi lta dgum pa'i dus bgyi snyam/ /tshul bzhin ma lags 'dod pas rab gdungs nas/ /de la bka' mchid brjod par bgyi ba dang / /bsod snyoms stsol ba'i rngo yang ma thogs nas/ /rdul
97b4(dkon brtsegs): byung der ni 'greng bzhin gum par gyur/ /bcom ldan bdag ni 'chi 'phor gyur pa'i tshe/ /skad cig de la bud med lus spangs te/ /shi 'phos mtho ris 'jig rten skyes gyur nas/ /
97b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis 'od gsal skyes pa 'di nyid thob/ /rin chen sna tshogs blta na sdug pa yi/ /gzhal med khang mchog mdzes pa grub gyur cing / /bdag gi g.yog 'khor lha yi bu mo ni/ /
97b6(dkon brtsegs): khri dang bzhi stong tshang ba'ang byung bar gyur/ /bdag la sems bzang byung bar gyur pa ni/ /sug las gang gi rnam smin 'di 'dra ba/ /rjes su dran nas ngan bu 'di snyam bgyid/ /chags
97b7(dkon brtsegs): bcas sems kyi rnam smin 'di 'dra ste/ /dga' byed yid dga' 'od gsal mkhas pa la/ /chags bcas sems kyis bdag gis bltas gyur pas/ /sug las de yi rnam smin bzang po
98a1(dkon brtsegs): des| |ngan bu gzi brjid mthu stobs 'di 'dra bas/ /chags bcas sems kyi rnam smin 'di 'dra na/ /gang gis de la mchod bgyis ci smos te/ /gang la
98a2(dkon brtsegs): bder gshegs mkhyen pa 'jug gyur pa/ /de ni nyan thos rang rgyal sa ma lags/ /ngan bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar ni/ /sangs rgyas ye shes mchog rab bsgrub pa dang / /bskal
98a3(dkon brtsegs): pa gang+gA'i bye snyed spyad par bgyi/ /bdag gi dam bcas 'di ni spang mi bgyi/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen dga' byed dam pa la/ /chos kyi mchod pa mchog gis mchod par bgyi/ /gang dag byang
98a4(dkon brtsegs): chub 'tshal ba ma gtogs par/ /gzhan gyi 'di la 'dren rnams mchod mi 'gyur/ /bud med gang dag 'dod chags sems kyis ni/ /bdag la rtog pa bud med lus bsgyur nas/ /de
98a5(dkon brtsegs): kun 'jigs med skyes pa thob 'gyur bar/ /byang chub spyad mchog dam pa spyad par bgyi/ /lus rngul shi bar gyur pa mthong nas ni/ /bu mo'i pha ma cho nges 'debs byed cing / /dge sbyong
98a6(dkon brtsegs): de yis byad stems byas snyam ste/ /ngu zhing dge sbyong rnams la mi snyan brjod/ /sangs rgyas mthu yis lha yi bu de ni/ /song nas pha ma dag la tshig smras pa/ /dge sbyong la ni zhe sdang khro ma byed/ /
98a7(dkon brtsegs): yun ring sdug bsngal 'grub par ma byed cig /bu mo dpal yon shi 'phos gang yin de/ /sum cu rtsa gsum skal ba mnyam gyur cing / /des ni bud med lus kyang spangs byas te/ /de
98b1(dkon brtsegs): ni lha yi bu pho 'od gsal gyur/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i spyan sngar khyed deng la/ /khro ba'i sems kyis nyes pa 'di shogs shig /sangs rgyas mi mchog rnams ni ma gtogs par/ /sems can
98b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi dpung gnyen gnas gzhan med/ /'jigs med de yis legs par bskul byas pas/ /pha ma gnyis kyis sangs rgyas sgra thos nas/ /nye du'i tshogs dang lhan cig 'grogs gyur te/ /
98b3(dkon brtsegs): shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar dong bar gyur/ /mi mchog zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ /khro ba'i sems kyis nyes pa bshags byas nas/ /de bzhin gshegs la gus dang bcas byas te/ /bde
98b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs rang 'byung la ni zhu zhus pas/ /ji tsam gyis na 'dren pa mchod par 'gyur/ /chos dang dge 'dun ji ltar mchod pa lags/ /zhus pa de yi lan ni stsal du gsol/ /thos nas de bzhin
98b5(dkon brtsegs): gnas bgyi gzhan ma lags/ /rgyal bas de dag bsam pa dag mkhyen nas/ /'jig rten mgon pos 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /gang zhig sangs rgyas thams cad mchod 'dod pa/ /de yis brten
98b6(dkon brtsegs): par byang chub sems skyed cig / bu mo'i pha dang ma dang nye du ni/ /lnga brgya tshang ba nyung ba ma yin pas/ /skyes bu khyu mchog de yi gsung thos nas/ /byang chub phyir ni sems kyang brtan par bskyed//
98b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal bas kun dga' bzang la bka' stsal pa/ /kun dga' ji skad bshad pa 'di nyon cig /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bsam yas te/ /shes rab thabs la mkhas pa'ang de bzhin no/ /
99a1(dkon brtsegs): dga' byed smon lam yang dang yang 'debs pa/ /bud med gang dag chags pa'i sems kyis ni/ /bdag la rtog pa bud med lus spangs nas/ /de dag myur du
99a2(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu 'jigs med shog / bud med gcig min gnyis dang gsum min te/ /bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag mang po rnams/ /gang dag dga' byed la ni chags gyur pa/ /de dag thams cad shi
99a3(dkon brtsegs): 'phos skyes par gyur/ /kun dga' 'dod chags bskyed pa gang gis ni/ /sems can gzhan dag sems dmyal 'gro 'gyur ba/ /de yis dpa' rnams mtho ris 'gro 'gyur zhing / /sems par
99a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa'i yon tan de 'dra ltos/ /lha'i bu gang gis nga la mchod byas te/ /gus dang bcas pas byang chub mchog zhugs pa/ /des ni sangs rgyas bye mang mchod byas nas/ /rgyal ba blta na
99a5(dkon brtsegs): mdzes zhes bya bar 'gyur/ /lnga brgya gang dag byang chub zhugs gyur pa/ /de dag mi mchog rnams su 'byung 'gyur bas/ /gang la dad byas bde ba bsam yas pa'i/ /'jig rten mgon
99a6(dkon brtsegs): la su zhig gus mi byed/ /gang dag nyon mongs rnams kyang bde byin na/ /gang dag gus byed de la ci smos pa/ /grags chen sman gyi rgyal po lta bu yis/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la su sdang
99a7(dkon brtsegs): bskyed/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ sems can rab tu sdang ba'i sems
99b1(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa'am/ dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'am/ chags pa'i sems dang ldan pa'am/ chos kyi bar du gcod pa'i sems dang ldan pa gang la la dag ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi drung du mchis na/
99b2(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad 'di lta ste/ gser gyi kha dog tu kha dog gcig par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ sems can rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'am/ dang ba'i sems
99b3(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa'am/ chags pa'i sems dang ldan pa'am/ chos kyi bar du gcod pa'i sems dang ldan pa gang la la dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi drung du mchis nas de dag thams cad
99b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyi kha dog tu sems gcig tu 'gyur lags pas/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni deng slan chad byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
99b5(dkon brtsegs): ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang 'dra bar 'dzin lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ sman gyi rigs chen po blta mdzes zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ sems can rab tu sdang
99b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sems dang ldan pa'am/ dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'i sems can bro nad sna tshogs kyis thibs pa gang la la dag gis de mthong na/ de dag thams cad kyi bro nad rnams rab tu zhi bar
99b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ sems can gang dag rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'am/ dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa dag /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi drung du
100a1(dkon brtsegs): mchis na/ /de dag thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nyon mongs pa'i bro nad rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur lags so/ /de
100a2(dkon brtsegs): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin te legs so/ /legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin no/ /de nas bcom
100a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gang gi slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams de ltar
100a4(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i ting 'dzin gyi gnas dag gis kyang gnas par bgyid la/ sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i slad du 'dod pa'i khams na yang kun du gda' ba dang / stong pa nyid dang /
100a5(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa'i chos rnams kyis kyang gnas par bgyid la/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos
100a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams la yang reg par mi bgyid pa dang / snying rje chen po yang kun du bskyed par bgyid la/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems la yang 'jug par bgyid pa de ni/ btsun pa bcom
100a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar lags te/ bde bar gshegs pa de ni mchog tu ngo mtshar lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/
100b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag chags pa thams cad bsrung bar bgyid cing / 'di lta ste/ gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya'i chags pa dag la spyad
100b2(dkon brtsegs): par bgyid kyang / de dag la chags par yang mi 'gyur ba de dag ni thabs la mkhas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag byang chub sems
100b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams las brtsams te/ dpe 'ga' zhig brjod par spobs lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ spobs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
100b4(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung chen po/ khyod spobs par gyis shig /'od srung chen pos gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ 'brog dgon pa chen po zhig mchis par gyur la/
100b5(dkon brtsegs): 'brog dgon pa chen po de yang srid pa'i rtse mo dang mnyam pa'i ra ba mchis par gyur cing / 'brog dgon pa chen po der yang srog chags 'bum phrag du ma zhig zhugs par gyur la/ 'brog
100b6(dkon brtsegs): dgon pa chen po de la yang chab sgo ni gcig cig mchis par gyur cing / 'brog dgon pa chen po de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na grong khyer chen po 'byor pa rgyas pa/ gtsang ba/ lo legs
100b7(dkon brtsegs): pa| skye bo dang mi mang pos kun du gtams pa/ nyams dga' ba zhig kyang mchis par gyur la/ grong khyer chen po de la yang chab sgo ni gcig cig mchis par gyur cing / gang dag grong khyer chen
101a1(dkon brtsegs): po dar zhugs par gyur pa de dag ni dga' ba dang mgu ba ma mchis par gyur la/ grong khyer chen po de na yang mtho gang tsam gyi tshad kyi shul shin tu dog cing
101a2(dkon brtsegs): nyam nga ba zhig kyang mchis shing / de'i g.yas g.yon na/ khru 'bum tsam mchis pa'i g.yang sa chen po dag kyang mchis par gyur la/ de nas 'brog dgon pa chen po de'i dbus nas sems
101a3(dkon brtsegs): can mkhas pa/ zhi ba/ glo ba gzhungs pa/ sems can thams cad la don du gyur par 'tshal ba/ bde bar 'tshal ba/ grub pa dang bde bar 'tshal ba/ sman par 'tshal ba/ snying rje chen
101a4(dkon brtsegs): po dang ldan pa gcig cig byung bar gyur nas/ de 'brog dgon pa chen po der 'di skad ces/ kye grogs po dag /kho bo ni khyed cag gi yongs su skyob pa yin te/ 'brog dgon pa chen po
101a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di nas ha cang mi ring ba na grong khyer chen po 'byor pa rgyas pa/ bde ba lo legs pa/ nyams dga' ba zhig yod de/ gang dag der zhugs par gyur pa de ni rga ba med pa dang / 'chi ba
101a6(dkon brtsegs): med par 'gyur zhing / sems can dpag tu med pa rnams skye bo dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston par yang 'gyur bas/ sems
101a7(dkon brtsegs): can shes pa dang ldan pa dag tshur shog / grong khyer chen po der 'dong ngo zhes sgra bsgrags shing skad kyis go bar bgyis par gyur na/ de na sems can dman pa la mos shing nges par 'byung
101b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bsam pa can gang dag lags pa de dag ni 'di skad ces bdag cag 'di nas kyang mi g.yo bar gdams shing rjes su bstan par yang 'tshal la/ bdag cag 'di na gnas bzhin du grong
101b2(dkon brtsegs): khyer de na mchis pa'i yon tan de dag kyang 'byung bar gyur cig ces mchis lags so/ /sems can rgya chen po la mos pa gang dag lags pa de dag ni 'di skad ces bdag cag ni khyod ji
101b3(dkon brtsegs): lta ba de bzhin du grong khyer der mchi'o/ /zhes mchi lags so/ /sems can bsod nams chung ba gang dag lags pa de dag ni sgra de nyan cing thos nas kyang dad par mi bgyid cing / skyes bu
101b4(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can de'i slad bzhin du mchi bar mi bgyi lags te/ de nas skyes bu mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can de 'brog dgon pa chen po de nas slar byung ba dang / des shul de yang
101b5(dkon brtsegs): mthong bar gyur/ des mtho gang tsam gyi shul shin tu dog cing nyam nga ba de yang mthong bar gyur/ shul de'i g.yas g.yon na khru 'bum tsam mchis pa g.yang sa chen po de dag kyang mthong
101b6(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur nas/ des g.yas g.yon gyi g.yang sa chen po de dag rtsig pa dang / spang leb kyis bkum ste/ rkang lag bzhis 'phye zhing shul de las 'da' bar bgyid la/ g.yas g.yon du yang
101b7(dkon brtsegs): mi blta bar slang bzhin du phyir rgol ba sgra 'byin cing 'jigs pa ston pa dag mchi yang slar yang mi blta la/ skyo zhing yid byung ba yang ma mchis par shul der mchi bar 'gyur ba dang / ji lta
102a1(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar mchi bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar grong khyer de mthong bar yang 'gyur la/ ji lta ji ltar mthong ba de lta de ltar de'i 'jigs pa dang / 'jigs su rung ba thams
102a2(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang ma mchis par 'gyur zhing / grong khyer der zhugs na rga ba dang / 'gum pa dang / bro nad ma mchis par 'gyur la/ sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa rnams kyi don bgyid cing / skye
102a3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / rga ba dang / bro 'tshal ba dang / 'gum pa las yang dag par bzla ba'i slad du chos ston par bgyid pa zhig mchis na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ de la 'brog dgon pa chen po zhes
102a4(dkon brtsegs): bgyi ba de ni 'khor ba'i dgon pa'i tshig bla dwags lags so/ /srid pa'i rtse mo dang mnyam pa'i ra ba zhes bgyi ba de ni ma rig pa dang / srid pa'i tshig bla dwags lags so/ /'brog dgon pa
102a5(dkon brtsegs): chen po der yang srog chags 'bum phrag du ma zhugs par gyur la zhes bgyi ba de ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi tshig bla dwags lags so/ /'brog dgon pa chan po de la yang chab sgo ni
102a6(dkon brtsegs): gcig cig mchis par gyur cing zhes bgyi ba de ji lta ba de bzhin du ni bgrod pa gcig pa'i shul blta bar bgyi lags so/ /skyes bu mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can zhes bgyi ba ji lta ba de bzhin
102a7(dkon brtsegs): du ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams blta bar bgyi lags so/ /sems can dman pa la mos shing nges par 'byung ba'i bsam pa can gnas de las kyang mi g.yo la/ grong khyer
102b1(dkon brtsegs): gyi yon tan yang 'tshal ba de dag ji lta ba de bzhin du ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad blta bar bgyi lags so/ /sems can rgya chen po la mos pa tshig 'di skad ces bdag cag ni
102b2(dkon brtsegs): khyod ji lta ba bzhin du grong khyer der mchi lags so/ /zhes mchi ba de dag ji lta ba de bzhin du ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag blta bar bgyi lags so/ /sems can
102b3(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams chung ngu sgra de nyan cing thos nas kyang dad par mi bgyid pa gang lags pa de dag ni gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun du rgyu de dag gi tshig bla dwags so/ /'brog dgon pa chen
102b4(dkon brtsegs): po de nas slar byung ba zhes bgyi ba ji lta ba de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par bsngos pa'i sems kyis brtson 'grus brtsams pa blta bar bgyi lags so/ /mtho gang tsam gyi
102b5(dkon brtsegs): tshad kyi shul zhes bgyi ba de ji lta ba de bzhin du ni chos kyi dbyings blta bar bgyi lags so/ /de'i g.yas g.yon na khru 'bum tsam mchis pa'i g.yang sa chen po zhes bgyi ba de ji lta ba de bzhin
