173b7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / mi dge ba zhes bya'o/ /de la phung po zhes bya ba'i don gang zhe na/ 'di la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ste/ bzhi po 'di dag ni

175a1(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pa de ni phyag bya ba'i gnas su 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bya ba bzhin du gus pa bskyed par bya zhing / 'di ni mdzod 'dzin pa yin
175a2(dkon brtsegs): no| |snyam du bzung bar bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung zhig/

175a6(dkon brtsegs): bstan la 'jug par bya/ /'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ /'chi bdag sde 'di gzhom par bya/ /gang zhig rab tu bag yod par/ /chos 'dul 'di la spyod gyur pa/ /skye ba'i
175a7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug bsngal mtha' mar 'byin par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ rgyal bu gzhon nu sman chen dang / tshong dpon
175b1(dkon brtsegs): bzang skyong dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa dkon
175b2(dkon brtsegs): mchog brtsegs ba chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ tshong dpon bzang skyong gis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ sum cu rtsa dgu pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi
175b3(dkon brtsegs): tra dang / su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+Ya pA ri kA bi ma la shrad d+hA pa ri pr-its+tsha nA ma mahA yA na sU tra/
175b4(dkon brtsegs): bod skad du/ bu mo rnam dag dad pas zhus pa le'u bzhi bcu pa/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig
175b5(dkon brtsegs): na| bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po lnga brgya dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
175b6(dkon brtsegs): po brgya stong dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang shes par bya ba rnams rab tu shes pa/ gzungs dang / thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa thob pa/ bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa/ bdud kyi
175b7(dkon brtsegs): dpung rab tu bcom pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis brnyes pa'i chos rnams rab tu thob pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten 'dzin dang / byang chub sems
176a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' lam 'dzin dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa 'dzin dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa 'dzin chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' mos blo gros
176a2(dkon brtsegs): dang | byang chub sems dpa' mos byed dang / byang chub sems dpa' gzugs mdzes bkod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i tog dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i
176a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen sems pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'byung gnas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen blo gros dang / byang chub sems
176a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rin chen yon tan dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od dang / gzhan yang bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la sogs pa gtso bor gyur pa dang
176a5(dkon brtsegs): thabs gcig go/ gzhan yang sems dpa' dpe zla med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la sogs pa gtso bor gyur pa drug cu po de dag dang yang thabs gcig go /gzhan yang skyes bu
176a6(dkon brtsegs): chen po byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong la sogs pa gtso bor gyur pa drug cu dang yang thabs gcig go / gzhan yang dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu nyi khri 'khor de nyid 'dus par gyur pa
176a7(dkon brtsegs): dag dang yang thabs gcig go / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das bkod pa chen po'i mdzod ces bya ba'i seng ge'i gdan la 'khor brgya stong tshad med pa dag gis yongs su bskor nas bzhugs
176b1(dkon brtsegs): pas| nyi zla lta bu'i 'od zer gyis ni kun du snang bar mdzad/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa'i rgyal po ltar gzi brjid kyis khyad par du 'phags/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab lta bur shin tu mtho
176b2(dkon brtsegs): zhing phal las ni mngon par 'phags par gyur/ sgron ma chen po lta bur 'od zer dag ni rab tu 'bar/ glang po che'i rgyal po ltar phan tshun du ni gzigs par mdzad/ seng ge'i sgra
176b3(dkon brtsegs): sgrogs pa ltar bsnyengs pa mi mnga' bar ni tshes ston par mdzad/ lha ma yin gyi rgyal po sgra gcan zin ltar 'khor mang po rnams ni zil gyis mnan/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dag
176b4(dkon brtsegs): gis ni sku rab tu brgyan/ gzi byin dang mthu stobs dag ni rab tu 'bar bar gyur te/ sems can thams cad des pa'i don mchog la dgod cing khong du chud par mdzad pa'i phyir/ tshangs
176b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sgra dbyangs stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun du bsgrags nas/ 'khor mang po'i dbus su chos ston par mdzad do/ /de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi bu mo rnam
176b6(dkon brtsegs): dag dad pa zhes bya ba gzhon nu ma byad bzhin sdug cing mdzes la/ sems can rnams kyis mthong bar mos pa/ sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ theg pa chen po bsgoms pa zhig yod pa de
176b7(dkon brtsegs): bu mo gzhon nu ma lnga brgyas yongs su bskor te/ so so nas gser gyi phreng ba thogs nas grong khyer mnyan yod nas byung ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
177a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhabs la spyi bos gtugs te phyag byas nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas tshigs su bcad de
177a2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par bstod pa/ yun ring bsod nams rnam dag 'phrin las bsags/ /yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' yas yongs rdzogs shing / /mang po dad mos dga' bar mdzad pas nas/
177a3(dkon brtsegs): de slad thub mchog khyed la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /gzi byin lam me ya mtshan rab ston cing / /rin chen 'byung gnas chos sgo ston par mdzad/ /sku yi 'od zer 'dom gang rtag gsal
177a4(dkon brtsegs): bas| blo chen gsal ba'i rdzing la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /yon tan ljon shing bsod nams bsags ma 'tshal/ mi mchog khyod la 'jig rten kun gyis bsngags/ /smon lam chen
177a5(dkon brtsegs): po tshul khrims yongs rdzogs pas/ /de slad mchod 'os gtso la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /chos mchog rab gnas rtag par zhi zhing dben/ /'jig rten kun la thugs snyoms bu gcig
177a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin/ /mkhyen pa dag gis spyod rnams rab mkhyen pas/ /'dren mkhan bzhin du mnyam pa'i shul yang ston/ /rab brtan brtson 'grus ldan par mchis 'gyur na/ /byams
177a7(dkon brtsegs): dang thugs rjes sems can sman mdzad pas/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gang lags pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pas bkas ni bshad du gsol/ /ji ltar rab brtan stobs ni
177b1(dkon brtsegs): thob gyur nas/ /'khor ba na gnas kyang bdun dpung pham bgyid lags/ /ji ltar mnyam pa'i chos ni thob 'gyur zhing / /ji ltar sems can yongs su smin bgyid lags/ /ji ltar
177b2(dkon brtsegs): bgyis na sa gzhi nam mkha' dang / /rlung dang me chu ji ltar bzhin du 'gyur/ /ji ltar yid ches thob nas chos gnas shing / /ri rab seng ge rgyal ba bzhin du 'gyur/ /ji ltar byams sdang
177b3(dkon brtsegs): sems ni yongs spangs nas/ /sems gtsang drang la g.yo sgyu ma mchis 'gyur/ /ji ltar sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa dang / /brtson 'grus bsam gtan rnam grol skye 'gyur zhing / /shes
177b4(dkon brtsegs): rab nyon mongs mun pa rab bcom zhing / /rtag par thabs chen la ni gnas pa dang / /ting 'dzin gzugs la thogs pa ma mchis shing / /tshad med bzhi dang mngon shes lnga la gnas/ /ji
177b5(dkon brtsegs): ltar sangs rgyas spyan sngar gnas gyur nas/ /rtag par brdzus te skye zhing tshe rabs dran/ /sbyangs pa'i brtsod pa ma mchis dgon gnas nas/ /sems ni rab btul nyon mongs zhi bgyid
177b6(dkon brtsegs): dang | |tshul khrims ldan zhing byang chub lam bsgoms dang / /bdud rtsi 'gog thob bdud dpung 'joms pa dang / /bde stsol chos kyi 'khor lo bskor 'gyur ba/ /de 'dra'i yang dag
177b7(dkon brtsegs): lam ni bkas bshad gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo rnam dag dad pa la bka' stsal pa/ bu mo/ byang chub sems dpa' gang stobs rnam pa brgyad dang ldan par gyur
178a1(dkon brtsegs): na| 'khor ba na gnas kyang rab tu brtan pa'i dpa' bor 'gyur zhing yongs su ngal ba med par 'gyur ro/ /brgyad gang zhe na/ dang po ni/ sems kyi
178a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dun pa'i stobs te/ g.yo sgyu med pa'i phyir ro/ /gnyis pa ni/ mos pa'i stobs te/ sdig pa rnams sbyong bar byed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsum pa ni/ sbyor ba'i stobs te/ rtag tu dge
178a3(dkon brtsegs): ba bsgrub pa'i phyir ro/ /bzhi pa ni/ mngon par yid ches pa'i stobs te/ las kyi rnam par smin pa dag la shin tu mngon par yid ches pa'i phyir ro/ /lnga pa ni/ byang chub kyi
178a4(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi stobs te/ theg pa dma' ba rnams yongs su mi tshol ba'i phyir ro/ /drug pa ni/ byams pa chen po'i stobs te/ las kyis sems can la gnod par mi byed pa'i phyir ro//
178a5(dkon brtsegs): bdun pa ni/ snying rje chen po'i stobs te/ gnod pa rnams dang du len pa'i phyir ro/ /brgyad pa ni/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi stobs te/ dus dus su sad par byed pa'i phyir ro//
178a6(dkon brtsegs): bu mo/ 'di ni stobs rnam pa brgyad ces bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' gang stobs brgyad po 'di dag dang ldan par gyur na rab tu bstan pa'i dpa' bor 'gyur bas /'khor ba na
178a7(dkon brtsegs): gnas kyang mngon par zhen cing chags pa med par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ sems 'dun dpa' bo gang yin pa/ /
178b1(dkon brtsegs): g.yo sgyu dag ni spong byed cing / /rtag par drang po spyod pas na/ /yang dag byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur/ /mos pa'i stobs ni gang yin pa/ /nyes pa mang po spong byed cing / /dge ba 'ba'
178b2(dkon brtsegs): zhig spyod pas ni/ /yang dag brtson la gnas par 'gyur/ /sbyor ba phun sum tshogs gyur pa/ /rtag tu legs par rab brtan nas/ /brtson 'grus brtan par gyur pas na/ /sems
178b3(dkon brtsegs): can rnams ni bde bar byed/ /mngon par yid ches stobs dbang gis/ /las kyi rnam smin rig pas na/ /sangs rgyas ye shes yid ches shing / /'jig rten yongs su sdud par
178b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ /byang chub sems stobs gang yin des/ /theg pa dman pa spong byed cing / /sangs rgyas gdung ni mi gcod pas/ /chos nyid la ni gnas par 'gyur/ /byams chen stobs
178b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbang gis na/ /sems can snyoms par lta byed cing / /byams sdang dag ni med pas na/ /zhe sdang gnod pa bskyed mi 'gyur/ /snying rje chen po'i stobs kyis ni/ /sems can dang
178b6(dkon brtsegs): du len byed cing / /'khor ba dag la zhen med cing / /yongs su skyo zhing ngal ba med/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen stobs kyis ni/ /rtag par phan tshun sad byed cing / /sems ni bying bar
178b7(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur bas/ /byang chub la ni gnas par 'gyur/ /dpa' bo gang yin de dag gis/ /stobs brgyad 'di dag thob gyur na/ /byang chub snying por 'dug nas ni/ /bdud dpung mang po
179a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom par 'gyur/ /gzhan yang bu mo/ byang chub sems dpa' chos rnam pa brgyad dang ldan par gyur na mnyam pa nyid la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro/ /brgyad
179a2(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ dang po ni/ sems can thams cad mnyam par gyur pa ste/ rang bzhin gyis bdag med pa'i phyir ro/ /gnyis pa ni/ chos thams cad mnyam par gyur pa ste/ chos thams
179a3(dkon brtsegs): cad rab tu dben pa'i phyir ro/ /gsum pa ni/ zhing thams cad mnyam par gyur pa ste/ stong pa nyid kyi khams su 'jug par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /bzhi pa ni/ shes pa thams cad
179a4(dkon brtsegs): mnyam par gyur pa ste/ /mnyam pa nyid stong ba'i phyir ro/ /lnga pa ni/ spyod pa thams cad mnyam par gyur pa ste/ rgyu dang rkyen la rang bzhin med pa'i phyir ro/ /drug pa ni/ theg pa
179a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mnyam par gyur pa ste/ 'dus ma byas su mtshungs pa'i phyir ro/ /bdun pa ni/ sems mnyam par gyur pa ste/ sems sgyu ma dang mtshungs pa'i phyir ro/ /brgyad pa ni/

179b1(dkon brtsegs): de lta bur ni blta bar bya/ /chos rnams thams cad mnyam pas na/ /rang bzhin rtag par stong zhing dben/ /yi ges tha dad phye bar zad/ /chos rnams rang bzhin bye brag med/ /phyogs
179b2(dkon brtsegs): bcu zhing rnams thams cad kun/ /mu mtha' dag ni mi dmigs pas/ /de yi rang bzhin nam mkha' 'dra/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni rtag tu mnyam/ /dus gsum de bzhin gshegs pa kun/
179b3(dkon brtsegs): chos dbyings gnas par mnyam pas na/ /ye shes mtha' yas rnam par grol/ /sangs rgyas kun kyang de bzhin no/ /sems can rang bzhin rgyu rkyen rnams/ /thams cad kun kyang mnyam
179b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / /de yi spyod pa rab shes pas/ /ci rigs par ni go bar byed/ /sems can ji snyed tha dad pa/ /sgyu 'phrul lta bur rab tu rtogs/ /phyi nang gnyi ga len med pas/ /rang bzhin rtag
179b5(dkon brtsegs): tu rnam par dag / theg pa sna tshogs rab bshad kyang / /'dus ma byas su rab tu mnyam/ /'dren pas thabs ni rab mkhyen pas/ /rnam par phye ste theg gsum bshad/ /nyon mongs bdud
179b6(dkon brtsegs): la rab gnas kyang / /nyon mongs dngos po ci yang med/ /lha dang phung po 'chi bdag bdud/ /spyod yul thams cad stong pa yin/ gzhan yang bu mo/ byang chub sems dpa' chos brgyad dang ldan
179b7(dkon brtsegs): na byams sdang rnams yongs su spong bar byed do/ /brgyad gang zhe na/ byams pa dang ldan pa dang / snying rje dang ldan pa dang / rtag par phan 'dogs par byed pa dang / 'jig rten gyi chos la ma
180a1(dkon brtsegs): chags pa dang / rang gi lus la chags pa med pa dang / rtag tu ting nge 'dzin gyi sems bsgom pa dang / lus dang srog yongs su gtong ba dang / nyon mongs pa
180a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams la so sor rtog pa ste/ chos brgyad po 'di dag ni mngon par bsgrub par nus na byams sdang yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de
180a3(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ byams sems go cha rab bgos nas/ /thams cad kun la snying brtse zhing / /mnyam pa'i sems la gang gnas pa/ /byams sdang sems la skye mi 'gyur/ /blo ldan phan
180a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dogs spyod pas nas/ /rtag par gzhan la bde ba gtong / /rnyed pa thob kyang rang mi mthong / /brnyas shing smad kyang khon 'dzin med/ /rlung brgyad kyis ni mi bskyed pas/ /byams sdang dag
180a5(dkon brtsegs): ni mi skye zhing / /bdag gam gal te gzhan yang rung / /byams sdang 'du shes yongs mi bskyed/ /'du shes dag ni rab spangs nas/ /spyod yul dag la zhen pa med/ /rtag par rang gi lus
180a6(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pas/ /lus srog dag la phabs pa med/ /mkhas rnams sdug bsngal bde ba yis/ /g.yos par mi 'gyur nam mkha' bzhin/ /nyon mongs legs par rtogs byed na/ /bdag dang
180a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi gnyi ga spong / /spyod 'dzin rtag par sa 'dra bas/ /byams sdang dag ni yong mi bskyed/ /gzhan yang bu mo/ byang chub sems dpa' chos rnam pa brgyad dang ldan na 'khor bas yongs su
180b1(dkon brtsegs): ngal bar mi 'gyur ro/ /brgyad gang zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yangs shing rgya che ba'i phyir dang / sems can la so sor rtog par byed pa'i phyir dang / rtag par de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong
180b2(dkon brtsegs): zhing mchod par byed pa'i phyir dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing chod med pa rnams mthong ba'i phyir/ rtag par sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa yongs su gnyer ba'i phyir dang / 'khor ba rmi lam lta bur
180b3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu rtog pa'i phyir dang / chos khyad par can dag la zhugs pa'i phyir dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang yang dag par mtha' la so sor rtog ba'i phyir ro/ /de nas bcom
180b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ rnal 'byor lam ni gang bsgom pa/ /dge sbyong skyon phran dri ma med/ /bar snang zla ba rnam dag bzhin/ /sdug bsngal sems
180b5(dkon brtsegs): can sgrol bar byed/ yon tan rnams ni bsdu ba'i phyir/ /'khor bas yongs su ngal mi 'gyur/ /sems can rang bzhin rtogs byed cing / /rab brtan brtson 'grus spyod par byed/ /sangs
180b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas zhing ni tshad med du/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni gus mchod pas/ /de phyir stobs bcu gang ldan pa/ /'khor bas yongs su ngal mi 'gyur/ /'jig rten dpag med tsha med du/ /bsam gyis mi
180b7(dkon brtsegs): khyab chos ston cing / /dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi gcod/ /chos rgyal nyid du mngon 'tshang rgya/ /tshul khrims dam par gang bsrung pa/ /'khor bas ngal bar mi 'gyur zhing / /'khor
181a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa/ /rmi lam sprin dang glog ltar shes/ /chos las gang zhig rnam grol ba/ /'khor bas yongs su ngal mi 'gyur/ /byang chub la ni
181a2(dkon brtsegs): rab gnas shing / /dga' ba'i sems kyis rtag tu bde/ /thabs kyi pha rol gang yin pa/ /'khor bas yongs su ngal mi 'gyur/ /rtag par dam chos sgrub pa yang / /bar snang zla bzhin
181a3(dkon brtsegs): 'phel bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas yon tan gang mos pa/ /'khor bas yongs su ngal mi 'gyur/ /'khor ba mu mtha' med gyur kyang / /rtag par yang dag mtha' la gnas/ /yud tsam
181a4(dkon brtsegs): shes rab rjes mthun pa/ /'khor ba dag gis ngal mi 'gyur/ /gzhan yang bu mo/ chos brgyad dang ldan na sems kyi khams mnyam par 'gyur ro/ /brgyad gang zhe na/ sems dang mtshungs
181a5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / sems chu dang mtshungs par 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / /sems me dang mtshungs par 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / sems rlung dang mtshungs par 'gyur ba'i phyir dang /
181a6(dkon brtsegs): sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs par 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / sems chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs par 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / sems rnam par grol ba dang mtshungs par 'gyur ba'i
181a7(dkon brtsegs): phyir dang / sems mya ngan las 'das pa dang mtshungs par 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ 'di ni sems kyi khams mnyam pa nyid rnam pa brgyad ces bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang
181b1(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ sems ni sa dang mtshungs pas na/ /thams cad khur du khyer bar byed/ /dge ba dang ni sdig pa'ang rung / /'phel ba med cing 'grib pa med/ /sems ni
181b2(dkon brtsegs): chu dang mtshungs pas na/ /dri ma mi gtsang 'khru byed cing / /'jig rten rnams ni gso ba dang / /nyon mongs gdung ba sel bar byed/ /sems ni me dang mtshungs pas na/ /nyon mongs
181b3(dkon brtsegs): dag ni sreg byed cing / /sgron ma chen po snang ba yin/ /gsal bar mi byed gang yang med/ /sems ni rlung dang mtshungs pas na/ /gnas pa med cing rten med par/ /tshul khrims thos
181b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dri yis ni/ /dus gsum kun du khyad par byed/ /sems ni nam mkha' mtshungs pas na/ /lta ba spong zhing rnam par dag /thams cad kun du 'jug byed kyang / /bdud kyi rjes su
181b5(dkon brtsegs): 'brang mi byed/ /sems ni chos dbyings mtshungs pas na/ /bde ba nyid du rab gnas shing / /'phel ba med cing 'grib med par/ /rtag par mnyam pa nyid la gnas/ /nyan thos dang ni rang
181b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal gyi/ /rnam par grol ba thob gyur kyang / /'ching ba dag kyang yod min la/ /grol ba dag kyang yod pa min/ /'khor ba dag ni mya ngan 'das/ /'ong ba med cing 'gro ba med/ /rab dben
181b7(dkon brtsegs): nyer zhi gnas nas ni/ /dus gsum kun tu 'gro bar byed/ /gzhan yang bu mo/ chos rnam pa brgyad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub kyi 'byung gnas su 'gyur ro/ /
182a1(dkon brtsegs): brgyad gang zhe na/ dang po ni/ sbyin pa 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin te/ /ci bdog pa rnams yongs su gtong ba'i phyir ro/ /gnyis pa ni/ tshul khrims
182a2(dkon brtsegs): 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin te/ nyams pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsum pa ni/ bzod pa 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin te/ zhe sdang med pa'i phyir ro/ /bzhi pa ni/ brtson 'grus 'byung
182a3(dkon brtsegs): gnas su gyur pa yin te/ le lo med cing nur ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /lnga pa ni/ bsam gtan 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin te/ thabs la mkhas pa'i phyir ro/ /drug pa ni/ shes
182a4(dkon brtsegs): rab 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin te/ tshul khrims bsrung zhing mang du thos pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /bdun pa ni/ tshangs pa'i gnas pa 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin te/ rnam par
182a5(dkon brtsegs): grol bas nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /brgyad pa ni/ mngon par shes pa 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin te/ rtag par mnyam par bzhag pa la rab tu gnas pa'i phyir ro/ /de
182a6(dkon brtsegs): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ rtag par sbyin pa gang gtong pa/ /'dod chags gdung ba spong bas na/ /'bras bu rnam smin mi re bar/ /
182a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas byang chub bsngo bar byed/ /khrims ldan theg pa che ba'i phyir/ /bcad cing btubs kyang khong khro med/ /rtse gcig bde chen gnyer byed cing / /bag chags spangs na
182b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gog mngon med/ /byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus can/ /bskal mang sems can ched du ni/ /sdug bsngal bzod cing 'jig rten rgyu/ /brtson 'grus stobs ni 'phel bar
182b2(dkon brtsegs): byed| |bsam gtan dag ni gang bsgom pa/ /spros pa rnams ni spong byed cing / /bsam gtan pha rol phyin gyur kyang / /bsam gtan rjes su yong mi skye/ /shes rab chen po mtshungs med
182b3(dkon brtsegs): pas| |mthar lta rnams ni spong byed cing / /'jig rten stong dben rig pas na/ /gti mug mun pa ma lus sel/ /nyer zhi tshangs gnas gang bsgom pa/ /ngan song rnams ni spangs pas
182b4(dkon brtsegs): na| |rtag par brgya byin tshangs par 'gyur/ /don gyi phan pa nan tan bsgom/ /mngon shes sangs rgyas zhing rgyu ba/ /sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur chos kyang nyan/ /rang bzhin mos pa rab shes
182b5(dkon brtsegs): pas| |chos bshad sems can zlos par byed/ /gzhan yang bu mo/ byang chub sems dpa' ni chos brgyad dang ldan pa'i phyir gzungs dang / thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa thob par
182b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ /brgyad gang zhe na/ chos la bla mar byed pa'i phyir dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon la rim gro byed pa'i phyir dang / chos yongs su gnyer ba la skyo ba med pa'i phyir dang / ji
182b7(dkon brtsegs): skad thos pa bzhin du yang dag par bstan par byed pa'i phyir dang / chos la ser sna mi byed pa'i phyir dang / gzhan gyi nyes pa sgrogs par mi byed pa'i phyir dang / chos smra ba dag la/ mkhan
183a1(dkon brtsegs): po bzhin du gus pas sri zhu byed pa'i phyir dang / gzhan gyi nyes pa mi mthong zhing nyes pa spangs par skul bar byed pa'i phyir te/ 'di ni byang chub sems
183a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i chos brgyad dang ldan na/ gzungs dang / thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'gyur ba zhes bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad
183a3(dkon brtsegs): de bka' stsal pa/ rtse gcig rtag tu chos gnyer ba/ mkhan po dge bshes rim gro byed/ /sdig pa'i grogs po spong bas na/ /mi zad gter 'dzin thob par 'gyur/ /mang thos yongs
183a4(dkon brtsegs): su skyo med par/ /rab brtson chos ni gnyer bar byed/ /ji skad thos bzhin ston byed pas/ /rnyed pa dag la re tshol med/ /spobs pa rnam dag gang thob pa/ /'khor mang dga' bar byed
183a5(dkon brtsegs): pas na/ /chos sbyin pa la rab mos shing / /ser sna phrag dog spong bar byed/ /chos spyod mngon par zhen med cing / /gzungs ni gang zhig thob 'gyur ba/ /khrims srung rang lus lta bas
183a6(dkon brtsegs): na| |gzhan gyi nyes skyon yong mi tshol/ /byams dang snying rje gnas gyur cing / /dus min tshig ni mi smra bas/ /thogs med spobs pa thob gyur nas/ /spro tshig pha rol phyin pa ston/ /chos
183a7(dkon brtsegs): ni legs par smra ba la/ /mkhan po bzhin du gus par byed/ /skyon 'chab nyes pa spong bskul bas/ /mi zad kun 'dzin rgya mtsho thob/ /gzhan yang bu mo/ byang chub sems dpa'
183b1(dkon brtsegs): ni chos rnam pa brgyad dang ldan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar pad+ma la brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ /brgyad gang zhe na/ srog la bab par gyur kyang gzhan gyi nyes pa mi brjod pa dang /
183b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro bar bskul ba dang / thams cad byang chub kyi sems la 'god pa dang / tshangs par spyod pa la gos pa med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
183b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sku gzugs dag byas nas pad+mo'i gdan la 'jog pa dang / sems can mya ngan byed pa dag gi mya ngan sel bar byed pa dang / khengs shing nga rgyal byed pa dag gi mdun du rtag par bdag
183b4(dkon brtsegs): nyid dman par byed pa dang / gzhan la 'tshe bar mi byed pa gang yin pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ gal te sdug bsngal gzir gyur kyang / /
183b5(dkon brtsegs): nam yang gzhan gyi skyon mi smra/ /rtag par dkon mchog gang bsngags pa/ /sangs rgyas spyan sngar brdzus te skye/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed pa dang / /thams cad mkhyen pa gnyer bskul
183b6(dkon brtsegs): nas| |rtag tu tshangs par gang spyod pa/ /sangs rgyas spyan sngar brdzus te skye/ /gser gyis sangs rgyas gzugs brgyan te/ /rin chen pad+ma'i gdan la bzhag /sems can mya ngan gang
183b7(dkon brtsegs): sel ba/ /sangs rgyas spyan sngar brdzus te skye/ /nga rgyal byed pa de dag la/ /slob ma bzhin du bdag dman zhing / /gzhan la gang zhig mi 'tshe ba/ /sangs rgyas spyan sngar brdzus te skye/ /gzhan
184a1(dkon brtsegs): yang bu mo/ chos brgyad dang ldan par gyur na/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan phun sum tshogs par 'gyur zhing rtag par dgon pa na gnas pa la mos par
184a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ /brgyad gang zhe na/ 'dod pa chung ba dang / chog shes pa dang / dge ba'i chos yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / dge bas bdag nyid gso bar byed pa dang / rtag par
184a3(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa'i rigs yongs su 'dzin pa dang / 'khor ba'i nyes dmigs mthong bas sems la rtag par skyo ba dang / rtag par mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang /
184a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag med par lta ba dang / dad pa shin du brtan zhing gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa gang yin pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ 'dod
184a5(dkon brtsegs): pa chung zhing chog shes pas/ /chos dga' dge mang bdag nyid gso/ /rtag par 'phags rigs bsgrub la mos/ /'khor ba'i skyon mthong sems la skrag /sbyang pa dag la rtag
184a6(dkon brtsegs): mos par/ /bse ru gcig ltar grogs kyang med/ /'dus byas sdug bsngal bdag med ces/ /blo yis rab dang brtson 'grus gnas/ /chos mthong gzhan gyi rjes mi 'brang / /rtag
184a7(dkon brtsegs): par dben gnas sangs rgyas bsngags/ /sbyangs pas thag bsrings gdung ba med/ /rtsod smra nyes dmigs mang ba med/ /gnyen bshes yongs spangs bsngags pa brjod/ /des na
184b1(dkon brtsegs): dgon par gnas la mos/ /gzhan yang bu mo/ byang chub sems dpa' ni chos rnam pa brgyad dang ldan pa'i phyir bdud kyi dpung rab tu pham par byed do/ /brgyad gang zhe na/ ngo bo nyid stong pa
184b2(dkon brtsegs): nyid la zhugs pa dang / mtshan ma med pa la mngon par yid ches pa dang / smon pa med pa la mngon par yid ches pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med par rab tu shes pa dang / de la the tshom
184b3(dkon brtsegs): dang som nyi med pa dang / skye ba med par rab tu brjod pa dang / /ngo bo nyid med par rab tu rtogs pa dang / thabs mkhas pas chos thams cad la so sor rtog cing de bzhin nyid 'jig
184b4(dkon brtsegs): par mi byed pa gang yin pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ stong dang mtshan ma med dang smon med pa/ /rnam thar gsum thob bdud dpung rab tu
184b5(dkon brtsegs): 'joms/ /'dus byas dus min mtshan nyid gnyis su med/ /skyon med thob pas rnam par grol bar 'gyur/ /chos rnams skye med de ltar gang bzod pa/ /de dag bdud dpung rab tu pham par
184b6(dkon brtsegs): byed| |skye ba med dang 'gag med 'di dag dang / /phung po khams la bdag med sgyu ma 'dra/ /chos la ngo bo nyid med des rtogs shing / /de bzhin nyid ni mi 'jigs thabs mkhas pas/ /chos
184b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams bdud kyi las zhes gang 'byed pa/ /rnam rtog spangs nas bdud ni pham par byed/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyi ga rab spyod cing / /yod dang stong la gnas pa med par ni/ /de ltar chos
185a1(dkon brtsegs): mchog gang zhig sgom byed pa/ thabs mkhas gzugs lus mdzes pa thob par 'gyur/ /gzhan yang bu mo/ byang chub sems dpa' ni chos rnam pa brgyad
185a2(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa'i phyir byang chub dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /brgyad gang zhe na/ yang dag pa'i lta bas log par lta ba'i sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang / yang dag
185a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dran pas log par sems pa'i sems can la snying brtse bar byed pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag gis log par smra ba rnams la snying rje bar byed pa dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi
185a4(dkon brtsegs): mthas log pa'i las can rnams yongs su sdud pa dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol bas log par rtsol ba rnams yongs su bzlog pa dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho bas log par
185a5(dkon brtsegs): 'tsho ba'i sems can rnams spong bar mi byed pa dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pas log par yid la byed pa spong bar byed pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis log pa'i ting nge
185a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin la gnas pa dag bslang nas gong du rtsol du gzhug pa gang yin pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ yang dag lta dang gang ldan
185a7(dkon brtsegs): pa| |log lta de dag smin par byed/ /rtag par yang dag dran bsgoms pas/ /log sems dag la brtse bar byed/ /rnam dag yang dag ngag gis ni/ /log smra rnams la brtse bar
185b1(dkon brtsegs): byed| |yang dag las mtha' gnas pa yis/ /log pa'i las can sdud par byed/ /rtag par yang dag rtsol bsgoms nas/ /log brtson dag ni spong bar byed/ /yang dag 'tsho bas rjes
185b2(dkon brtsegs): mthun pas/ /log 'tsho gang yin sdud par byed/ /blo ldan yang dag rtog pa yis/ /log par yid byed brtse bar sems/ /yang dag ting 'dzin rtag gnas nas/ /log pa'i ting 'dzin
185b3(dkon brtsegs): sdud par byed/ /bla med yang dag lam brgyad kyis/ /chu bo dag las bde bar sgrol/ /rgyun phyogs ded pa zlog byed pas/ /de ni byang chub lam chen yin/ /nyan thos dang ni rang rgyal
185b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams/ /rtswa yi gzings bzhin bdag nyid zlos/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun zlos pas/ /dper na gru chen 'dren mkhan 'dra/ /gzhan yang bu mo/ byang chub sems dpa' ni chos
185b5(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa brgyad dang ldan pa'i phyir bdud rtsi'i lam mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro/ /brgyad gang zhe na/ rtsod pa med pa'i chos la gnas pa dang / thog pa'i sems legs par rab tu srung
185b6(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pa dang / rtag par de kho na nyid kyi don la lta bar byed pa dang / byang chub kyi sems rab tu gnas nas rjes su dran pa drug sgom par byad pa dang / nan tan brtson 'grus kyi pha
185b7(dkon brtsegs): rol tu phyin pa rnams sgom par byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags nas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang / snying rje chen po la gnas nas yang dag pa'i chos yongs su
186a1(dkon brtsegs): sdud par byed pa dang / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa nas phyir mi ldog pa la rab tu gnas pa gang yin pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs
186a2(dkon brtsegs): su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ rtag par rtsod med spyod bsgrubs nas/ /dge sbyong tshe yi chos la gnas/ /zhe sdang nyes pa yongs spangs nas/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba gsog par byed/ /yang
186a3(dkon brtsegs): dag don ni rab lta bas/ /mi zad spobs rnams thob par byed/ /byang chub sems la rab gnas nas/ /rtag par dran med rjes su dran/ /pha rol phyin pa thams cad la/ /rab brtson
186a4(dkon brtsegs): bsgrubs pas log pa med/ /thabs mkhas stobs rnams thob pas na/ /des ni sems can sgrol bar byed/ /chos kyi mnga' bdag nor gyis ni/ /brtse sems thams cad kun sdud pas//
186a5(dkon brtsegs): myur du mi skye bzod thob nas/ /byang chub las ni ldog mi 'gyur/ /gal te de ltar spyod nus na/ /sangs rgyas chos ni thob mi dka'/ /ring por mi thogs bdud btul nas/ /byang chub
186a6(dkon brtsegs): mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /de nas bu mo des chos de lta bu thos nas dga' mgu rangs par gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos rnam
186a7(dkon brtsegs): pa du dang ldan par gyur na bud med kyi dngos po las ldog par 'gyur lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu mo/ chos brgyad dang ldan par gyur na bud med kyi dngos
186b1(dkon brtsegs): po las ldog par 'gyur ro/ /brgyad gang zhe na/ phrag dog mi byed pa dang / ser sna mi byed pa dang / g.yo sgyu med pa dang / khong khro ba med pa dang / bden par smra ba dang / ngag rtsub po
186b2(dkon brtsegs): mi smra ba dang / 'dod chags spangs pa dang / log par lta ba rnams spangs pa gang yin pa ste/ bu mo/ chos brgyad po 'di dag mngon par bsgrubs nas/ myur du bud med kyi dngos po las
186b3(dkon brtsegs): ldog par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ gzhan la phrag dog mi byed cing / /ser sna spangs nas chos mos dang / /g.yo sgyu dag ni mi
186b4(dkon brtsegs): spyod cing / /bud med lus la skyo ba dang / /byams sems zhe sdang rab spangs nas/ /rtag par bden tshig smra ba dang / /'dod bsal ngag rtsub spangs nas ni/ /yang dag lta la gnas
186b5(dkon brtsegs): par bya/ /gang gis bud med lus skyo nas/ /'di 'dra'i chos ni sgrub byed na/ /myur du bud med lus spangs nas/ /skyes pa'i lus bzang len par 'gyur/ /gzhan yang bu mo/ chos
186b6(dkon brtsegs): brgyad dang ldan par gyur na bud med kyi dngos po las ldog par 'gyur ro/ /brgyad gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas la bla mar byed cing chos la shin tu mos pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod
186b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / mang du thos pa dang ldan pa'i dge sbyong dang / bram ze dag la bsnyen bkur dang rim gro byed pa dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khyim gyi dngos po dag la mngon par zhen
187a1(dkon brtsegs): cing chags pa med pa dang / bslab pa'i dngos po yang dag par blangs pa rnams 'jig par mi byed pa dang / srog chags thams cad la log pa'i
187a2(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa mi skyed pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas bud med kyi dngos po la yongs su skyo bar 'gyur ba dang / byang chub kyi sems kyis skyes bu chen po'i chos la gnas pa dang /
187a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten pa'i khyim gyi 'tsho tshis rnams la sgyu ma dang rmi lam lta bur lta ba gang yin pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas
187a4(dkon brtsegs): rab gus chos la mos/ /tshul khrims mang thos bla mar byed/ /'dod chags sred sems mi skyed na/ /bud med dngos po myur du spong / /khrims srung ngo tsha khrel yod ldan/ /gzhan la
187a5(dkon brtsegs): mi bden bsam mi khyab/ /byang chub sems la rab gnas nas/ /theg pa gzhan la mos med na/ /des ni myur ba kho nar yang / /mi gtsang bud med dngos po spong / /bsam pa mchog
187a6(dkon brtsegs): gis sems skyo nas/ /thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang / /chos rnams rang bzhin g.yo med dang / /rgyu rkyen rang bzhin stong dben zhes/ /nan tan yang dag chos bsgoms na/ /myur
187a7(dkon brtsegs): du skyes pa'i lus thob 'gyur/ /de nas bu mo rnam dag dad pa gser gyi phreng ba thogs pa de dag bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor ba dang / steng gi bar snang la gser yang
187b1(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'i gzhal med khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dag tu gyur nas/ gzhal med khang de dag gi nang du sprul pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi gdan la bzhugs pa sha stag
187b2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par byung bar gyur to/ /de nas bu mo lnga brgya po de dag kyang so so nas lus kyi rgyan rnams bkrol nas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor ba dang / steng gi bar snang la
187b3(dkon brtsegs): gser gyi gzhal med khang dang / rin po che'i gur dang / rin po che'i gdugs dang / bkod pa rnam pa sna tshogs su gyur to/ /de nas bu mo lnga brgya po de dag gis de lta bu'i cho 'phrul
187b4(dkon brtsegs): chen po mthong ba dang / skad mthun par tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bcom ldan mi mchog khyad par 'phags pas nas/ /thugs rje sems can rnams la sman par mdzad/ /bdag
187b5(dkon brtsegs): cag deng ni byang chub sems bskyed nas/ /mos pa rjes mthun rab tu dul la gnas/ bcom ldan 'dren pa bde bar rab stsol ba/ /bdag cag mi mchog la ni mchod par bgyi/ /chos
187b6(dkon brtsegs): thos dbang gi sa rdul rnams rab spangs nas/ /bdag cag the tshom nem nur yong ma mchis/ /des na bud med nyon mongs mang spangs nas/ /nyon mongs gtan bcos bdud ni pham
187b7(dkon brtsegs): par bgyis/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bye ba tshad med rnams/ /bdag cag dga' bas rtag tu mchod par 'tshal/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims brtson 'grus rab gnas nas/ /bzod
188a1(dkon brtsegs): dang bsam gtan sems ni rab tu bgyi/ /thabs dang shes rab sems ni yongs bsdus nas/ /byang chub mchog lam gang lags mngon du bgyi/ /
188a2(dkon brtsegs): lha mi'i 'khor ni tshad med sman btags nas/ thams cad theg chen sems ni bskyed pas bskul/ /bdag cag seng ge'i sgra ni sgrogs par 'gyur/ /bdag cag lha mi'i ston pa
188a3(dkon brtsegs): bgyid par mchis/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid ni nam 'dzum pa mdzad pa na 'od zer kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs 'di lta ste/
188a4(dkon brtsegs): sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / dngul dang / shel gyi kha dog lta bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal gyi sgo nas byung ste/ 'jig
188a5(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams tshad med/ dpag tu med pa dag nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du khyab par snang bar byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/
188a6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tu thim par gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
188a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das/ rgyu rkyen gang gi slad du 'dzum pa 'di lta bu bstan par mdzad lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis bu mo rnam dag dad pa 'di
188b1(dkon brtsegs): mthong ngam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ bu mo rnam dag dad pa la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po
188b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag ni 'di nas tshe zad pa dang / bud med kyi lus spangs nas dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das byams pa dang / bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa
188b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la bkur sti dang / rim gro dang / mchod pa byed par 'gyur bas/ bu mo rnam dag dad pas bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgyad khri bzhi stong 'das pa'i 'og tu 'jig rten gyi khams
188b4(dkon brtsegs): glog gi 'od ces bya bar mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi bkod pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa bzang po'i ming ni rtag tu snang ba
188b5(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad ni dga' ldan gyi lha bzhin du tshe lo stong phrag bcu gnyis thub par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi khams de na yang byang chub sems dpa'
188b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po 'ba' zhig gi 'khor tshad med dpag tu med pa dag gis 'khor byed par 'gyur ro/ /bu mo lnga brgya po 'di dag kyang 'khor de dag gi nang na gtso bo mchog byed par
188b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ ji ltar da ltar nga'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la sogs pa drug cu po 'di dag gtso bor gyur pa bzhin no/ /kun dga' bo/ bud med gang la la zhig gi chos
189a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas yongs su 'dzin par byed/ klog par byed/ kha ton du gdon par byed na bud med kyi lus 'di dag gtugs nas phyis yang
189a2(dkon brtsegs): len par mi 'gyur zhing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
189a3(dkon brtsegs): nas| bu mo rnam dag dad pa la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la
189a4(dkon brtsegs): rab tu dga' nas mngon par bstod to/ /'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ bu mo rnam dag dad pas zhus pa'i le'u
189a5(dkon brtsegs): ste| 'dus pa bzhi bcu pa rdzogs so/ / //lo ts+tsha ba 'gos chos grub kyis rgya nag gi dpe las bsgyur cing zhus te/ gtan la phab pa// //rgya gar skad
189a6(dkon brtsegs): du| Ar+ya mai tri ya pa ri pr-i ts+tshA pa ri brta nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa byams pas zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po gcig pa/
189a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul brga na chu srin byis pa gsod pa
189b1(dkon brtsegs): lta bu'i ri 'jigs su rung ba'i nags ri dwags kyi nags na/ dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po mngon par shes pas mngon par shes pa/ gnas brtan
189b2(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos chen po sha stag la 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kau di n+ya dang / tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang / tshe dang ldan pa rlangs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa ming chen dang / tshe dang ldan
189b3(dkon brtsegs): pa bzang ldan dang / tshe dang ldan pa dri ma med pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag dang / tshe dang ldan pa ri dwags mgo dang / tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas
189b4(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa chu klung 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa ga ya 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa byin pa 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan
189b5(dkon brtsegs): pa don yod rgyal po dang / tshe dang ldan pa blo gros rab bzang dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ri rgyal dang / tshe dang
189b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin dang / de dag la sogs pa dge slong lnga brgya tsam dang thabs
189b7(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu bzhugs so/ /byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa khri dang yang thabs gcig pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
190a1(dkon brtsegs): blo gros phreng dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan dang / blo gros yangs pa dang / spobs pa brtsegs
190a2(dkon brtsegs): dang | spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob dang / tog dpal dang / 'jam dpal dang / mngon par shes pa'i me tog shin tu rgyas pa dang / dmigs pa med pa yid la
190a3(dkon brtsegs): byed pa dang / dad ldan dang / rin po che'i tog dang / dbang po'i lha dang / chu lha dang / sgra dbyangs snyan dang / zhing rnam par sbyong dang / lhun po brtsegs dang / spobs pa phun sum
190a4(dkon brtsegs): tshogs pa dang / dbang po dpal dang / sa 'dzin dang / sems can dmyal ba skem dang / ngan song spong dang / rin chen ze ba can dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'
190a5(dkon brtsegs): khri dang thabs gcig ste/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to/ /de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' byams pa
190a6(dkon brtsegs): 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go / de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor chen po de 'dus par rig nas stan las langs te/ bla
190a7(dkon brtsegs): gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
190b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
190b2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
190b3(dkon brtsegs): to| |byams pa/ dri ba lung bstan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas rtag tu skabs phye'i/ byams pa khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas sems rangs
190b4(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' chos du dang ldan
190b5(dkon brtsegs): na ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i sug par mchi bar mi 'gyur la/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
190b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /byams pa khyod ni 'di
190b7(dkon brtsegs): ltar sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ tshe rabs dran pa/ spobs pa thob pa/ yun ring po nas tshangs pa spyod pa spyad pa ste/ byams pa khyod skye bo mang
191a1(dkon brtsegs): po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde
191a2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo da ltar gyi dang / ma 'ongs pa rnams yongs su gzung ba'i phyir zhugs pa nas/ khyod de bzhin

193a1(dkon brtsegs): thob pa yin/ shin tu sbyangs pa dang ldan pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin la mkhas pa yin/ shes rab kyis rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pa yin te/ byams pa/

193b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas so/ /rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang rab tu dang ste/ sems kyi
193b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa/ dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa bsgrubs te gnas so/ /dga' ba'i
193b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas shing dran pa dang shes bzhin can yin te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la
193b6(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa/ gtang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pas bsam gtan gsum pa bsgrubs te gnas so/ /bde ba yang spangs te/ snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs
193b7(dkon brtsegs): shing yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba yang nub pas/ bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa
194a1(dkon brtsegs): bsgrubs te gnas so/ /rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur
194a2(dkon brtsegs): cing | sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas so/ /rnam pa thams
194a3(dkon brtsegs): cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas so/ /
194a4(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ ci yang med do snyam nas/ ci yang med do snyam nas/ ci yang med pa'i skye mched bsgrubs te gnas so/ /rnam pa

194a6(dkon brtsegs): shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas/ 'du shes dang / tshor ba 'gog pa bsgrubs nas gnas te/ byams pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chos

194b1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /byams pa/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu dang ldan na ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la/ myur
194b2(dkon brtsegs): du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yin/ gnas dang
194b3(dkon brtsegs): gnas ma yin pa la mngon par brtson pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yin/ thabs kyis 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yin/ rnam par snang byed kyi ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yin
194b4(dkon brtsegs): kun nas snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yin/ kun du gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yin/ rin chen zla ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yin/ zla ba'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin
194b5(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa yin/ nyon mongs pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yin/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yin te/ byams pa/ byang chub sems
194b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ ngan song thams cad spong zhing sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu mi 'gro la/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
194b7(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes
195a1(dkon brtsegs): te/ stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der
195a2(dkon brtsegs): logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /sngon chad sbyin pa sbyin mdzad pa/ /sdug
195a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bu dang zas skom dang / /mgo dang mig kyang btang mdzad de/ /sangs rgyas sbyin kun pha rol phyin/ /g.yag rnga bzhin du yul ring nas/ /khyod kyis tshul khrims ma nyams bsrung /
195a4(dkon brtsegs): khrims kyis khyed 'dra ma mchis te/ /sangs rgyas khrims legs pha rol phyin/ /bzod pa'i stobs ni bskyed mdzad nas/ /byis pas nongs par bgyis pa bzod/ /bzod pa'i stobs
195a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kun dang ldan/ /sangs rgyas bzod legs pha rol phyin/ /brtson 'grus stobs ni bskyed mdzad nas/ /zhi bde bla na med pa brnyes/ /brtson 'grus stobs kyis stobs dang
195a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan| |sangs rgyas brtson legs pha rol phyin/ /sdig pa thams cad bsregs mdzad nas/ /'dren pa skyes chen bsam gtan dgyes/ /bsam gtan stobs kyi stobs dang
195a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan| |sangs rgyas bsam legs pha rol phyin/ /chos rnams de dag rang bzhin stong / /ngo bo nyid kyis gang mi skye/ /shes rab kyis ni pha rol gshegs/ /sangs rgyas shes legs
195b1(dkon brtsegs): pha rol phyin/ /mkhyen chen byang chub shing drung du/ /sder bcas bdud ni khyod kyis btul/ /don gyi mchog kyang brnyes par gyur/ /sangs rgyas bdud kyi tshogs ngan 'joms/ /skyes chen
195b2(dkon brtsegs): wA ra NA sir ni/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /mu stegs tshogs ngan skrag par mdzad/ /sangs rgyas mu stegs can tshogs 'joms/ /shes rab chen po bla na med/ /kun nas zla
195b3(dkon brtsegs): dpe yod ma mchis/ /dkon mchog chos de ston par mdzad/ /'dren pa sangs rgyas 'od mdzad lags/ /sbyin pa dang ni tshul khrims stobs/ /bzod brtson khyod dang 'dra ma mchis/ /
195b4(dkon brtsegs): kun gyi pha rol phyin par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas yon tan mang po 'phags/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i
195b5(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa
195b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di 'di ltar spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'di ltar shin tu rnam par nges pa'i tshig gis chos ston
195b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / 'di ltar tshig dang yi ge mtshungs pa'i chos ston pa dang / 'di ltar zab mo'i tshig gis chos ston pa dang / 'di ltar legs par 'brel ba'i tshig gis chos ston pa dang /
196a1(dkon brtsegs): dran pa'i tshig gis chos ston pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ de de bzhin no/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/
196a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' byams pa spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan zhing / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa shin tu rnam par nges pa'i tshig gis chos ston pa nas/ rjes su dran
196a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshig gi bar gyis chos ston pa ni ngo mtshar to/ /kun dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pas ni da ltar nga la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bstod par ma
196a4(dkon brtsegs): zad de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa bcur tshang bar gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
196a5(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams
196a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das snang bas rnam par rol pa'i mngon par shes pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i tshe bram ze'i khye'u bzang dag ces bya ba gzugs bzang
196a7(dkon brtsegs): ba| mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig yod pa de skyed mos tshal du 'gro ste grong bar du phyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
196b1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang bas rnam par rol pa'i mngon par shes pa mdzes pa dad par bya ba/ dbang po zhi ba/ thugs zhi ba/ dul ba dang zhi gnas kyi mchog
196b2(dkon brtsegs): brnyes pa/ dul ba dang zhi gnas kyi dam pa brnyes pa dbang po bsrungs pa/ glang po che dbang po thul ba lta bu/ mtsho ltar dang zhing rnyog pa med la gsal ba/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan
196b3(dkon brtsegs): sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag gis sku legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu po dag gis sku rnam par spras pa/ shing sA la'i rgyal po me tog shin tu rgyas pa 'dra ba/ ri'i
196b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po ri rab ltar mngon par 'phags pa/ zhal zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar zhi ba/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar lham me lhan ne lhang nge ba/ shing n+ya gro da ltar chu zheng gab pa/ 'od
196b5(dkon brtsegs): 'bar ba'i skus dpal chen pos 'bar ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de bcom ldan 'das la sems dad par gyur to/ /de sems dang nas 'di snyam du sems te/ a la la/ de bzhin
196b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i sku 'di rnam par spras shing / kha dog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal dang / mtshan rnams kyis ni 'bar zhing lham me lhan ne lhang nga ba ngo mtshar to snyam mo/ /de nas
196b7(dkon brtsegs): bram ze'i khye'u bzang dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/ /a la la/ bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na lus 'di 'dra ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ kha dog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal dang /
197a1(dkon brtsegs): mtshan rnams kyis 'di ltar 'bar zhing lham me lhan ne lhang nge bar gyur cig ces des smon lam de skad btab nas/ sa la nyal te 'di snyam du bsams
197a2(dkon brtsegs): so| |gal te bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'di lta bu'i lus dang ldan par gyur te/ kha dog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal dang / mtshan rnams kyis 'bar zhing lham me lhan
197a3(dkon brtsegs): ne lhang nger 'gyur zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs bdag gi lus la reg par gyur cig snyam mo/ /kun dga' bo/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
197a4(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang bas rnam par rol pa'i mngon par shes pa des bram ze'i khye'u bzang dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas/ bram ze'i khye'u bzang dag ga la ba der
197a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs te/ bram ze'i khye'u bzang dag la zhabs kyis reg par mdzad do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa snang bas rnam par rol pa'i mngon par shes pa des bram ze'i khye'u bzang dag
197a6(dkon brtsegs): la zhabs kyis reg par mdzad ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bar gyur to/ /kun dga' bo/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa snang bas rnam par rol pa'i
197a7(dkon brtsegs): mngon par shes pa des snam logs su gzigs nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed gang gis bram ze'i khye'u bzang dag de'i lus la rkang pas ma rdzi
197b1(dkon brtsegs): zhig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas de nyid kyi tshe bram ze'i khye'u bzang dag gis lha'i mig dang /
197b2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i rna ba dang / pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon sum du bya ba'i shes pa thob bo/ /rdzu 'phrul yang mngon par bsgrubs so/ /des de bzhin gshegs pa snang
197b3(dkon brtsegs): bas rnam par rol pa'i mngon par shes pa'i spyan sngar tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis kyang mngon par bstod do/ /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su bskor te
197b4(dkon brtsegs): btsal bgyis kyang / /'jig rten dag na mi dbang khyod 'dra yong ma mchis/ /'gro ba kun na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par 'phags/ /rnam par 'dren pa rang byung khyod la bdag phyag
197b5(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal/ /dper na bar snang la ni nyi ma lhan ne lta ra/ /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun gyi 'jig rten khams rnams na/ /'jig rten 'di dag thams cad 'od kyis lham mer gyur//
197b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas yon tan gzi mnga' khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /ji ltar seng ge nags khrod dag na sgra sgrogs pa/ /wa tshogs phal chen thams cad zil gyis gnon par bgyid/ /de
197b7(dkon brtsegs): ltar mi yi dam pa mthu chen mnga' ba yang / /mu stegs can mang 'dus pa thams cad zil gyi la gnon/ /bde bar gshegs pa smin mtshams par gyi mdzod spu dkar/ /dngul dang kha ba'i
198a1(dkon brtsegs): tshogs bzhin mtha' yas gzi brjid can/ /des ni 'jig rten 'di dag thams cad snang bar bgyis/ /'jig rten kun nas sangs rgyas khyod ni mi mnyam
198a2(dkon brtsegs): mnyam/ /skyes bu khyu mchog zhabs la lha yi 'khor lo mnga'/ /gsal zhing mdzes la rtsibs stong tshang zhing mu khyud 'khor/ /de dag gis ni ri dang nags bcas sa 'di rnams/ rab
198a3(dkon brtsegs): tu g.yo bgyid thub pa gang zag mtshungs ma mchis/ /nyon mongs shes chen dor bar bgyi ba thams cad bor/ /'phags pa nges par 'byin pa'i lam ni rab tu brnyes/ /nor rnams
198a4(dkon brtsegs): kun dang ldan zhing yon tan rnams kyis phyag / bsam pa bzhin du 'phags pa'i nor rnams bkod pa mdzes/ /sa dang mtshungs shing sbyin pa'i gnas gyur mtshungs ma mchis/ /
198a5(dkon brtsegs): yon tan kun la mnga' brnyes tshul khrims rnam dag pa/ /ji ltar nam mkha' lag pa mi thogs mi chags ltar/ /'jig rten dag na khyod la rjes chags khro mi mnga'/ /bzod pa zad
198a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis gtugs pa don dang chos rnams kun/ /snying po ma mchis pa dang gsob dang gsog tu mkhyen/ /srid pa'i 'gro ba thams cad dag ni gang rnams la/ /rlom sems 'gyur
198a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sems can srog dang dngos ma brnyes/ /khams dang spyod pa dag la sbyor dang bsam pa mkhyen/ /rmad du byung dang rnam par 'byed mdzad sgron mar gyur/ /chu bo chen pos ded
198b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'gro ba gzigs gyur nas/ /sngon chad brtson 'grus stobs brtan mthu ni bskyed par mdzad/ skye ba spangs zhes nyon mongs zhi ba'i thugs dang ldan/ /thugs rgya chen po skye dang rga shi
198b2(dkon brtsegs): mtha' mar 'byin/ /nam mkha'i dkyil dang mtshungs par chags pa mi mnga' rgyu/ /'jig rten chos kyis mi gos 'jig rten gsum na rgyu/ /bdag nyid chen po shes rab kyis ni snang
198b3(dkon brtsegs): bar mdzad/ /mun pa mun nag gyur pa thams cad rnam par sel/ /'dod chags rdul zhi mdzad cing zhe sdang gti mug gi/ dri ma sna tshogs mun bsal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kun dga'
198b4(dkon brtsegs): bo| de tshun chad bram ze'i khye'u bzang dag de'i rdzu 'phrul rnams sam/ mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su nyams par ma gyur to/ /kun dga' bo/ de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u
198b5(dkon brtsegs): bzang dag ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod dogs shing yid gnyis za'am the tsom za na de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhen/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
198b6(dkon brtsegs): po byams pa 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u bzang dag ces bya bar gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang bas rnam par
198b7(dkon brtsegs): rol pa'i mngon par shes pa de la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad
199a1(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di gal te yun ring po de srid nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod
199a2(dkon brtsegs): pa thob pa lags na/ ci'i slad du myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
199a3(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bkod pa dang / yongs su bzung ba ni gnyis po 'di dag ste /gnyis
199a4(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ sems can bkod pa dang / sems can yongs su bzung ba dang / zhing bkod pa dang / zhing yongs su bzung ba dang / gnyis po 'di dag yin na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
199a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po byams pas ni sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe zhing bkod pa rnams par sbyangs shing / zhing yongs su bzung ba yongs su bzung ngo / /kun dga' bo/
199a6(dkon brtsegs): nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ /ngas ni sems can bkod pa rnam par sbyangs/ sems can yongs su bzung ba yongs su bzung / zhing bkod pa yang rnam par
199a7(dkon brtsegs): sbyangs shing yongs su bzung ba yang yongs su bzung ngo / /kun dga' bo/ ngas mngon par shes te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa yang dag par zhugs
199b1(dkon brtsegs): nas bskal par zhi bcu rtsa gnyis lon pa'i 'og tu ngas gdod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ kun dga' bo/ bskal pa bzang po 'di 'das nas bskal
199b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dgu bcu rtsa bzhin/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar rigs pa las/ kun dga' bo/ ngas brtson 'grus 'bar bar byas pas myur
199b3(dkon brtsegs): du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ kun dga' bo/ ngas brtson 'grus rlabs po che myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
199b4(dkon brtsegs): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /kun dga' bo/ chos bcu po 'di dag gis nga myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/
199b5(dkon brtsegs): bcu gang zhe na/ bdog pa phangs pa thams cad yongs su btang ba dang / chung ma phangs pa yongs su btang ba dang / bu phangs pa yongs su btang ba dang / mgo phangs pa yongs su btang ba dang /
199b6(dkon brtsegs): mig phangs pa yongs su btang ba dang / rgyal srid phangs pa yongs su btang ba dang / longs spyod phangs pa yongs su btang ba dang / khrag phangs pa yongs su btang ba dang / rus pa dang
199b7(dkon brtsegs): rkang phangs pa yongs su btang ba dang / yan lag phangs pa thams cad yongs su btang bas nga myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/
200a1(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo/ chos bcu po de dag gis nga myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /kun dga' bo/
200a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang ngas chos bcus myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ bcu gang zhe na/ kun dga' bo/ nga tshul khrims kyi yon
200a3(dkon brtsegs): tan gyi chos la gnas te myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /kun dga' bo/ nga bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan pas myur du
200a4(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /kun dga' bo/ nga brtson 'grus 'bar ba brtsams pas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par
200a5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon pa rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /kun dga' bo/ nga bsam gtan gyi yon tan la gnas te myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
200a6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /kun dga' bo/ nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
200a7(dkon brtsegs): par sangs rgyas so/ /kun dga' bo/ ngas sems can thams cad yongs su ma btang bas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
200b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas so/ /kun dga' bo/ thabs mkhas pa la gnas te myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /kun dga' bo/ nga sems
200b2(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad la sems snyoms pas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /kun dga' bo/ ngas stong pa nyid kyi chos rtogs pas
200b3(dkon brtsegs): myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /kun dga' bo/ ngas mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos rtogs pas myur du bla na
200b4(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ kun dga' bo/ chos bcu po de dag gis nga myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
200b5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /kun dga' bo/ ngas tshor ba sdug bsngal ba drag pa rtsub pa ji lta bu dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
200b6(dkon brtsegs): par sangs rgyas pa de/ gal te khyed kyis shes su zin na/ kun dga' bo khyod spobs par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon
200b7(dkon brtsegs): nu nor thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ rgyal po'i bu 'byor pa chen po dang / rgyal po'i mthu chen
201a1(dkon brtsegs): po dang ldan pa zhig yod pa de skyed mos tshal du 'gro ste/ grong bar du phyin pa dang / gnod pas nyen cing sdug bsngal pa/ nad tshabs chen pos btab pa'i mi
201a2(dkon brtsegs): zhig mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de snying rje bar gyur te/ mi de ga la ba der song ste phyin nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye/ mi khyod ci sdug bsngal lam/ des smras pa/ lha/ bdag ni
201a3(dkon brtsegs): nad kyis btab bo/ /des smras pa/ kye/ mi khyod kyi nad cis zhi bar 'gyur/ khyod la ci sbyin/ des 'di skad ces smras so/ /gal te bdag gis lha khyod kyi lus las ji tsam gyis tshim par 'gyur
201a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i khrag cig 'thung du thob par lta na bdag gi nad zhi bar 'gyur/ kun dga' bo/ de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu nor thams cad sbyin pa des mtshon rnon po blangs te/ rang gi lus
201a5(dkon brtsegs): phug nas khrag gzags te mi de la btung bar byin no/ /kun dga' bo/ mi des de 'thungs ma thag tu mi de'i nad sos par gyur to/ /kun dga' bo/ rgyal po gzhon nu nor thams
201a6(dkon brtsegs): cad sbyin pas rang gi lus phug ste/ khrag thams cad gzags kyang 'gyod pa'i sems gcig kyang med do/ /kun dga' bo/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu nor thams cad
201a7(dkon brtsegs): sbyin par gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod dogs shing yid gnyis za'am/ the tshom za na de ltar mi lta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga nyid de'i dus na/ rgyal bu gzhon nu nor
201b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya bar gyur to/ /kun dga' bo/ rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i chu'i phung po ni tshad bzung du yod kyi/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di yongs
201b2(dkon brtsegs): su tshol zhing ngas sngon sems can rnams la khrag byin pa ni tshad med do/ /kun dga' bo/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu me tog ces bya ba gzugs bzang ba mdzes
201b3(dkon brtsegs): pa blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang / rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang ldan pa zhig yod pa de skyed mos tshal gyi sar 'gro ste grong
201b4(dkon brtsegs): bar du phyin pa dang / skya rbab kyi nad kyis btab pa'i mi gnod pas nyen pa/ sdug bsngal ba nad tshabs chen po zhig mthong ngo / /des de mthong nas kyang snying rje bar gyur te/ mi de ga la ba der
201b5(dkon brtsegs): song nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye/ ci zhig gis mi khyod kyi nad 'di zhi bar gyur/ khyod la ci zhig sbyin/ des 'di skad ces smras so/ /gal te bdag gis lha khyod kyi lus las ji
201b6(dkon brtsegs): tsam gyis tshim par gyur pa'i rkang zhig thob pa lta na bdag gi nad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu me tog de tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' nas bde ba dang
201b7(dkon brtsegs): yid bde ba skyes te/ rang gi lus brdungs nas rkang brus te de'i lus la bskus so/ /kun dga' bo/ ngas bskus ma thag tu mi de'i nad sos bar gyur to/ /kun dga' bo/ rgyal bu gzhon
202a1(dkon brtsegs): nu me tog gis rang gi lus brdungs te rkang gzags kyang sems la 'gyod pa med par gyur to/ /kun dga' bo/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu
202a2(dkon brtsegs): me tog ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du dogs shing yid gnyis za'am/ the tshom za na de ltar mi lta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu
202a3(dkon brtsegs): me tog ces bya bar gyur to/ /kun dga' bo/ rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i chu'i phung po ni tshad bzung du yod kyi/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di yongs su tshol
202a4(dkon brtsegs): zhing | ngas sngon sems can rnams la rkang byin pa ni tshad med do/ /kun dga' bo/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na rgyal po zla 'od ces bya ba gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa blta na
202a5(dkon brtsegs): sdug pa| kha dog bzang po rgyas pa'i mchog dang ldan pa rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang / rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang ldan pa zhig yod pa de skyed mos tshal du 'gro ste/ grong bar du
202a6(dkon brtsegs): phyin pa dang / mi mig med ba long ba/ dbul po bkres pa/ slong mo byed pa zhig mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang snying rje bar gyur to/ /de nas mi de rgyal po zla 'od ga la ba der song ste/ phyin nas
202a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha khyod ni skyid do/ /lha khyod ni dgyes so/ /bdag ni sdug bsngal lo/ /long ngo / mig ma mchis so/ /dbul po bkren no/ /slong mo pa'o/ /mgon ma mchis
202b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'o| |kun dga' bo/ de nas rgyal po zla 'od kyis mi de yang mthong / tshig kyang thos nas dus te mchi ma zag bzhin du de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye/ mi khyod la ci dgos/ bza' ba
202b2(dkon brtsegs): dang | btung ba dang / bzhon pa dang / rgyan dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / rin po che sna tshogs sbyin par bya'am/ khyod la gang dgos pa de smros shig /mi des smras pa /
202b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag la mig 'tshal na bdag la mig stsal du gsol/ kun dga' bo/ de nas rgyal po zla 'od des rang gi mig kyang phyung ste/ mi de la sbyin no/ /kun dga' bo/ de nas rgyal po zla 'od kyis
202b4(dkon brtsegs): rang gi mig phyung ste/ mi de la byin yang de'i sems la 'gyod pa med par gyur to/ /kun dga' bo/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po zla 'od ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam
202b5(dkon brtsegs): du dogs shing yid gnyis za'am/ the tshom za na de ltar mi lta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po zla 'od ces bya bar gyur to/ /kun dga' bo/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab
202b6(dkon brtsegs): la ni tshad bzung du yod kyi/ bla na med yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di yongs su tshol zhing / ngas sems can rnams la mig byin pa ni ches mang ste/ tshad med do/ /kun dga' bo/
202b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas ni sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ theg pa bde ba/ 'jug pa bde ba/ lam bde bas bla na med pa yang dag par
203a1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs so/ /kun dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas ni sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad
203a2(dkon brtsegs): pa spyod pa'i tshe/ lag pa yongs su btang ba ma byas/ rkang pa yongs su btang ba ma byas/ rkang yongs su btang ba ma byas/ chung ma phangs pa yongs su btang ba ma byas/ bu phangs pa
203a3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su btang ba ma byas/ grong dang / grong rdal dang / grong khyer dang / ljong dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor phangs pa yongs su btang ba ma byas te/ kun dga' bo/
203a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas ni sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe na thabs mkhas pas yongs su zin pas/ theg pa bde ba/ 'jug pa bde ba/
203a5(dkon brtsegs): lam bde bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
203a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas thabs mkhas pa gang la gnas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs
203a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i thabs la mkhas pa gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo/ 'di la byang chub
203b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ nyin lan gsum/ mtshan lan gsum du bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas
203b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas sangs rgyas thams cad mngon du byas te tshig 'di skad ces smras so/ /sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /drang srong lha mig ldan pa yi/ /byang
203b3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams dang yang / /nyan thos rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ngan 'gro thams cad bzlog bgyid cing / /mtho ris lam ni rab ston la/ /rga shi med par 'dren bgyid pa/
203b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems kyi dbang du gyur pas na/ /bdag gis sdig pa ci bgyis pa/ /sangs rgyas spyan sngar mchis nas su/ /bdag gis de dag bshags par bgyi/
203b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag las rnam pa gsum gang gis/ /bsod nams tshogs ni skyes pa de/ /bdag gi kun mkhyen sa bon te/ /bdag gi byang chub mi zad shog /phyogs bcu dag gi zhing rnams su//
203b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mchod pa gang byung ba/ /sangs rgyas mkhyen pa yi rang bas/ /de la bdag ni yi rang ngo / /sdig pa thams cad bshags par bgyi/ /bsod nams kun la yi rang ngo / /sangs
203b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag ni ye shes mchog thob shog /phyogs bcu dag gi phyogs rnams na/ /sa bcu dag la gnas pa yi/ /byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mchog /
204a1(dkon brtsegs): 'tshang rgya bgyid par bskul ma 'debs/ /byang chub dam par sangs rgyas shing / /sde dang bcas pa'i bdud btul nas/ /srog chags kun la sman slad
204a2(dkon brtsegs): du| |chos kyi 'khor lo skor gyur cig / chos rnga chen po sgra yis ni/ /sdug bsngal sems can thar bgyid shog /bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su/ /chos ston mdzad cing bzhugs gyur
204a3(dkon brtsegs): cig/ 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying gyur cing / /srid pa'i srad bus dam bcings pa/ /'ching ba kun gyis bcings bdag la/ /rkang gnyis mchog rnams gzigs su gsol/ /sems kyi
204a4(dkon brtsegs): dri mar bgyis pa la/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni smod mi mdzad/ /sems can rnams la byams thugs ldan/ /srid pa'i mtsho las sgrol bar shog /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs
204a5(dkon brtsegs): dang | |gang dag 'das dang ma byon pa/ /de dag rjes su bdag slob cing / /byang chub spyad pa spyod gyur cig /pha rol phyin drug rdzogs bgyis nas/ /'gro drug sems can thar bgyid
204a6(dkon brtsegs): shog| mngon shes drug po mngon bgyis nas/ /bla med byang chub reg gyur cig/ ma skyes pa dang mi 'byung dang / /rang bzhin ma mchis gnas ma mchis/ /rnam rig ma mchis dngos
204a7(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis/ /stong pa'i chos ni rtogs par shog /sangs rgyas drang srong chen po ltar/ /sems can ma mchis srog ma mchis/ /gang zag ma mchis gso ma mchis/ /bdag ma
204b1(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa'i chos rtogs shog / bdag 'dzin bdag gir 'dzin pa ni/ /dngos po kun la mi gnas par/ /sems can kun la bde slad du/ /ser sna ma mchis sbyin gtong shog /dngos
204b2(dkon brtsegs): po dngos po ma mchis pas/ /bdag gis longs spyod lhun grub shog /dngos po thams cad rnam 'jig pas/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin rdzogs shog /khrims kyi tshul khrims skyon med cing //
204b3(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims rnam par dag dang ldan/ /rlom sems med pa'i tshul khrims kyis/ /tshul khrims pha rol phyin rdzogs shog /sa'am yang na chu'am me/ /rlung gi khams ltar mi gnas
204b4(dkon brtsegs): shing | |bzod pa'am khro ba ma mchis par/ /bzod pa'i pha rol phyin rdzogs shog /brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i brtson 'grus kyis/ /brtan spro le lo ma mchis shing / /stobs dang

204b6(dkon brtsegs): gtan pha rol phyin rdzogs shog / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / /dus gsum mnyam pa nyid dang yang / /rig gsum mngon sum bgyis pa yis/ /shes rab pha rol phyin rdzogs
204b7(dkon brtsegs): shog |sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa dang / /'od dang gzi brjid 'bar ba dang / /byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyis/ /bdag gi bsam pa rdzogs gyur cig /de ltar spyad

205a4(dkon brtsegs): spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams 'dod chags chung ba dang / zhe sdang chung ba dang / gti mug chung ba dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par gyur la/ phyis bdag
