205a6(dkon brtsegs): yod de/ de'i tshe de'i dus na sems can dag 'dod chags chung ba dang / zhe sdang chung ba dang / gti mug chung ba dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa dag 'byung bar
205a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur te/ de'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa smon lam gyi dbang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
205b1(dkon brtsegs): 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ ngas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gnas pa'i tshe/ sems can 'dod chags kyi
205b2(dkon brtsegs): shas che ba dang / zhe sdang gi shas che ba dang / gti mug gi shas che ba dang / 'dod chags bdo ba dang / zhe sdang bdo ba dang / gti mug bdo ba dang / chos ma yin pa la chags shing zhen
205b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / chags pa yang bas zil gyis non pa dang / chos log pas yongs su zin pa dang / pha la 'khu ba dang / ma la 'khu ba dang / spun la 'khu ba dang / ming sring la 'khu ba dang / khyo
205b4(dkon brtsegs): shug la 'khu ba dang / nye du la 'khu ba dang / 'phags pa la 'khu ba dang / mkhan po dang slob dpon la 'khu ba dang / bdag la 'khu ba dang / mi gzhan la 'khu ba dang / mi dri ma can
205b5(dkon brtsegs): dang | mi dmu rgod dang / mi cang shes ma yin pa rnams kyi nang du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas na ci ma rung zhes de ltar
205b6(dkon brtsegs): smon lam yongs su sbyangs te/ dus yang ba 'di lta bu la gnas na/ kun dga' bo/ ngas snying rje chen po mdun du byas te/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pas nga da ltar grong dang / grong khyer dang /
205b7(dkon brtsegs): grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang dang / 'khor rnams su zhugs te chos ston pa dang / nga la kha ngan zer zhing gshe rgyab ste/ tshogs par mi 'byung ba rtsub
206a1(dkon brtsegs): pa rlang pos smra bar byed do/ /kun dga' bo/ nga la chad pa smra ba yin no zhes kyang zer/ rtog par smra ba yin no zhes kyang zer ro/ /'khor 'dod pa
206a2(dkon brtsegs): mang po zhes kyang gleng ngo / /'dod pa che'o zhes kyang gleng ngo / /khyim gyi nang na zhugs na yang nga la sas kyang 'thor ro/ /dug dang bsres pa'i kha zas kyang byin no/ /me'i phung po
206a3(dkon brtsegs): yang nye bar bsgrubs so/ /'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas su gyur kyang mdzes ldan ma dang zhes bya ba lta bu 'khrig pa'i chos dang ldan pas nga la skur pa yang btab bo/ /kun dga'
206a4(dkon brtsegs): bo| nga ni snying rje chen po mdun du byas te/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pas da ltar sems can de lta bu de dag la chos ston to/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan
206a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sems can de lta bu de dag la chos ston par mdzad pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
206a6(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma dul ba 'dul ba/ khur chen po bsnams pa dka' ba mdzad pa lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa
206a7(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo/ de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
206b1(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma dul ba 'dul ba/ khur chen po bsnams pa/ dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa gang dag sems can de lta bu dag la chos sten pa ni dka' ba mdzad
206b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'o| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar snying rje chen pos yongs su zin pa'i phyir ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad
206b3(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mdzad pa dang / bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos shing / bcom ldan 'das kyi khyu mchog gi gnas
206b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di thos nas spu zing zhes bgyid pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
206b5(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sngon gyi smon lam yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig /de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag
206b6(dkon brtsegs): par 'byung ba zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig / byang chub kyi dgongs pa 'byung ba zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig /byams pas zhus pa zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig /bcom ldan 'das
206b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / dge slong lnga brgya po dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de
207a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags
207a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ byams pas zhus pa zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa rdzogs so// //
207a3(dkon brtsegs): rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+Ya mai
207a4(dkon brtsegs): tri ya pa ri pr-i ts+tshA nA ma mahA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa byams pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
207a5(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi
207a6(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' khri dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas
207a7(dkon brtsegs): chos ston to/ /de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
207b1(dkon brtsegs): chen po byams pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/
207b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
207b3(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

207b5(dkon brtsegs): pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye bas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas bcom

207b7(dkon brtsegs): phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can du 'gyur zhing mi nyams la yongs su mi nyams te khyad par thob par 'gyur ba dang / bdud phyir rgol ba bcom par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
208a1(dkon brtsegs): spyad pa spyod pa na/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs nas/ 'khor ba na yongs su mi skyo ba dang / yongs su mi skyo ba'i
208a2(dkon brtsegs): yid dang ldan par gyur nas kyang / gzhan gyi kha na ma las pa'i ye shes kyis myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags

208a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /byams pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos brgyad dang ldan na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi
208a7(dkon brtsegs): ldog pa'i chos can du 'gyur zhing mi nyams la yongs su mi nyams te khyad par thob par 'gyur ro/ /bdud kyi phyir rgol ba bcom par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/

208b2(dkon brtsegs): kha na ma las pa'i ye shes kyis myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byams pa/ 'di la byang
208b3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa yin/ gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa yin/ yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa
208b4(dkon brtsegs): yin| byams pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ snying rje phun sum tshogs pa yin/ thabs la mkhas pa yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung ba yin no/ /byams pa/ ji
208b5(dkon brtsegs): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ byams pa/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi bsngags
208b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'am/ bsngags pa ma yin pa thos kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bsam pa nges pa yin/ chos kyi bsngags pa'am/ bsngags pa ma yin pa thos kyang bla na med pa yang
208b7(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bsam pa nges pa yin/ dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa'am/ bsngags pa ma yin pa thos kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bsam pa nges
209a1(dkon brtsegs): pa yin te/ byams pa/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /byams pa/ ji ltar na byang chub
209a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ byams pa/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni srog gcod pa spangs pa yin/ ma byin par
209a3(dkon brtsegs): len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma'i tshig dang / ngag rtsub po dang / tshig kyal pa spangs pa yin te/ byams pa/ de ltar na byang chub sems
209a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /byams pa/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ byams
209a5(dkon brtsegs): pa| 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dge sbyong dang / bram ze rnams dang / phongs pa dang / slong ba rnams la gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos
209a6(dkon brtsegs): sman dang / yo byad rnams gtong ba dang / sbyin pa dag tu gyur ba yin te/ byams pa/ de lta na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /
209a7(dkon brtsegs): byams pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ byams pa/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni
209b1(dkon brtsegs): lus dang ngag dang yid kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du byed pa gang ci yang rung ste/ de thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed de/ byams
209b2(dkon brtsegs): pa| de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa yin no/ /byams pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa phun sum
209b3(dkon brtsegs): tshogs pa yin zhe na/ byams pa/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni byams pa'i lus kyi las dang ldan pa yin/ byams pa'i ngag gi las dang ldan pa yin/ byams
209b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yid kyi las dang ldan pa yin te/ byams pa/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /byams pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems
209b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ byams pa/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gnod sems med pa'i lus kyi las dang ldan pa
209b6(dkon brtsegs): yin| gnod sems med pa'i ngag gi las dang ldan pa yin/ gnod sems med pa'i yid kyi las dang ldan pa yin te/ byams pa/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying
209b7(dkon brtsegs): rje phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /byams pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ byams pa/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
210a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po ni kun rdzob kyi don la mkhas pa yin/ dam pa'i don la mkhas pa yin/ gnyi ga'i don la mkhas pa yin te/ byams pa/ de ltar na byang
210a2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ /byams pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par
210a3(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba yin zhe na/ byams pa/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ 'di yod pa'i phyir 'di 'byung / 'di skyes pas 'di skye ba ste/ 'di
210a4(dkon brtsegs): lta ste/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched
210a5(dkon brtsegs): drug| skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye
210a6(dkon brtsegs): ba| skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na sdug bsngal
210a7(dkon brtsegs): gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'di med pa'i phyir 'di mi 'byung / 'di 'gags pas 'di 'gag ste/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed
210b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gag / 'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag /rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag /ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag /skye
210b2(dkon brtsegs): mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag / reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag /tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag /sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag /len pa 'gags pas
210b3(dkon brtsegs): srid pa 'gag/ srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag /skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams
210b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gag par 'gyur te/ de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'gag par 'gyur snyam pa ste/ byams pa/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
210b5(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung ba yin no/ /byams pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos brgyad po de dag dang ldan na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
210b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can du 'gyur zhing / mi nyams la yongs su mi nyams te khyad par thob par 'gyur ro/ /bdud phyir rgol ba bcom par 'gyur/ byang chub sems
210b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs nas 'khor ba na yongs su mi skyo bar 'gyur/ yongs su mi skyo ba'i yid dang ldan par gyur
211a1(dkon brtsegs): nas kyang gzhan gyi kha na ma las pa'i ye shes kyis myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /bcom
211a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /
211a3(dkon brtsegs): lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung ba la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs
211a4(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ byams pas zhus pa chos brgyad pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ 'dus pa bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs so// //
211a5(dkon brtsegs): rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tshA ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+Ya kA sh+ya pa pa ri brta nA ma mahA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'od srung gi le'u zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang
211a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das/ rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong
211b1(dkon brtsegs): brgyad stong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs nas 'dus pa khri drug stong thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par
211b2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu skye ba gcig gis thogs pa sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur nas 'dug
211b3(dkon brtsegs): go| de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung / chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab yongs su nyams par
211b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos dang chos smra ba la mi gus pa yin/ chos la ser sna byed cing chos la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud byed pa yin/ chos 'dod pa'i gang
211b5(dkon brtsegs): zag rnams la chos kyi bar chad byed cing 'dun pa zlog par byed/ rnam par 'khrug pa byed de/ mi ston cing rab tu 'chab pa yin/ mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis bdag la bstod cing
211b6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan la smod pa yin te/ 'od srung / chos bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ chos smra ba la gus pa
211b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa yin/ /chos la ser sna byed par gyur pa dang / /chos la slob dpon dpe mkhyud byed pa yin/ /chos 'dod rnams la bgegs ni byed gyur cing / /'dun pa bzlog la de bzhin
212a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam 'khrug byed/ /rgyal bas bsngags pa'i chos ni yong mi ston/ le lo can te bdag bstod rtag tu brtson/ /gzhan la smod par byed la mngon par
212a2(dkon brtsegs): dga'| |chos bzhi 'di dag rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyi/ /shes rab nyams par 'gyur bar rgyal bas gsungs/ /chos bzhi 'di dag rab tu spangs byas la/ /rgyal bas gsungs
212a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos bzhi gzhan bsgom mo/ /'od srung / chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab chen por 'gyur ba ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos dang chos smra
212a4(dkon brtsegs): ba la gus pa dang bcas pa yin/ zang zing med pa'i sems kyis rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang tshigs su bcad pa la mi re bar ji ltar thos pa dang / ji ltar khong du chud pa'i chos rnams
212a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par byed pa yin/ mang du thos pa las shes rab 'byung bar rig nas/ mgo 'am gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du thos pa yongs su
212a6(dkon brtsegs): tshol zhing ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams 'dzin par byed pa yin/ nan tan snying por byed kyi/ smra ba dang brjod pa'i tshig lhur len pa ma yin te/ 'od srung / chos bzhi po 'di dag ni
212a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab chen por 'gyur ba'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ chos smra ba la gus pa dang bcas pa yin/ /zang zing med cing rnyed dang bkur sti la/ /re ba med cing
212b1(dkon brtsegs): tshigs bcad mi sems par/ /ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams gzhan la ston/ /thos las shes rab 'byung bar des rig nas/ /mgo la 'bar bzhin rtag tu thos pa tshol/ /de ni ji ltar
212b2(dkon brtsegs): thos pa'i chos rnams 'dzin/ /chos bzung nas ni nan tan bya phyir gnas/ /mkhas de nan tan snying por byed pa yin/ /tshig lhur mi len smra ba lhur mi len/ /mkhas pas chos bzhi 'di
212b3(dkon brtsegs): dag bsten byas na/ /rgyal bas bsngags pa'i shes rab thob par 'gyur/ /'od srung / byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub kyi sems brjed par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang
212b4(dkon brtsegs): zhe na| 'di lta ste/ slob dpon dang / bla ma dang / sbyin gnas la slu ba dang / gzhan 'gyod pa med pa dag la 'gyod pa nye bar bsgrub pa dang / theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i
212b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams la bsngags pa ma yin pa dang / mi snyan pa dang / brjod pa ma yin pa'i sgra tshigs su bcad pa 'byin pa dang / sgyu dang g.yos gzhan la nye bar spyod kyi/ lhag pa'i bsam
212b6(dkon brtsegs): pas ma yin pa ste/ 'od srung / byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub kyi sems brjed par 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sbyin gnas bla mas bsgo
212b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin mi byed dang / /gzhan dag la yang the tshom nyer bsgrub dang / /sems can gang dag byang chub rab zhugs pa/ /de la bsngags min mi snyan smra ba dang / /sgyu dang g.yo dang rgyan la
213a1(dkon brtsegs): dor byed pas/ /gzhan la brten gyi bsam pas ma yin pa/ /chos bzhi 'di dag kun du bsten byas na/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems mchog nyams par
213a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ /de lta bas na chos 'di sten byed na/ /byang chub mchog las de ni ring bar 'gyur/ /de las bzlog pa sten par byed na ni/ /byang chub mchog rab bsngags pa reg par 'gyur/ /
213a3(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung / byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na skye ba thams cad du skyes ma thag tu byang chub kyi sems mngon du 'gyur te/ byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du bar ma dor brjod
213a4(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ srog gi phyir ram/ tha na bzhad gad kyi phyir yang rdzun gyi tshig mi smra ba dang / sgyu dang g.yo med par sems can thams cad kyi drung na
213a5(dkon brtsegs): lhag pa'i bsam pas gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la ston par 'du shes skyed cing / de dag gi yang dag pa'i bsngags pa phyogs bzhir brjod pa dang / nyi
213a6(dkon brtsegs): tshe ba'i theg pa mi 'dod pa'i phyir sems can gang rnams yongs su smin par byed pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin
213a7(dkon brtsegs): du 'jug pa ste/ 'od srung / chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' skye ba thams cad du skyes ma thag tu byang chub kyi sems mngon du gyur te/ byang chub kyi snying
213b1(dkon brtsegs): po la 'dug gi bar du bar ma dor brjed par mi 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ srog gi phyir yang rdzun tshig mi smra zhing / /rtag tu don dang ldan pa'i tshig rnams smra/ /sgyu dang
213b2(dkon brtsegs): g.yo ni rtag tu rnam spangs te/ /lhag pa'i bsam pas rtag tu sems can lta/ /sems can dag pa byang chub gang zhugs pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' de la ston par sems/ /ston pa'i
213b3(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes nye bar bzhag nas kyang / /de dag bsngags pa phyogs bzhir rjod par byed/ /sems can gang dag yongs su smin byed pa/ /bla med ye shes yang dag 'dzin du 'jug /
213b4(dkon brtsegs): chos de dag la rab tu gnas pa rnams/ /byang chub sems ni nam yang brjed mi 'gyur/ /'od srung / byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i chos skyes shing byung ba
213b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams yongs su zad par 'gyur te/ dge ba'i chos de dag gis rgyas par mi 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis 'jig rten rgyang pan pa'i gsang tshig
213b6(dkon brtsegs): tshol ba dang / rnyed pa dang bkur sti la lhag par zhen pas khyim la lta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' la rnam par sdang zhing skur pa 'debs pa dang / ma thos pa dang ma zin pa'i mdo
213b7(dkon brtsegs): sde rnams spong ba ste/ 'od srung / byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i chos skyes shing byung ba rnams yongs su zad par 'gyur te/ dge ba'i chos de
214a1(dkon brtsegs): dag gis rgyas par mi 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ nga rgyal gyis ni 'jig rten rgyang pan tshol/ /rnyed kyi phyir ni mi la sbyor bar byed/ /byang chub
214a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sangs rgyas sras la sdang / /de dag bsngags min kun du smra bar byed/ /de ni ma thos pa dang ma zin mdo/ /bde bar gshegs pas gsungs pa spong bar byed/ /chos
214a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag dang ldan par gyur pa ni/ /dge ba'i chos kyis rgyas par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa yis/ /chos bzhi 'di dag rgyang bsring rnam par spong / /'di
214a4(dkon brtsegs): dag bsten na byang chub rab ring ste/ /gnam sa ring bas shin tu ring bar 'gyur/ /'od srung / byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na khyad par du 'gro bas yongs su mi
214a5(dkon brtsegs): nyams pa'i chos can du 'gyur te/ gzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod tshol ba la brtsams nas legs par
214a6(dkon brtsegs): thos pa tshol gyi nyes par thos pa mi tshol te/ sems can thams cad la nga rgyal med pa'i sems khyi dang 'dra ba yin/ chos kyi rnyed pas chog par 'dzin te/ log pas 'tsho ba
214a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yongs su spangs shing 'phags pa'i rigs kyis chog par 'dzin pa yin/ gzhan dag gi ltung ba byung ba dang / ma byung ba mi gleng zhing gzhan dag gi 'khrul pa gzhan dang
214b1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan mi tshol ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo gang dag de'i blos mi rtogs pa de la/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ni mtha' yas shing sems can mos pa tha dad pa rnams la de bzhin gshegs
214b2(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyi chos bstan pa 'jug ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen gyi bdag gis ni mi shes te/ de bzhin gshegs pas mngon sum mo zhes byas nas mi spang pa ste/ 'od srung /
214b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan no/ khyad par du 'gro bas yongs su mi nyams pa'i chos can du 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ de ni rtag tu pha rol phyin rnams dang //
214b4(dkon brtsegs): thabs la mkhas dang byang chub sde snod brtson/ /nga rgyal med pas khyi 'dra'i sems kyis su/ /sems can kun la nga rgyal bcag pa yin/ /chos dang mthun pa'i rnyed pas chog sems
214b5(dkon brtsegs): shing | |'tsho ba yong dag 'phags pa'i rigs la gnas/ /gzhan gyi 'khrul pa tshol bar mi byed cing / /gzhan gyi ltung ba gleng bar mi byed do/ /gang de'i blos ni zab mo mi rtogs
214b6(dkon brtsegs): pa| |de la de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum ste/ /bde gshegs bshad pa'i byang chub mtha' yas pas/ /rgyal bas mkhyen gyi bdag gis mi shes so/ /chos bzhi 'di dag rig
214b7(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pa ni/ /ye shes khyad par 'phags mchog nyams mi 'gyur/ /chos 'di dag la rab tu gnas pa ni/ /rgyal bas bsngags pa'i byang chub rnyed mi dka'/ /'od srung / chos
215a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po 'di dag ni gya gyu can gyi sems bskyed pa ste/ de dag byang chub sems dpas yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas
215a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos rnams la som nyi dang / yid gnyis dang / the tshom za ba dang / sems can rnams la nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / 'chab pa dang / khro ba dang / gnod par sems pa
215a3(dkon brtsegs): dang | gzhan gyi rnyed pa rnams la phrag dog dang ser sna byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bsngags pa ma yin pa dang / mi snyan pa dang / brjod pa ma yin pa'i
215a4(dkon brtsegs): sgra tshigs su bcad pa 'byin pa ste/ 'od srung / bzhi po de dag ni gya gyu can gyi sems bskyed pa ste/ de dag byang chub sems dpas yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /de la 'di skad
215a5(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ste/ chos rnams la ni som nyi yid gnyis byed/ /sems can rnams la nga rgyal rgyags khro bsten/ /gzhan gyi rnyed la ser sna phrag dog byed/ /rgyal ba la ni nam yang dad mi
215a6(dkon brtsegs): byed| |mi mkhas rtag tu byang chub sems dpa' la/ /bsngags pa min dang brjod min mi snyan brjod/ /gya gyu can gyi sems bzhi rnam par spang / /byang chub sems dpas
215a7(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu sems can bstan/ /'od srung / bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' drang po'i drang ba'i mtshan nyid yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ltung ba byung ba rnams mi
215b1(dkon brtsegs): 'chab cing brjod de rnam par 'byed pa dang / 'chags pas kun nas ldang ba med pa yin/ de'i bden pa'i tshig gang gis rgyal srid stor ba'am/ nor yal ba'am/ srog gi bar
215b2(dkon brtsegs): chad du 'gyur yang bden pa'i tshig mi mkhyud cing gzhan nas gzhan du bsgyur ba'i tshig mi smra ba yin/ gzhan gyis gnod pa bya ba skur pa dang / mtshang 'bru ba dang / smod pa dang / bshung
215b3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / bsdigs pa dang / rdeg pa dang / gsod pa dang / 'ching bar byed pa'i nyes pa thams cad la bdag gi nyes par sems shing / las kyi rnam par smin pa la ston pas gzhan dag
215b4(dkon brtsegs): la mi 'khrug cing khong du 'dzin pa med pa yin/ de dad pa la rab tu gnas pa yin te/ bsam pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir thams cad dad par mi 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos la
215b5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par dad pa ste/ 'od srung / bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' drang po'i drang ba'i mtshan nyid yin no/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ ltung ba byung ba 'chab par mi byed kyi//
215b6(dkon brtsegs): brjod cing rnam par 'byed de nyes pa 'dor/ /nor dang rgyal srid phyir dang srog phyir yang / /'du shes bsgyur te rdzun pa'i tshig mi smra/ /skur dang smod dang bshung dang gsod pa dang / /
215b7(dkon brtsegs): 'ching ba byed dang go rar bcug pa la/ /bdag gis nyes sems gzhan la 'khrug mi byed/ /las ni bdag gir bya bas khon mi 'dzin/ /de ni bder gshegs rnams kyi byang chub
216a1(dkon brtsegs): dang | |dad la gnas shing bsam pa dad ldan pa/ /'di dag drang ba'i mtshan du sangs rgyas gsungs/ /sems can mchog gis rtag tu bsten par bya/ /
216a2(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung / bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' dmu rgod de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ thos pa la gces pa 'dor ba'i chos su gnas shing / chos kyi rjes su mthun
216a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos bsgrub pa la nan tan du mi byed pa yin/ rjes su bstan pa la gces pa 'dor ba'i chos su gnas shing / slob dpon dang / mkhan po la sri zhu mi byed pa yin/ dam bcas
216a4(dkon brtsegs): pa las nyams kyang dad pas byin pa kun spyod de/ dad pas byin pa log par ltung bar byed pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' dul ba cang shes pa rnams mthong na mi gus shing nga rgyal
216a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa yin te/ 'od srung / bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' dmu rgod do/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ thos pas rgod par gnas par byed pa yin/ /rjes su
216a6(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa'i chos nyid rtogs mi 'gyur/ /de ni chos kun gces pa 'dor ba bsten/ /'phags pa rnams la nam yang sri zhu med/ /dam bcas nyams kyang dad pas byin pa yi/ /
216a7(dkon brtsegs): kha zas rnams la de ni rtag tu za/ /byang chub sems dpa' cang shes thob pa dag /mthong bar gyur na gus par mi byed cing / /dmu rgod dag ni nga rgyal 'phel bar byed/ /byang chub
216b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' nga rgyal bcag mi brten/ /'di dag dmu rgod bde bar gshegs pas gsungs/ /de dag rgyal sras rnams kyis yongs su spang / /'od srung / bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems
216b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' cang shes pa ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ legs par thos pa nyan cing de la nan tan du byed de/ don la rton gyi tshig 'bru la mi rton pa yin/ gdams pa/ rjes su bstan pa
216b3(dkon brtsegs): la mthun par 'dzin cing / bka' blo bde la legs par byed pa'i las byed cing / bla ma la sri zhu bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/ tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin las ma nyams te cang shes
216b4(dkon brtsegs): pas zas za ba yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba cang shes rnams mthong na gus pa dang bcas shing zhes dang bcas par de la gzhol/ de la 'bab/ de la bab cing / de'i yon tan
216b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa yin te/ 'od srung / bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' cang shes so/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gang mnyan de ni legs par nan tan byed/ /chos don snying por byed cing nan
216b6(dkon brtsegs): tan gnas/ /rjes su bstan pa mthun par 'dzin byed cing / /chos 'dod bka' blo bde bar bla ma bsten/ /tshul khrims ting nge 'dzin la rtag gnas shing / /tshul khrims bsdams nas de
216b7(dkon brtsegs): ni bza' ba za/ /gus dang bcas shing zhe sar bcas pa yin/ /de la gzhol zhing der 'bab yon tan 'dod/ /rgyal sras gang dag cang shes thob gyur pa/ /de dag la ni rtag tu dga'
217a1(dkon brtsegs): bas lta/ /bde bar gshegs pas bstan pa 'di bzhi ni/ /bder gshegs sras po cang shes thob pa yin/ /'od srung / bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub
217a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i 'khrul pa ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can yongs su smin par ma byas pa rnams la yid rton pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khrul pa dang / sems can snod
217a3(dkon brtsegs): du ma gyur pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po ston pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khrul pa dang / rgya chen po la mos pa'i sems can rnams la theg pa dman pa ston pa byang chub
217a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i 'khrul pa dang / sems can yang dag pa la rab tu gnas pa tshul khrims dang ldan pa dge ba'i chos can rnams la brnyas shing tshul khrims 'chal pa sdig pa'i
217a5(dkon brtsegs): chos can kun du sdud pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khrul pa ste/ 'od srung / bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khrul pa'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ yongs smin
217a6(dkon brtsegs): ma byas rnams la yid mi rton/ /snod min rnams la rgya chen chos mi bshad/ /rgya chen sems can rnams la theg pa dman/ /byang chub sems dpa' mchog gis bshad
217a7(dkon brtsegs): mi bya/ /yang dag gnas shing tshul khrims yon tan ldan/ /dge ba'i chos can rnams la brnyas mi bya/ /tshul khrims 'chal pa'i sems can yongs mi bsdu/ /sdig
217b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos rnams yongs su spang bar bya/ /'khrul ba'i chos bzhi 'di dag shes gyur nas/ /byang chub sems dpas rgyang bsring rnam par spang / /'di dag bstan na byang chub 'tshang
217b2(dkon brtsegs): mi rgya/ /de lta bas na mkhas pas chos 'di spongs/ /'od srung / bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la
217b3(dkon brtsegs): sems mnyam pa dang / sems can thams cad la mtshungs par chos ston pa dang / sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yang dag par 'dzin tu 'jug pa dang / sems
217b4(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad la yang dag par sbyor ba ste/ 'od srung / bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam mo/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sems can rnams la rtag tu sems
217b5(dkon brtsegs): snyoms bya/ /sangs rgyas theg mchog yang dag 'dzin du 'jug /rgyal bas bsngags pa'i chos ni bstan par bya/ /sems can kun la dang ba'i sems su bya/ /yang dag sbyor zhing
217b6(dkon brtsegs): nan tan byed par gnas/ /sems can kun la mtshungs par spyad par bya/ /chos bzhi 'di dag rgyal bas rab bsngags te/ /rgyal sras rnams kyis de dag rtag tu bstan/ 'od
217b7(dkon brtsegs): srung | bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i bshes gnyen ngan pa grogs po ngan pa ste/ de dag byang chub sems dpas yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
218a1(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos kyi theg pa pa bdag la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa don nyung zhing bya ba nyung ba dang / 'jig rten rgyang pan pa'i
218a2(dkon brtsegs): gsang tshig sna tshogs kyi spobs pa can dang / gang la brten pas 'jig rten gyi zang zing kun sdud par 'gyur gyi chos kun mi sdud pa ste/ 'od srung / bzhi po de dag ni byang chub
218a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' bshes gnyen ngan pa grogs po ngan pa ste/ de dag byang chub sems dpas yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ nyan thos gang dag bdag phan brtson
218a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / /gang dag rab tu byung nas rnal 'byor spyod/ /rang sangs rgyas pa gang dag byed nyung zhing / /bdag gi don du 'du 'dzi rnam par spong / /byis pa gang dag 'jig rten rgyang
218a5(dkon brtsegs): pan klog / ji ltar bstan bzhin gang dag 'dir rtsod byed/ /gang la brten nas zang zing kun sdud kyi/ /chos 'di nam yang sdud par mi byed pa/ /de bzhi byang chub sems
218a6(dkon brtsegs): dpas rab spangs nas/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen bzhi la bsten par bya/ /'di dag bshes gnyen ngan dang grogs ngan du/ /rgyal bas gsung te thag bsring yongs su spongs/ /
218a7(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung / bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi lam ston pa'i phyir slong ba byang chub sems
218b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / thos pa'i shes rab ston pa'i phyir chos smra ba byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad ston pa'i phyir rab tu
218b2(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ston pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
218b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen te/ 'od srung / bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen no/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ byang chub yongs
218b4(dkon brtsegs): su ston phyir len pa po/ /sbyin byed rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin/ /chos sngon smra ba thos dang shes rab byed/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par bde gshegs
218b5(dkon brtsegs): gsungs/ /gang dag rab 'byung yang dag 'dzin 'jug pa/ /de dag dge rtsa yin pas bshes gnyen gsungs/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi lam ni ston pa'i phyir/ /sangs
218b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas rnams ni bde gshegs sras kyi bshes/ /rgyal bas bsngags pa bzhi po 'di dag ni/ bde gshegs sras kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen te/ /'di dag bsten cing
218b7(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu bag yod na/ /bde gshegs bsten pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /'od srung / bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' ltar bcos pa ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/
219a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti don du gnyer gyi chos don du gnyer ba ma yin pa dang / brjod pa'i sgra tshigs su bcad pa don du gnyer gyi yon
219a2(dkon brtsegs): tan don du gnyer ba ma yin pa dang / bdag bde ba don du gnyer gyi sems can gyi sdug bsngal bsal ba don du gnyer ba ma yin pa dang / 'khor gyi tshogs don du gnyer
219a3(dkon brtsegs): gyi dben pa don du gnyer ba ma yin te/ 'od srung / bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' ltar bcos pa'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ rnyed pa don du gnyer gyi chos
219a4(dkon brtsegs): don min/ /brjod pa don gnyer yon tan don gnyer min/ /bdag bde rtag tu don du gnyer byed cing / /sems can sdug bsngal bsal ba don mi gnyer/ /'khor tshogs don
219a5(dkon brtsegs): du gnyer gyi dben mi 'dod/ /bde la chags kyi yon tan ma chags pa/ /bzhi po de dag bcos par gsungs pa ste/ /de dag byang chub sems dpas yongs su spang / /'od
219a6(dkon brtsegs): srung | bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i yon tan te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid la yang mos la
219a7(dkon brtsegs): las kyi rnam par smin pa la yang yid ches pa dang / de bdag med par yang bzod la sems can thams cad la yang snying rje che ba dang / de'i bsam pa mya ngan las 'das pa
219b1(dkon brtsegs): la yang gnas la sbyor ba 'khor ba na yang gnas pa dang / de sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa la yang mi re ba ste/ 'od srung / bzhi po de
219b2(dkon brtsegs): dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i yon tan no/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ chos rnams stong pa nyid du rtag mos kyang / /las kyi
219b3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par smin pa'ang yid ches so/ /bdag med bzod pas mnyam pa nyid gnas kyang / /sems can rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed/ /de bsam rtag tu mya ngan 'das la
219b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas/ /de yi sbyor ba 'khor bar gnas pa yin/ /yongs smin bya phyir sbyin pa sbyin byed kyang / /las kyi rnam par smin la re ba med/ /'od srung / bzhi po 'di dag ni byang
219b5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i gter chen po rnyed pa ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par byed pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug nyan pa dang / chos smra ba
219b6(dkon brtsegs): la khong khro ba med pa'i sems kyis lta ba dang / bag yod par dgon pa la gnas par mngon par dga' ba ste/ 'od srung / bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i
219b7(dkon brtsegs): gter chen po rnyed pa'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ tshe rabs kun tu sangs rgyas mnyes par byed/ /pha rol phyin pa drug po rnams kyang nyan/ /chos smra ba la sems ni
220a1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu dang / /mthong na rtag tu gus pa skyed par byed/ /rtag tu bag yod gyur nas dgon par gnas/ /de ni de nyid la yang rtag tu dga'/ /
220a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po 'di dag rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyi/ /gter chen yin par bde bar gshegs pas gsungs/ /'od srung / bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' bdud
220a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi lam las yang dag par 'da' ba'i chos te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba dang / sems can thams cad la khong khro ba'i sems
220a4(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / lta bar gyur pa thams cad rtog pa dang / sems can thams cad la mi brnyas pa ste/ 'od srung / bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi
220a5(dkon brtsegs): lam las yang dag par 'da' ba'i chos so/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ byang chub sems ni yongs su gtong mi byed/ /sems can rnams la khong khro rtag tu spong / /lta
220a6(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur pa thams cad 'dor bar byed/ /sems can tshogs la brnyas pa yongs mi byed/ /bde bar gshegs pas bzhi po 'di dag ni/ /bdud las 'da' bar
220a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i chos su gsungs/ /'di dag bsten na rgyal ba rnam 'dren pa/ /gser 'dra'i sku mnga' mtshungs pa med par 'gyur/ /'od srung / chos bzhi po 'di dag
220b1(dkon brtsegs): ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos thams cad sdud par 'gyur ba ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul 'chos pa med par dgon par gnas pa dang / lan du phan
220b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dogs par re ba med pa'i bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po dang / sems can thams cad la lus dang srog gtong zhing dam pa'i chos yongs su tshol ba dang / thos pa dang don
220b3(dkon brtsegs): gyis ngoms mi myong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par sdud pa'i brtson 'grus te/ 'od srung / chos bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i
220b4(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad sdud par 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dgon par gnas shing tshul 'chos rnam par spong / /rgyal gsungs bsdu ba sems can rnams la byed/ /dam
220b5(dkon brtsegs): chos yongs su btsal ba brtsam byas nas/ /lus dang srog kyang yongs su gtong bar byed/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu mi nyung ba/ /yang dag bsgrub phyir rtag tu ngoms mi myong / /dge
220b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos rnams yang dag bsdu ba'i phyir/ /chos bzhi 'di dag bde bar gshegs pas gsungs/ /'od srung / chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams
220b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos spyin pa dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams la cher snying rje ba dang / sems
221a1(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad la byang chub kyi sems ston pa dang / nyam chung ba rnams la bzod pa bstan pa ste/ 'od srung / bzhi po de dag ni byang chub
221a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dag cing zang zing med pa'i sems kyis su/ /chos kyi sbyin byed rgyal bas rab
221a3(dkon brtsegs): tu bsngags/ /tshul khrims mi ldan pa la snying rje che/ /gzhan dag byang chub phyir ni sems bskyed 'jug /nyam chung rnams la bzod pas dang du len//
221a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni dge chos sdud par gsungs pa ste/ /'di dag bsten na rgyal bar 'gyur bas na/ /byang chub sems dpas de dag rtag tu bsten/ /'od srung / chos
221a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i ma rig pa'i bag chags kyi sa'i nyon mongs pa 'joms par 'gyur ba ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi
221a6(dkon brtsegs): sdom pa yang dag par 'dzin pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang / sgron ma sbyin pa dang / tha na 'dris pa rnams la yang sbyin pa ste/ 'od srung / chos bzhi
221a7(dkon brtsegs): po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i ma rig pa'i bag chags kyi sa'i nyon mongs pa 'joms par byed pa'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ tshul khrims sdom pa yang dag 'dzin
221b1(dkon brtsegs): byed dang / /dam chos 'dzin dang sgron ma sbyin byed dang / /de bzhin tha na 'dris la sbyin byed cing / /mkhas pa ma rig sa las rnam par 'byed/ /'od srung / chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang
221b2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ba ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dam pa'i chos sbyin pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang / phrag dog med pa
221b3(dkon brtsegs): dang | gzhan dag la mi brnyas pa ste/ 'od srung / chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur pa'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gang dag byang
221b4(dkon brtsegs): chub la ni sgrib byed pa/ /sdig pa'i bzhi pa bcu po rnam spangs nas/ /mkhas pas de bzhin bcu gnyis gzhan bsten na/ /'chi med reg nas byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /sems can dam
221b5(dkon brtsegs): pa gang dag chos tshul 'di/ /'dzin tam klog gam rab tu ston byed pa/ /de dag bsod nams mtha' yas rgyal bas gsung / /de yi tshad ni rgyal ba rnams brjod do/ /gang gis zhing ni gang+gA'i
221b6(dkon brtsegs): bye ma snyed/ /rin chen bkang ste rgyal la phul ba bas/ /gang gis 'di las tshig bzhi'i tshig bcad klog /bsod nams 'di yi grangs su'ang mi phod do/ /'od srung / byang chub sems dpa'i
221b7(dkon brtsegs): ni ming tsam gyis byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi bya'o/ /'od srung / byang chub sems dpa' chos spyod pa dang / snyoms par spyod pa dang / dge ba spyod pa dang / chos la gnas pa dang ldan pa la
222a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/ /'od srung / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ste/ sum
222a2(dkon brtsegs): cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'dzud pa dang / bdag ci ri
222a3(dkon brtsegs): zhes yongs su mjal zhing gzhan gyi shes pa la mi smod pa dang / nga rgyal med pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pa dang / bcos ma ma yin par byams pa dang / mdza' ba dang mi mdza'
222a4(dkon brtsegs): pa la sems snyoms pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha'i bar du gtan du mdza' ba dang / tshig ran cing 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis gsong por smra ba dang / khur blangs pa rnams la
222a5(dkon brtsegs): sgyid lug pa med pa dang / sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po yongs su ma bcad pa dang / yid yongs su mi skyo ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su tshol ba'i phyir thos pa dang don
222a6(dkon brtsegs): gyis ngoms mi myong ba dang / bdag gi 'khrul pa rnams la skyon du lta zhing gzhan gyi 'khrul pa rnams la mi gshe bar bsgo ba dang / spyod lam thams cad du byang chub kyi sems
222a7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su spyod pa dang / rnam par smin pa la mi re ba'i gtong ba dang / srid pa'i 'gro bar skye ba thams cad la mi gnas pa'i tshul khrims dang / sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras
222b1(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa'i bzod pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa'i brtson 'grus dang / gzugs med pa'i khams rnam par bsal ba'i bsam gtan dang / thabs mkhas pa
222b2(dkon brtsegs): bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang rab tu ldan pa'i thabs kyis zin pa'i shes pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams la gnyis su med pa'i byams pa dang / gus par
222b3(dkon brtsegs): byas te chos nyan pa dang / gus par byas te dgon pa la gnas par mngon par dga' ba dang / 'jig rten gyi sna tshogs rnams la mi dga' zhing 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams la
222b4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par dga' ba dang / theg pa dman pa mi 'dod cing theg pa chen po la phan yon du lta ba dang / sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spong zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pa dang / tshangs
222b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gnas pa bzhi sgrub pa dang / mngon par shes pa lngas rnam par rtsen pa dang / ye shes la rton pa dang / sgrub pa dang log par sgrub pa la gnas pa'i sems can rnams mi gtong ba
222b6(dkon brtsegs): dang | gcig tu chad par smra ba dang / bden pa gces su byed pa dang / byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro ba ste/ 'od srung / byang chub sems dpa' chos sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag dang ldan
222b7(dkon brtsegs): na byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sems can kun la phan dang bde bya ba'i/ /lhag pa'i bsam la mos bar byed pa yin/ /kun mkhyen ye shes la ni sems
223a1(dkon brtsegs): sgrol zhing / /ri 'am mi ri snyam du bdag la dpog /smod pa med cing lhag pa'i nga rgyal med/ /bsam pa brtan zhing bcos pa med par byams/ /mdza'
223a2(dkon brtsegs): dang mi mdza' rnams la sems kyang snyoms/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i mtha' la thug bar du/ /sems can rnams la gtan du rab tu mdza'/ /'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis 'jam por smra
223a3(dkon brtsegs): bar byed/ /khur blangs pa la sgyid lug zhum pa med/ /sems can dag la snying rje yongs ma bcad/ /dam chos yongs su tshol ba skyo ba med/ /thos pas mi ngoms bdag gi 'khrul skyon
223a4(dkon brtsegs): lta| |gzhan la gshe bas gdung bar byed pa med/ /spyod lam rnams su sems ni rab tu sbyong / /gtong ba rnam par smin la re ba med/ /tshul khrims srid pa'i 'gro bar gnas ma
223a5(dkon brtsegs): yin| |sems can rnams la bzod cing khong khro spangs/ /dge ba yang dag sgrub pa'i brtson 'grus dang / /gzugs med khams spangs pa yi bsam gtan dang / /thabs kyis yang dag
223a6(dkon brtsegs): zin pa'i shes rab dang / /bsdu ba rnam bzhis yang dag zin thabs dang / /khrims ldan khrims med gnyis med byams pa dang / /gus par byas te dus su chos nyan dang / /gus par
223a7(dkon brtsegs): byas te dgon zhi gnas pa dang / /'jig rten sna tshogs dga' bar mi byed dang / /theg pa dman la dga' bar mi byed cing / /theg pa che la 'dod pa skyed pa dang / /sdig pa'i grogs
223b1(dkon brtsegs): po rnam par spong byed cing / /dge ba'i bshes gnyen rtag tu bsten pa dang / /tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi la bsgoms pa dang / /mngon shes rnam lngas rtag tu brtson pa dang / /ye shes rjes su rtag
223b2(dkon brtsegs): tu 'byung ba dang / /sgrub dang ldan pa gtong bar mi byed dang / /sgrub dang mi ldan gzhan yang mi gtong dang / /gcig tu chad par rtag tu smra ba dang / /bden la rtag tu gus dang bcas pa dang / /
223b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems ni sngon du btang nas su/ /rgyal bas bsngags pa'i chos ni sgom par byed/ /bde gshegs gsungs pa'i sum cu rtsa gnyis chos/ /'di dag bde gshegs sras kyis
223b4(dkon brtsegs): bsten par bya/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin de dag ni/ /chos 'di ldan zhes bde bar gshegs pas gsungs/ /'od srung / dpe nye bar dgod pa bstan pa gang dag gis byang chub sems
223b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rab tu shes par byed pa'i dpe nye bar dgod pa khyod la bstan par bya'o/ /'od srung / 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sa chen po 'di ni sems can thams
223b6(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi 'tsho ba ste/ 'gyur ba med cing lan du phan gdogs pa la re ba med do/ /'od srung / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa yang byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi
223b7(dkon brtsegs): bar du sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba yin te 'gyur ba med cing lan du phan gdogs par re ba med do/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na sa 'di skye bo kun gyi 'tsho/ /lan la mi re
224a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba med pa bzhin/ /byang chub sems dpa' thog mar sems gnas pa/ /rgyal mchog bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas su/ /ma gyur bar du skye bo kun
224a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi 'tsho/ /lan la re ba med cing 'gyur ba med/ /bu dang dgra la'ang yid kyis mtshungs par sems/ /byang chub mchog rab rtag par yongs su 'tshol/ /'od srung / 'di lta ste/
224a3(dkon brtsegs): dper na/ chu'i khams ni rtswa dang / shing gel pa dang / sman dang / nags tshal thams cad skyed par byed do/ /'od srung / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa dag pa/
224a4(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byas te gnas pa yang sems can thams cad la dkar po'i chos thams cad skyed do/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na chu ni rtswa
224a5(dkon brtsegs): dang gel pa dang / /nags tshal sman dang 'bru yi rnam pa skyed/ /de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' bsam dag pa/ /sems can mtha' yas byams pas khyab par byed/ /sna tshogs
224a6(dkon brtsegs): chos la khyab byas rim gyis su/ /dkar po'i chos kyis rnam par rgyas 'gyur zhing / /dpung bcas sde dang bcas pa'i bdud bcom nas/ /rim gyis rgyal ba'i byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /
224a7(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung / 'di lta ste/ dper na/ me'i khams ni lo tog thams cad yongs su smin par byed do/ /'od srung / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyang sems can thams
224b1(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi dkar po'i chos thams cad yongs su smin par byed do/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na me ni rtswa dang sman rnams dang / /lo tog thams cad yongs su smin par byed/ /de bzhin bde
224b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs sras kyi shes rab kyang / /skye bo rnams kyi dge ba'i chos smin byed/ /'od srung / 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rlung gi khams ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rnam par sgrub bo/ /'od srung /
224b3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yang sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par sgrub bo/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na rlung ni sangs
224b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas dgongs pa bzhin/ /rnam pa sna tshogs zhing rnams rnam par sgrub/ /de bzhin rgyal sras rnams kyi thabs mkhas kyang / /bde gshegs gsungs pa'i chos mchog rnam par sgrub/ /'od
224b5(dkon brtsegs): srung | 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bdud sdig can gyi dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha thams cad kyis zil gyis mnan pa'am yongs su zad par bya bar mi nus so/ /'od
224b6(dkon brtsegs): srung | de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa dag pa yang bdud thams cad kyis zil gyis mnan pa'am yongs su zad par bya bar mi nus so/ /'od srung / 'di lta ste/ dper na/ zla ba
224b7(dkon brtsegs): yar gyi ngo la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor skye zhing gang bar 'gyur ro/ /'od srung / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa dag pa yang dkar po'i chos thams cad kyis rdzogs shing rgyas
225a1(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yar ngo la/ /skye zhing yongs su gang 'gyur 'bri mi 'gyur/ /de bzhin bsam dag byang
225a2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' yang / /dkar po'i chos kyis rtag tu rgyas par 'gyur/ /'od srung / 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor las lan gcig phyung ba'i 'od zer rnams kyis
225a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad snang bar byed do/ /'od srung / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis lan gcig phyung ba'i shes rab kyi 'od zer rnams kyis kyang sems can thams cad
225a4(dkon brtsegs): la shes pa'i snang ba byed do/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na nyi las lan gcig phyung ba yi/ /'od zer rnams kyis sems can snang bar byed/ /de bzhin rgyal sras ye shes 'od
225a5(dkon brtsegs): zer gyis/ /sems can rnams la shes rab snang bar byed/ /'od srung / 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ri dwags kyi rgyal po seng ge ni ga las gar 'gro ba thams cad du mi 'jigs mi skrag
225a6(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid du 'gro'o/ /'od srung / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thos pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bslab pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin
225a7(dkon brtsegs): dang | ye shes la gnas pa yang ga las gar 'gro ba thams cad du mi 'jigs mi skrag pa nyid du 'gro'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ ri dwags rgyal po seng ge ral pa can/ /'jigs pa
225b1(dkon brtsegs): med par gang du 'dod par 'gro/ /de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang / /thos dang ye shes gnas pa dga' mgur 'gro/ /'od srung / 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ba glang glang po che
225b2(dkon brtsegs): shin tu dul ba ni khal thams cad khyer bas yongs su skyo ba med do/ /'od srung / /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems shin tu dul ba yang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir phung
225b3(dkon brtsegs): po lnga'i khur khyer bas yongs su skyo ba med do/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na rab dul stobs ldan glang po che/ /khal rnams khyer yang yongs su skyo ba med/ /de bzhin byang chub sems
225b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems rab dul/ /sems can khur gyis skyo bar 'gyur ba med/ /'od srung / 'di lta ste/ dper na/ pad+ma chu las skyes kyang chus mi gos so/ /'od srung / de bzhin du byang chub sems

225b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten skyes/ /'jig rten chos kyis nam yang gos pa med/ /'od srung / 'di lta ste/ dper na/ shing ljon pa yal ga bcad pa ni rtsa ba ma snad na slar yang
225b7(dkon brtsegs): sa las skye'o/ /'od srung / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa nyon mongs pa'i yal ga bcad pa yang snying rje chen pos dge ba'i rtsa ba la kun du sbyor ba ma nyams na
226a1(dkon brtsegs): slar yang khams gsum du skye'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na shing ljon yal ga bcad pa ni/ /rtsa ba brtan par ma snad slar yang skye/ /de bzhin rtsa ba kun
226a2(dkon brtsegs): sbyor ma spangs na/ /thabs kyis bsal yang slar yang skye bar 'gyur/ /'od srung / 'di lta ste/ dper na/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams tha dad pa nas klung chen po'i chu'i phung po rgya
226a3(dkon brtsegs): mtsho chen por 'bab pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ lan tshwa'i ror ro gcig par 'gyur ro/ /'od srung / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sgo tha dad pa nas bsags pa byang chub tu
226a4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bsngos pa thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ror ro gcig par 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na tha dad phyogs kyi chu klung rnams/ /rgya mtsho
226a5(dkon brtsegs): cher 'bab ro gcig 'gyur ba bzhin/ /tha dad sgo nas dge ba bsags byas pa/ /byang chub bsngos pa rnams kyang ro gcig 'gyur/ /'od srung / 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i
226a6(dkon brtsegs): ris rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams ni ri rab la gnas so/ /'od srung / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi sems kyi dge
226a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba la gnas so/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na rgyal chen bzhi yi ris rnams dang / /sum cu rtsa gsum lha tshogs ri rab gnas/ /de bzhin byang chub sems dpa'
226b1(dkon brtsegs): dger gnas te/ /thams cad mkhyen nyid thob nas chos kyang ston/ /'od srung / 'di lta ste/ dper na/ blon pos yongs su zin pa'i rgyal po rnams ni rgyal po'i bya ba thams cad byed do/ /'od srung /

226b6(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur ro/ /'od srung / 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sprin chen po las byung ba'i char gyi rgyun ni lo tog thams cad la mngon par 'bab bo/ /'od srung / de bzhin du byang chub sems

227a1(dkon brtsegs): sprin chen glog dang bcas pa las/ /char pa bab pas lo tog ngoms par byed/ /de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' dam chos kyi/ /sprin byung chos rgyu sems can
227a2(dkon brtsegs): tshim par byed/ /'od srung / 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po gang du byung ba der rin po che sna bdun yang 'byung ngo / /'od srung / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'

229b6(dkon brtsegs): med pa/ gnas med pa ste/ 'od srung / 'di ni dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa zhes bya'o/ /'od srung / gang yang ngas khyed rnams la ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis
229b7(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed rnams/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug /skye mched drug gi rkyen
230a1(dkon brtsegs): gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye
230a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung ste/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba'
230a3(dkon brtsegs): zhig po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag /'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag /rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag/

230a7(dkon brtsegs): rig pa dang ma rig pa de dag gnyis ma yin zhing rnam pa gnyis su dbyer med de/ /'od srung / 'di la shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa zhes

231a1(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams ma byung bar mi byed de/ chos rnams nyid ma byung ba dang / gang ngo bo nyid med pas chos rnams ngo bo nyid med par mi byed de/ chos rnams nyid ngo
231a2(dkon brtsegs): bo nyid med par gang dag de ltar so sor rtog pa de ni/ 'od srung / dbu ma'i lam chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog pa zhes bya'o/ /yang 'od srung / gang zag rnam par gzhig
231a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir stong pa nyid ma yin gyi stong pa nyid stong pa'o/ /'od srung / sngon gyi mtha' stong pa/ phyi ma'i mtha' stong pa/ da ltar byung ba stong ba ste/ stong pa nyid la rton par bya'i/ gang
231a4(dkon brtsegs): zag la ma yin no/ /'od srung / gang dag stong pa nyid du dmigs pas stong pa nyid la rton pa de dag ni/ ngas gsung rab 'di las nyams/ rab tu nyams zhes bshad do/ /'od srung / gang
231a5(dkon brtsegs): zag tu lta ba ri rab tsam la gnas pa bla'i/ mngon pa'i nga rgyal can stong pa nyid du lta ba ni de lta ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'od srung / lta bar gyur pa thams cad las 'byung ba ni stong pa
231a6(dkon brtsegs): nyid yin na/ 'od srung / gang stong pa nyid kho nar lta ba de ni gsor mi rung ngo zhes ngas bshad do/ /'od srung / 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi nad pa zhig yod la/ sman pas de la sman btang nas
231a7(dkon brtsegs): sman des de'i nad thams cad bskyod de/ sman lto na 'dug pa de nyid mi 'byung na/ 'od srung / 'di ji snyam du sems/ mi de nad de las thar par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
231b1(dkon brtsegs): de ni mi 'gyur lags te/ gang sman des nad thams cad bskyod nas/ sman lto na mchis pa nyid ma byung na/ mi de'i bro nad shin tu tshabs che bar 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis

232a2(dkon brtsegs): nus pa ma yin yang / /rmongs pas byis pa dag ni 'di skad smra/ /de bzhin dge sbyong bram ze gang dag cig /stong pa nyid kyis skrag cing sems 'khrugs pas/ /byis pa de dag stong pa
232a3(dkon brtsegs): nyid spyod pa/ /stong pa nyid ni gang du'ang gzhig mi nus/ /'od srung / 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ri mo mkhan zhig bdag nyid kyis gnod sbyin gyi gzugs 'jigs 'jigs lta zhig bris

232a7(dkon brtsegs): la sogs rmongs gyur pas/ /'gro ba drug tu 'khyams par 'gyur/ /'od srung / 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi sgyu ma mkhan zhig gis sgyu ma sprul nas/ sprul pa des sgyu ma mkhan

234b6(dkon brtsegs): tu gang bar blta/ /'od srung / 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi la la zhig gis skra tshal pa brgyar bshags pa'i rtse mos rgya mtsho chen po bzhi las chu'i thigs pa gcig blangs pa de bzhin du/

235b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po'i bu min dbang bskur min/ /de bzhin nyan thos 'dod chags bral gyur pa/ /de dag dbu dbang bskur 'os ma yin/ /'di ltar de dag bdag la phan phyir brtson/ /bdag gzhan

236a1(dkon brtsegs): los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po la bu gzhon nu stobs che zhing mgyogs pa'i shugs dang ldan pa mthu rnyed pa stong mod par gyur la/ de dag gang yang 'khor los
236a2(dkon brtsegs): sgyur ba'i mtshan dang mi ldan na de dag la 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i sras su 'du shes mi skyed pa de bzhin du/ 'od srung / de bzhin gshegs pa'i zham ring ba nyan thos bye
236a3(dkon brtsegs): ba brgya stong de dag gang yang byang chub sems dpar ma gyur na de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras su 'du shes mi bskyed do/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dper na mi bdag rgyal po
