254b5(dkon brtsegs): la zhugs shig / tshe dang ldan pa dag /'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las gong na bya ba med do zhes smras so/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe dge slong
254b6(dkon brtsegs): lnga brgya po de dag len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /de dag sems rnam par grol nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags pa dang / bcom
254b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag /
255a1(dkon brtsegs): gar dong / gang nas lhags/ de dag gis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ gang du yang 'gro ba med pa dang / gang nas kyang 'ong ba med pa'i phyir/ bcom
255a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis chos bstan to/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /khyed kyi ston pa gang yin/ smras pa/ gang ma skyes shing yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'o/ /smras pa/ khyed kyis ji ltar
255a3(dkon brtsegs): chos thos/ smras pa/ bcings pa'i phyir yang ma yin/ thar pa'i phyir yang ma yin no/ /smras pa/ khyed sus btul/ smras pa/ su la lus med cing sems med pas so/ /smras
255a4(dkon brtsegs): pa| khyed ji ltar brtson/ smras pa/ ma rig pa spang ba'i phyir yang ma yin/ rig pa bskyed pa'i phyir yang ma yin pa'o/ /smras pa/ khyed ji ltar rnam par grol/ smras pa/ sbyor ba'i phyir yang
255a5(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ spang ba'i phyir yang ma yin no/ /smras pa/ khyed su'i nyan thos/ smras pa/ gang gis thob pa med cing mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas med pa'o/ /smras pa/ khyed kyi tshangs
255a6(dkon brtsegs): pa mtshungs par spyod pa gang / smras pa/ gang dag khams gsum na mi rgyu ba rnams so/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /khyod ji srid cig na yongs su mya ngan las 'da'/ smras pa/ de
255a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa nam yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba na'o/ /smras pa/ khyed kyis bya ba byas sam/ smras pa/ ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa yongs su shes pas
255b1(dkon brtsegs): so| |smras pa/ khyed kyis nyon mongs pa zad dam/ smras pa/ chos thams cad gtan du zad pa'i phyir ro/ /smras pa/ khyed kyis bdud btul tam/ smras pa/ phung po'i bdud mi dmigs
255b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir ro/ /smras pa/ khyed kyis ston pa la bsnyen bkur byas sam/ smras pa/ lus kyis kyang ma byas/ ngag gis kyang ma byas/ sems kyis kyang ma byas so/ /smras pa/ khyed kyis sbyin
255b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gnas kyis sbyangs sam/ smras pa/ 'dzin pa med cing sdud pa med pas so/ /smras pa/ khyed 'khor ba las brgal tam/ smras pa/ chad pa med cing rtag pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /
255b4(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ khyed sbyin pa'i gnas kyi sar zhugs sam/ smras pa/ 'dzin pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba'i phyir ro/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag gar 'gro /smras pa/ de bzhin
255b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i sprul pa gang du bzhud par ro/ /de ltar tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis yongs su dris te/ dge slong de dag gis lan btab nas/ 'khor de'i dge slong brgyad brgya ni
255b6(dkon brtsegs): len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /srog chags sum khri nyis stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go /
255b7(dkon brtsegs): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du snang ba zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dus pa de stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas
256a1(dkon brtsegs): pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
256a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das/ dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la slob par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpas ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
256a3(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ tshar bcad cing tshar bcad nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'dir bslab pa ston te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni skyes bu dam pa nan tan snying po byed pa rnams
256a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi don chen por 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi la la zhig khams pa'i grur zhugs te/ gang+gA'i klung chen po brgal bar 'dod par gyur na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di
256a5(dkon brtsegs): ji snyam du sems/ mi des ci 'dra ba'i brtson 'grus kyis gru de btsal bar bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ stobs dang ldan pa'i brtson 'grus kyis bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad
256a6(dkon brtsegs): du zhe na/ bdag ni chu bo chen po'i nang du zhugs kyi/ bdag 'gram du ma phyin par bar ma dor gru zhig tu 'ong ngo snyam du sems pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
256a7(dkon brtsegs): pa| kun du snang ba/ de ltar byang chub sems dpas de bas kyang ches stobs dang ldan pa'i brtson 'grus kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bslab par bya ste/ stobs chen po dang ldan
256b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i brtson 'grus kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub par bya'o/ /kye ma'o lus 'di ni mi rtag pa ste/ bdag gis snying por ma blangs par bar ma dor 'chi ba'i dus
256b2(dkon brtsegs): byas su 'ong ngo zhes yid la byed pa de lta bus bdag ni chu bo chen por zhugs kyi/ chu bo bzhir zhugs pa'i sems can rnams chu bo chen por zhugs pa las bsgral ba'i phyir/ dam pa'i chos
256b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi gru gang gis sems can 'khor ba'i rgya mtshos khyer ba thams cad bsgral bar bya ba'i dam pa'i chos kyi gru chen po sbyar bar bya'o/ /kun du snang ba/ de la byang chub sems dpas dam pa'i
256b4(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi gru chen po sbyar bar bya ba de ci 'dra zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid de/ bsod nams kyi tshogs mtha' yas pa bsags pa/ tshul khrims kyi
256b5(dkon brtsegs): snam gyis sbyar ba sbyin pa'i 'khor gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa'i bcing ba sra bas dam por sbrel ba/ bzod pa dang des pa dang dran pa'i sbyor kas legs
256b6(dkon brtsegs): par sbyar ba/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi tshogs can/ brtson 'grus brtan pa dang dge ba'i chos kyi shing gis yang dag par sbyar ba/ bsam gtan gyi sems kyis las su rung
256b7(dkon brtsegs): bar byas pa/ dul ba dang zhi ba dang cang shes kyi dge ba'i bzos legs par zin par byas pa/ shin tu mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can/ snying rje chen pos yang dag par zin pa/ bsdu ba'i
257a1(dkon brtsegs): dngos po bzhi dang / dpa' bar 'gro bas bstar ba/ shes rab dang ye shes kyis phyir rgol pa legs par rnam par zin par bsrungs pa/ thabs mkhas pas
257a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par bsags pa/ legs par byas pa/ tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhis legs par yongs su sbyangs pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhis legs par rnam par bsams
257a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lus kyis bsten pa/ yang dag par spong bas 'gro ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i mgyogs pa'i shugs dang ldan pa/ dbang pos legs par brtags pas lta ba ngan pa'i shing
257a4(dkon brtsegs): yon po med pa/ stobs kyi shugs yang dag par byung bas bar shag shig med pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag gis 'gro ba rnam par dag pa/ gcugs can dgra nyon mongs pa'i
257a5(dkon brtsegs): bdud kyi lam 'dor bar byed pa/ lam du 'jug par byed pa/ pha rol gyi ngogs su phyin par byed pa/ mu stegs can ngan pa'i mu stegs 'dor bar byed pa/ zhi gnas kyis
257a6(dkon brtsegs): nges par sems pa brtan pa/ lhag mthong gis sbyor ba/ mtha' gnyis la ma chags par 'jugs/ rgyu'i chos dang yang dag par ldan pa/ sgra grags pa yangs shing rgya che la
257a7(dkon brtsegs): mi zad cing tshad med pa/ tshur shog /dam pa'i chos kyi gru chen po mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'gro ba/ bde bar 'gro ba/ 'jigs pa med par 'gro ba/ lam du 'gro ba/
257b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig tshogs la lta ba 'dor bar zhugs pa/ tshu rol gyi 'gram nas pha rol gyi 'gram du lta ba thams cad sel ba/ gtse ba med pa'i mya ngan las 'das par myur du song zhig ces phyogs
257b2(dkon brtsegs): bcur sgras go bar byed pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med par yid yongs su mi skyo bar byang chub sems dpas
257b3(dkon brtsegs): dam pa'i chos kyi gru chen po 'di 'dra ba de sbyar bar bya'o/ /dam pa'i chos kyi gru 'dis chu bo bzhis khyer ba'i sems can thams cad bsgral bar bya'o/ /kun du snang ba/ de la 'dir byang
257b4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i mngon pa shes pa myur ba gang zhe na/ gang 'di sems can thams cad las bcos ma ma yin pa'i sbyor ba ste/ bsam pa dag pas rab tu 'dun pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa
257b5(dkon brtsegs): ba thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir brtson 'grus 'bar ba dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pas dge ba la 'dun pa dang / shes rab yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir thos pas
257b6(dkon brtsegs): mi ngoms pa dang / ye shes brtan par bya ba'i phyir nga rgyal med pa dang / yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ rab tu 'byung ba la gzhol ba dang / lus dang sems
257b7(dkon brtsegs): dben par dgon pa na gnas pa dang / skye bo mi srun pa rnam par spangs pas 'du 'dzi med pa dang / don dam pa la rton pas chos don du gnyer ba dang / shin tu mi 'khrugs pas
258a1(dkon brtsegs): ye shes kyi don dang / ye shes kyi don yin pas chos kyi don dang / mi 'khrugs pas bden pa'i don dang / yang dag par sbyor bar byas pas stong pa nyid kyi
258a2(dkon brtsegs): don dang / shin tu nye bar zhi ba'i don yin pas dben pa'i don te/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni 'dir byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa myur ba'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la
258a3(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /'di ltar dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs
258a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo rnams la phan 'dogs par gyur pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das/ ngo mtshar to/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dkon mchog
258a5(dkon brtsegs): brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam bstan na/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam bskyed par 'gyur/
258a6(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'od srung / rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las
258a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu gang bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
258b1(dkon brtsegs): la sbyin pa byin pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams las de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i gtsug lag khang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa gang+gA'i
258b2(dkon brtsegs): klung gi bye ma snyed brtsigs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams las de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dpag tu med pa dag la
258b3(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gro byas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag gi mchod rten rin po che bdun
258b4(dkon brtsegs): las byas pa bas/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa gzhan zhig gis dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tshigs su bcad pa gcig
258b5(dkon brtsegs): tsam lung mnos te/ lung mnos nas kyang mi spong na de ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du bskyed do/ /bud med gang zhig lung 'bog na/ de nam yang log par ltung bar mi 'gyur
258b6(dkon brtsegs): te| de nyid de'i bud med kyi lus kyi tha ma yin no/ /sa phyogs gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'am/ bstan pa'am/ yi ger 'dri ba'am/ yi ger bris nas glegs bam du byas te/
258b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhag pa'i sa phyogs de lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod rten dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /su zhig chos smra ba las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa'am 'dzin pa'am yi ger 'dri ba de la
259a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ji ltar bya ba de bzhin du gus par bya'o/ /'od srung / rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig de bzhin gshegs
259a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos smra ba la bkur stir byed pa dang / btsun par byed pa dang / ri mor byed pa dang / mchod pa byed pa de la/ nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston to/ /
259a3(dkon brtsegs): de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mthong nas kyang lus kyi las yongs su dag pa bcu thob par 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/
259a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ tshor bas sems kun du ma zin par 'chi ba'i dus byed pa dang / de mig 'khrul par mi 'gyur ba dang / lag pa g.yo bar mi byed pa dang / rkang pa 'phra bar mi byed pa
259a5(dkon brtsegs): dang | gcin mi stor ba dang / phyi sa mi 'byung ba dang / de'i snying gar rdul mi 'byung ba dang / khu tshur mi 'chang ba dang / nam mkha' la mi snyegs pa dang / ji ltar 'dug pa de bzhin
259a6(dkon brtsegs): du tshe'i 'du byed 'dor bar 'gyur ba ste/ lus kyi las yongs su dag pa bcu po de dag thob par 'gyur ro/ /ngag gi las yongs su dag pa bcu thob par 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe
259a7(dkon brtsegs): na| 'di lta ste/ gdangs snyan pa'i tshig dang / mnyen pa'i tshig dang / 'jam pa'i tshig dang / dga' ba'i tshig dang / snum pa'i tshig dang / slar bzlog pa ma yin pa'i tshig
259b1(dkon brtsegs): dang | gzung bar 'os pa'i tshig dang / btsun pa'i tshig dang / lha dang mis yongs su bzung ba'i tshig dang / sangs rgyas kyis yongs su bzung ba'i tshig ste/ ngag gi las yongs su dag
259b2(dkon brtsegs): pa bcu po de dag thob par 'gyur ro/ /yid kyi las yongs su dag pa bcu thob par 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ khro bar mi 'gyur ba dang / 'khon du 'dzin pa med pa dang / 'chab par
259b3(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur ba dang / tshig par mi 'gyur ba dang / nyes pa la mi dga' ba dang / 'khon gcugs la mi dga' ba dang / 'du shes phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur ba dang / spong ba la bag yod par 'gyur
259b4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / ma zhugs pa'i sems kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'dzin pa dang / nga rgyal dang che ba'i nga rgyal med par sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par sgrub pa'i ting nge
259b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin thob par 'gyur ba ste/ yid kyi las yongs su dag pa bcu po de dag thob par 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ tshor bas nyen cing 'chi ba'i dus mi byed/ /de yi mig la
259b6(dkon brtsegs): 'khrul par 'gyur ba med/ /lag pa mi g.yo ba rkang pa 'phra mi 'gyur/ /de ni bshang gci stor bar yong mi 'gyur/ /de yi snying gar rdul yang 'byung mi 'gyur/ /khu tshur mi 'chad
259b7(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' snyegs mi 'gyur/ /'dug bzhin bde bar 'chi ba'i dus byed de/ /lus las yongs su dag pa 'di bcu thob/ /gdangs snyan phun sum tshogs la 'jam mnyen tshig /snum
260a1(dkon brtsegs): zhing yid 'ong de bzhin dga' bar 'gyur/ /gzhan gyis slar mi bzlog cing bzung 'os tshig /skye bos btsun par bya ba'i tshig tu 'gyur/ /de yi tshig ni lha
260a2(dkon brtsegs): dang klu dag dang / /mi'am ci dang de bzhin rgyal bas bsngags/ /des bshad pa yi don kyang 'dzin byed de/ /des ni ngag las dag pa de dag 'thob/ /khro ba med cing 'khon du 'dzin
260a3(dkon brtsegs): pa med/ /brtan pa 'chab pa med cing 'tshig pa med/ /nyes la mi dga' 'khon gcugs dga' ba med/ /de yi 'du shes phyin ci log mi 'gyur/ /bslab pa yang dag blangs la
260a4(dkon brtsegs): sems mi zhum/ /spong ba la ni bag med mi 'gyur te/ /zhum pa med pa'i sems kyis zhing sbyong byed/ /nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal yongs spangs nas/ /ting 'dzin 'byor pa thams
260a5(dkon brtsegs): cad mngon bsgrubs nas/ /yid kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa'i chos rnams 'thob/ /chos rnams 'di dag ldan par gyur pa la/ /sangs rgyas dngos po dkon par mi 'gyur ro/ /'od
260a6(dkon brtsegs): srung | gang la la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis nga la bkur stir byed par 'dod pa dang / mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod par 'dod pa des dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i
260a7(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya/ kun chub par bya/ yi ger bri bar bya/ bklag par bya/ bcang bar bya'o/ /'od srung / de lta na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
260b1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa bla na med pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / byang chub sems
260b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs nas 'dus pa de dag dang / dge slong de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/
260b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ 'phags pa 'od srung gi
260b4(dkon brtsegs): le'u zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa bzhi bcu gsum pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing
260b5(dkon brtsegs): zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+Ya rat+na rA shi nA ma mahA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rin po che'i phung po
260b6(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ /bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das
260b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong brgyad stong tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' khri drug stong
261a1(dkon brtsegs): dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu skye ba gcig gis thogs pa phyir mi ldog
261a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bzod pa thob pa sha stag go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dge sbyong dge sbyong zhes bgyi ba ji tsam
261a3(dkon brtsegs): gyis na dge sbyong dge sbyong zhes bgyi ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'ong srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'od srung / dge
261a4(dkon brtsegs): sbyong dge sbyong zhes bya ba ni zhi ba dang / dul ba dang / cang shes pa dang / tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su dag pa dang / ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa shes pas dge sbyong zhes bya ste/ shes
261a5(dkon brtsegs): rab dang ldan pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i snying po lhur len pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la som nyi med cing the tshom mi za ba dang / 'phags pa'i spyod yul la gnas pa
261a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la gnas pa dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi la gnas pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi bsgom pa bsgoms pa dang / dad pa'i dbang po dang ldan
261a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / sangs rgyas la dad pa mi phyed pa dang / chos la dad pa mi phyed pa dang / dge 'dun la dad pa mi phyed pa dang / sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la shes nas dad pa dang
261b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa dang / gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa dang / dge ba'i chos rnams la brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / srid pa bcom pa dang / yang dag par zhugs pa dang /
261b2(dkon brtsegs): dran pa dang shes bzhin la mkhas pa dang / sems rtse gcig pa dang / shes rab kyis lhag mthong la mkhas pa dang / stobs lnga dang ldan pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi
261b3(dkon brtsegs): brdzi ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la bsam gtan pa dang / chos rnams kyi brten pa shes pa la mkhas pa dang / lam shes pa dang / lam la mkhas pa dang / yang dag pa'i
261b4(dkon brtsegs): lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zhi gnas lhag mthong bsgom pa la mkhas pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'i shes rab dang
261b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa dang / don la rton gyi tshig 'bru la mi rton pa dang / ye shes la rton gyi rnam par shes pa la mi rton pa dang / nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rton gyi drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde la mi
261b6(dkon brtsegs): rton pa dang / chos nyid la rton gyi gang zag la mi rton pa dang / bdud bzhi'i lam las shin tu 'das pa dang / phung po yongs su shes pa bsrung ba dang / nyon mongs pa bsal ba dang /
261b7(dkon brtsegs): tha ma'i lus 'dzin pa dang / 'chi bdag gi lam las yang dag par 'das pa dang / sdug bsngal ba yang dag par yongs su shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba thams cad spangs pa dang /
262a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gog pa mngon sum du bya ba la zhugs pa dang / lam bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rjes su zhugs pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi mthong ba dang / gzhan
262a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi dring la mi 'jog pa dang / ston pa'i bstan pa la bya ba byas pa dang / byed pa byas pa dang / zag pa zad pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa dang / brgya byin dang /
262a3(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong bas bsu ba dang / sngon gyi spyod pa dang bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / dgon pa la gnas par mngon par dga' ba dang / 'phags
262a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rigs la gnas pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan la gnas pa dang / blo gya gyu med pa dang / rab tu byung nas khyim gyi gnas dang mi 'dre ba dang / bse ru ltar gcig pur
262a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyu ba dang / 'du 'dzis 'jigs skrag pa dang / khams gsum las rnam par grol ba dang / rtag tu 'jigs pa'i yid dang ldan pa dang / yang dag pa'i dge sbyong gi tshul la gnas
262a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / thams cad la 'dod pa med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad po rnyed pa dang / ma rnyed pa dang / grags pa dang / ma grags pa dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang /
262a7(dkon brtsegs): bstod pa dang / smad pa rnams las yang dag par 'das pa dang / sa dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / bdag dang gzhan rjes su bsrung ba dang /
262b1(dkon brtsegs): 'khrul pa med pa dang / 'khrug pa med pa dang / yang dag par zhugs pa dang / nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / mtshan ma thams cad
262b2(dkon brtsegs): la de'i sems mi chags/ mi 'ching ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' la lag mthil bzhin du mi chags/ mi 'ching ba yin te/ 'od srung / dge sbyong gi chos rnam pa de lta bu de dag
262b3(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan na dge sbyong dge sbyong zhes bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs
262b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis yang dag pa'i dge sbyong gi yon tan 'di dag yang dag par rab tu bstan pa ni ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ma mchis
262b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dus na gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub bskal pa grangs ma mchis par yang dag par bsgrubs pa nub par bgyid pa/ dge sbyong ma lags pa la dge sbyong du mchid kyis 'che
262b6(dkon brtsegs): zhing | tshangs par spyod pa ma lags par tshangs par spyod par mchid kyis 'che ba'i dge slong la la dag 'byung bar 'gyur lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od
262b7(dkon brtsegs): srung | nga dang / khyod dang / nyan thos chen po 'di dag kyang yongs su mya ngan 'das shing / byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan du dong nas bstan pa 'di rab tu
263a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig par 'gyur ba ni/ tshig gis bstan par mi nus so/ /'od srung / de la dge slong lus ma bsgoms pa/ tshul khrims ma bsgoms pa/ sems ma
263a2(dkon brtsegs): bsgoms pa/ shes rab ma bsgoms pa/ byis pa/ dman pa/ glen pa/ rmongs pa/ rab tu ma zhi ba/ ma dul ba kha cig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag gi g.yo dang / sgyu dang /
263a3(dkon brtsegs): mi drang ba dang / gya gyu dang / dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / dge sbyong gi skyon rnams brjod par bya'o/ /'od srung / de la dge sbyong gi dri ma rnams gang zhe na/ 'od srung / sum cu rtsa gnyis
263a4(dkon brtsegs): bo 'di dag ni dge sbyong gi dri ma ste/ de dag spangs na dge sbyong dge sbyong zhes bya'o/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'dod pa la rnam par rtog pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / gnod sems
263a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam par rtog pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / bdag la bstod pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / gzhan la brnyas pa dge sbyong gi
263a6(dkon brtsegs): dri ma dang / mi mthun pa'i rnyed pa kun du tshol ba dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / rnyed pas rnyed par byed 'dod pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / dad pas byin pa chud son pa dge sbyong gi dri ma
263a7(dkon brtsegs): dang | ltung ba 'chab pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / khyim pa la brten pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / rab tu byung ba dang brten pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / 'du 'dzi la mngon par dga' ba dge
263b1(dkon brtsegs): sbyong gi dri ma dang / rnyed pa yongs su ma grub par rtog pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / bdag gi rnyed pas chog par mi 'dzin pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / pha rol bsod snyoms rnyed pa la phrag
263b2(dkon brtsegs): dog dang ser sna byed pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / pha rol gyi rnyed pa la 'dod pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / bdag gi 'khrul pa la mi rtog pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / gzhan gyi 'khrul pa yongs
263b3(dkon brtsegs): su tshol ba dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / so sor thar pa dang 'dul ba mi srung ba dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / khwa ltar mu cor smra ba dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / ma gus pa dang rgod pa dang khengs pa dge
263b4(dkon brtsegs): sbyong gi dri ma dang / lta bas kun nas dkris pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang 'gal ba dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / mthar lta ba la gnas pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang /
263b5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba la mngon par dga' ba dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon par mi dga' ba dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / 'jig rten rgyang pan pa'i gsang tshig 'dzin pa dge
263b6(dkon brtsegs): sbyong gi dri ma dang / sgrib pas kun nas dkris pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa dang 'gal ba dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyis skrag pa dge
263b7(dkon brtsegs): sbyong gi dri ma dang / chos zab mo spong ba dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / chos dang 'gal bar gnas pa dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / dkon mchog gsum la mi gus pa dge sbyong gi dri ma ste/ 'od
264a1(dkon brtsegs): srung | sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag ni dge sbyong gi dri ma ste/ de dag spangs na dge sbyong dge sbyong zhes bya'o/ /'od srung / brgyad po 'di dag ni dge sbyong gi
264a2(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi sgrib pa ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bla ma rnams la mi gus pa dang / chos rnams la rim gro med pa dang / tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang / ma thos
264a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mdo sde spong pa dang / bdag med pa dang / sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gang zag med pa'i chos kyis skrag pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos bstan pa la mi
264a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jug gi 'dus byas nyid kyi rjes su snyeg pa dang / 'du byed rnams ma skyes pa zhes thos nas skrag pa dang / chos rnams rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa thos na g.yang sa chen por
264a5(dkon brtsegs): lhung ba bzhin du ltung ba ste/ 'od srung / brgyad po 'di dag ni dge sbyong gi chos kyi sgrib pa ste/ rab tu byung bas de dag yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /'od srung / dge sbyong gi kha dog
264a6(dkon brtsegs): dang rtags kyi dbyibs kyis dge sbyong zhes nga mi 'chad kyi/ yon tan gyi chos la nan tan byed pa'i dge sbyong ni dge sbyong zhes ngas bshad do/ /'od srung / dge sbyong gis ni rnyog pa
264a7(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i sems kyis lus la ngur smrig dag bcang bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'od srung / rnyog pa med pa la ngas ngur smrig gnang gi/ 'od srung / rnyog pa dang bcas pa'i
264b1(dkon brtsegs): lus la ngur smrig dag 'chang ba de dag thams cad ni ngur smrig tshig pa'o zhes bshad de/ bsam pas mos pa rnams ni ma gtogs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni 'phags pa
264b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi rgyal mtshan yin pa'i phyir te/ skyo zhing 'dod chags dang bral bar spyod pa rnams kyis gos 'di dag ni nye bar zhi ba'i rjes su mthun pa byams pa'i rjes su zhugs pa'o/ /
264b3(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung / de la 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan gang zhe na/ 'od srung / bcu gnyis po 'di dag ni 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan te/ bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'od srung / tshul
264b4(dkon brtsegs): khrims 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang / ting nge 'dzin 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang / shes rab 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang / rnam par grol ba 'phags
264b5(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang / bden pa la 'jug pa 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang / rten
264b6(dkon brtsegs): cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang / bsam gtan bzhi 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang / tshad med pa bzhi 'phags pa rnams
264b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi rgyal mtshan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang / skyon med pa la 'jug pa 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang /
265a1(dkon brtsegs): zag pa zad pa 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan te/ 'od srung / bcu gnyis po 'di dag ni 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan no/ /'od srung / gang
265a2(dkon brtsegs): la la rgyal mtshan 'di dag dang mi ldan par 'phags pa'i rigs gos ngur smrig dag 'chang ba de ni nor ba'i chos la zhugs pa'o zhes ngas bshad do/ /chos dang 'gal bar
265a3(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa zhes bshad do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa las ring du gnas pa zhes bshad do/ /mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyogs kyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs la gnas pa
265a4(dkon brtsegs): zhes bshad do/ /'khor ba'i phyogs dang mthun pa zhes bshad do/ /nga rgyal gyi mchil pas zin pa zhes bshad do/ /snying po ma blangs pa zhes bshad do/ /chos las nyams pa
265a5(dkon brtsegs): zhes bshad do/ /nyam nga ba'i lam la gnas pa zhes bshad do/ /'od srung / de lta bas na dge sbyong gi lus la ngur smrig dag 'chang ba na rnyog pa med pa'i sems su bya'o/ /
265a6(dkon brtsegs): gal te des 'bras bu thob par ma gyur na/ de la gus pa brgyad kyis lus la ngur smrig dag bcang bar bya ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ mchod rten gyi 'du shes dang / ston pa'i 'du
265a7(dkon brtsegs): shes dang / nye bar zhi ba'i 'du shes dang / byams pa'i 'du shes dang / sangs rgyas la gus pa'i 'du shes dang / ngo tsha shes pa'i 'du shes dang / khrel yod pa'i 'du shes
265b1(dkon brtsegs): dang | rnyog pa med par bya'o snyam pa ste/ dge sbyong gi tshul dang mthun pa'i gus pa brgyad po de dag gis lus la ngur smrig dag bcang bar bya'o/ /'od srung / gang dag lhod cing yang
265b2(dkon brtsegs): dag par mi sdom pa dang / dge sbyong gi yon tan gyi chos 'di dag las nyams par lus la ngur smrig dag 'chang ba rnams mi gus pa 'di dag mi bskyed do/ /'od srung / dge sbyong gi
265b3(dkon brtsegs): kha dog dang gzugs can la gnod pa byed pa zhes bya ba nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba yod de/ 'od srung / nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba der dge sbyong gi gzugs su gyur bzhin
265b4(dkon brtsegs): du| gos 'bar ba dag dang / mgo 'bar ba dag dang / lhung bzed 'bar ba dag dang / stan 'bar ba dag dang / mal cha 'bar ba dag gnod par byed de/ de dag gi longs spyod dang /
265b5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su spyad pa gang ci yod pa de dag thams cad 'bar/ rab tu 'bar te/ kun du rab tu mched cing 'bar ba de mer gyur te/ dge sbyong kha dog dang gzugs kyis gnod pa de dag myong
265b6(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las yongs su ma dag pa dang ldan pa'i phyir te/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las yongs su ma dag pa dang ldan pa de
265b7(dkon brtsegs): dag gi 'gro ba yongs su ma dag pa nyid du 'gyur ro/ /'od srung / dge sbyong ma yin pa la dge sbyong du khas 'che ba dang / tshangs par spyod pa ma yin pa la tshangs par spyod par khas
266a1(dkon brtsegs): 'che ba gang zhig tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams dang / yon tan dang ldan pa rnams kyis phyag byas pa bdag gir byed na de mi dge ba'i las des
266a2(dkon brtsegs): brnyas pa brgyad 'thob ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ bems po lta bur 'gyur ba dang / go dka' zhing le lo can du 'gyur ba dang / skye bo mang pos brgal ba'i bud med du 'gyur ba
266a3(dkon brtsegs): dang | rang dbang med cing bran du 'gyur ba dang / mdog ngan cing mi sdug par 'gyur ba dang / mdog ngan cing dbang chung grags par 'gyur ba dang / de la su yang bsu bar mi
266a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dang / sbyin gnas rnams la mgu bar mi byed pa ste/ brnyas pa brgyad po 'di dag 'thob bo/ /'od srung / de lta bas na bzang po ma yin pa'i chos 'di lta bu 'di dag
266a5(dkon brtsegs): thos nas dge sbyong sdig pa can gyis gzhan gyis phyag byas pa bdag gir mi bya'o/ /'od srung / dge sbyong ma yin pa la dge sbyong du khas 'che ba dang / tshangs par spyod pa ma
266a6(dkon brtsegs): yin pa la tshangs par spyod par khas 'che ba ni tha na sa chen po 'di la mchil ma'i thal ba tsam 'dor ba de yang rnyed par mi 'gyur na/ gom pa 'debs pa dang / 'jog pa lta
266a7(dkon brtsegs): ci smos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'od srung chen po/ 'di ni sngon gyi rgyal po rnams kyis tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams dang / yon tan dang ldan pa rnams dang / sbyin gnas rnams
266b1(dkon brtsegs): la kun du spyad pa'i don du phul ba'i phyir ro/ /'od srung / de la mi blun po de ni gom pa 'jog pa dang 'dor ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dad pas byin pa la mi dbang bzhin du
266b2(dkon brtsegs): gom pa 'dor zhing 'jog pa yin na/ dge 'dun gyi'am/ phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi khri'am/ khri'u 'am/ 'chag sa'am/ gding ba'am/ gnas khang 'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam/
266b3(dkon brtsegs): kun dga'i ra ba'am/ kun dga'i ra ba'i gzhi'am/ yongs su spyad pa'am/ lhung bzed dam/ chos gos sam/ bsod snyoms sam/ mal cha'am/ na ba'i gsos sman nam/ yo
266b4(dkon brtsegs): byad kyang rung ste/ thams cad dad pas byin pa la mi dbang bar spyod pa yin pa lta ci smos/ 'od srung / khyod mos par bya'o/ /khyod kyis khong du chud par bya'o/ /'od srung / dge sbyong ma
266b5(dkon brtsegs): yin pa la dge sbyong du khas 'che ba dang / tshangs par spyod pa ma yin pa la tshangs par spyod par khas 'che bas ni dad pas byin pa skra'i rtse mo'i cha tsam yang yongs su dag par bya mi nus so/ /
266b6(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'od srung / 'phags pa'i dge 'dun ni ngas rgya mtsho chen po lta bu dang / bsod nams kyi zhing dang / sbyin gnas rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa'i phyir ro/ /'od srung /
266b7(dkon brtsegs): bram ze'am khyim bdag dad pa gang dag de la yon 'bul ba de dag tshad med pa'i 'du shes kyis 'bul ba de la/ 'od srung / mi blun po tshul khrims 'chal pas tha na skra'i rtse mo brgyar
267a1(dkon brtsegs): gshags pa'i cha tsam zhig dad pas byin pa yongs su spyad na yang sbyin pa po dang / sbyin pa dag de'i yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir dad pas byin pa skra'i rtse mo'i cha
267a2(dkon brtsegs): tsam ji snyed la spyad pa de snyed kyi las kyi rgya mtsho chen po gsog par 'gyur ro/ /'od srung / de lta bas na tshul khrims yongs su dag pas dad pas byin pa yongs su spyad par bya'o/ /
267a3(dkon brtsegs): zhes khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bstan pa 'di bshad pa na rnal 'byor spyod pa'i dge slong nyis brgyas bstan pa 'di thos nas rab tu ngus te mchi ma zag cing tshig 'di
267a4(dkon brtsegs): skad ces bdag cag ni gum yang rung ste/ 'bras bu ma thob kyi bar du dad pas stsal pa'i bsod snyoms gcig tsam yang yongs su spyad par mi bgyi'o zhes smras so/ /bcom
267a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu dam pa dag /legs so/ /legs so/ /ngo tsha shes pa dang / 'gyod pa dang ldan pa dang / 'jig rten pha rol tu kha na ma tho bas 'jigs
267a6(dkon brtsegs): par lta ba rnam pa 'di lta bu dag gis gsung rab 'di mdzes so/ /'od srung / ngas dge slong gnyis la dad pas byin pa gnang ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ ldan pa dang / grol ba'o/ /
267a7(dkon brtsegs): yang gnyis te/ gang 'du byed thams cad la mi rtag par lta ba dang / gang yang sems rnam par grol ba byams pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'o/ /dge slong dag /de la dge
267b1(dkon brtsegs): slong ldan pa rnal 'byor spyod pa nga'i bstan pa la zhugs pa gang zhig sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag las chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo
267b2(dkon brtsegs): byad rnams yongs su spyad nas 'khor pa'i skyon mthong / 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag par mthong / 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal bar rig /chos thams cad la bdag med
267b3(dkon brtsegs): par mos/ mya ngan las 'das pa zhi bar rtogs pas ni ri rab tsam gyi kham dag gi dad pas byin pa yongs su spyad kyang / de'i yon shin tu yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /sbyin pa
267b4(dkon brtsegs): po dang / sbyin bdag gang dag las dad pas byin pa yongs su spyad pa de las de dag gi bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa 'byor pa chen po dang / phan yon chen por 'gyur ro/ /de
267b5(dkon brtsegs): ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag /rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po rnams las/ gang byams pa'i sems la snyoms par 'jug pa de mchog yin pa'i phyir ro/ /
267b6(dkon brtsegs): dge slong dag /dge slong gang zhig sbyin pa po sbyin bdag gi chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / yo byad rnams yongs su spyad nas sems rnam par grol ba tshad
267b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa la snyoms par 'jug na sbyin pa po dang sbyin bdag de'i rnam par smin pa yang tshad med par shes par bya'o/ /'od srung / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na
268a1(dkon brtsegs): yod pa'i rgya mtsho chen po rnams ni yongs su zad par 'gyur yang srid kyi/ de'i bsod nams kyi rgyu mthun pa ni yongs su zad par gang yang mi 'gyur ro/ /'od
268a2(dkon brtsegs): srung | gang zhig sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag gi dad pas byin pas yongs su spyad nas 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyis log par ltung ba byed na/ mi gti mug pa de gnod pa ji tsam
268a3(dkon brtsegs): gyi phyir zhugs pa la ltos/ 'od srung / de bas na dge sbyong gi dri ma dang / dge sbyong gi skyon dang / dge sbyong gi mi drang ba dang / dge sbyong gi g.yo dang / dge sbyong gi sgyu dang / dge
268a4(dkon brtsegs): sbyong gi gya gyu rnam pa de lta bu de dag ni dge sbyong bsam pa dag pas yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /'od srung / dge sbyong dge sbyong zhes bya ba ni/ gang mi gnas mi zag cing / rna ba nas
268a5(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ sna nas ma yin/ lce nas ma yin/ lus nas ma yin/ yid nas kyang ma zag pa ste/ de'i phyir dge sbyong dge sbyong zhes bya'o/ /skye mched drug rig pa dang / mngon par
268a6(dkon brtsegs): shes pa drug dang / rjes su dran pa drug dang ldan pa dang / dam pa rnams la gus par gnas pa dang / pha rol tu 'gro ba'i chos drug la gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir dge sbyong dge sbyong
268a7(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o/ /dge sbyong gi le'u ste dang po'o// //'od srung / dge slong dge slong zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa bcom pa'i phyir dge slong zhes bya'o/ /bdag tu 'du shes
268b1(dkon brtsegs): pa bcom pa dang / sems can du 'du shes pa dang / srog tu 'du shes pa dang / gso bar 'du shes pa dang / gang zag tu 'du shes pa dang / skyes par 'du shes pa dang / bud med du
268b2(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes pa dang / khye'ur 'du shes pa dang / bu mor 'du shes pa bcom pa ste/ de'i phyir dge slong dge slong zhes bya'o/ /lus bsgoms pa dang / tshul khrims bsgoms pa dang / sems
268b3(dkon brtsegs): bsgoms pa dang / shes rab bsgoms pa dang / 'jigs skrag pa med pa dang / srid pa'i chu bo las brgal ba dang / 'byung ba dang 'jig pa la lta ba dang / 'jigs pa thams cad
268b4(dkon brtsegs): las bral ba dang / 'jigs pa med pa'i lam la gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir dge slong dge slong zhes bya'o/ /'od srung / gang la la zhig chos 'di dag dang mi ldan la bdag ni dge slong
268b5(dkon brtsegs): dge slong ngo snyam du khas 'che na/ bsam pas mos pa ma gtogs par nga yang de'i ston pa ma yin la/ de yang nga'i nyan thos ma yin no/ /'od srung / sdig pa can gyi dge slong dag phal
268b6(dkon brtsegs): cher nga'i bstan pa 'di nub par byed par 'gyur te/ 'od srung / ya mtshan can dgu bcu rtsa lnga dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis ni nga'i bstan pa 'di nub par byed mi nus so/ /
268b7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan du na nga'i bstan pa 'di las mi gti mug pa nges par mi sems pa gang dag 'byung ba de dag gis nga'i bstan pa nub bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /'od srung / 'di lta ste/ dper na/
269a1(dkon brtsegs): ri dwags kyi rgyal po seng ge shi ba'i sha la gcan gzan nam/ bya gang gis kyang za bar mi nus kyi/ seng ge'i ro de nyid las srin bu gang dag 'byung ba de dag ri
269a2(dkon brtsegs): dwags kyi rgyal po seng ge'i sha la za'o/ /'od srung / de bzhin du nga'i bstan pa 'di nyid las mi blun po brkam pa chags pa'i zil gyis non pa chos ma yin pa la lta ba/ nges par mi
269a3(dkon brtsegs): sems pa/ lhod pa/ brdzun du smra ba gang dag 'byung ba de dag nga'i bstan pa nub par byed par 'gyur ro/ /'od srung / chos bzhi dang ldan na sdig pa can gyi dge slong du rig par bya ste/
269a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhi gang zhe na/ chags pa dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal te/ bzhi po de dag go /gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ khengs pa dang / mu cor smra
269a5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / bya khwa ta lta bu dang / tshig 'chal pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go /gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rgod pa dang / pho theg can dang / rnyed pa 'dod pa dang / chos ma yin pa
269a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go /gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ g.yo can dang / sgyu can dang / mi mthun pas 'tsho ba dang / mi gtsigs par smra ba yin te/ bzhi po de dag
269a7(dkon brtsegs): go| gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byas pa mi gzo ba dang / byas pa la smod pa dang / sngon byas pa mi dran dang / mdza' bo la 'khu ba yin te/ bzhi po de dag go/ gzhan yang
269b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ dad pas byin pa log par ltung bar byed pa dang / tshul khrims mi srung ba dang / so sor thar pa khyad du gsod pa dang / 'dul ba mi srung ba ste/ bzhi po de
269b2(dkon brtsegs): dag go / gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag tu smra ba yin/ sems can du smra ba yin/ srog tu smra ba yin/ gang zag tu smra ba yin te/ bzhi po de dag go /gzhan yang
269b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas la mi gus pa yin/ chos la mi gus pa yin/ dge 'dun la mi gus pa yin/ bslab pa rnams la mi gus pa yin te/ bzhi po de dag go /gzhan
269b4(dkon brtsegs): yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ dge 'dun mthun pa la mi dga' ba yin/ gtsug lag khang la dga' ba mi rnyed pa yin/ 'du 'dzi la mngon par dga' pa yin/ 'jig rten rgyang pan
269b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i gsang tshig brjod pa yin te/ bzhi po de dag go /gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rnyed pa 'dod pa yin/ grags pa 'dod pa yin/ gnyen bshes 'dod pa yin/ chos
269b6(dkon brtsegs): la mchog tu dga' ba mi rnyed pa yin te/ bzhi po de dag go /gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bdud kyis zin pa yin/ bdud kyis non pa yin/ rmugs pa dang gnyid mang pa
269b7(dkon brtsegs): yin| 'phags pa'i rigs rnams la mi gnas pa yin te/ bzhi po de dag go/ gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ lus rul cing brgyan pa dang / nyon mongs pas snad pa dang / mya
270a1(dkon brtsegs): ngan las 'das pa la rgyab kyis bltas pa dang / 'bras bu thob pa med pa yin te/ bzhi po de dag go /gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'dod chags
270a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi yongs su gdung bas yongs su gdungs pa dang / zhe sdang gi yongs su gdung bas yongs su gdungs pa dang / gti mug gi yongs su gdung bas yongs su gdungs pa dang /
270a3(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis yongs su gdungs pas yongs su gdung ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go /gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ lam ngan pa la gnas te 'byung ba mi mthong
270a4(dkon brtsegs): ba yin/ ser sna can du gyur te kun mi 'gyed pa'i ngang tshul can yin/ thams cad yongs su 'dzin par 'dod cing chog mi shes pa yin/ ngoms mi myong zhing thos pa'i nan
270a5(dkon brtsegs): tan dang bral ba yin te/ bzhi po de dag go /gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ mun par gzhol bas mun par gyur pa yin/ rmongs pa la gzhol bas rmongs par gyur
270a6(dkon brtsegs): pa yin/ log pa'i chos kyis dkris pas chos ma yin pa mthong ba yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo bcad pas 'khor ba'i bcing bas bcings pa yin te/ bzhi po de dag
270a7(dkon brtsegs): go |gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ lus kyi tshul 'chos pa yin/ ngag gi tshul 'chos pa yin/ sems kyi tshul 'chos pa yin/ spyod lam gyi tshul 'chos pa yin
270b1(dkon brtsegs): te| bzhi po dag go / de la lus kyi tshul 'chos pa ni dal gyis 'gro bar tshul 'chos pa yin/ mgo smad par tshul 'chos pa yin/ gnya' shing gang tsam du lta zhing tshul 'chos pa
270b2(dkon brtsegs): yin| gos tshags legs par gyon par tshul 'chos pa yin/ dgon pa la gnas pa'i yon tan mi tshol bar dgon pa la gnas pa ltar tshul 'chos pa yin/ gong bur 'du shes
270b3(dkon brtsegs): pa mi sel bar bsod snyoms len pa ltar tshul 'chos pa yin/ ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa'i rjes su mi 'jug par phyag dar khrod 'chang ba ltar tshul 'chos pa yin/ rten cing
270b4(dkon brtsegs): 'brel par 'byung ba la mi 'jug par ri drung dang shing drung du gnas pa ltar tshul 'chos pa yin/ chos bdud rtsi'i sman mi tshol bar bkus te bor ba'i sman tshol ba ltar tshul
270b5(dkon brtsegs): 'chos pa yin te/ 'di ni lus kyi tshul 'chos pa zhes bya'o/ /de la ngag gi tshul 'chos pa gang zhe na/ che ge mo zhes bya bas kho bo shes shing che ge mo zhes bya bas kho bo mgron du
270b6(dkon brtsegs): bos te/ kho bos gang 'dod pa rnyed cing / bsti stang du byas nas rnyed/ kho bos bzang po rnyed/ kho bos mang du rnyed/ kho bos mang du thos/ kho bo tshul khrims ldan zhing dge ba'i chos
270b7(dkon brtsegs): can yin/ kho bo ni bod par 'os pa yin/ kho bo ni slar lan gdab pa'i 'os yin/ kho bo ni nus pa dang ldan zhing skal ba yod la mthu yod pa yin/ kho bo ni don rnam par nges pa
271a1(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa la mkhas pa yin/ gang che ge mo zhes bya ba kho bo la 'di skad ces smras te/ kho bos de la 'di skad smras nas tshar bcad de spobs pa med par
271a2(dkon brtsegs): byas| kho bos 'khor mgu bar byas/ kho bos legs so zhes bya ba thob/ kho bos de la bgo ba thob/ yang 'ong bar bya ba'i phyir kho bo mgron du gnyer ces bya ba ste/ 'od srung /
271a3(dkon brtsegs): nges par mi sems pa'i sems dang ldan pa las tshig 'chal ba de lta bu gang ci byung ba de thams cad ni ngag gi tshul 'chos pa ste/ mi rigs pa rnams kyi yin gyi rigs pa rnams
271a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi ma yin te/ 'di ni ngag gi tshul 'chos pa zhes bya'o/ /'od srung / de la sems kyi tshul 'chos pa gang yin zhe na/ gang sems kyis chos gos dang / bsod snyoms rnyed kyang rung
271a5(dkon brtsegs): bar yongs su rtog la/ tshig gis bdag la ci yang mi dgos so zhes zer ba dang / gang sems kyis rnyed par 'dod la 'dod pa nyung ba skad du smra ba 'di ni sems kyis tshul 'chos
271a6(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sems kyis rnyed kyang ci ma rung snyam sems/ /tshig tu bdag la ci yang dgos med smra/ /med pa'i ngo bo'i yid kyis de smras te/ /nam yang
271a7(dkon brtsegs): bde ba rnyed par 'gyur ma yin/ /sems kyis tshul 'chos bsam pas lha rnams dang / /klu dang lha mig can rnams slu bar byed/ /smras pa'i sems kyis nam yang dag mi 'gyur//
271b1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis de mkhyen to/ /'od srung / de ltar na dge slong chos ma yin pa dang ldan pa sdig pa can rnams kyi cho ga ma yin pa'i spyod yul la spyod pa 'di lta bu gang
271b2(dkon brtsegs): yin pa 'di ni sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //'od srung /
271b3(dkon brtsegs): de la dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu gang zhe na/ 'od srung / 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gdol pa ni/ rtag tu dur khrod spyod yul ba yin te/ shi ba la re ba dang / byams pa med pa'i mig gis
271b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba la lta ba dang / shi ba la dga' ba yin no/ /'od srung / de bzhin du dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu yang rtag tu mdza' bshes kyi khyim dang / slong ba ster ba'i khyim la gdu ba yin te/
271b5(dkon brtsegs): de nas rnyed pa dang bkur stis nye bar 'tsho zhing khyim pa de dag chos sam 'dul ba yang dag par 'dzin du mi 'jug pa dang / de rnyed pa'i ched du 'dris par byed kyi/ don gyi ched du
271b6(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa dang / mdza' ba'i sems med cing rtag tu rnyed pa la re ba yin te/ 'od srung / 'di ni dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu zhes bya'o/ /'od srung / 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gdol pa ni
271b7(dkon brtsegs): tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / blon po dang / khams kyi rgyal po dag dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / grong rdal gyi mi dang / yul gyi mi rnams kyis rtag tu yongs su
272a1(dkon brtsegs): spang bar bya ba'i 'os yin te/ gdol par rig nas thag ring po bas kyang ring por yongs su spang ngo / /'od srung / de bzhin du dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu
272a2(dkon brtsegs): yang | dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang ldan pa rnams kyis yongs su spong bar bya ba'i 'os yin te/
272a3(dkon brtsegs): dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu'i sdig pa'i chos kun du spyod cing tshul khrims 'chal par rig nas/ thag ring po bas kyang ring por yongs su spong ngo / /'od srung / 'di lta ste/ dper na/
272a4(dkon brtsegs): gdol pa'i kha phyis sam/ gos sam/ yongs su spyad pa de dag thams cad la ni skye bo ya rabs rnams mi reg cing yongs su mi spyod do/ /'od srung / de bzhin du dge sbyong
272a5(dkon brtsegs): gdol pa lta bu'i lhung bzed dam/ chos gos sam/ yongs su spyad pa thams cad ni mi mthun pa'i 'tsho bas yongs su btsal ba/ lus dang / sems smras pas yongs su
272a6(dkon brtsegs): btsal ba yin pas/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang ldan pa dag de la mi reg cing mi spyod do/ /'od srung / 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gdol pa ni kha phyis thogs te/
272a7(dkon brtsegs): zhum zhum por byas nas gzhan gyi khyim du 'gro'o/ /'od srung / de bzhin du dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu yang zhum zhum por byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten
272b1(dkon brtsegs): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhum zhum por byas nas 'khor gyi nang du 'gro'o/ /zhum zhum por byas nas gtsug lag khang dang / gnas khang dang / gzhan gyi khyim du 'gro'o/ /zhum zhum
272b2(dkon brtsegs): por byas nas 'gro ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal bar byed do/ /'od srung / de ltar na zhum zhum por byas pa/ sdig pa 'chab pa/ de'i spyod lam gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni
272b3(dkon brtsegs): rung ba ma yin pa las yongs su brtags pa'o/ /'od srung / 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gdol pa'i sems ni bde 'gro'i skye ba la mi gnas so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de rang
272b4(dkon brtsegs): gi las kyi nyes pa'i phyir ro/ /'od srung / de bzhin du dge sbyong gdol ba lta bu'i sems kyang bde 'gror 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir mi gnas shing / de'i 'jig rten pha rol rnam par zhig
272b5(dkon brtsegs): la| de ngan 'gro gsum du gnas par sgrib pa med de/ 'od srung / 'di ni dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu zhes ba'o/ /'od srung / de la dge sbyong rul pa gang zhe na/ 'od srung / 'di lta ste/
272b6(dkon brtsegs): dper na/ rgyal po la 'os pa'i btung ba ro mchog dang ldan pa las gang snying gu'i mchog bcus pa de'i lhag ma ni rul cing mi gtsang bar gyur pa ste/ myang bar bya ba ma yin no/ /'od srung /
272b7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du dge sbyong rul pa yang chos kyi mchog gi snying gu'i ro bro ba dang bral ba yin te/ dri nga ba dang / yongs su spang bar bya ba'i 'os yin te/ nyon mongs pa dang / g.yo sgyu 'dzin
273a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi dri mi zhim pa dang ldan zhing tshul khrims kyi dri dang bral ba yin/ nyon mongs pa'i dris bsgos pa yin te/ de
273a2(dkon brtsegs): gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang de nyid du yang bdag la phan pa'i phyir zhugs kyi/ gzhan la phan pa'i phyir ma yin te/ 'od srung / 'di ni dge sbyong rul ba zhes bya'o/ /'od
273a3(dkon brtsegs): srung | 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rul pa zhes bya ba ni gang zos pa dang / 'thungs pa dang / 'chos pa gzags pa de ni rul cing dri nga ba yin te/ skye bo ya rabs thams cad kyis
273a4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su spang bar bya ba'i 'os yin no/ /'od srung / de bzhin du dge sbyong rul pa yang gzags pa dang mtshungs te/ lus dang ngag dang sems kyi kun tu spyod pa yongs su
273a5(dkon brtsegs): ma dag pas/ 'phags pa'i skye bos yongs su spang bar bya ba yin te/ 'di ni dge sbyong rul pa zhes bya'o/ /'od srung / 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sa bon rul pa gang yin pa de ni
273a6(dkon brtsegs): sa chen po las skyer mi rung ngo / /'od srung / de bzhin du dge sbyong rul pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa 'di la mi skye zhing / 'phags pa'i chos rnam par grol ba'i sa bon
273a7(dkon brtsegs): nus pa ma yin la/ 'bras bu thob par mi 'gyur te/ 'od srung / 'di ni dge sbyong rul ba zhes bya'o/ /'od srung / de la dge sbyong za ma tog lta bu gang zhe na/ 'od srung / 'di
273b1(dkon brtsegs): lta ste/ dper na/ za ma tog phyi rol shin tu byi dor byas la/ nad mi gtsang ba sna tshogs kyis gang ba zhig yod pa de bzhin du dge sbyong za ma tog lta bu yang dge sbyong ltar bcos shing phyi
273b2(dkon brtsegs): rol gtsang sbra spyod par gyur la/ nang 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis yongs su gang ba yin te/ 'od srung / 'di ni dge sbyong za ma tog lta bu zhes bya'o/ /'od srung /
273b3(dkon brtsegs): de la dge sbyong ku ran da ka lta bu gang zhe na/ 'od srung / 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ku ran da ka zhes bya ba'i me tog ni kha dog blta na sdug la reg na rtsub pa lci ba'i sbrang ma'i dri mnam
273b4(dkon brtsegs): zhing shi la bar ka'i rtsa ba'i dri mnam ste/ mkhas pa mdzangs pa rnams ni me tog de lta bu la mi reg/ mi len/ mi snom gyi/ gang dag byis pa'i rang bzhin can du gyur pa de'i skyon mi
273b5(dkon brtsegs): shes pa de dag ni me tog de lta bu len cing snom mo/ /'od srung / de bzhin du dge sbyong ku ran da ka lta bu yang dge sbyong gi kha dog dang / gzugs dang ldan par gyur kyang mi nges pa yin/
273b6(dkon brtsegs): tshig brlang ba yin/ 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi dri mi zhim pa yin/ 'tsho ba nyams pa yin/ spyod pa nyams pa yin/ lta ba nyams pa yin te/ mdzangs pa mkhas pa rnams ni ku
273b7(dkon brtsegs): ran da ka lta bu'i dge sbyong de lta bu la sten pa'am/ snyen pa'am/ bsnyen bkur mi byed kyi/ de'i tshul rig pas thag ring po pas kyang ring por yongs su spong ngo / /gang dag byis pa'i
274a1(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin can du gyur pa de dag ni ku ran da ka lta bu'i dge sbyong de lta bu la sten cing snyen la bsnyen bkur byed de/ ku ran da ka'i me tog byis pa'i
274a2(dkon brtsegs): lag na 'dug pa bzhin du/ de dang mthun pa nyid du 'gyur te/ 'od srung / 'di ni ku ran da ka lta bu'i dge sbyong zhes bya'o/ /'od srung / de la chom rkun lta bu'i dge sbyong gang
274a3(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ 'od srung / 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi g.yon can gyi rang bzhin can rtag tu brkam pa/ chags pa'i zil gyis non pa/ bdag gi rnyed pas chog par mi 'dzin pa/ gzhan
274a4(dkon brtsegs): gyi nor la re ba drag shul can/ dbyug pa dang / mtshon cha dang / dgra cha thogs pa/ ngo tsha med pa/ snying rje med pa/ rtag tu gdug cing rab tu gdug pa'i sems dang ldan
274a5(dkon brtsegs): pa ni/ de gang gi tshe/ grong bar ram/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ yul du 'jug pa de'i tshe/ de 'di snyam du gzhan dag gi nor gyi phung po gang yin pa de
274a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag gir gyur na/ re stes snyam du sems shing / de zin du 'ong zhes mkhyun bu mkhyun bur rgyu ba yin no/ /'od srung / de bzhin du chom rkun lta bu'i dge sbyong yang rtag tu
274a7(dkon brtsegs): brkam pa/ chags pa'i zil gyis non pa/ bdag gi rnyed pas chog mi shes pa/ gzhan gyi rnyed pa la re ba yin te/ de gang gi tshe/ grong bar ram/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/
274b1(dkon brtsegs): grong rdal lam/ yul du 'jug pa de'i tshe/ de rnyed pa'i phyir 'jug gi /chos kyi phyir ma yin te/ spyod lam thams cad kyang chom rkun lta bur ston pa yin/ 'chab cing sbod
274b2(dkon brtsegs): pa yin te/ bdag dge slong gzhan gyis tshul khrims 'chal par shes na mi rung ste/ shes par gyur na/ so sor thar pa'i mdo 'don pa las bskrad par 'gyur ro/ /snyam nas rtag tu skrag
274b3(dkon brtsegs): cing rtag tu 'jigs te/ spyod lam thams cad kyang g.yos spyod pas lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dag gis chom rkun 'ong ngo / /chom rkun 'gro'o/ /chom rkun
274b4(dkon brtsegs): 'greng ngo / /chom rkun 'chag go /chom rkun 'dug go /nyal lo/ /chos gos len to/ /chom rkun grong du 'gro'o/ /grong nas 'byung ngo / /chom rkun za'o/ /chom rkun 'thung
274b5(dkon brtsegs): ngo| |chom rkun skra 'dreg go zhes rig par 'gyur ro/ /'od srung / de lta na lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za rnams kyis de'i spyod lam gang yin pa de thams cad
274b6(dkon brtsegs): rung ba ma yin la/ yongs su brtags pa ma yin par rig par 'gyur te/ rig nas kyang de la snying rje chen po skyed cing / kye ma 'di mtshar cig sdig pa can gyi dge slong 'di lta
274b7(dkon brtsegs): bu dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa nub par byed par 'gyur ro zhes 'phya zhing mi snyan par zer ro/ /tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang ldan pa
275a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams la ni lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za rnams kyang 'di dag ni bstan pa yongs su 'dzin pa'o zhes gus pa cher skyed do/ /'od srung /
275a2(dkon brtsegs): chom rkun lta bu'i dge sbyong bstan pa 'di la rab tu byung ba ni skyo ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems gcig kyang mi skyed na/ 'bras bu 'thob pa lta ci smos kyi/ de ni gnas
275a3(dkon brtsegs): med do/ /'od srung / 'di ni chom rkun lta bu'i dge sbyong zhes bya'o/ /'od srung / de la dge sbyong shin te ma gang zhe na/ 'od srung / 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'bru'i nang na gang
275a4(dkon brtsegs): dag ma smin pa dang / mi grung pa dang / 'ongs med cing 'bru 'dra ba de dag ni shin te ma zhes bya'o/ /'od srung / de bzhin du dge sbyong shin te ma yang / yang zhing mthu chung la
275a5(dkon brtsegs): bdud kyis zin pa/ bdud kyis non pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis 'phrogs pa/ rlung gi g.yengs pa lta bu ste/ 'od srung / dge sbyong shin te ma zhes bya ba de ni/ dge sbyong
275a6(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims 'chal ba/ sdig pa can rnams kyi tshig bla dwags te/ de dag ni ngas dge sbyong shin te ma zhes btags so/ /'od srung / de la dge sbyong sun par byed pa gang
275a7(dkon brtsegs): zhe na| 'od srung / 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nas kyi ljang bu phun sum tshogs pa'i nang na/ nas la gnod pa zhig skyes nas/ de ljang bu'i kha dog 'dra zhing rtags dang
275b1(dkon brtsegs): dbyibs kyang 'dra bas/ de la nas kyi bdag po de dag 'di snyam du 'di dag thams cad ni nas yin no snyam pa'i 'du shes skyed skyed pa las/ gang gi tshe nas kyi ljang bu las
275b2(dkon brtsegs): snye ma byung bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ nas la gnod pa de la nas kyi 'du shes mi 'byung ngo / /'od srung / de bzhin du dge sbyong sun par byed pa'i dge slong / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi
275b3(dkon brtsegs): nang na 'dug pa yang tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang ldan pa/ sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur pa rnams dang / kha dog dang rtags kyi dbyibs 'dra bas/ de la sbyin pa po dang /
275b4(dkon brtsegs): sbyin bdag de dag dge slong ngo snyam pa'i 'du shes skyed cing / sbyin gnas su 'du shes bskyed pa las/ de nas gal te/ mi gti mug pa/ dge sbyong ma yin la dge sbyong du
275b5(dkon brtsegs): khas 'che ba/ tshangs par spyod pa ma yin la tshangs par spyod par khas 'che ba/ nang rul cing zag pa de 'khor gyi nang nas byung ste/ shi 'phos shing 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/
275b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za lha'i mig dang ldan pa rnams kyis/ de sems can dmyal bar skye bar mthong ste/ mthong
275b7(dkon brtsegs): nas kyang mi gti mug pa 'di ni sngon dge sbyong gi kha dog dang / gzugs kyis sdig pa'i las byas pas de sems can dmyal ba chen por skyes te/ nas la gnod pa la nas
276a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi yon tan med pa ltar 'di la yang dge sbyong gi yon tan gyi 'bras bu med do/ /zhes snying rje chen po skyed de/ 'od srung / 'di ni dge sbyong sun par byed
276a2(dkon brtsegs): ba zhes bya'o/ /'od srung / de la dge sbyong ltar bcos pa gang zhe na/ 'od srung / 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ra gan chen po zhes bya ba'i lcags shig yod/ shin tu yongs su sbyang
276a3(dkon brtsegs): bar byang shing / shin tu yongs su dag par byas na/ gser 'dra bar gyur te/ 'on kyang gser gyi rin thang dang / gser gyi kha dog dang / bdar 'phro dang / srang la gzhal ba'i
276a4(dkon brtsegs): ljid 'dra ba ni ma yin no/ /'od srung / de bzhin du dge sbyong ltar bcos pa'i dge slong yang lus shin tu bkrus shing gos bzang po mdzes pa gyon la/ dge slong gi phyi rol gyi spyod
276a5(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad yongs su dag ste/ 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba dang / mdun du lta ba dang / g.yas g.yon lta ba dang / bskum pa dang / brkyang ba dang / chos gos snam sbyar dang /
276a6(dkon brtsegs): lhung bzed dang / chos gos 'dzin pa shes bzhin du spyod kyang / de 'dod chags kyis bcom pa dang / zhe sdang gis bcom pa dang / gti mug gis bcom pa dang / nyon mongs
276a7(dkon brtsegs): pas bcom pa dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur stes bcom pa dang / nga rgyal dang / che ba'i nga rgyal dang / nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal dang / nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang / mngon
276b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i nga rgyal dang / cung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang / log pa'i nga rgyal gyis bcom pa dang / nyon mongs pas 'khol ba dang / bsnyen bkur lhur len gyi/ chos lhur mi len pa dang / lus che
276b2(dkon brtsegs): bar sbyor ba la brtson gyi/ tshul khrims kyi che bar sbyor ba la mi brtson pa dang / zas dang gos lhur len gyi/ 'phags pa'i chos lhur mi len pa dang / 'jig rten pha rol du kha na ma tho bas
276b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs par mi lta ba dang / tshe 'di lhur len gyi/ tshe phyi ma lhur mi len pa dang / lus gsob dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / grags pa la rten gyi/ chos la rim gror bya ba la
276b4(dkon brtsegs): mi rten pa dang / spags pa sna tshogs kyis spags pa dang / sdig pas bsgos pa dang / khyim gyi las kyi mtha' la mngon par brtson pa dang / khyim pa dang mtshungs pa'i sems
276b5(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pas/ bde ba dag gis kyang bde zhing / sdug bsngal dag gis kyang sdug bsngal ba dang / rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro bas bcom pa yin te/ de'i dge sbyong gi cho
276b6(dkon brtsegs): ga dang / spyod lam thams cad dang / sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos thams cad ni/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig
276b7(dkon brtsegs): rten du gzhol ba yin zhing / de dge sbyong gi rin thang dang / ri ba dang / dge sbyong gi srang kha dang mi mnyam pa ste/ 'od srung / 'di ni dge sbyong ltar bcos pa zhes bya'o/ /'od
277a1(dkon brtsegs): srung | de la ci ltar na dge sbyong gzi 'phrogs pa yin zhe na/ 'od srung / 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes pa'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu
277a2(dkon brtsegs): mo gang la la zhig mi ma yin pas gzi 'phrogs par gyur na/ de dbang chung bar grags shing / mdog ngan la/ mi sdug par 'gyur te/ de ltar mdangs 'phrogs pa
277a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams la ni sman tam| gsang sngags sam/ rig sngags rnams kyis mi slon te/ de 'chi bar 'gyur ba ma gtogs par tha mar gzhan du mi 'gyur ro/ /'od srung / de
277a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du dge slong gang la la tshul khrims kyi gzi med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi gzi med pa dang / shes rab kyi gzi med pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i gzi med pa dang /
277a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i gzi med pa dang / byams pa'i gzi med pa dang / snying rje'i gzi med pa dang / dga' ba'i gzi med pa dang / btang snyoms kyi gzi
277a6(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / sbyin pa dang yang dag par sdom pa dang / nges pa'i gzi med pa dang / dge sbyong gi yon tan gyi gzi med pa dang / 'phags pa'i rigs la gnas pa'i gzi
277a7(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa'i gzi med pa dang / lus dang / ngag dang / sems yongs su dag pa'i gzi med pa 'di ni/ 'od srung / dge
277b1(dkon brtsegs): slong gzi 'phrogs pa zhes bya ba ste/ 'od srung / gzi 'phrogs pa de lta bu rnams la ni de bzhin gshegs pas sbyar ba'i sman gyis mi tshugs te/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags la mi
277b2(dkon brtsegs): sdug pa'i sman dang / zhe sdang la byams pa dang / gti mug la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / nyon mongs pa rnams la tshul bzhin yid la bya ba dang / 'du 'dzi la dben par
277b3(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba dang / 'dzin pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir dgon par gnas pa dang / gsum bsdam pa'i phyir lus dang / ngag dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / sems las
277b4(dkon brtsegs): su rung bar bya ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin yongs su dag pa'i sman de bzhin gshegs pas sbyar ba 'di lta bu 'di dag gis de la mi tshugs te/ de shi nas sems can dmyal ba nyid
277b5(dkon brtsegs): du 'gyur gyi/ de'i tha ma gzhan du mi 'gyur ro/ /gang dag yang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sman 'di lta ste/ phung po shes pa dang / khams shes pa dang / skye mched shes pa
277b6(dkon brtsegs): dang | rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa shes pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sman 'di lta bu 'di dag
277b7(dkon brtsegs): gis kyang de la mi tshugs te/ de shi nas sems can dmyal ba nyid du 'gyur gyi/ de'i tha ma gzhan du mi 'gyur ro/ /bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa lnga
278a1(dkon brtsegs): brgyas bdag cag tshul khrims yongs su ma dag bzhin du dad pas byin pa spyad par gyur na/ mi rung zhes nyams par byas te/ slar khyim du dong ngo / /
278a2(dkon brtsegs): de la dge slong gzhan dag cig 'di skad du/ dge slong che ba'i bdag nyid can rnal 'byor spyod pa 'di dag bstan pa las nyams pa ni shin tu ma legs so zhes 'phya'o/ /bcom
278a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dge slong dag /khyod 'di skad du dge slong che ba'i bdag nyid can 'di dag 'di ltar bstan pa las shin tu
278a4(dkon brtsegs): nyams pa 'di ni shin tu ma legs so zhes ma smra zhig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag /mngon par mi dga' nas/ khyim na gnas pa 'di ni dad pa can rnams kyi chos yin
278a5(dkon brtsegs): te| dge slong dad pa dang / mos pa mang ba/ 'gyod pa dang ldan pa 'di dag gis bstan pa 'di thos nas/ bdag cag tshul khrims yongs su ma dag bzhin du dad pas byin pa yongs su
278a6(dkon brtsegs): spyad na/ mi rung ngo zhes nyams par gyur to/ /'od srung / nga lung ston te/ dge slong 'di dag ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su skye bar 'gyur te/ de dag de
278a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i nyan thos thog mar 'dus pa'i grangs su chud par 'gyur ro/ /dge sbyong gdol pa lta bu'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //bam po gnyis
278b1(dkon brtsegs): pa ste tha ma/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dge slong ci lta bus zhal ta bgyi ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das
278b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung / ngas zhal ta bya bar gnang ba'i dge sbyong gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ dge slong yongs su dag pa/ 'jig rten pha rol tu kha na ma tho bas 'jigs par lta
278b3(dkon brtsegs): ba las kyi rnam par smin pa la rton pa/ mdzem pa dang ldan zhing 'gyod pa dang ldan pa dang / gang yang zag pa zad pa/ dgra bcom par gyur pa ste/ 'od srung / dge slong ma nyams pa 'di
278b4(dkon brtsegs): gnyis zhal ta byed par ngas gnang ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'od srung / legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la rigs sna tshogs las rab tu byung ba/ sems kyis mos pa sna
278b5(dkon brtsegs): tshogs dang ldan pa/ spong ba'i phyir rnal 'byor sna tshogs la gnas pa/ kha cig ni dgon pa pa zhi ba'i mal stan la mngon par dga' ba/ kha cig ni bsod snyoms pa/ kha cig ni
278b6(dkon brtsegs): grong 'dab na gnas pa/ kha cig ni 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa/ kha cig ni mang du thos pa la mngon par brtson pa/ kha cig ni chos smra ba/ kha cig ni 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ kha cig ni ma mo
278b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa/ kha cig ni grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / pho brang 'khor dag tu zhugs nas chos ston pa ste| sems can gzhan dag gi sems kyi spyod
279a1(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams bsrung dka' ba'i phyir ro/ /'od srung / de la dge slong zhal ta byed pas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad kyi sems mgu bar bya'o/ /'od
279a2(dkon brtsegs): srung | de la dge slong dgon pa pa bas mtha'i mal stan pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ dge slong zhal ta byed pas yongs su las su bsko bar mi bya'o/ /zhal ta byed pas dge slong dgon pa ba
279a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag bsrung bar bya ste/ dus ma yin par gsol ba mi bya/ dus ma yin par gtang bar mi bya'o/ /'od srung / gal te dge slong dgon pa pa la dge 'dun gyi bya bar gtogs pa slob
279a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i las res bab na/ dge slong zhal ta byed pa des las de bdag nyid kyis bya'o/ /yang na dge slong gzhan zhig bskos la las de byed du gzhug ste/ dge slong dgon pa pa la gnod
279a5(dkon brtsegs): par mi bya'o/ /'od srung / de la dge slong bsod snyoms spyod pa gang yin pa de la dge slong zhal ta byed pa des kha zas bsod pa bgo bsha' bya'o/ /'od srung / de la dge slong rnal 'byor
279a6(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa gang yin pa de dag la/ dge slong zhal ta byed pas mthun pa'i 'tshogs chas dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams sbyin par bya'o/ /dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa de sa phyogs
279a7(dkon brtsegs): gang la gnas pa'i sa phyogs der dge slong zhal ta byed pa des/ sgra chen po dang / skad drag po mi 'byung zhing / byed du yang mi gzhug go /dge slong zhal ta byed pas dge slong rnal 'byor
279b1(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa de bsrung zhing / mal cha yang sbyar bar bya'o/ /kha zas bsod pa dang / yi gar 'ong ba dang / rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa dang mthun pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba rnams sbyin par bya'o/ /
279b2(dkon brtsegs): dge slong de la dge slong 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa rton pa'i phyir gnas pa yin te| de la bdag gis rjes su mthun pa'i yo byad thams cad mang du sbyar bar bya'o snyam du
279b3(dkon brtsegs): shin tu phangs pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ /'od srung / de la dge slong mang du thos pa la mngon par brtson pa gang yin pa de dag la dge slong zhal ta byed pas lung nos shig /lhogs
279b4(dkon brtsegs): shig| kha ton gyis shig / kho bo ni khyod kyi rim gro byed pa yin gyi/ khyod ji lta ji lta bur mang du thos par gyur pa de lta de lta bur dge slong gi dge 'dun mdzes par 'gyur bar gyis shig /
279b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dug la brjod pas mdzes par gyis shig /bdag nyid kyi shes rab kyang mchog tu 'gyur bar gyis shig ces spro ba bskyed par bya'o/ /'od srung / de la dge slong zhal ta byed pas de dag
279b6(dkon brtsegs): dus ma yin par gtang bar mi bya/ las su bsko bar mi bya'o/ /dge slong zhal ta byed pa des dge slong mang du thos pa de dag bsrung bar bya'o/ /'od srung / de la chos smra ba'i dge slong gang yin
279b7(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag dge slong zhal ta byed pas las su mi bsko bar bya'o/ /grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag tu 'jug tu bcug la chos
280a1(dkon brtsegs): 'chad du gzhug go / chos nyan pa dag bsko bar bya'o/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag par bya'o/ /'bel ba'i chos kyi gtam gyi phyir/ dkyil 'khor
280a2(dkon brtsegs): du gzhag par bya'o/ /chos smra ba'i dge slong la dge slong gang dag gnod pa byed pa'i dge slong de dag dge slong zhal ta byed pas bzlog par bya'o/ /dge slong zhal ta byed pas chos smra
280a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dge slong la rtag tu bsu bar bya/ legs so zhes bya ba mang du bya'o/ /'od srung / de la dge slong gang dag 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang / ma mo 'dzin par gyur pa de dag gi gan du dge
280a4(dkon brtsegs): slong zhal ta byed pa de song la/ ji ltar na bdag rma med cing ma nyams pa dang / ji ltar na bdag ltung ba med pa'i chos kyis zhal ta bya zhes yongs su dri bar bya'o/ /de nas 'dul ba
280a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa dang / ma mo 'dzin pa'i dge slong de dag gis dge slong zhal ta byed pa de'i bsam pa rig nas/ de'i bya ba dang / 'byung ba gang yin pa dang / byed pa gang yin pa de bstan
280a6(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o/ /dge slong zhal ta byed pas 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang / ma mo 'dzin pa'i dge slong de dag la phangs bar bya ba dang / dad pa dang / gus pa dang / zhe sa rab tu bskyed par bya'o/ /
280a7(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa gang yin pa de dge slong zhal ta byed pas dus dus su dge slong gi dge 'dun la 'bul bar bya'i/ dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa bsags shing sba bar mi bya ste/ ji ltar
280b1(dkon brtsegs): rnyed pa bzhin du sbyin par bya/ ma bskul bar sbyin par bya/ gnod pa med par sbyin par bya'o/ /des 'dun pa dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / 'jigs pas 'gro bar mi bya'o/ /dge slong
280b2(dkon brtsegs): gi dge 'dun la rton par bya'i/ khyim pa'i phyogs la rton par mi bya'o/ /dge 'dun gyi bya ba la rton par bya'i/ bdag gi bya ba la rton par mi bya'o/ /dngos po gang la yang dbang bya ba'i 'du
280b3(dkon brtsegs): shes bskyed par mi bya'i/ bya ba ci tsam du chung ba yang dge 'dun gyi gros bzhin bya zhing rang dgar mi bya'o/ /dge 'dun gyi'am/ phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi'am/ mchod rten gyi yo byad
280b4(dkon brtsegs): gang ci yang rung ste/ ci lta ba bzhin du gzhag par bya ste/ dge 'dun gyi phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi dang bsre bar mi bya'o/ /phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa yang dge 'dun gyi dang bsre bar mi
280b5(dkon brtsegs): bya'o| |dge 'dun gyi dang phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa mchod rten gyi dang bsre bar mi bya'o/ /mchod rten gyi rnyed pa yang dge 'dun gyi dang / phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi dang bsre bar mi
280b6(dkon brtsegs): bya'o| |gal te phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun la brel phongs su gyur la/ dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa che bar gyur na/ dge slong zhal ta byed pas dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdus la/ gros mthun par
280b7(dkon brtsegs): bgyis te/ dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa de las phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun la shugs par bya'o/ /gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten zhig ral du gyur la/ dge 'dun gyi dang / phyogs bzhi'i
281a1(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa che bar gyur na/ dge slong zhal ta byed pas dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad bsdus la/ gros mthun par bgyis te/ 'di skad ces
281a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten 'di ni zhig ral du gyur la/ dge 'dun gyi dang / phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa ni che bar gyur na/ gal te tshe dang ldan pa rnams gnod
281a3(dkon brtsegs): pa med cing / dad pa dang ldan la/ bzod cing gnang na bdag gis dge 'dun gyi dang / phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa 'di las dngos po cung zad cig khyer te/ de bzhin gshegs
281a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mchod rten 'di bcos par bya'o zhes brjod par bya'o/ /gal te dge 'dun gyis gnang na/ dge slong zhal ta byed pa des de bzhin du bya'o/ /ci ste dge 'dun gyis ma gnang na/ dge
281a5(dkon brtsegs): slong zhal ta byed pa des sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag rnams la gsol ba thob la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gso bar bya'o/ /'od srung / gal te mchod rten gyi rnyed pa ji ltar
281a6(dkon brtsegs): mang du gyur du zin kyang / dge slong zhal ta byed pas dge 'dun dang / phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun la bshugs par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dad cing dang ba mang po dag gis mchod
281a7(dkon brtsegs): rten la phul ba ni tha na ras kyi kha tsar gcig tsam gang yin pa de yang lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod rten yin na/ rin po che'am/ rin po cher smos pa dag lta smos kyang ci dgos/ mchod
281b1(dkon brtsegs): rten la gos phul ba gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de nyid du rlung dang nyi ma dang / char pas dengs kyang bla'i/ mchod rten la phul ba'i gos dbyig gam/ dbyig gi rin
281b2(dkon brtsegs): du bsgyur bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mchod rten gyi ni rin thang cung zad kyang med la mchod rten ni cis kyang brel ba med pa'i phyir/ 'od srung / dge slong zhal ta byed pas de ltar yongs su
