281b4(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi 'du shes mi bya'o/ /'od srung / dge slong zhal ta byed pa rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa gang la la zhig gis tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang ldan pa/ spyin
281b5(dkon brtsegs): gnas rnams la sems khros sam/ dbang byed cing bsgo blag byed na/ de mi dge ba'i las des sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te mi'i 'jig rten du 'ongs na yang
281b6(dkon brtsegs): bran dang gzhan gyi las byed par 'gyur ba dang / khu tshur dang / thal lcags dang / lag cha snyems pas brdegs pa dang phrad par 'gyur ro/ /'od srung / gzhan yang dge slong zhal
281b7(dkon brtsegs): ta byed pa dge 'dun gyi bya ba las 'das te/ rang dgar dge slong rnams la dbang byed cing / bsgo ba dang / chad pas gcod pa dang / 'jigs par byed pa dang / bsdigs pa dang / dus
282a1(dkon brtsegs): ma yin par mngag pa dang / dus ma yin par bsgo ba byed na de mi dge ba'i las des nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba phur pa mang po zhes bya ba der skye bar 'gyur te/
282a2(dkon brtsegs): der skyes nas lus la lcags phur brgya stong zug cing / de dag 'bar/ rab tu 'bar la/ kun du rab tu mched cing 'bar 'gyur ro/ /des tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang
282a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa/ sbyin gnas rnams la bsdigs shing / ngag gi las gdug pa smras par gyur pa gang yin pa des/ de der skyes nas/ lce'i dbang po'i khyon dpag tshad brgya par 'gyur zhing / de'i lce'i
282a4(dkon brtsegs): dbang po de la lcags phur brgya stong rab tu 'bab cing de dag kyang 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun du rab tu 'bar la/ kun tu rab tu mchod cing 'bar te mer 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di
282a5(dkon brtsegs): ltar des bsdigs shing / ngag gi las gdug pa smras par gyur pa'i phyir ro/ /'od srung / dge slong zhal ta byed pa gang la las dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa 'dus shing 'dus pa bzhag
282a6(dkon brtsegs): ste| dus dus su mi sbyin zhing tho btsams la gtses nas sbyin pa dang / kha cig byin/ kha cig ma byin/ kha cig la byin/ kha cig la ma byin na/ de mi dge ba'i las des yi
282a7(dkon brtsegs): dwags kyi skye gnas skyag 'jim byin pa nub ces bya ba der skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de der skyes nas yi dwags gzhan gyi kha zas bslangs te/ de la bstan na de bstan pa'i tshe mig gnyis ka mi
282b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dzums par zas de la lta zhing / bkres pa dang / skom pas nyen pa'i sdug bsngal tshor ba myong gi /lo brgya stong du yang zas de ni thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /ci ste brgya la brgya
282b2(dkon brtsegs): lam na zas de thob kyang ngan skyugs dang / rnag khrag tu 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang ldan pa/ sbyin gnas rnams
282b3(dkon brtsegs): mgu bar ma byas shing / rang gi rnyed pas chog mi shes par gyur pa'i phyir ro/ /'od srung / dge slong zhal ta byed pa gang la las dge 'dun gyi'am/ phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun
282b4(dkon brtsegs): gyi'am/ mchod rten gyi tshol bar byas na/ de'i rnam par smin pa ni ngas bskal pa bgrangs pas kyang brjod kyi mi lang ngo / /'od srung / dge slong zhal ta byed pa gang la las nyes
282b5(dkon brtsegs): dmigs kyi gnas 'di lta bu 'di dag thos nas/ khro'am/ gshe'am/ gnod par sems sam/ khong khro ba skyed na/ de ni gsor mi rung ngo / /zhes ngas bshad do/ /'od srung /
282b6(dkon brtsegs): de lta bas na dam pa'i chos 'di lta bu 'di thos nas/ dge slong zhal ta byed pas lus dang / ngag dang / yid yongs su dag par bya'o/ /bdag dang gzhan bsrung bar bya'o/ /
282b7(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung / dge slong zhal ta byed pa rang gi sha la za yang bla'i/ dkon mchog gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i lhung bzed dam/ chos gos sam/ bsod snyoms sam/ na
283a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i gsos sman nam/ yo byad yongs su spyad par ni mi bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces
283a2(dkon brtsegs): gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis lhod pa rnams kyi lhod pa'i chos dang / 'dzem dogs mchis pa rnams kyi 'dzem dog gi chos rnams bka' stsal to/ /zhal ta byed
283a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o/ / //bcom ldan 'das/ dge slong dgon pa pa gang dag bdag dgon pa pa zhes mchis kyis 'che na/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci
283a4(dkon brtsegs): tsam gyis na dge slong dgon pa pa lags/ ci tsam gyis na dge slong bsod snyoms pa lags/ ci tsam gyis na dge slong phyag dar khrod pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa
283a5(dkon brtsegs): dang | bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'od srung / 'di la dge slong dgon pa pas dgon pa dang / nags tshal
283a6(dkon brtsegs): gyi gnas dang / bas mthar gnas mal bca' bar bya'o/ /chom rkun dang / gnag rdzi dang / phyug rdzi med pa/ sdigs sbrul med pa ri dwags dang / bya mang po med pa/
283a7(dkon brtsegs): sbrang bu dang / sha sbrang nyung ba/ sgra nyung ba/ ca co nyung ba de lta bu'i dgon pa bas mtha' dag tu gnas par bya'o/ /de dgon pa'i gnas de na gnas pa na/ yid la byed
283b1(dkon brtsegs): pa brgyad bskyed par bya ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ lus la mi lta bar bya ba dang / srog la mi lta bar bya ba dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta bar bya ba dang / 'du
283b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin thams cad la mi lta bar bya ba dang / dgon pa dag tu ri dwags mchi ba ltar khas blang bar bya ba dang / dgon par dgon pa'i yon tan yang dag par blangs te gnas
283b3(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba dang / chos kyi 'tsho bas 'tsho'i/ log pa'i 'tsho bas 'tsho ba ma yin par bya ba dang / zang zing dang nyon mongs nga med pa'i 'tsho bas 'tsho bar bya ba ste/ yid la bya
283b4(dkon brtsegs): ba brgyad po de dag bskyed nas/ dgon pa'i gnas su gnas par bya'o/ /de dgon pa'i gnas de na gnas pa na/ sems can thams cad la byams pa rnam pa brgyad bskyed
283b5(dkon brtsegs): par bya ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ phan pa'i byams pa dang / bde ba'i byams pa dang / gnod pa med pa'i byams pa dang / yang dag pa'i byams pa dang / tha dad pa med pa'i
283b6(dkon brtsegs): byams pa dang / zhi gnas kyi byams pa dang / chos la nges par sems pa'i byams pa dang / bsam pa yongs su dag pa'i byams pa ste/ sems can thams cad la
283b7(dkon brtsegs): byams pa brgyad po de dag bskyed par bya'o/ /de dgon pa'i gnas de na gnas pa na/ 'di ltar sems bskyed par bya ste/ 'di ltar bdag ni lam ring po nas 'dir 'ongs
284a1(dkon brtsegs): la| gcig pu gnyis su med pa ste/ legs par byas pa'am/ nyes par byas pa skul ba'i grogs ni gang yang med kyi/ lha dang / klu dang /
284a2(dkon brtsegs): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bdag gi sems kyi bsam pa shes pa dag yod de/ bdag dgon pa'i gnas na gnas la/ mi
284a3(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i sems kyi dbang du song na/ de dag dbang du 'gyur ro/ /bdag lam ring po nas 'ongs shing gcig pu gnyis su med de/ rten pa med/ bdag gi med/ yongs
284a4(dkon brtsegs): su 'dzin pa med la/ gal te 'dod pa la rnam par rtog pas rnam par rtog /gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pas rnam par rtog /'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pas rnam
284a5(dkon brtsegs): par rtog / mi dge ba gzhan la rnam par rtog pas rnam par rtog par gyur na/ bdag tu 'dzin pa dang / 'du ba la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can rnams dang
284a6(dkon brtsegs): bye brag med par 'gyur te/ bdag gis lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za rnams la bslus par 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang
284a7(dkon brtsegs): mi ma nyes par byas par 'gyur gyi/ ci nas kyang bdag la lha rnams 'phya bar mi 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang dgyes par 'gyur ba de
284b1(dkon brtsegs): ltar bya'o/ /snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o/ /de dgon pa'i gnas de na gnas pa na/ so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bsdam par bya/ tshul khrims kyi phung po shin tu kun
284b2(dkon brtsegs): bsrung bar bya/ lus dang / ngag dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / tshul 'chos pa med pa dang / kha gsag med pa dang / 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa dang / ting nge
284b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin gyi sems mngon du bya ba dang / ci ltar thos pa'i chos la rten pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la bya ba dang rab tu ldan pa dang / yid byung ba dang / 'dod chags dang
284b4(dkon brtsegs): bral ba dang / 'gog pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la gzhol ba dang / 'khor bas 'jigs skrag pa dang / phung po ni gshed ma ste/ phyir rgol bar rig pa dang / khams
284b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhi la myur du gdug pa'i dug tu 'du shes pa dang / skye mched drug la grong stong ltar mos pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar 'jug par mkhas pa dang / rtag pa dang /
284b6(dkon brtsegs): chad par lta ba yongs su spang ba dang / sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gso ba med pa dang / gang zag med par rnam par spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid la mos
284b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / mtshan ma med pa spyod yul ba dang / smon pa med pa'i sems spel ba dang / khams gsum la rtag tu 'jigs pa'i yid dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu mgo dang / gos la me 'bar pa
285a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / brtson pa mi 'dor ba dang / lus kyi skyon la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog pa dang / sems kyi skye ba dang 'jig
285a2(dkon brtsegs): pa la lta ba dang / sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa la mngon par brtson pa dang / kun 'byung ba thams cad kyi sred pa spang ba dang / 'gog pa mngon sum du bya ba la zhugs pa dang / lam
285a3(dkon brtsegs): bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa dang / phyi'i spyod yul dran pa nye bar bzhag pa la rab tu gnas pa dang / mi dge ba'i chos dang bral ba dang / dge ba'i chos la mngon du phyogs
285a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / yang dag pa'i spong ba la shin tu gnas pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa mngon du gyur pa dang / dbang po lnga dang ldan pa dang / stobs lnga'i shugs dang ldan pa dang / byang
285a5(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi yan lag bdun la bsam gtan pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mngon par brtson pa dang / zhi gnas la gnas pa dang / lhag mthong gis blta
285a6(dkon brtsegs): bar bya ste/ 'od srung / de lta bu'i go cha 'di dag bgos nas/ nam gyi cha stod dang / nam gyi cha smad la mi nyal zhing rnal 'byor la brtson pa dang / rtag tu khyad par du 'gro bar dgon
285a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gnas de la gnas par bya'o/ /de dgon pa'i gnas de na gnas pa na/ lus brgyan par sbyor ba la brtson par mi bya'o/ /mal chas brgyan pa la brtson bar mi bya'o/ /chos gos
285b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis brgyan pa la brtson par mi bya'o/ /des rtswa rnying pa skams pa blangs la 'chag sa dang / 'dug sar legs par bting ste/ bdag 'dug pa dang / dge 'dun gyi dang / phyogs bzhi'i dge
285b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dun gyi dang / ma spags pa dang / bdag gi gos kyis chog shes par dgon pa'i gnas der gnas par bya'o/ /'od srung / dge slong dgon pa gang gi tshe/ lus gso ba dang / 'phags
285b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lam nye bar brtan pa'i phyir grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal du bsod snyoms kyi phyir 'jug pa na/ des sems 'di lta bus dgon pa'i gnas de nas 'gro bar bya ste/ ma rnyed
285b4(dkon brtsegs): kyang yongs su yi chad par mi bya/ rnyed kyang dga' ba bskyed par mi bya/ las kyi rnam par smin pa yid la bya/ bsod nams nye bar brtan par bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa yid la bya ba
285b5(dkon brtsegs): bsam zhing des grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal du bsod snyoms kyi phyir 'jug par bya'o/ /de grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal du bsod snyoms spyod pa na/ chos kyi go cha bgos
285b6(dkon brtsegs): la| bsod snyoms spyad par bya'o/ /de la chos kyi go cha gang zhe na/ mig gis yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs rnams mthong na/ rjes su chags par mi bya'o/ /yid du mi 'ong ba'i gzugs
285b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams mthong yang khong khro bar mi bya'o/ /de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg yid du 'ong ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba rnams la rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro bar mi bya'o/ /
286a1(dkon brtsegs): dbang po shin tu bsdams pa dang / mig mi g.yeng ba dang / gnya' shing gang tsam du lta ba dang / dul ba dang / cang shes kyi sems dang / sngon yid la byed
286a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos mi 'dor ba dang / zang zing gis ma spags pa'i rgyud kyis bsod snyoms spyad par bya'o/ /mtha' chags su bsod snyoms blang bar bya'o/ /gang nas bsod snyoms rnyed pa der
286a3(dkon brtsegs): rjes su chags par mi bya'o/ /gang nas ma rnyed pa der yang khong khro bar mi bya'o/ /khyim bcur bslangs pa las/ khyim bcu gcig pa las bsod snyoms ma rnyed na yang yongs su yi chad
286a4(dkon brtsegs): par mi bya'o/ de 'di snyam du bram ze dang / khyim bdag 'di dag ni bya ba mang ba dag yin pas/ de dag gis bdag la sbyin par nges pa med de/ de dag bdag la sems pa yang ngo mtshar
286a5(dkon brtsegs): chen| bsod snyoms sbyin pa lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya ste/ des de ltar yongs su yi chad pa med par bsod snyoms spyad par bya'o/ /sems can gang
286a6(dkon brtsegs): dag de'i mig lam du snang bar 'gyur ba skyes pa dang bud med dang khye'u dang bu mo dang tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba de dag la yang byams pa dang / snying rje'i sems bskyed par
286a7(dkon brtsegs): bya'o| |ci nas kyang sems can gang dag bdag gi mig lam du snang bar gyur pa'am/ bsod snyoms sbyin pa de dag mtho ris su 'gro bar 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o/ /de ltar brtson
286b1(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o/ /des bsod snyoms ngan nam/ bzang yang rung blangs te/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal 'di na bdag gi bsod snyoms 'di las bgo bsha' bya dgos pa'i sems can dbul
286b2(dkon brtsegs): po su yod snyam du phyogs bzhir kun du blta bar bya'o/ /gal te sems can dbul po zhig mthong na des bsod snyoms de las bgo bsha' bya'o/ /gal te sems can dbul po ma mthong
286b3(dkon brtsegs): na| des 'di ltar gang dag bdag gi mig lam du snang bar ma gyur te/ mi snang ba'i sems can de dag la bsod snyoms kyi thog ma'i cha skal sbyin gyi/ byin nas len pa dag yongs su spyod
286b4(dkon brtsegs): cig snyam du sems bskyed la des bsod snyoms de khyer la/ dgon pa'i gnas der song la lhung bzed dang lag pa bkrus te/ dge sbyong gi spyod pa dang cho ga dang ldan pa'i spyod pa bzang pos byin
286b5(dkon brtsegs): gyis brlabs la de skyil mo krung bcas te bsod snyoms de bza' bar bya'o/ /ma chags pa dang / gnod sems med pa dang / mi brkam pa dang / ma zhen pas zas zos nas 'di snyam du lus 'di la srin bu'i
286b6(dkon brtsegs): rigs brgyad khri yod pa de dag 'di'i mthus bde bar gnas par gyur cig/ da lta ni 'di dag zang zing gis bsdu bar bya'o/ /byang chub thob nas ni chos kyis bsdu bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed
286b7(dkon brtsegs): do| |gal te yang de'i bsod snyoms ngan par gyur na de 'di snyam du sems bskyed par bya ste/ kha zas ngan pas ni bdag gi lus yang bar 'gyur/ spong pa bzang bar 'gyur/ bdag gi
287a1(dkon brtsegs): bshad gci 'byung ba nyung bar 'gyur/ bdag la dad pas byin pa chung bar 'gyur/ bdag gi lus yang ba dang sems yang bar 'gyur/ bdag rmugs pa dang
287a2(dkon brtsegs): gnyid chung bar 'gyur/ bdag 'dod chags kyi sems kyis kun dkris par mi 'gyur ro snyam du yid la bya ba 'di lta bu 'di dag bskyed par bya'o/ /gal te des bsod snyoms mang
287a3(dkon brtsegs): zhig rnyed na de yang ran pa bza' bar bya'o/ /dor ba'i chos nyid du yang bya ste/ bsod snyoms de las rdo leb gang yang rung ba'i steng du gtor la/ 'di snyam du gcan zan dang / bya'i
287a4(dkon brtsegs): tshogs gang la la zang zing gi zas 'dod pa byin nas len pa de dag/ 'di la zo zhig/ snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o/ /des zas zos nas lhung bzed dang lag pa bkrus
287a5(dkon brtsegs): te| dgon pa la brten nas gnas par bya'o/ /sngon yid la byed pa'i chos de nyid kyang mi 'dor bar bya'o/ /'od srung / gal te dge slong dgon pa pa 'bras bu ma thob pa so so'i skye
287a6(dkon brtsegs): bo'i drung du sbrul dang / gcan zan gtum po dag 'ongs na des de la 'jigs pa dang / skrag par mi bya'i/ des 'di snyam du bdag thog ma nyid nas lus dang srog bor te dgon
287a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gnas su 'ongs kyi/ 'di la bdag gis 'jigs par mi bya/ skrag par mi bya'i/ byams pa'i sems bskyed par bya/ zhe sdang rnam par spang bar bya/ 'jigs pa spang bar
287b1(dkon brtsegs): bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o/ /gal te de ltar byas nas sbrul dang / gcan zan de dag gis srog gcod cing zan yang des 'di snyam du gcan zan 'di dag la bdag gis zang zing tsam gyis
287b2(dkon brtsegs): tshim par byed mi nus kyi/ de dag gis bdag gi sha zos nas bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur la/ bdag gis kyang snying po med pa'i lus la snying po blangs par 'gyur ba ni bdag gis rnyed
287b3(dkon brtsegs): pa legs par rnyed do/ /da ni 'di dag zang zing gis bsdu bar bya'o/ /byang chub thob nas ni chos kyis bsdu bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya ste/ 'od srung / dgon pa la gnas pa'i dge
287b4(dkon brtsegs): slong gis de ltar lus dang srog la mi lta bar dgon pa la gnas par bya'o/ /gal te dgon pa'i gnas pa de na gnas pa na mi ma yin pa 'ongs na mdog sdug kyang rung mi sdug kyang rung de la
287b5(dkon brtsegs): chags par mi bya/ khong khro bar mi bya'o/ /gal te sngon sangs rgyas mthong ba'i lha dag dge slong dgon pa pa'i gan du 'ongs te dri ba yongs su 'dri na/ de la dge slong dgon pa pa des ji ltar
287b6(dkon brtsegs): thos pa bzhin du lha de dag la chos bshad par bya'o/ /ji ste lha de dag zab mo'i dri ba yongs su 'dri ste/ dge slong dgon pa pa des lan mi thebs pa lta na des nga rgyal med par byas la/
287b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces ma bslabs pa la brnyas par mi bya ste/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la lung mnos nas 'bad de khong du ma chud pa'i chos rnams khong du chud par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na dris
288a1(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad kyi lan gdab par bya'o/ /bdag ni chos nyan pa yin gyi/ khyed spobs par gyis shig ces brjod par bya ste/ 'od srung / dge slong dgon pa pas
288a2(dkon brtsegs): de ltar lha de dag la go bar bya'o/ /'od srung / gzhan yang dge slong dgon pa pa dgon pa la gnas pas/ dgon pa'i 'du shes shin tu bsgom par bya ste/ des lus 'di ni rtswa dang /
288a3(dkon brtsegs): shing dang / rtsig pa dang / bong ba dang / mig yor lta bu ste/ bdag po med pa/ bdag gi med pa/ yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'o/ /lus 'di la ni bdag dang / sems can dang /
288a4(dkon brtsegs): srog dang / gang zag med kyi/ chos 'di dag ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ste/ rgyu dang rkyen las 'byung zhing byed rgyu tshogs pa las byung ba ste/ ci nas kyang bdag gi lta bar
288a5(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa thams cad nye bar 'gyur ba de ltar bdag gis tshul bzhin so sor brtag par bya'o/ /stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos kyang rgyun mi 'chad
288a6(dkon brtsegs): par yid la bya'o snyam du de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /dgon pa'i gnas de na gnas pa des rtswa dang / shing gel pa dang / sman dang / nags tshal de dag ji ltar 'byung ba dang / ji
288a7(dkon brtsegs): ltar 'jig par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar phyi rol gyi dngos po 'di dag bdag po med pa/ bdag gi med pa/ yongs su 'dzin pa med pa de ltar g.yo ba med cing byed pa med de/
288b1(dkon brtsegs): stong bzhin du skye zhing 'jig la/ su yang de dag skye bar mi byed/ 'gog par mi byed pa'i mtshan ma bzung la/ de bzhin du lus 'di yang rtswa dang / rtsig pa dang / shing dang / bong ba dang / mig
288b2(dkon brtsegs): yor lta bu ste/ bdag po med pa/ bdag gi med pa/ yongs su 'dzin pa med pa/ g.yo ba med pa/ byed pa med pa/ rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa las 'byung gi/ rgyu dang rkyen ma tshang na mi 'byung ba
288b3(dkon brtsegs): ste| 'di la don dam par skye ba dang 'gag pa'i chos gang yang med do snyam du mtshan ma gzung bar bya'o/ /'od srung / de ltar dge slong dgon pa pas chos kyi yi dam kyi spyod pa 'di lta bus
288b4(dkon brtsegs): dgon pa la gnas par bya'o/ /de lta bu'i chos la gnas pa de nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa zhig tu myur du khyad par
288b5(dkon brtsegs): du 'gyur ro/ /gal te nyan thos kyi theg pa par gyur na ni de myur du 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro/ /ji ste de las kyi sgrib pas bsgribs te 'bras bu thob par ma gyur na yang de zag pa rnams
288b6(dkon brtsegs): la sems rnam par grol gyi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis sam/ gsum las mi 'da'o/ /gal te rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa par gyur na ni de myur ba nyid du rang byang chub thob par
288b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa par gyur na ni/ de tshe 'di nyid la mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur te/ de sgrib pa med par sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur
289a1(dkon brtsegs): ro| |sgrib pa med par sangs rgyas mthong nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /
289a2(dkon brtsegs): dgon pa pa'i le'u 'di bshad pa na/ dge slong lnga brgya len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /dgon pa pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// //'od srung /
289a3(dkon brtsegs): de la ji ltar na dge slong bsod snyoms spyod pa ma yin zhe na/ 'od srung / 'di la dge slong bsod snyoms spyod pas 'di ltar bdag bsod snyoms kyi kha zas la gnas te legs par
289a4(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung la/ bdag sngon gyi smon lam dang dam bcas pa la gnas par bya'o snyam du bslab par bya'o/ /dge slong bsod snyoms spyod pa lhag pa'i
289a5(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa dang ldan pa des mi brkam pa dang / tshul 'chos pa med pa dang / kha gsag med pa dang / mgron du 'bod pa thams cad kyi sems med pa dang / dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa
289a6(dkon brtsegs): dang ma 'bags pa dang / yid dam la brtan par bya'o/ /des kha zas bzang po rnams la ro bro ba'i 'du shes thams cad kyi thams cad du bskyed par mi bya'o/ /des 'di ltar bdag
289a7(dkon brtsegs): gis gdol pa lta bu dang / lus dang sems gtsang mar bya'i/ kha zas kyis lus gtsang mar ni mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zas bzang po ji snyed cig zos kyang de thams cad ni
289b1(dkon brtsegs): tha mar rnag tu zag go/ tha mar mi mthun no/ /tha mar dri nga ba'o/ /de lta bas na bdag gis bzang po 'dod par mi bya'o snyam du bslab par bya'o/ /de der shin tu nges par sems pa'i sems kyis
289b2(dkon brtsegs): grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal du bsod snyoms kyi phyir 'jug pa na mthar chags su bslang bar bya'o/ /des 'di ltar sems bskyed par bya ste/ bdag la skyes pa bsod snyoms ster gyi/
289b3(dkon brtsegs): bud med ni ma yin no zhe'am/ bdag la bud med bsod snyoms ster gyi skyes pa ni ma yin no zhe'am/ bdag la khye'u bsod snyoms ster gyi bu mo ni ma yin no zhe'am /bdag la bu mo
289b4(dkon brtsegs): bsod snyoms ster gyi khye'u ni ma yin no zhe'am/ bdag gis bzang po rnyed kyi ngan pa ni ma yin no zhe'am/ bdag gis bsti stang du byas nas rnyed kyi bsti stang du ma byas par ni ma
289b5(dkon brtsegs): yin no zhe'am/ bdag gis bde blag tu rnyed kyi sha thang par ma yin no zhe'am/ bdag la skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo bsu bar 'gyur ro zhe'am/ phyin ma thag
289b6(dkon brtsegs): tu sems par 'gyur ram/ bdag bstod dgos par 'gyur ram/ shin tu bsdogs pa rnyed par 'gyur ram/ bdag gis kha zas bzang po ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa rnyed par
289b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur gyi/ dbul po'i zas lta bu ngan pa ni rnyed pa ma yin no snyam du des mi dge ba'i yid la byed pa thams cad bskyed par mi bya'o/ /'di lta bu'i go cha ba go par yang bya ste/
290a1(dkon brtsegs): rnyed pa ma rnyed kyang yongs su yi chad par mi bya ba dang / ngan pa dang bzang po'i 'du shes bskyed par mi bya ba 'di ni dge slong bsod snyoms spyod pa dag gi chos nyid do//
290a2(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can phal cher ni rol brkam ste/ zas kyi phyir sdig pa'i las rnams byas nas sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye'o/ /gang dag chog shes pa dang / mi
290a3(dkon brtsegs): brkam pa/ ma zhen pa/ ro la mi gdung ba/ lce'i dbang po chog shes pa/ zas ngan don ci tsam gyis kyang 'tsho ba de dag shi 'phos te shi ba'i dus byas nas mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur/
290a4(dkon brtsegs): lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur/ lhar skyes nas bdud rtsi za bar 'gyur ro/ /'od srung / de ltar na bsod snyoms spyod pa'i dge slong gis rol srid pa bzlog
290a5(dkon brtsegs): ste| sems nges par sems pas lhag zan zhag bdun lon pa za yang yi chad par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus gso ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam gyi tshogs gsag pa'i don
290a6(dkon brtsegs): du bdag gis zas bza'o snyam pa'i phyir ro/ /'od srung / bsod snyoms spyod pa'i dge slong gis lhung bzed du 'ongs pa/ lhung bzed du chud pa/ chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyis
290a7(dkon brtsegs): rnyed pa tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa'i dge slong dag dang thun mong du byas la bza' bar bya'o/ /'od srung / gal te dge slong bsod snyoms spyod par gyur te/ nad g.yog
290b1(dkon brtsegs): med la bsod snyoms la 'jug kyang mi nus na/ des 'di snyam du bdag ni grogs med pa/ bdag ni gcig pu gnyis su med pa/ bdag ni rab tu byung ba'o/ /bdag gi grogs ni chos
290b2(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ bdag ni chos la brten pa yin la/ bdag ni mi bde zhing sdug bsngal te/ rab tu na bas de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi sman gsungs pa gang yin pa de ji ltar thos pa bzhin du
290b3(dkon brtsegs): chos de dag bdag gis tshul bzhin brtag par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o/ /'od srung / de la gang lus 'di la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog pa 'di ni tshul bzhin
290b4(dkon brtsegs): la sbyor ba'o/ /de lus 'di la skyon du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog pa na tshul bzhin la zhugs pa de sems rtse gcig tu 'gyur zhing / dran pa dang ldan la shes bzhin dang
290b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan pas bsam gtan dang po bskyed pa'i gnas gang yin pa de yod par 'gyur te/ des bsam gtan thob nas bsam gtan gyi bde ba 'dod pa na nyi ma gcig gam/ nyi ma gnyis
290b6(dkon brtsegs): sam/ nyi ma gsum nas nyi ma bdun gyi bar du bsam gtan gyi bde ba'i zas kyis gnas so/ /gal te 'di ltar rnal 'byor la zhugs pa bsam gtan bskyed par mi nus na de ltar brtson
290b7(dkon brtsegs): zhing rnal 'byor spyod pa'i dge slong chos la gnas pa de la/ mngon par shes pa mngon par shes pa'i lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dag kha zas 'bul bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe
291a1(dkon brtsegs): na| 'di ni rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams kyi rgyu mthun pa ste/ des lhas yongs su bzung ba rnyed pa'i phyir ro/ /'od srung / gal te sprin 'dus shing char bab ste/
291a2(dkon brtsegs): bsod snyoms spyod pa'i dge slong bsod snyoms la 'jug mi nus pa'i dus kyi tshe byams pa'i zas kyi go bgos te/ chos sems pa yid la byed pa la gnas nas zhag gnyis sam/ zhag
291a3(dkon brtsegs): gsum zhig zan chad na/ 'di ltar yi dwags gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa nyes par byed pa'i las byas pa gang dag lo brgyar yang mchil ma'i thal ba 'ga' tsam yang bzar mi rnyed pa
291a4(dkon brtsegs): dag kyang yod de/ de lta bas na bdag tshul bzhin du chos sems pa la gnas pas lus nyam chung ba'am/ sems nyam chung ba bskyed par mi bya ste/ bkres pa dang skom pas ji mi
291a5(dkon brtsegs): snyam par bya'o/ /'phags pa'i lam bsgom pa la brtson 'grus rgyun mi 'chad par bya'o snyam du 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ /'od srung / dge slong bsod snyoms spyod pas khyim
291a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dris pa dang / skyes pa 'dris pa dang / bud med 'dris pa dang / khye'u 'dris pa dang / bu mo 'dris par mi bya'o/ /khyim gang na bsod snyoms gtsang ma byed pa'i khyim der stan la
291a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dug ste/ bsod snyoms gtsang ma byed pa zin gyi bar du chos kyi gtam brjod par bya'o/ /de nas bsod snyoms de blangs la stan las langs te 'gro bar bya'o/ /'od srung / bsod
291b1(dkon brtsegs): snyoms spyod pa'i dge slong gis 'khod par mi bya'o/ /kha gsag mi bya'o/ /tshul bcos par mi bya'o/ /de la 'khod pa gang zhe na/ gang gzhan dag la tshig 'di skad ces smra ba ste/ bdag gi
291b2(dkon brtsegs): bsod snyoms ni ngan pa'o/ /bdag gi bsod snyoms ni rtsub pa'o/ /bdag gis sngon 'di lta bu dang / ma 'grangs par ma zos so/ /bdag gi bsod snyoms ni skye bo mang po dang thun mong du byas
291b3(dkon brtsegs): so| |bdag gis nyung zhig zos te/ bdag ma 'grangs pas lus nyam chung ngo zhes bya ba ste/ 'di ltar 'khod pa'i mtshan ma gang ci yang rung ba 'di lta bu 'di ni sems kyi tshul 'chos
291b4(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya ste/ dge slong bsod snyoms spyod pas de dag thams cad mi bya'o/ /gang lhung bzed du 'ongs pa ngan kyang rung bzang yang rung / nyung yang rung mang yang rung / gtsang yang rung mi
291b5(dkon brtsegs): gtsang yang rung ste/ de bza' bar bya'o/ /yongs su gdung ba med pa dang / bsam pa yongs su dag pa dang / chos nges par sems pa mang ba dang / lus gso ba dang / 'phags pa'i
291b6(dkon brtsegs): lam nye bar bstan pa'i phyir des bsod snyoms bza' bar bya'o/ /'od srung / gal te bsod snyoms spyod pas grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal du bsod snyoms bslangs te ma rnyed
291b7(dkon brtsegs): na| ji ltar lhung bzed bkrus pa bzhin du phyir byung na/ des de bzhin gshegs pa yid la bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams kyi gzi brjid kyis brjid pa/ 'khor los
292a1(dkon brtsegs): bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid spangs nas rab tu byung ba/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri zas mchod pa/ mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs pa/ dge ba'i chos
292a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dang ldan pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral ba/ de nyid grong du bsod snyoms kyi phyir gshegs na yang ji ltar lhung bzed bkrus pa bzhin du slar gshegs na/ bdag
292a3(dkon brtsegs): lta bu bsod nams chung ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ji ltar lhung bzed bkrus pa bzhin du phyir byung bas ci'i phyir yi chad par bya/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed
292a4(dkon brtsegs): pas kha zas bzang po dag mi rnyed pa'i phyir ro/ /gal te bdud kyi las sam/ bdud kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bram ze dang khyim bdag de dag bdag la bsod snyoms mi ster na/ ci
292a5(dkon brtsegs): nas bdud bzhi las yang dag par 'das pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o snyam du bsam mo/ /de ltar nga'i nan tan la gnas pa de la bdud
292a6(dkon brtsegs): dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur te/ 'od srung / dge slong bsod snyoms spyod pas de ltar 'phags pa'i rigs rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o//
292a7(dkon brtsegs): bsod snyoms spyod pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// //'od srung / de la dge sbyong phyag dar khrod pa pas ji lta bu'i sems kyis phyag dar khrod pa bsdu bar bya zhe na/
292b1(dkon brtsegs): ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pas g.yogs pa'i sems su bya'i/ chos gos kyis cha bar sbyor ba la brtson pa'i sems kyis ni ma yin no/ /rlung dang / nyi ma dang / sbrang bu dang / sha sbrang
292b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / sdig sbrul gyis reg par 'gyur ba yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir yin gyi/ lus brgyan pa'i phyir ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la nan tan gyis gnas
292b3(dkon brtsegs): pas gos gtsang ma la mngon par dga' ba med de/ des phyag dar gyi phung po las phyag dar khrod pa blangs la 'du shes gnyis bskyed par bya ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ chog
292b4(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i 'du shes dang / mgu sla ba'i 'du shes so/ /gzhan yang 'du shes gnyis bskyed par bya ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ nga rgyal med pa'i 'du shes dang / 'phags pa'i
292b5(dkon brtsegs): rigs la gnas pa'i 'du shes so/ /gzhan yang 'du shes gnyis bskyed par bya ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ lus brgyan pa dang / sems gtsang ba'o/ /'od srung / gal te dge
292b6(dkon brtsegs): slong phyag dar khrod pa pas phyag dar gyi phung po las phyag dar khrod len pa na/ sa phyogs de na sngon gnyen bshes su gyur pa'am/ sngon gtam 'dres pa'am/ phebs par smra ba
292b7(dkon brtsegs): de dag gis mthong na bdag la smod par 'gyur gyis dogs te/ phyag dar khrod pa de ma blangs na/ 'od srung / dge slong phyag dar khrod pa pa'i phyag dar khrod pa de lta bu ni yongs
293a1(dkon brtsegs): su dag pa ma yin no zhes ngas bshad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong phyag dar khrod pa pas rdo lta bu'i sems dang / rdo rje lta bu'i sems kyis dogs pa med
293a2(dkon brtsegs): par phyag dar khrod pa blang bar bya ba'i phyir ro/ /des phyag dar khrod pa de blangs nas legs par bkrus te/ shin tu gtsang zhing dri ma med par byas la/ tshon btsal te kha legs par
293a3(dkon brtsegs): bsgyur la/ chos gos snam sbyar la glan par bya'o/ /des phyis 'jig par mi 'gyur bar legs par glan/ legs par sbyar/ legs par btsems te bgo bar bya'o/ /'od
293a4(dkon brtsegs): srung / dge slong phyag dar khrod pa bas 'dod chags nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir mi sdug pa yid la bya ba la gnas la phyag dar khrod pa dag lus la bgo bar bya'o/ /zhe sdang nye bar
293a5(dkon brtsegs): zhi bar bya ba'i phyir byams pa'i sems kyis phyag dar khrod pa dag lus la bgo bar bya'o/ /gti mug nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la gnas te phyag dar
293a6(dkon brtsegs): khrod pa dag lus la bgo bar bya'o/ /nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la zhugs pas phyag dar khrod pa dag lus la bgo bar bya'o/ /skye
293a7(dkon brtsegs): mched drug yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir dbang po legs par bsdams te phyag dar khrod pa dag lus la bgo bar bya'o/ /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dag mgu bar bya ba'i phyir
293b1(dkon brtsegs): tshul 'chos pa med pa dang / kha gsag med par phyag dar khrod pa dag lus la bgo bar bya'o/ /'od srung / ci'i phyir phyag dar khrod pa zhes bya zhe na/ 'od srung / dper na/ phyag dar de la ni
293b2(dkon brtsegs): su yang 'dod pa mi bskyed/ su yang chags pa mi bskyed cing yongs su mi len te/ phyag dar ni dor ba'i cha'o/ /'od srung / de bzhin du phyag dar dang mtshungs par bdag gi med pa/ yongs
293b3(dkon brtsegs): su 'dzin pa med pa/ rnyed sla ba/ mod pa/ gzhan la gsol mi dgos pa/ gzhan gyi ngor blta mi dgos pa/ gzhan la rag ma las pa/ phyag dar lta bur bor ba ste/ de'i phyir phyag dar
293b4(dkon brtsegs): khrod pa| phyag dar khrod pa zhes bya'o/ /'di ni drang srong rnams kyi rigs so/ /'di ni 'phags pa rnams kyi rigs gtsang ma'o/ /'di ni 'phags pa'i rigs kyi gnas so/ /'di ni sbyangs
293b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yon tan rnams kyi ston pa'o/ /'di ni tshul khrims kyi phung po kun bsrung ba'o/ /'di ni ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po'i sgo'o/ /'di ni shes rab kyi phung po'i rten no/ /'di ni rnam par grol ba'i
293b6(dkon brtsegs): phung po 'byung ba'o/ /'di ni rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dang mthun pa ste/ 'od srung / de ltar phyag dar khrod pa ni yon tan mang ba/ skabs med pa/ go skabs med pa/
293b7(dkon brtsegs): bla gab med pa ste/ dri ma med par 'gyur zhing / khur khyer bar 'gyur ba'o/ /'od srung / dge slong phyag dar khrod pa ni gang phyag dar khrod pa'i gos kyis chog par 'dzin pa de la lha rnams
294a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /'od srung / 'di lta bu'i dus dang / 'di lta bu'i gnas yod de/ 'di ltar dge slong phyag dar khrod pa pa chos gos ngan pa 'chang
294a2(dkon brtsegs): ba bsam gtan gyi bde ba la snyoms par zhugs pa de la/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis thal mo sbyor zhing rkang pa la gtugs te phyag 'tshal bar
294a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur na/ lha gzhan phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos/ 'od srung / dge slong dag chos gos kyis cha ba la mngon par brtson gyi rnal 'byor la mi brtson pa/ lus kyi rgyan lhur
294a4(dkon brtsegs): len pa/ phyi rol gtsang sbra spyod la/ nang 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gi dri mas yongs su gang ba dag ni gos bzang po ji tsam gyon kyang / 'od srung / de dag lha rnams
294a5(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba'i gzugs ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha rnams kyis lus cha bar sbyor ba la brtson pa de dag gi sems dang sems las byung ba rnams shes te/ shes nas kyang de
294a6(dkon brtsegs): dag rgyang bsrings te yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro/ /'od srung / dge tshul skul byed mi gtsang bas sbags pa'i phyag dar khrod pa thogs nas bsod snyoms blangs te mtsho ma dros par
294a7(dkon brtsegs): song ba dang / de der song ba'i tshe mtsho mchog de na gnas pa'i lha de dag gis rgyang ring bo nas bsu ste/ rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ gtsang sbra spyod pa'i lha de dag gis
294b1(dkon brtsegs): mi gtsang bas sbags pa'i phyag dar khrod pa de bdag nyid kyis bkrus te dri ma med par byas nas bkrus pa'i chu dri ma can des rang gi lus la skud de/ skul byed kyi tshul khrims kyi yon tan
294b2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par blangs pa dang / snyoms par zhugs par shes nas mtsho de'i lha rnams yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal lo/ /kun tu rgyu rab tu bzang po zhes bya ba de gos gtsang ma bgos nas bsod
294b3(dkon brtsegs): snyoms blangs te mtsho ma dros par song ba dang / mtsho de na gnas pa'i lha de dag gis de mtsho mchog 'dir kha zas zos nas lhag ma bor na mtsho mchog mi gtsang bar byas su 'ong zhes
294b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyang grags gcig kho ra khor yug tsam gyi bar du nang du 'dar ma ster ba la ltos/ 'od srung / 'phags pa'i chos kyi yon tan sgrub pa'i khyad par dang / skul byed kyi phyag dar khrod pa
294b5(dkon brtsegs): bkrus pa'i chu dri ma can lha dag rang gi lus la skud pa dang / kun du rgyu rab tu bzang po ni 'gror yang ma ster ba la ltos/ 'od srung / de lta bas na dge slong phyag dar khrod pa pa yon tan
294b6(dkon brtsegs): gyi chos 'di lta bu 'di dag 'dod pa zhum zhum por ma gyur pa 'phags pa'i rigs la gnas pas mchod rten gyi 'du shes dang / ston pa'i 'du shes dang / bdag gi ba med cing
294b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'i 'du shes kyis lus la phyag dar khrod pa dag bgo bar bya'o/ /'di ltar yang sems kyis lus dag par 'gyur gyi/ lus kyis sems dag par ni mi
295a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ /de bas na sems dag par 'gyur bar bya'i/ /lus cha bas dag pa ni ma yin te/ sems dag pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa la tshangs
295a2(dkon brtsegs): par spyod pa zhes gsungs so/ /snyam du sems nges par bsam par bya'o/ /'od srung / de ltar na dge slong phyag dar khrod pa pas khyod dang / nga'i rjes su bslab par bya'o/ /'od srung /
295a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta bu'i dus dang / 'di lta bu'i man yod de/ 'od srung / chos gos ngan pa gyon pa/ chos gos ngan don gyis chog par 'dzin pa khyod gang du chos gos snam sbyar khri'u 'am/
295a4(dkon brtsegs): khri'i steng du bzhag ste/ khyod bla gos gyon nas 'chag sar 'chag pa'i tshe lha brgya stong phrag mang po dag der lhags nas/ 'di ni tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes
295a5(dkon brtsegs): rab kyis yongs su bsgos pa'i lus la bgo bgo ba'i chos gos so zhes khyod kyi chos gos snam sbyar de la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/ /'od srung ltos/ chos gos la yang phyag
295a6(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal bar 'gyur na lus la lta mi smos/ 'od srung / ji ltar na dge slong nga'i rjes su slob pa dag de bzhin du bsgrub par 'gyur snyam ste/ ngas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal
295a7(dkon brtsegs): srid spangs nas rab tu byung ste ka shi ba phra mo dang / du ku la'i ras dang / ko taM pa'i ras dang / ngang ris can gyi chos gos rnams spangs nas/ 'phags pa'i rigs la dga'
295b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir sha na'i ras kyi gos rnams lus la bgos so/ /'od srung / ngas khyod las dar gos ngan pa blangs te ngas khyod la sha na'i ras byin pa gang yin pa de thams cad kyang khyod nyid
295b2(dkon brtsegs): la snying brtse ba'i phyir yin gyi/ chags pa'i phyir ma yin la/ lus brgyan pa'i phyir ma yin no/ /'od srung / 'di la mi gti mug pa kha cig khyod dang nga'i rjes su mi slob cing brkam
295b3(dkon brtsegs): pa chags pa'i zil gyis gnon pa/ chos gos gsog par byed pa dang / lhung bzed gsog par byed pa/ 'jig rten gyi zang zing gsog par byed pa/ 'gron bu dang / gser dang /
295b4(dkon brtsegs): nor bu dang / 'bru gsog par byed pa/ ba glang dang / lug dang / bya gag dang / phag dang / bong bu dang / rta dang / thong shol dang / shing rta 'dren pa dag nye bar 'jog par byed
295b5(dkon brtsegs): pa| khyim pa'i las kyi mtha' spyod pa dag pas ni/ 'od srung / khyim pa dag la khyad par du 'gyur ba yod mod kyi/ mi blun po rab tu byung ba'i mtshams las 'das pa de dag la
295b6(dkon brtsegs): ni khyad par 'gyur ba gang yang med do/ /'od srung / khyim pa rnams khyad par du 'gyur ba ni dge sbyong ma yin la dge sbyong du khas 'che ba/ tshangs par spyod pa ma yin la tshangs
295b7(dkon brtsegs): par spyod par khas 'che ba/ gos ngur smrig bgos shing bya ba mang ba/ sbags pa sna tshogs kyis spags pa zas dang gos lhur len pa de dag khyim pa dag gis gos ngur smrig
296a1(dkon brtsegs): gyon par rig nas zhes dang gus pa bskyed pa dang / chos gos dang bsod snyoms kyis sdud par byed pa dang / gus par smra zhing phyag 'tshal la/ ldang bar
296a2(dkon brtsegs): byed pa ste/ 'od srung / 'di ni khyim pa de dag gi khyad par du 'gyur ba yin gyi/ de dag rab tu byung ba de dag la ni med pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag ni yongs su len
296a3(dkon brtsegs): pa la brtson pa ma yin zhing ci yang mi gsog pa'i phyir ro/ /'od srung / de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong phal cher lhung bzed dang / chos gos mang zhing snod spyad mang ba dang / rnyed
296a4(dkon brtsegs): pa mang bar 'gyur te/ de dag la bsti stang byed par 'gyur/ btsun par byed par 'gyur/ ri mo byed cing mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de sbyin
296a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / phyir sbyin pa dus dus su byed cing bya ba ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su 'dzin pa'i phyir ro/ /dge slong gang dag tshul khrims dang ldan pa dge ba'i chos can zag pa rnams
296a6(dkon brtsegs): zad par byed pa la mngon par brtson pa dang / yid byung ba mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du brtson pa/ don nyung ba/ byed pa nyung ba/ rang gi don la brtson pa 'dris
296a7(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa yongs su spangs pa dag 'byung ba de dag gi gan du ni/ de'i tshe de'i dus na su yang mi 'gro/ mi bsten cing bsnyen bkur mi byed par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na
296b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar khyim pa dag ni chags pa'i rang bzhin can tshe 'di lhur len gyi/ tshe rabs phyi ma lhur len pa ma yin pas de dag 'di snyam du dge slong de dag la ni bdag cag gi 'tsho ba med
296b2(dkon brtsegs): na| bdag cag gis ci'i phyir bsten/ ci'i phyir phyag bya/ ci'i phyir mchod/ ci'i phyir bsnyen bkur bya snyam du sems pa'i phyir ro/ /gzhan du na gang dag dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa
296b3(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa dag 'byung zhing / tshul khrims dang ldan pa dge ba'i chos can de lta bu de dag la bsten par byed/ bsnyen par byed cing bsnyen bkur byed pa
296b4(dkon brtsegs): ni ma gtogs te nyung ngo / /'od srung / chos 'di lta bu tshul dang mthun pa 'di lta bu 'di dag ni/ gang zag gnyis kyi yid du 'ong bar 'gyur te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ bden pa mthong
296b5(dkon brtsegs): zhing 'khor ba la 'jigs par lta ba dang / rnal 'byor spyod pa la brtson zhing 'bras bu thob par 'dod pa las kyi rnam par smin pa la rton pa/ chos don du gnyer zhing chos
296b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa'o/ /'od srung / mngon par mi brtson pa chos ma yin pa la lta ba/ las kyi rnam par smin pa dang 'gal ba/ 'jig rten pha rol du kha na ma tho bas 'jigs par mi lta
296b7(dkon brtsegs): ba| tshe 'di lhur len pa/ tshe rabs phyi ma lhur mi len pa thams cad kyi sgo ngas bshad par bya'o/ /'od srung / gang dag tha na thar pa dang ldan pa'i sems gcig tsam yang
297a1(dkon brtsegs): m i bskyed pa'i mi gti mug pa de dag la ni ngas 'di lta bu'i chos 'di skabs mi 'byed kyi steng du 'di lta bu'i chos 'di dag thos na bdag sgrub pa las nyams
297a2(dkon brtsegs): par rig nas smad par bya bar sems te/ 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin gyi 'di dag ni rang bzor sbyar ba'am/ bdud kyis mtho btsams nas byas pa'o zhes smra zhing /
297a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag 'di lta skye bo mang po dag log par 'dzin du 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /de dag ni bdag nyid kyang phung la gzhan kyang phung bar byed par 'gyur/ bdag kyang nyon mongs pa can
297a4(dkon brtsegs): du gyur la gzhan yang nyon mongs pa can du byed par 'gyur te/ de ltar mi gti mug pa de dag ni bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa ma yin no/ /de nas
297a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
297a6(dkon brtsegs): r dzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis dkon mchog brtsegs pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'dir nan tan snying por bgyid pa'i gang zag chos kyi dbang phyug rnams la sangs rgyas bcom ldan
297a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po gang lags pa de rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sems can gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas
297b1(dkon brtsegs): gos shing de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyis yongs su bzung ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung / de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ gang dag
297b2(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos shing de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa'i sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas kyis yongs su bzung ba yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun
297b3(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ zhi ba 'dod pa/ grol bar 'dod pa de dag gi ched du chos kyi le'u 'di
297b4(dkon brtsegs): gzung zhig/ khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba de dag kyang chos 'di la bslabs nas phung po thams cad rab tu spangs pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom
297b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das/ bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan
297b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di chos thams cad yang dag par bsdus pa zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig/ 'phags pa'i rigs sbyang
297b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yon tan gyi gnas dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / tshul khrims 'chal ba spa 'gong ba dang / rin po che brtsegs pa dang / rin po che'i phung po dang /
298a1(dkon brtsegs): rin po che bsags pa dang / rin po che'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa
298a2(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon
298a3(dkon brtsegs): par bstod do/ /'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ rin po che'i phung po'i le'u zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi
298a4(dkon brtsegs): pa rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //rgya gar skad
298a5(dkon brtsegs): du| |AR+Ya ak+Sha ya ma ti pa ri pr-i ts+tsha nA ma mahA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa blo gros mi zad pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
298a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i
298a7(dkon brtsegs): dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes tog dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
298b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po chos kyi tog dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla ba'i tog dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i tog dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
298b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po mtha' yas tog dang / bzang skyong la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa bcu drug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal la sogs pa sems dpa' dpe
298b3(dkon brtsegs): med pa bcu drug dang / byams pa la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /byang chub sems
298b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pa yang byang chub sems dpa' bya ba phrag drug cus yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te 'khor de nyid du 'dus nas 'dug par gyur to/ /
298b5(dkon brtsegs): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pa stan las langs te/ bla gros phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom
298b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog gi gdugs dang / me tog gi phur mas mchod cing bcom ldan
298b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub kyi sems byang chub kyi sems zhes bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi
299a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dang ldan pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub kyi sems gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub la ni sems sam/ sems dpa'
299a2(dkon brtsegs): ma dmigs/ mi dmigs/ dmigs par mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub las gud na yang byang chub kyi sems mi dmigs te/ byang chub ni brjod du ma mchis/ sems ni/ gzugs ma
299a3(dkon brtsegs): mchis/ bstan du ma mchis/ thog par ma mchis/ rnam par rig pa ma mchis shing sems dpa' yang mi dmigs na/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar chos 'di dag gi don rtog
299a4(dkon brtsegs): par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub ni brda'am/ gdags pa'am/ tha snyad du mi dmigs shing / byang chub las gud na byang chub
299a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi sems kyang mi dmigs la/ byang chub ni brjod du med/ sems ni gzugs med/ bstan du med/ thogs pa med/ rnam par rig pa med de/ sems dpa' yang mi dmigs so/ /
299a6(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub ni brjod du med pa ste/ byang chub ji lta bar sems kyang de bzhin no/ /sems ji lta bar byang chub kyang de bzhin no/ /byang chub dang sems ji lta bar sems
299a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /sems dpa' rnams ji lta bar 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos thams cad kyang de bzhin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na byang
299b1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i ming 'thob bo/ /chos thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i sems de ni byang chub kyi sems zhes bya'o/ /byang chub ni 'das pa dang /
299b2(dkon brtsegs): ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba ma yin te/ sems kyang de bzhin no/ /sems dpa' yang de bzhin no/ /chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i phyir 'di la ci yang rnyed pa med de/ byang chub
299b3(dkon brtsegs): kyang med/ byang chub tu gdags pa yang med/ sems can yang med/ sems can du gdags pa yang med/ nyan thos kyang med/ nyan thos su gdags pa yang med/ rang sangs rgyas kyang
299b4(dkon brtsegs): med| rang sangs rgyas su gdags pa yang med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang med/ byang chub sems dpar gdags pa yang med/ sangs rgyas kyang med/ sangs rgyas su gdags pa yang med/
299b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dus byas kyang med/ 'dus byas su gdags pa yang med/ 'dus ma byas kyang med/ 'dus ma byas su gdags pa yang ma dmigs/ mi dmigs/ dmigs par mi 'gyur mod kyi/
299b6(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu/ 'on kyang dper na/ ri rab kyi tshul du dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis yang dag par 'phags pa'i sems dang po skye ste/ de la rgyu ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /sems
299b7(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa gnyis pa ni chos thams cad kyi bya ba'i gnas kyi tshul gyis sa lta bur blta ste/ de la rgyu ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /sems bskyed pa gsum pa ni 'jigs pa med
300a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa dang / skrag pa med pa'i tshul gyis ri dwags kyi rgyal po seng ge ral pa can gyi rtsal lta bur blta ste/ de la rgyu ni bzod pa'i pha rol
300a2(dkon brtsegs): tu phyin pa'o/ /sems bskyed pa bzhi pa ni phyir mi ldog pa'i tshul gyis sred med kyi bu'i mthu dang / stobs dang / shugs dang / brtson 'grus dang / brtul ba lta bur blta ste/ de
300a3(dkon brtsegs): la rgyu ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /sems bskyed pa lnga pa ni bsod nams kyis chog mi shes pa'i tshul gyis dge ba sna tshogs kyis yang dag par 'phags pa lta bur
300a4(dkon brtsegs): blta ste/ de la rgyu ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /sems bskyed pa drug pa ni mun pa mun nag chen po sel ba'i tshul gyis nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od gsal ba lta bur blta ste/
300a5(dkon brtsegs): de la rgyu ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /sems bskyed pa bdun pa ni de da dpon mdzod chen po phyug pa ltar 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa las sgrol ba'i tshul gyis bsam pa
300a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pas legs par brgyan par blta ste/ de la rgyu ni thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /sems bskyed pa brgyad pa ni zla ba nya ba'i dkyil
300a7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor rnam par dag pa'i dpe'i tshul gyis sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa yongs su rdzogs par blta ste/ de la rgyu ni smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /sems bskyed pa
300b1(dkon brtsegs): dgu pa ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i yon tan gyi rgyan bkod pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed par blta ste/ de la rgyu ni stobs
300b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /sems bskyed pa bcu pa ni yon tan dang / ye shes dang / chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur bar dbang bskur ba thob pas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i mtshan gyi
300b3(dkon brtsegs): dpe'i tshul gyis nam mkha' dang mtshungs par blta ste/ de la rgyu ni ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa ni bcu po 'di
300b4(dkon brtsegs): dag yin te/ 'di dag dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/ /don dam par ni 'di la byang chub kyang med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang med/ byang chub kyi sems kyang
300b5(dkon brtsegs): med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dad pa'i dbang po
300b6(dkon brtsegs): sngon du 'gro ba dang / bsam pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / byams pa chen po sngon du 'gro ba dang / snying rje
300b7(dkon brtsegs): chen po sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can gyi rten sngon du 'gro ba dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po sngon du 'gro ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dod pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / thams cad mkhyen
301a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ye shes 'dod pa sngon du 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o/ /

301a3(dkon brtsegs): dag pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / ngag gi las yongs su dag pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / yid kyi las yongs su dag pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / rnam par mi 'tshe ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / ngan
301a4(dkon brtsegs): song thams cad rnam par spong ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / mi khom pa brgyad rnam par spong ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las bzla ba sngon du 'gro ba
301a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan la dgod pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa sngon du 'gro ba ste/ rigs
301a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu| byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
301a7(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rjes su chags pa spong ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / khong khro ba spong ba sngon du 'gro
301b1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / lus la mi blta ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / srog la yid mi rton pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / mos pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / byams
301b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i stobs sngon du 'gro ba dang / zab mo'i chos la bzod pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / rgya chen po la mos pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / mi shes pa bsal ba sngon du 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub
301b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
301b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad kyi bya ba ci yod snyam pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / dge ba'i lus dang ngag dang yid mngon par
301b5(dkon brtsegs): sgrub pa la rjes su yi rang ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / zhum pa med pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa bsdu ba thob par bya ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba sngon du 'gro
301b6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i dgra gdul ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad kyis dben pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can yongs su

302a1(dkon brtsegs): rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du

302a7(dkon brtsegs): pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / khams la mkhas pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / skye mched la mkhas pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /
302b1(dkon brtsegs): bden pa la mkhas pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / lta bar gyur pa thams cad bsal ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / shes rab kyi dbang po sngon du 'gro ba dang / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa sngon du
