302b6(dkon brtsegs): gyi ye shes mthong ba khong du chud pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su byang bar bya ba yongs su smin pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / dngos po ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rtog
302b7(dkon brtsegs): pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems kyi stobs nye bar bsgrub pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa yongs su thob par byed pa sngon du 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems
303a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon
303a2(dkon brtsegs): lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad sems kyi spyod pa thibs po nye bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'gro
303a3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thibs po nye bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po thibs po nye bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba
303a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang mos pa thibs po nye bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /
303a5(dkon brtsegs): mos pa thibs po nye bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa dang / khams gsum thibs po nye bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can
303a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi bsam pa dang bag la nyal ba thibs po nye bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba thibs po nye bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon
303a7(dkon brtsegs): du 'gro ba dang / sems can thams cad phung po gsum du rnam par bzhag pa thibs po nye bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / dbang po mi skyo ba'i sems can yongs su smin par
303b1(dkon brtsegs): bya ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la byang chub
303b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad gzod ma nas 'byung ba med pa sngon du 'gro ba
303b3(dkon brtsegs): dang | chos thams cad gzod ma nas mtshan nyid med pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad gzod ma nas skye ba med pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad gzod ma nas yod pa ma yin
303b4(dkon brtsegs): pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad gzod ma nas chags pa med pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad 'jug pa med pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad ldog pa med pa
303b5(dkon brtsegs): sngon du 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid sngon du 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad kyi thog ma dang bar dang tha ma mnyam pa nyid sngon du 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad
303b6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin nyid la 'jug pa rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa med pa sngon du 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos
303b7(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa bcu'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams
304a1(dkon brtsegs): cad rnam par dbye ba la shin tu rnam par brtags pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / dkar po'i chos shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / byang chub kyi
304a2(dkon brtsegs): tshogs bsags pa dpag tu med pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po yongs su bzung ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / snying rje chen po yangs pa khong du chud
304a3(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dbye ba'i rim pa shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can gyi khams dang nyon mongs pa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa sngon du
304a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la 'jug cing rjes su 'gro ba shes pa yid la byed pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas
304a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos ma 'dres pa la lhag par dmigs shing kun shes par bya ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dbang
304a6(dkon brtsegs): bskur ba'i sa thob pa sngon du 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o/ /de la pha
304a7(dkon brtsegs): rol tu phyin pa'i don gang zhe na/ spyod pa'i khyad par yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/ /ye shes zab cing rgya che ba yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i
304b1(dkon brtsegs): don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/ /'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas la chags pa med pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/ /'khor ba'i nyes pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin
304b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i don no/ /skye bo mi mkhas pa rnams khong du chud par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/ /chos kyi mdzod zad mi shes pa yang dag par ston pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no//
304b3(dkon brtsegs): sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/ /sems can gyi khams rab tu shes par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/ /
304b4(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa mnyam pa nyid rjes su rtogs pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/ /tshul khrims mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/ /bzod pa
304b5(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/ /brtson 'grus mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/ /bsam
304b6(dkon brtsegs): gtan mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par mkhas pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni pha rol
304b7(dkon brtsegs): tu phyin pa'i don no/ /chos thams cad rab tu shes par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/ /mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin
305a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i don no/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i sa yang dag par thob par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyangs pa'i don ni pha rol tu
305a2(dkon brtsegs): phyin pa'i don no/ /sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/ /byang chub kyi snying po la sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i don
305a3(dkon brtsegs): ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/ /bdud thams cad gdul bar bya ba'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/ /'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa gnyis su med par ston cing sgrol ba'i don
305a4(dkon brtsegs): ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/ /yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu 'gro ba'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/ /phas kyi rgol ba thams cad tshar bcad pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i
305a5(dkon brtsegs): don no/ /stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs
305a6(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/ /
305a7(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ba'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i
305b1(dkon brtsegs): sa dang po'i snga ltas ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gter bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis yongs su gang ba mthong ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ de la byang chub sems dpa'
305b2(dkon brtsegs): s ems dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa'i snga ltas ni gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lag mthil lta bur gyur pa la rin po che bye ba khrag
305b3(dkon brtsegs): khrig brgya stong du mas legs par brgyan pa mthong ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa gsum pa'i snga ltas ni/
305b4(dkon brtsegs): bdag nyid dpa' zhing lag cha dang go cha sra ba thogs nas phas kyi rgol ba thams cad gdul bar mthong ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
305b5(dkon brtsegs): po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa bzhi pa'i snga ltas ni/ phyogs bzhi nas rlung gi dkyil 'khor bzhis thams cad dang ldan pa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor chen po la me tog sna tshogs
305b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis mngon du 'thor ba mthong ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa lnga pa'i snga ltas ni/ rgyan thams cad kyis
305b7(dkon brtsegs): brgyan pa'i bud med kyis mgo la me tog tsam pa ka'i phreng ba 'dogs par mthong ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems
306a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i sa drug pa'i snga ltas ni/ rdzing them skas bzhi dang ldan pa gser gyi bye ma rdal ba rnyog pa med cing dang la yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su
306a2(dkon brtsegs): gang ba/ me tog ut+pa la dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar pos brgyan pa'i chu mthong ste/ de la bdag nyid rtse dga' yongs su spyod pa mthong ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ de la byang chub sems dpa'
306a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa'i snga ltas ni/ phyogs g.yas g.yon gnyis na sems can dmyal ba'i g.yang sa mthong ste/ de nas bdag nyid ma
306a4(dkon brtsegs): smas ma nyams par slar ldog pa mthong ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa'i snga ltas ni/ phrag pa gnyis
306a5(dkon brtsegs): na ri dwags kyi rgyal po seng ge ral pa can cod pan thogs pa gcan zan phra mo thams cad skrag par byed cing 'dug pa mthong ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
306a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa dgu pa'i snga ltas ni/ 'khor los bsgyur pa'i rgyal po mthong ste/ skye bo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun
306a7(dkon brtsegs): gyis bltas la mgo'i steng na rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i gdugs dkar po 'dzin pa mthong ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub
306b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i sa bcu pa'i snga ltas ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong ste/ kha dog gser lta bu 'od 'dom gang ba tshangs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing
306b2(dkon brtsegs): mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston pa mthong ste/ rigs kyi bu/ bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu pa'i snga ltas yin no/ /
306b3(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sa dang po la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gnon to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sa gnyis pa la ni tshul khrims
306b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnon to/ /sa gsum pa la ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gnon to/ /sa bzhi pa la ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnon to/ /sa lnga pa la ni bsam gtan gyi
306b5(dkon brtsegs): pha rol tu phyin pa gnon to/ /sa drug pa la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnon to/ /sa bdun pa la ni thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gnon to/ /sa brgyad pa la ni smon lam gyi
306b6(dkon brtsegs): pha rol tu phyin pa gnon to/ /sa dgu pa la ni stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnon to/ /sa bcu pa la ni ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnon to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la byang chub sems dpa'
306b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa dang po ni rin po che yang dag par 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bzung ste skye'o/ /sems bskyed pa gnyis pa ni gnas pa med pa'i
307a1(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bzung ste skye'o/ /sems bskyed pa gsum pa ni rab tu mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bzung ste skye'o/ /sems bskyed pa
307a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhi pa ni phyir mi ldog pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bzung ste skye'o/ /sems bskyed pa lnga pa ni rin po che'i me tog gi ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bzung ste skye'o/ /sems bskyed pa drug
307a3(dkon brtsegs): pa ni nyi ma'i 'od kyi gzi brjid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bzung ste skye'o/ /sems bskyed pa bdun pa ni don thams cad grub pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bzung ste skye'o/ /sems
307a4(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa brgyad pa ni da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bzung ste skye'o/ /sems bskyed pa dgu pa ni ye shes sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyis
307a5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bzung ste skye'o/ /sems bskyed pa bcu pa ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bzung nas skye ste/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
307a6(dkon brtsegs): chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa bcu'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la khyad par gyi byin gyi rlabs
307a7(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba'i gzungs skye'o/ /sa gnyis pa la ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs skye'o/ /sa gsum pa la ni rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs skye'o/ /sa bzhi pa la
307b1(dkon brtsegs): ni gdul dka' ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs skye'o/ /sa lnga pa la ni yon tan sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i gzungs skye'o/ /sa drug pa la ni ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor sgron ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs skye'o//
307b2(dkon brtsegs): sa bdun pa la ni khyad par du 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs skye'o/ /sa brgyad pa la ni rnyog pa med pa'i rtog pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs skye'o/ /sa dgu pa la sgo mtha' yas pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i
307b3(dkon brtsegs): gzungs skye'o/ /sa bcu pa la zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i gzungs skye'o/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu seng ge'i tog gi 'od zer snang ba thogs pa med pa zhes
307b4(dkon brtsegs): bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ kye ma 'di ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i nang du thams cad rdzogs shing / sangs rgyas kyi chos dang yon tan thams cad sgrub par
307b5(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa ni ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu/ de ni ji skad zer ba de bzhin te/ lha'i bu/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' rnams
307b6(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo phyir mi ldog pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su
307b7(dkon brtsegs): smin pa rnams kyi phyag rgya ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa yin te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams kyi rna lam du grag par mi 'gyur ro/ /
308a1(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa tsam gyis rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag cing sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi
308a2(dkon brtsegs): 'bral bar 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya mi zad pa mngon par bsgrub
308a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ sems can gyi bsam pa dang / spyod pa dang / sgra la 'jug pa'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ nyi ma'i tog snang ba'i gzungs dang
308a4(dkon brtsegs): mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ zla ba'i tog snang ba'i gzung dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ kun nas ldang ba thams cad rnam par gnon pa sgrub pa'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ rdo
308a5(dkon brtsegs): rje ltar sra zhing brtan pa'i ri rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ brjod du med pa'i don bstan pa la yang dag pa gzhol ba'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar
308a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ tshig dang / spyod pa dang / sgra thams cad la 'jug pa'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ nam mkha'i dkyil dri ma med par sgrub pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa'i gzungs
308a7(dkon brtsegs): dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi sku mtha' yas pa yongs su rdzogs pa sgrub pa'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ lha'i bu/ gzungs 'di dag thob pas byang chub sems
308b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su sangs rgyas kyi sku mngon par sprul nas chos ston te/ chos nyid las kyang mi g.yo la/ 'gro ba yang med/ 'ong ba yang med do/ /sems
308b2(dkon brtsegs): can rnams yongs su smin par byed kyang sems can du dmigs pa yang med do/ /chos ston kyang yi ge mnyam pa nyid la g.yo ba med do/ /'chi 'pho dang skye ba ston kyang 'pho ba yang med/
308b3(dkon brtsegs): skye ba yang med do/ /chos thams cad rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir 'du byed rnams gang du 'gro bar yang mi 'gyur/ gang nas 'ong bar yang mi 'gyur ro/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad
308b4(dkon brtsegs): pa na byang chub sems dpa' sum stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /sems can tshad med pa rnams kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
308b5(dkon brtsegs): bskyed par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag
308b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / dge slong de dag dang / lha'i bu seng ge'i tog gi 'od zer snang ba thogs pa med pa dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/
308b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ blo gros mi zad
309a1(dkon brtsegs): pas zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye
309a2(dkon brtsegs): shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba d+harma tA shI las skad gsar bcad kyis kyang zhus te gtan la phab pa// //rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya
309a3(dkon brtsegs): sap+ta shA ti kA nA nA ma pra dz+nyA pA ra mi tA ma hA yA na sU tra/ bos skad du/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdun brgya pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/
309a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal
309a5(dkon brtsegs): mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong stong tham pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
309a6(dkon brtsegs): chen po go cha chen po bgos pa sa ya thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur
309a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa dang / byams pa dang / spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang / brtson pa mi 'dor ba dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sa ya dang yang thabs gcig go /
309b1(dkon brtsegs): de nas 'jam dpal gzhol nur gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir skya rengs shar ba'i dus kyi tshe rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ de bzhin
309b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i pho brang gi sgo ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang pho brang gi sgo'i phyi rol na 'dug go / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu yang bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag
309b3(dkon brtsegs): bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir/ rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang ga la ba der song ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang
309b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA'i bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che dang / de dag thams cad dang / gzhan
309b5(dkon brtsegs): yang nyan thos chen po rnams rang rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi pho brang ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
309b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis nyan thos chen po rnams 'ongs shing lhags te 'dus par mkhyen nas/ bdag gi pho brang nas byung ste/ pho brang gi phyi rol phyogs gcig tu gdan bting ba la bzhugs so/ /
309b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod ci'i phyir zhogs pas 'ongs te de bzhin gshegs
310a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i pho brang gi sgo na 'dug/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
310a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das/ thams cad kyi thog ma nyid du 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang gi chab sgor mchis so/ /bdag ni bcom ldan 'das la blta bar 'tshal
310a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i slad du slad kyis mchis so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod de bzhin gshegs pa
310a4(dkon brtsegs): la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir thams cad kyi thog ma nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang gi sgor 'dug pa bden nam/ de skad ces bka' stsal
310a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol te/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de de lta lags/ bde bar gshegs pa/ de de ltar lags te/
310a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du/ thams cad kyi thog ma nyid du rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
310a7(dkon brtsegs): pho brang ga la ba der mchis nas phyogs gcig tu mchis so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang /
310b1(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen bkur bgyis pas ma ngoms pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du mchi ba
310b2(dkon brtsegs): de yang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi na/ ji ltar bdag gis
310b3(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba dang / ji ltar bdag phyag bgyi ba dang / ji ltar bdag bsnyen bkur bgyid pa de ltar blta bar bgyi'o/ /de ltar phyag bgyi'o/ /de ltar bsnyen bkur bgyi'o/ /de ltar na de bzhin
310b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa mthong nas bsnyen bkur bgyis pa'i bar du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi slad du de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba lags so/ /
310b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ji ltar blta/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin nyid kyi rnam pa
310b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / rnam par mi rtog pa'i rnam par de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar bgyi'o/ /de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mi skye ba'i rnam par blta ba nas dngos po ma mchis pa'i
310b7(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar bgyi'o/ /de bzhin nyid la kun nas 'byung ba ma mchis te/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar bgyi'o/ /de bzhin nyid
311a1(dkon brtsegs): ni 'byung ba yang ma lags/ 'jig pa yang ma lags te/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar bgyi'o/ /de bzhin nyid ni yul na mi gnas/ phyogs
311a2(dkon brtsegs): na mi gnas te/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar bgyi'o/ /de bzhin nyid ni 'das pa yang ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma lags/ da ltar byung ba yang ma lags te/
311a3(dkon brtsegs): de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar bya'o/ /de bzhin nyid ni gnyis kyis rab tu phye ba ma lags/ gnyis su ma mchis pas rab tu phye ba yang ma lags te/ de ltar de
311a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar bgyi'o/ /de bzhin nyid ni kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba ma lags/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba ma lags te/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs
311a5(dkon brtsegs): pa la blta bar bgyi'o/ /de bzhin nyid ni mi skye mi 'gag pa ste/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar bgyi'o/ /de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba mthong ba dang /
311a6(dkon brtsegs): phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
311a7(dkon brtsegs): to| |'jam dpal khyod kyis de ltar bltas na ci zhig mthong / 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis de ltar bltas na ci yang mthong ba ma
311b1(dkon brtsegs): mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du bdag gis chos gang la yang skye ba yang ma mthong / 'gag pa yang ma mthong ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon
311b2(dkon brtsegs): nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la de ltar mthong ba dang / de ltar bsnyen bkur byas pa gang yin pa dang / khyod kyis kyang byams
311b3(dkon brtsegs): pa chen pos sems can thams cad la nye bar gnas kyang / khyod la sems can du dmigs pa dang / sems can du mngon par zhen pa ci yang med cing / sems can thams cad
311b4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyir zhugs kyang khyod la sems can du mngon par zhen pa gang yang mi 'byung ba dang / khyod mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa'i tshul dang /
311b5(dkon brtsegs): sgyid lug pa med pa'i tshul gyis sems can thams cad kyi ched du go cha bgos pa de ni khyod dka' ba byed pa'o/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tshe
311b6(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ji skad smras pa de de bzhin te/ sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir go cha
311b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di yang bgos te/ bdag la sems can du dmigs pa'am/ sems can la mngon par zhen pa gang yang med do/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ go cha da ni ji ltar bdag gis sems
312a1(dkon brtsegs): can gyi khams bri ba'am gang bar bya zhes de ltar ma bgos so/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ yongs su brtag pa nye bar bzung ste/ gal te sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re
312a2(dkon brtsegs): na gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag so so nas nyin mtshan du chos ston te/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
312a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi bskal par bzhugs par gyur la/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos bstan pa re res sems can ji snyed btul ba de snyed kyi sems can
312a4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa re res/ chos bstan pa re res btul bar gyur du zin kyang sems can gyi khams la bri ba'am gang bar mngon pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems
312a5(dkon brtsegs): can dben pa dang / sems can sems can ma yin pa'i phyir te/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sems can gyi khams bri ba'am gang bar mi mngon no/ /de skad ces smras pa dang /
312a6(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ gal te sems can dben pa dang / sems can sems can ma
312a7(dkon brtsegs): yin pa'i phyir sems can gyi khams bri ba dang gang bar mi mngon na/ 'o na byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nas su la chos ston/ de skad ces smras pa dang /
312b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gang gi tshe sems can shin tu mi dmigs pa de'i tshe su zhig mngon par
312b2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/ su la chos bstan par bya/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar chos thams cad shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
312b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'jam dpal/ gang gi tshe chos thams cad shin tu mi dmigs pa de'i tshe ci sems can du'ang 'dogs sam/ yang
312b4(dkon brtsegs): gal te 'jam dpal khyod la 'ga' zhig sems can ji snyed yod ces de skad 'dri na de la khyod kyis ji skad bya/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de skad 'dri ba de la
312b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis 'di skad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ji snyed yod pa de snyed do zhes bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te yang sems can gyi khams ji tsam zhes 'dri na/ de skad 'dri ba de la
312b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis 'di skad du sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi tshad ci tsam pa de tsam mo zhes bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod la gal te yang la la zhig
312b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad du sems can gyi khams gang du gtogs zhes 'dri na/ de la khyed kyis ji skad bya/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de skad 'dri ba de la bdag gis
313a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad du skye ba med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang du gtogs par gtogs so zhes bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ gal
313a2(dkon brtsegs): te yang la la zhig khyod la 'di skad du sems can gyi khams ci la gnas zhes 'dri na/ de la khyod kyis ji skad bya/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de skad 'dri ba
313a3(dkon brtsegs): de la bdag gis 'di skad du skye ba med pa'i khams ci la gnas pa de la sems can gyi khams kyang gnas so zhes bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal
313a4(dkon brtsegs): khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de'i tshe ci la gnas te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang gi tshe
313a5(dkon brtsegs): bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de'i tshe mi gnas par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam
313a6(dkon brtsegs): dpal/ mi gnas pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom du yang ci yod/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang ci la'ang mi gnas pa de nyid shes rab
313a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyi
313b1(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba gang 'phel ba'am/ 'bri bar 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de'i tshe bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel ba'am/ 'bri bar 'gyur ba ci yang ma
313b2(dkon brtsegs): mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang yang chos 'ga' zhig 'phel ba'am/ 'bri ba mchis na/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/
313b3(dkon brtsegs): gang yang chos 'ga' zhig 'phel ba'i slad du'am/ 'bri ba'i slad du nye bar gnas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa ma legs pa rig par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan
313b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das/ gang so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang mi spong la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang mi len pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
313b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa ni chos gang spang ba'am/ blang bar dmigs pas chos gang la yang mi gnas pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang
313b6(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba'i skyon du yang ma mchis la/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan du yang mi mchi ba de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
313b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das/ 'di ltar 'khor ba nyid kyang mi mthong na 'khor ba'i skyon smos kyang ci 'tshal/ mya ngan las 'das pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan lta smos
314a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang ci 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang chos gang la yang blang ba'am/ gzung ba'am/ dor ba ma mchis pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
314a2(dkon brtsegs): lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das gang chos gang la yang 'grib pa'am/ 'phel ba mi dmigs pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
314a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das/ skye ba ma mchis pa la 'grib pa dang / 'phel pa ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das gang de ltar bsgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
314a4(dkon brtsegs): lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang chos gang skye ba'am/ 'gag par mi bgyid pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang chos
314a5(dkon brtsegs): gang la yang 'grib pa'am/ rgyas par mi bgyid pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang de ltar bsgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol
314a6(dkon brtsegs): tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos la yang mi smon cing nyi tshe ba la yang mi smon gyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang la
314a7(dkon brtsegs): smon pa dang / gang gis smon pa de nyid kyang ma mchis pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar bsgom na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
314b1(dkon brtsegs): pa bsgom pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa ni/ 'di ltar chos 'di dag ni mchog go/ /chos 'di dag ni tha ma'o/ /zhes bgyi bar nye bar mi
314b2(dkon brtsegs): gnas shing / chos gang dag mchog dang tha mar 'gyur ba'i chos de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa'i rigs kyi bu ni chos
314b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mi dmigs so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa ni chos gang yang mchog ce'am/ tha ma zhes mi rtog go/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
314b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das/ skye ba ma mchis pa la mchog gam/ tha ma zhes bgyi ba gang yang ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / chos thams cad kyi bar la yang
314b5(dkon brtsegs): mchog gam tha ma ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar bsgom na shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam
314b6(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'jam dpal/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams mchog ma yin nam/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/
314b7(dkon brtsegs): gzung du ma mchis pa'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni mchog lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos thams cad stong par de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs
315a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad stong par mngon par
315a2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ stong pa nyid la mchog gam tha ma zhes bgyi ba mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
315a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal/ legs so/ /legs so/ /'jam dpal/ de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa bzhin no/ /'jam dpal/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams bla na med pa ma yin nam/ 'jam dpal
315a4(dkon brtsegs): gyis gsol pa/ de de lta lags te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni bla na ma mchis pa lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar de dag la chos cung zad tsam
315a5(dkon brtsegs): yang ma mchis shing mi dmigs te/ de bas na sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag ni bla na ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang gang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams bsgrub par
315a6(dkon brtsegs): yang mi bgyid la/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams spong bar yang mi bgyid cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 'dul ba yang ma lags/ 'dzin pa'ang ma lags pa de shes rab kyi
315a7(dkon brtsegs): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang gang chos gang la yang mi sems la rnam par mi rig pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags
315b1(dkon brtsegs): so| |bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mi sems sam/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te bdag gis sangs
315b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su grub par mthong na ni bdag sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la sems lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di dag ni so
315b3(dkon brtsegs): so'i skye bo'i chos so/ /'di dag ni nyan thos kyi chos so/ /'di dag ni rang sangs rgyas kyi chos so/ /'di dag ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos so zhes chos gang la yang rnam
315b4(dkon brtsegs): par rtog pas nye bar gnas pa ma lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa'i rigs kyi bus chos de
315b5(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyang mi dmigs te/ gang la chos de dag so so'i skye bo'i chos zhes brjod pa'am/ slob pa'i chos zhes brjod pa'am/ mi slob pa'i chos zhes brjod pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
315b6(dkon brtsegs): chos zhes brjod pa'am/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes brjod pa yang mtha' las 'das pa'i chos nyid lags pas chos de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes
315b7(dkon brtsegs): su mi mthong ba'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar bsgom na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
316a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa'i rigs kyi bu ni 'di ltar 'di ni 'dod pa'i khams so/ /'di ni gzugs kyi khams so/ /'di ni gzugs med pa'i khams so
316a2(dkon brtsegs): zhes bgyi ba nas 'di ni 'gog pa'i dbyings so zhes bgyi ba'i bar du yang mi sems so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar des 'gog pa'i chos gang lags
316a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos de gang yang mi mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar sgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par rig par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang gang
316a4(dkon brtsegs): chos gang la yang phan pa'am/ gnod pa yang mi bgyid pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa ni/ sangs
316a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos rnams sbyin par bgyid pa yang ma lags/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams gcod par bgyid pa yang ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams
316a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang mi 'gog la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams mi 'thob pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags so/ /de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal
