350b6(dkon brtsegs): pa| yon tan 'byung gnas bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu gtan la phebs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon du gyur pa/ byang chub kyi snying por rab tu gzhol pa/ bdud kyi yul thams
350b7(dkon brtsegs): cad las shin tu 'das pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi gnas la rab tu gnas pa/ mi zad pa'i bstan pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po tshim par byed pa'i spobs
351a1(dkon brtsegs): pa rab tu thob pa/ mi 'jig pa seng ge'i stabs kyis 'khor thams cad gnon pa la mkhas pa/ tshig bstan pa la phyed pas don yod par bskal pa'i bar du
351a2(dkon brtsegs): lung ston pa/ gzugs kyi mtshan bzang pos legs par brgyan pa/ 'dus pa ngan pa'i tshogs pha rol rgol ba yang dag par rab tu 'joms pa/ grags pa dang brjod pa'i sgra mthon po
351a3(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bcur grags pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags te rab tu bkur ba/ sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang /
351a4(dkon brtsegs): shes rab dang / thabs dpag tu med pa las byung ba/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med par shin tu spyad pa byas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad yongs
351a5(dkon brtsegs): su shes nas so so ci rigs par chos kyi sman gtong ba/ rkyen las byung ba'i chos zab cing gting dpag dka' ba la 'jug cing mtha' dang mtha' ma yin pa dang / rtag pa dang chad
351a6(dkon brtsegs): par lta ba yongs su spangs pas dge ba dag cing dri ma med pa'i bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa shin tu yongs su dag pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
351a7(dkon brtsegs): bsdu ba dang / kun rig pa dang / rnam par rig pa'i tshul la mkhas pa/ rang gi sems la dbang bsgyur ba/ sems dpa' zhing brtan la rdo rje ltar mi phyed pa/ dad pa dang / brtson 'grus dang /
351b1(dkon brtsegs): dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab kyi stobs dang ldan pa/ stobs bcu dang / gzungs dang / smon lam la yang dag par rab tu zhugs pa/ yon tan dang / ye shes dpag tu med pa'i blo nam
351b2(dkon brtsegs): mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa rnams la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba dang / rtag tu rnam par lta ba dang / spyan ras gzigs
351b3(dkon brtsegs): dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob pa dang / seng ge dang / seng ge blo gros dang / seng ge'i stabs su 'gro ba dang / seng ge'i sgra mngon par bsgrags pa dang / mchog gi blo gros dang / rdo rje'i blo gros
351b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / rdo rje rnam par gnon pa dang / rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan dang / rdo rje'i sde dang / mi g.yo ba'i gom pas rnam par gnon pa dang / 'jig rten gsum gom pas rnam par gnon pa dang / mig
351b5(dkon brtsegs): bzang dang / pad+ma'i mig dang / pad+ma bkod pa dang / rin po che bkod pa dang / spobs pa chen po dang / mthu bo che dang / rin chen 'khar ba dang / rin chen 'byung gnas dang / lag na phyag rgya rin
351b6(dkon brtsegs): po che dang / yon tan gyi rgyal po snang dang / bkod pa'i rgyal po snang dang / bkod pa'i rgyal po dang / yid gnyis rnam par 'joms pa'i rgyal po dang / glog gi snang bas brgyan dang / nam mkha'
351b7(dkon brtsegs): mdzod dang / dbyangs snyan dang / sprin dbyangs dang / rnga sgra dang / dbyangs rnam par dag dang / rnam par dag pa'i blo gros dang / bzang skyong la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa bcu drug dang / 'jam dpal
352a1(dkon brtsegs): la sogs pa sems dpa' dpe med pa drug cu dang / spos kyi glang po che la sogs pa dag pa'i sems can sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / byams pa la sogs pa thams cad
352a2(dkon brtsegs): kyang bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha stag go/ lha'i bu bdud las rgyal dang / lha'i bu dge ba bkod dang / lha'i bu mtshams rab dang / bzang po'i rgyal
352a3(dkon brtsegs): po dang / rgyal ba dang / rgyal ba'i blo gros dang / rab tu zhi zhing dul ba'i dbang phyug dang / lha'i bu legs par sems pa dang / de dag la sogs pa thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la yang
352a4(dkon brtsegs): dag par zhugs pa'i lha'i bu stong phrag nyi shu dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha'i bu ded dpon dang / lha'i bu
352a5(dkon brtsegs): dbang phyug chen po dang / de dag dang / gzhan yang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang
352a6(dkon brtsegs): mi ma yin pa du ma dang yang thabs gcig go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das bkod pa chen po'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te/ 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis
352a7(dkon brtsegs): bltas nas chos ston te/ seng ge ltar ni sgrogs/ nyi ma ltar ni lhan ne/ zla ba ltar ni lham me/ sgron ma ltar ni 'bar/ brgya byin ltar ni lhang nge / tshangs pa ltar ni lhag ge/ rgya mtsho chen
352b1(dkon brtsegs): po'i dbus na ri rab ltar ni 'phags te/ 'khor chen po'i dbus su gshegs pas chos ston pa ni tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig
352b2(dkon brtsegs): 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam
352b3(dkon brtsegs): par dag pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo las brtsams nas/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa la spyod par 'gyur bar
352b4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rab tu ston to/ /yang de'i tshe shar phyogs logs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams legs par sprul pa zhes bya ba de
352b5(dkon brtsegs): n a| de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su dag par rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston pa
352b6(dkon brtsegs): de'i gan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug tu na rin po che zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong dang lhan cig tu lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za
352b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa brgya stong mang pos yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ 'jig rten gyi khams
353a1(dkon brtsegs): legs par sprul pa de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir gnas par gyur to/ /de tshangs pa'i 'jig rten de nyid du 'dug nas/ rin
353a2(dkon brtsegs): po che'i gdugs gcig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams khebs par byas te/ me tog kha dog du ma/ kha dog sna tshogs dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i

353a4(dkon brtsegs): shing / /brtul zhugs brten pas byang chub rab bsgrubs pa/ /drang srong chen po shAka thub sus mthong ba/ /lha mi rnams kyi rnyed pa legs par rnyed/ /gang+gA'i bye snyed byang chub sems
353a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' mang / /brtson 'grus dag gi stobs kyis phyir bor te/ /stong phrag bye ba'i bdud rnams rab btul bas/ /byang chub rdul bral mya ngan med pa thob/ /'gro ba kun gyi gtso bor bsnyen
353a6(dkon brtsegs): bkur bar/ /shar phyogs logs kyi mchog gi 'jig rten khams/ /legs par sprul nas spyod pa yongs dag pa'i/ /rgyal ba'i thad nas bdag ni 'dir mchis so/ /su dag chos kyi
353a7(dkon brtsegs): gtam rnams nyan pa dang / /phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' blta ba dang / /rkang gnyis gtso bo de yang blta 'dod pa/ /de dag bya rgod phung por myur du shog /'dren pa mthong
353b1(dkon brtsegs): ba shin tu rnyed par dka'/ /zhi ba'i chos kyang thos par shin tu dka'/ /dal 'byor mir skye shin tu rnyed par dka'/ /tshul khrims dad pa'ang rtag tu rnyed par dka'/ /'jig rten rnam par 'dren
353b2(dkon brtsegs): pa bzhugs bzhin du/ /bde 'dod gang zhig bsod nams mi byed na/ /mya ngan 'das nas de ni ci bya yi/ /da ni rgyal pa'i drung der 'dong par bya/ /gang dag ngan 'gro thams cad spangs nas
353b3(dkon brtsegs): ni| |lha mi'i nang du bde ba 'thob pa dang / /mya ngan 'das thob bde bar 'gyur 'dod pa/ /mtshungs med de yi gan du de dag deng / /de ni sman pa'i rgyal po bdud rtsi sbyin/ /de ni ded dpon
353b4(dkon brtsegs): mchog gi lam mtshon pa/ /de ni chos rgyal rin chen dam pa 'chang / /de ni sems can kun gyi rten dang dpung / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po ches
353b5(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad pa mngon par sgrub pa 'di dag smras pas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang dbyangs kyis go bar gyur/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus kyang tshigs

354a3(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas te/ nga la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag kyang blta ba'i phyir/

354b1(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du 'dug nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /shA ri'i bu/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams go bar byas nas/ sems

357a3(dkon brtsegs): byed ce na/ gang chos smra bar 'gyur ba de dag la ni sbyin/ gang chos ma yin pa smra bar 'gyur ba de dag la ni mi sbyin no snyam du de ltar sems mi skyed de/ de chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid

357a5(dkon brtsegs): ste| bye brag med pas sbyin pa sbyin pa 'di ni chos tha dad pa ma yin pa zhes bya'o/ /de la ji ltar na yongs su bsngo ba tha dad du mi byed ce na/ gang sbyin pa byin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de brgya
357a6(dkon brtsegs): byin thob par mi bsngo/ tshangs pa thob par ma yin/ rgyal po'i srid dang / tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / gzugs dang / longs spyod dang / dbang phyug dang / g.yog 'dod
357a7(dkon brtsegs): par ma yin/ srid pa'i 'gro ba thams cad du 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba'i skye gnas rnams su dge ba'i rtsa ba de yongs su mi bsngo/ nyan thos kyi theg par ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
357b1(dkon brtsegs): theg par ma yin te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las gzhan du mi bsngo ba 'di ni bsngo ba tha dad pa ma yin pa zhes bya'o/ /de la ji ltar na sbyin pa
357b2(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa na bsam pa tha dad du mi byed ce na/ bsam pa mnyam pa/ sbyor ba mnyam pa/ rnam par smin pa la mi re ba/ pha rol la byas pa'i lan re ba med pa/ g.yo med pa dang / sgyu med pas sems
357b3(dkon brtsegs): thag pa nas shin tu yongs su btang ba'i blo/ sems 'gyod pa med pa/ gnas gsum du dad pa thob ste/ sbyin no snyam pa dang / sbyin par byed pa dang / byin nas dad par rab tu thob pa 'di ni
357b4(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa tha dad pa ma yin pa zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa sbyin pa ni tha dad pa 'di bzhi mi byed de/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams sbyin
357b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i yongs su dag pa'i rkang pa dang po'o/ /de lta ba brgyad yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ brgyad po dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag tu lta ba yongs su dag
357b6(dkon brtsegs): par sbyin pa sbyin pa dang / de bzhin du sems can du lta ba dang / srog tu lta ba dang / gang zag tu lta ba dang / chad par lta ba dang / rtag par lta ba dang / 'byung bar lta ba dang / 'jig par lta ba
357b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa ste/ lta ba brgyad po de dag yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin bar byed do/ /de bag la nyal ba bzhi yongs su spangs nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ so so'i skye
358a1(dkon brtsegs): bo'i chos kyi bag la nyal dang / nyan thos kyi chos kyi bag la nyal dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bag la nyal dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i bag la
358a2(dkon brtsegs): te| bag la nyal ba bzhi po de dag yongs su spangs nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed do/ /de 'du shes bzhi yongs su spangs nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rtag par 'du
358a3(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / bde bar 'du shes pa dang / gtsang bar 'du shes pa dang / bdag tu 'du shes pa ste/ 'du shes bzhi po de dag yongs su spangs nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed do/ /de rnam
358a4(dkon brtsegs): pa bzhi yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin par byed/ bzhi gang zhe na/ lus yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / bsam pa yongs
358a5(dkon brtsegs): su dag pa ste/ rnam pa bzhi po de dag yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin par byed do/ /de chags pa gsum las shin tu 'das nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ gsum gang zhe na/ rnam
358a6(dkon brtsegs): par smin pa la chags pa dang / 'gyod pa la chags pa dang / theg pa dman par bsngo ba la chags pa ste/ gsum po de dag las shin tu 'das nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed do/ /de 'jigs
358a7(dkon brtsegs): pa gsum las shin tu 'das nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ gsum gang zhe na/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal gyi 'jigs pa dang / rlom sems kyi 'jigs pa dang / bdud kyi las kyi 'jigs
358b1(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/ gsum po de dag las shin tu 'das nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed do/ /de rgya bzhis btab nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ nang stong pa nyid kyi rgyas btab pa dang / phyi
358b2(dkon brtsegs): stong pa nyid kyi rgyas btab pa dang / sems can stong pa nyid kyi rgyas btab pa dang / byang chub stong pa nyid kyi rgyas btab pa ste/ rgya bzhi po de dag gis btab nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed do/ /de
358b3(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus rtsom pa bzhi dang mi 'bral bar sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
358b4(dkon brtsegs): cad yongs su bsgrub pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba'i brtson
358b5(dkon brtsegs): 'grus rtsom pa ste/ brtson 'grus rtsom pa bzhi po de dag dang ma bral bar sbyin pa sbyin par byed do/ /de dran pa bzhi dang mi 'bral bar sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi
358b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dran pa dang / sangs rgyas mthong ba dran pa dang / byams pa chen po dran pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spong ba dran pa ste/ dran pa bzhi po de dag dang ma bral bar sbyin
358b7(dkon brtsegs): pa sbyin par byed do/ /de 'khor gsum yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ gsum gang zhe na/ bdag gi 'khor yongs su dag pa dang / sems can gyi 'khor yongs su dag pa
359a1(dkon brtsegs): dang | byang chub kyi 'khor yongs su dag pa ste/ 'khor gsum po de dag yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin par byed do/ /de shes pa yongs su dag pa
359a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhis yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / sems can gyi bsam pa tshim par byed pa shes pa yongs su dag pa dang /
359a3(dkon brtsegs): sgyu ma'i chos su so sor rtog pa yongs su dag pa dang / bsngo ba la so sor rtog pa shes pa yongs su dag pa ste/ shes pa yongs su dag pa bzhi po de dag gis yongs su dag par
359a4(dkon brtsegs): sbyin par byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu'i chos la zhugs pa de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa shin tu yongs su dag par 'gyur te/
359a5(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
359a6(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa ni rnam pa gcig ste/ rnam pa gcig gang zhe na/
359a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems/ mnyam pa med pa'i sems/ thun mong ma yin pa'i sems/ 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las mchog tu bye brag tu 'phags pa'i sems/ nyan
359b1(dkon brtsegs): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i sems/ bdud thams cad 'dul ba'i sems/ las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad yongs su zad par byed pa'i sems/
359b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad sgrol ba'i sems/ yon tan rin po che dpag tu med pa thams cad kyi sems de nyid mi 'dor zhing bsrung ba dang / spong ba dang / mi brjed pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di
359b3(dkon brtsegs): ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa gcig go / rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
359b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa gnyis te/ rnam pa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la 'od zer thogs pa med pa dang / sems can de dag
359b5(dkon brtsegs): kyang byang chub kyi bsam pa'i tshul khrims la 'dzud pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa gnyis so/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag
359b6(dkon brtsegs): pa rnam pa gsum ste/ rnam pa gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus kyi gnod pa thams cad bsal nas lus yongs su dag pa dang / kha gsag dang / gzhog slong dang / ngag gi skyon
359b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad bsal bas ngag yongs su dag pa dang / 'dod pa dang / gnod sems dang / rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa bsal bas sems yongs su dag pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa
360a1(dkon brtsegs): gsum mo/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa bzhi ste/ rnam pa bzhi gang zhe
360a2(dkon brtsegs): na| 'di lta ste/ bslab pa yang dag par 'dzin pa dang / bslab pa yang dag par bzung ba ma nyams pa dang / sems can tshul khrims 'chal ba yongs su smin par byed pa
360a3(dkon brtsegs): dang | tshul khrims dang ldan pa la ston pa bzhin du gus par byed pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa bzhi'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa
360a4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa rnam pa lnga ste/ rnam pa lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag la mi bstod pa dang / gzhan la mi smod pa dang / ma bslabs pa la mi brnyes pa dang / nyan thos kyi sems
360a5(dkon brtsegs): la mi re ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa mi 'dod pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa lnga'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam
360a6(dkon brtsegs): pa drug ste/ rnam pa drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bslab pa las mi 'da' bas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims la 'gyod pa med pas chos rjes su dran pa dang / sangs
360a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi bslab pa la lta bas dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su spong bas gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / skye ba thams cad la mi gnas pas tshul
360b1(dkon brtsegs): khrims rjes su dran pa dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pas lha rjes su dran pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa drug go /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi
360b2(dkon brtsegs): pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa bdun te/ rnam pa bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mngon par dad pa dang / bdag nyid dbang du byas te ngo tsha
360b3(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad mngon sum du byas te khrel yod pa dang / nga rgyal med pas gus pa dang / bdag dang gzhan la gdung ba med pas nges pa dang / 'jig rten pha rol tu kha na
360b4(dkon brtsegs): ma tho ba la 'jigs par lta bas rnam par 'tshe ba med pa dang / sems kyi yongs su gdung ba nye bar zhi bas khon du mi 'dzin pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa bdun no/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i
360b5(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa brgyad de/ rnam pa brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ zang zing med pa'i sems kyis tshul mi 'chos pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa
360b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad 'dor bas kha gsag med pa dang / rang bzhin gyis chog shes pas thob kyis 'jal ba mi byed pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad bsnyungs pas 'phags pa'i rigs yang
360b7(dkon brtsegs): dag par 'dzin pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / dgon pa la gnas pa rjes su mi gtong bas lus la mi lta ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pas srog la mi lta ba dang / 'du 'dzi spong bas
361a1(dkon brtsegs): gcig pu na dga' ba dang / khams gsum thams cad kyis 'jigs pas chos kyi dga' ba la mos pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa brgyad do/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub
361a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa dgu ste/ rnam pa dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ kun nas mnar sems kyi dngos po dgu po rnams 'dul ba
361a3(dkon brtsegs): dang | sems can gyi gnas dgu po rnams las shin tu 'da' ba dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po rnams kyi rtsa ba yongs su spyod pa dang / yongs su gdung ba
361a4(dkon brtsegs): med pas sems zhi ba dang / sems las su rung bas zhi gnas kyi tshogs kun du tshol ba dang / cho ga dang / tshul khrims dang / lta ba nyams pa las shin tu 'das pas mi lhod pa dang / theg
361a5(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po yongs su rdzogs pas sems can thams cad la mi slu ba dang / tshul khrims la skyon med pas shin tu mthar thug pa dang / yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pas sems phyed pa ste /
361a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni rnam pa dgu'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa bcu ste/ rnam pa bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus kyi
361a7(dkon brtsegs): las rnam pa gsum yongs su dag pa dang / ngag gi las rnam pa bzhi yongs su dag pa dang / yid kyi las rnam pa gsum yongs su dan/ pa dang / g.yo sgyu dang bral te drang zhing tshul 'chos
361b1(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa dang / bslab pa thams cad dang mi 'gal ba dang phan par sbyor ba'i dngos po'i sngon du 'gro bas rjes su ston pa dang / dul zhing cang shes kyi sa'i phyir sems
361b2(dkon brtsegs): dmu rgod ma yin pa dang / bdag nyid byed pas sems can thams cad kyi slob mar gyur pa dang / nga rgyal med pas sbyin pa'i gnas rnams la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal ba dang / srog gi dbang
361b3(dkon brtsegs): por chos mdun du byed kyi/ 'jig rten gyi zang zing mdun du mi byed pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa bcu'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
361b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa gnyis te/ rnam pa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mtshan ma dang bcas shing 'bad pa dang bcas pa'i tshul khrims ni srog gi phyir yang mi 'bral ba dang / mtshan
361b5(dkon brtsegs): ma med pa dang lhun gyis grub pa'i tshul khrims ni chos thams cad la sgro mi 'dogs par slob pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa gnyis so/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul
361b6(dkon brtsegs): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nang rnam par dag pas skye mched rnam par dag pa dang / phyi rnam par dag pas yul
361b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad spangs pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
362a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyis byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pas tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid de/ gnyis
362a2(dkon brtsegs): po de dag go / rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i pha
362a3(dkon brtsegs): rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni ngag yongs su dag pas 'di ltar gshe yang slar mi gshe'o/ /lus yongs su dag
362a4(dkon brtsegs): pas brdegs kyang slar mi brdeg go / sems yongs su dag pas khros kyang slar mi khro'o/ /lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pas 'tshig par byas kyang slar mi 'tshig go /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan
362a5(dkon brtsegs): yang byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can la blta ba'i phyir/ gzhan gyis ngan du smras sam/ ngan du brjod pa'i tshig gi lam thos kyang mi gshe'o/ /'jig rten pha rol la blta ba'i
362a6(dkon brtsegs): phyir| lag pa dang / bong ba dang / dbyug pas brdeg kyang khong khro bar mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kun du bsrung ba'i phyir/ yan lag dang / nying lag bcad kyang / khong khro bar mi 'gyur ro/ /
362a7(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni bsdu ba'i dngos po yongs su 'dzin pa'i phyir slong ba la mi gshe'o/ /byang chub kyi lam gyis nye bar bstan pa'i phyir/ de dag la
362b1(dkon brtsegs): byams pa nye bar sgrub po/ /smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir de dag la snying rje skyed do/ /bdud kyi las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir/ gang slong yang de la phan par
362b2(dkon brtsegs): sems shing snying rje chen po dang ldan te/ byang chub kyi yan lag tu nges par sbyin par byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su rdzogs par
362b3(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing bzod do/ /stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir byang chub rjes su dran zhing bzod do/ /dus gsum la chags pa med pa'i ye shes mthong
362b4(dkon brtsegs): ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ye shes rjes su dran zhing bzod do/ /byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir phan par 'dod pa rjes su dran zhing bzod do/ /snying rje chen
362b5(dkon brtsegs): po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'bras bu yod pa rnam par gnon pa rjes su dran zhing bzod do/ /mi 'jigs pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir seng ge bsgyings pa rjes su dran zhing
362b6(dkon brtsegs): bzod do/ /sems can thams cad la 'dud pa'i phyir spyi gtsug bltar mi snang ba rjes su dran zhing bzod do/ /'jig rten thams cad kyis zil gyis mi gnon pa'i phyir/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang
362b7(dkon brtsegs): po rjes su dran zhing bzod do/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes myang ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa rjes su dran zhing bzod do/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i
363a1(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa ni stobs gnyis kyis yongs su dag par 'gyur te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ so sor rtog pa'i stobs dang / bsgom pa'i stobs so/ /de
363a2(dkon brtsegs): la gang lus dang sems la gnas te/ bzod pa ni so sor rtog pa'i stobs so/ /gang chos thams cad la gnas te bzod pa ni bsgom pa'i stobs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang byang
363a3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa ni gang sems can thams cad la bdag med pas bzod cing / chos thams cad la bden par bzod de/ gang
363a4(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad la mi bzod pa de ni bzod pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di la don dam par gang bzod pa'am/ mi bzod pa'i chos gang yang med de/ gang chos thams
363a5(dkon brtsegs): cad khas mi len pa de'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa ste/ chos khas len pa la ni bzod pa yongs su dag pa gang yang med do/ /gang chos thams cad la zhum pa med pa ni bzod pa yongs
363a6(dkon brtsegs): su dag pa ste/ zhum pa la ni bzod pa yongs su dag pa gang yang med do/ /gang chos thams cad mi 'dzin pa de ni bzod pa yongs su dag pa ste/ 'dzin pa la ni bzod pa yongs su dag pa
363a7(dkon brtsegs): gang yang med de/ /gang la bdag med pa dang / sems can med pa dang / chos med pa ni bzod pa yongs su dag pa ste/ bdag dang / sems can dang / chos la gnas pa la ni bzod pa
363b1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa gang yang med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
363b2(dkon brtsegs): lus rnam par 'phrul pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du bzod pa yongs su dag pa ste/ gnyis po de dag go /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i
363b3(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems
363b4(dkon brtsegs): mi gtong ba dang / dgos pa dang dgos pa ma yin pa la zhum pa med pa dang / rtsom pas mi ngal ba dge ba'i rtsa ba gsog pa la mi zhen pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag las phyir mi ldog pa'i chos
363b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yongs su tshol ba la brtson pa/ chos thams cad ston par brtson pa/ chos thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa la spro ba/ mchod sbyin chen po las sgrol ba/ sems can rnams yongs su
363b6(dkon brtsegs): smin par byed pa la yongs su mi skyo ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par sbyong ba/ theg pa dman pa las shin tu 'da' ba/ sngon dam bcas pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ sbyin pa dang / tshul
363b7(dkon brtsegs): khrims dang / thos pa'i tshogs bsags pa/ sngon gyi bsod nams bsags pa chud mi gzon pa/ nga rgyal med pas sems can thams cad la rim gror bya'o cog byed pa ste/ 'di ni brtson
364a1(dkon brtsegs): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /de'i yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ gang lus la mig yor dang / gzugs brnyan du shes pa/ tshig la brjod du med
364a2(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa/ sems la shin tu nye bar zhi bar shes pa/ zad pa shes pa rnam par rig pa/ zad pa shes pa rab tu shes pa/ mi skye ba shes pa nges par rtogs pa'o/ /de rtsom pa gsum
364a3(dkon brtsegs): las rnam par grol bar brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ gnas pa'i rtsom pa dang / dmigs pa'i rtsom pa dang / yongs su rtog pa'i rtsom pa ste/ gsum po de dag go /de chags pa gsum la
364a4(dkon brtsegs): mi chags par brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ mig dang / gzugs dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa la mi chags pa/ rna ba dang / sgra dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la mi chags pa/
364a5(dkon brtsegs): sna dang / dri dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa la mi chags pa/ lce dang / ro dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa la mi chags pa/ lus dang / reg bya dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa la mi
364a6(dkon brtsegs): chags pa/ yid dang / chos dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mi chags pa'o/ /de 'dzin pa med cing 'dor ba med pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pas sbyin pa mi len/ ser sna mi
364a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dor/ tshul khrims mi len/ 'chal ba'i tshul khrims mi 'dor/ bzod pa mi len/ gnod sems mi 'dor/ brtson 'grus mi len/ le lo mi 'dor/ bsam gtan mi len/
364b1(dkon brtsegs): g.yeng ba mi 'dor/ shes rab mi len/ 'chal pa'i shes rab mi 'dor/ dge ba mi len/ mi dge ba mi 'dor/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mi len/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi
364b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mi 'dor ro/ /de len pa med cing 'dor ba med pas gnyis yongs su dag pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de la gnyis gang zhe na/ gang nang gi kun du ldang ba las/
364b3(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa kun du ldang ba dang / phyi rol tu rnam par shes pa mtshan ma'i rjes su 'brang par 'gyur ba de ni gnyis zhes bya'o/ /de la gnyis yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ gang nang nye bar
364b4(dkon brtsegs): zhi bas phyi rol tu mi rgyu ba dang / spros pa med pa ste/ 'di ni gnyis yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o/ /gang rgyu ba med cing ma spros pa/ spros pa med pa'i brtson 'grus 'di lta bu 'di ni byang chub
364b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa
364b6(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ gang bsam gtan gyi yan lag rnams yang dag par bsgrub cing yang dag par bsgrubs nas so sor rtog pa dang / so sor brtags nas kyang snyoms par 'jug pa yin te /de bsam
364b7(dkon brtsegs): gtan byed kyang gzugs la gnas te/ bsam gtan mi byed/ de bsam gtan byed kyang tshor ba la ma yin/ 'du shes la ma yin/ 'du byed rnams la ma yin/ rnam par shes pa la gnas
365a1(dkon brtsegs): te bsam gtan mi byed do/ /de bsam gtan byed kyang mig la gnas te/ bsam gtan mi byed/ de bsam gtan byed kyang rna ba la gnas te/ bsam
365a2(dkon brtsegs): gtan mi byed/ sna la ma yin/ lce la ma yin/ lus la ma yin/ yid la gnas te/ bsam gtan mi byed do/ /de bsam gtan byed kyang gzugs la gnas te /bsam gtan
365a3(dkon brtsegs): mi byed / sgra la ma yin/ dri la ma yin/ ro la ma yin/ reg bya la ma yin/ chos la gnas te/ bsam gtan mi byed do/ /de bsam gtan byed kyang lus la rnam par rtog pa la
365a4(dkon brtsegs): gnas te/ bsam gtan mi byed/ de bsam gtan byed kyang sems su rnam par rtog pa la gnas te/ bsam gtan mi byed/ de bsam gtan byed kyang sa la gnas te/ bsam
365a5(dkon brtsegs): gtan mi byed/ de bzhin du chu la ma yin/ me la ma yin/ rlung la ma yin/ nam mkha' la gnas te/ bsam gtan mi byed do/ /de bsam gtan byed kyang zla ba la ma yin/ nyi
365a6(dkon brtsegs): ma la ma yin/ brgya byin la ma yin/ tshangs pa la ma yin/ skye dgu'i bdag po la gnas te/ bsam gtan mi byed do/ /'dod pa'i khams la gnas te/ bsam gtan mi byed do/ /
365a7(dkon brtsegs): gzugs kyi khams la ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams la gnas te/ bsam gtan mi byed do/ /de bsam gtan byed kyang 'jig rten 'di la gnas te/ bsam gtan mi byed/ 'jig
365b1(dkon brtsegs): rten pha rol la gnas te/ bsam gtan mi byed do/ /de bsam gtan byed kyang mi mtho mi dma' bar gnas te/ mi g.yo bar gyur cing bsam gtan byed do/ /de bsam gtan byed kyang bdag nye
365b2(dkon brtsegs): bar len pa'i lta ba la gnas te/ bsam gtan mi byed do/ /de bsam gtan byed kyang sems can la ma yin/ srog la ma yin/ gso ba la ma yin/ gang zag la ma yin/ shed las skyes pa
365b3(dkon brtsegs): la ma yin/ shed pur nye bar len pa'i lta ba la gnas te/ bsam gtan mi byed do/ /de bsam gtan byed kyang chad par lta bar khas blangs te/ bsam gtan mi byed do/ /de bsam gtan byed
365b4(dkon brtsegs): kyang rtag par lta ba ma yin/ 'byung bar lta ba ma yin/ 'jig par lta bar khas blangs te/ bsam gtan mi byed do/ /de bsam gtan byed kyang zag pa shin tu zad par bya ba'i phyir bsam
365b5(dkon brtsegs): gtan mi byed do/ /de bsam gtan byed kyang skyon med pa la 'jug pa dang / 'bras bu thob pa mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan mi byed do/ /de bsam gtan byed kyang shin tu mngon
365b6(dkon brtsegs): par 'du mi bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan mi byed do/ /de stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin 'dris par bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan byed kyang / stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir bsam
365b7(dkon brtsegs): gtan mi byed do/ /de mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'dris par bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan byed kyang / mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan mi byed do/ /
366a1(dkon brtsegs): de smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'dris par bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan byed kyang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir bsam
366a2(dkon brtsegs): gtan mi byed do/ /de byams pa chen po'i go bgos/ snying rje chen po'i byin gyis brlabs la gnas te/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid kyi rnam pas
366a3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par bsgrubs pa bsam gtan du byed do/ /de la rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ sbyin pa ma tshang ba med pa/ tshul khrims ma tshang ba med
366a4(dkon brtsegs): pa| bzod pa ma tshang ba med pa/ brtson 'grus ma tshang ba med pa/ bsam gtan ma tshang ba med pa/ shes rab ma tshang ba med pa/ thabs ma tshang ba med pa/ byams pa chen
366a5(dkon brtsegs): po ma tshang ba med pa/ snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms ma tshang ba med pa/ bden pa shes pa la 'jug pa ma tshang ba med pa/ byang chub kyi sems sems can
366a6(dkon brtsegs): la lta ba ma tshang ba med pa dang / bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sbyor ba ma tshang ba med pa/ sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / don byed pa dang / don mthun pa ma tshang ba
366a7(dkon brtsegs): med pa/ dran pa dang shes bzhin ma tshang ba med pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub
366b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan brgyad pa ma tshang ba med pa/ zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong ma tshang ba med pa/ sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / yang dag par sdom pa dang / des pa
366b2(dkon brtsegs): ma tshang ba med pa/ ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa ma tshang ba med pa/ mi dge ba'i chos dang mi ldan pa/ dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun mi chad pas byin
366b3(dkon brtsegs): gyis brlabs pa/ chos kyi tshul 'bar bas yang dag par bsdus ba/ dge 'dun gyi tshul yongs su sdud pa dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la lta bas byin gyis brlabs pa/ sangs rgyas
366b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi sku yongs su bsgrubs pas legs par brgyan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs yongs su rdzogs par bsngos pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi
366b5(dkon brtsegs): rdzu 'phrul dang / so sor yang dag par rig pa dang ldan pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs kyis yang dag par bzung ba/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la rab tu gnas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
366b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dres pa bco brgyad dang rjes su mthun pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ma 'dres pa/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa bsal ba/ mngon par shes pa'i ye
366b7(dkon brtsegs): shes dang ma bral ba/ sems can thams cad kyi ston par gyur pa/ ston pa bzhi thob pas 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid thob pa/ sems can thams cad
367a1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su smin par byed pas ma smad pa/ drang ba/ mkhas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal sel ba/ nyon mongs pa thams cad sbyong ba/ chu
367a2(dkon brtsegs): bo las sgrol ba/ 'dzin pa thams cad gcod pa/ rang bzhin gyis nye bar zhi ba/ las dang nyon mongs pa rnams kyis nye bar zhi ba/ chos nyid kyis btang snyoms pa/ sangs rgyas kyi
367a3(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad la lta ba/ rang gi mtshan nyid kyis bems po byin gyis brlab bya ba'i phyir rnam par grol ba med pa/ rang gi ngang gis lung du ma bstan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bya ba
367a4(dkon brtsegs): la rtag tu brtson pa/ nye bar zhi bas bsil bar gyur pa/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la rtag tu 'bar ba ste/ 'di ni rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa
367a5(dkon brtsegs): nyid ces bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ yongs su brtag pa bzung ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de
367a6(dkon brtsegs): dag thams cad ri mo mkhan bzo tha dad par bslabs pa/ yan lag rnam par phye ba tha dad du bslabs par gyur te/ de la la la ni sa gcod pa la mkhas kyang 'bri ba la mi mkhas/
367a7(dkon brtsegs): la la ni gtan la 'bebs pa la mkhas kyang yan lag dang nying lag la mi mkhas/ kha cig rkang lag 'bri ba la mkhas kyang mig dang mgo bo dang rna ba 'bri ba la mi mkhas pa dag
367b1(dkon brtsegs): cig yin la/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar rnam pa tha dad du bslabs pa/ yan lag rnams rnam par dbye ba la tha dad du bslabs pas gzugs tha dad du bslabs pa'i ri mo mkhan de dag
367b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas ras shig byin te/ khyed rnams kyis ras 'di la nga'i gzugs bris te 'on cig /khyed cag thams cad kyis kyang 'di la ri
367b3(dkon brtsegs): mor bris shig/ de nas ri mo mkhan de dag tshogs nas ras de brgyangs pa las/ ri mo mkhan de dag gi nang nas ri mo mkhan gcig cig yul gzhan zhig tu song bar gyur la/ de nas ri mo
367b4(dkon brtsegs): mkhan phyi ma de dag gis de la rgyal po de'i gzugs bris na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ ri mo mkhan gcig po de'i lag tu ma blangs na ras de rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog
367b5(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na ji tsam du don rnam par rig par bya ba'i
367b6(dkon brtsegs): phyir 'di dper byas te/ 'di'i don cir lta zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ ji ltar ri mo mkhan gcig po de med na ras de rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan par mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ rigs
367b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu/ rnam pa ji snyed dang / spyod pa ji snyed dang / brtson pa ji snyed kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ba'i rnam pa de dag las gal te rnam pa gcig ma bstan na yang /
368a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /nam sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rnam pa yang dag par bsdus shing lta ba dang /
368a2(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa'i kun nas ldang ba dang / mtshan ma la dmigs pa'i spros pa thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de na byang chub sems dpa'i rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang
368a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'i stong pa nyid yin no/ /bstan pa 'di nges par bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong gis rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid la bzod pa rab
368a4(dkon brtsegs): tu thob bo/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la byang chub sems dpa'i shes
368a5(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub byang chub sems dpa' ni shes rab yongs su dag pa rnam pa bcu gnyis dang ldan
368a6(dkon brtsegs): pa yin te/ rnam pa bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sngon gyi mtha' la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / phyi ma'i
368a7(dkon brtsegs): mtha' la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / da ltar byung ba la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa
368b1(dkon brtsegs): med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / 'dus byas pa la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / 'dus ma byas la yang
368b2(dkon brtsegs): de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi bzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas thams cad la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes
368b3(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang /
368b4(dkon brtsegs): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes pa la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / bden pa shes pa la yang de'i shes rab dang
368b5(dkon brtsegs): ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / kun rdzob bstan pa la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug
368b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / don dam pa bsten pa la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / sems can gyi dbang po dang brtson 'grus rnam pa tha
368b7(dkon brtsegs): dad pa'i phyir/ rab dang / 'bring dang / tha ma'i dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pas sems can thams cad la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing
369a1(dkon brtsegs): thogs pa med par 'jug pa yin te/ de'i shes rab de yang 'phags pa zag pa med pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang
369a2(dkon brtsegs): mthun pa/ sems can gyi bsam pa'i rjes su zhugs pa ni gting dpag dka' ste/ mthong bar dka' zhing zab la/ khong du chud par dka' ba bye brag phyed cing / nges par rtog pa/ lta ba
369a3(dkon brtsegs): dang bral ba/ bag chags bsal ba/ bdag stong pa nyid du rtogs pa/ thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rjes su zhugs pa/ chos stong pa nyid kyi tshul shes pa/ don la nges par rtog pa/ shin tu
369a4(dkon brtsegs): lcigs pa/ shin tu sbyangs pa/ ci yang snang ba med pa/ 'gal ba med pa/ ma 'gags pa/ dus dang dus ma yin pa la rtog pa/ dus las mi 'da' ba/ skyon med pa/ legs par bsrungs
369a5(dkon brtsegs): pa| skyon med pa la dga' ba/ bden pa khong du chud pa/ 'gog pa'i bden pa rjes su rtogs pa/ shin tu brgal ba/ thams cad kha na ma tho ba med pa/ gcig tu spyod pa med pa spyod
369a6(dkon brtsegs): pa| legs par spyad pa spyod pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa la spyod pa/ 'jig rten thams cad las phyir log kyang gang nas kyang 'ong ba med pa/ yul thams
369a7(dkon brtsegs): cad las shin tu 'das kyang sangs rgyas kyi yul las phyir ma log pa/ brtsom pa thams cad las shin tu 'das kyang sems can yongs su smin par byed pa las phyir ma log
369b1(dkon brtsegs): pa| spyod pa thams cad las shin tu 'das kyang dge ba'i spyod pa las phyir ma log pa/ sems kyi dmigs pa thams cad las shin tu 'das kyang sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod
369b2(dkon brtsegs): pa las phyir ma lag pa/ nye bar len pa la spyod kyang nye bar len pa med par 'bar ba/ 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis ma gos kyang 'jig rten dang ma bral ba/ lus med kyang sems
369b3(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi spyod pa dang bsam pa'i rjes su zhugs pa'o/ /de'i shes rab de yang de'i ngang tshul la spyod pa myur du khong du chud par dbang po smin par 'gyur ba/ yun ring por lta ba/ rtag
369b4(dkon brtsegs): tu rgyun mi 'chad par dge ba'i chos la brtson pa/ byang chub kyi snying po la gzhol ba/ dge ba sbyin pa la spyod pa/ nye bar len pa med par 'bar ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis
369b5(dkon brtsegs): brlabs pa/ bdud thams cad 'dul ba/ sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mthong ba/ don thams cad rjes su rtogs pa/ chos thams cad ro mtshungs
369b6(dkon brtsegs): pa| thabs thams cad kyis yang dag par bzung ba'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni srid pa'i pha rol tu song ba dang dpag tu med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
369b7(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o/ /mtshan ma thams cad dang / dmigs pa thams cad dang / sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu son pas de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes
370a1(dkon brtsegs): bya'o| |de'i shes rab yongs su dag pa ni gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yongs su dag pa/ thogs pa med
370a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ye shes kyi mtshan nyid yongs su dag pa ste/ de dag ni yongs su dag pa gnyis so/ /gzhan yang yongs su dag pa gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ dmigs pa yongs su dag pa dang /
370a3(dkon brtsegs): lta ba yongs su dag pa ste/ de dag ni yongs su dag pa gnyis so/ /de'i shes rab de yang thams cad kyi rjes su song ba/ sems can gyi rjes su song ba/ chos kyi rjes su song ba'o/ /de'i
370a4(dkon brtsegs): shes rab de ni nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi phyir mtshams sbyor ba'ang med la/ skye ba'i gnas thams cad kyi mtshams kyang sbyor ro/ /de'i shes rab de gnas pa yang med la/ yul
370a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul la yang gnas so/ /de'i shes rab de ni mtha' dang yang bral la/ dbus la yang mi gnas so/ /de'i shes rab de ni phyogs
370a6(dkon brtsegs): bcur rnam par lta ba'i sgrib pa med pa'i spyod yul lo/ /'byung ba shin tu mthong ba'i phyir sgrib pa med pa yang rnyed pa'o/ /de'i shes rab de ni chos thams cad shes shing mngon par rtogs
370a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /de'i shes rab de ni chos kyi don thams cad dang ldan yang ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin/ bral ba yang ma yin te/ sbyor ba'am/ mi sbyor ba'am/
370b1(dkon brtsegs): chos gang gis kyang brjod par bya ba ma yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi 'byung gnas ni ye shes kyi 'byung gnas yin no/ /bsod nams kyi 'byung gnas yin
370b2(dkon brtsegs): no| |thos pa'i 'byung gnas yin no/ /yon tan gyi 'byung gnas yin no/ /chos kyi 'byung gnas yin no/ /gzungs dang spobs pa'i 'byung gnas yin no/ /so so yang dag par rig pa'i
370b3(dkon brtsegs): 'byung gnas yin no/ /yon tan dang ye shes rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i 'byung gnas yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
370b4(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa 'di bstan pa na 'khor de'i nang nas lha dang mi'i srog chags nyi khri nyis stong bla na med pa yang dag par
370b5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to/ /dge slong lnga brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las
370b6(dkon brtsegs): sems rnam par grol lo/ /lha'i bu khri ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med pa rnam par dag nas/ de dag gi tshig 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang
370b7(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u 'di thos par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba lags na/ gang dag thos nas mos pa dang /
371a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / ston pa dang / de bzhin nyid du bsgrub pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal zhes smras so// //
371a2(dkon brtsegs): bam po gnyis pa/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po che la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de la byang chub sems dpa'i
371a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i lus la lus kyi rjes su lta bas dran pa nye bar bzhag pa la gnas te/ lus
371a4(dkon brtsegs): la rnam pa gnyis su so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa'i dran pa nye bar 'jog go / rnam pa gnyis su so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi sdug pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa dang
371a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa dang / sdug pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa'o/ /de la mi sdug pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ kye ma lus 'di ni mi gtsang ba ste/ btsog
371a6(dkon brtsegs): pas yongs su gang ba yun thung zhing byis pa 'drid pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni mi sdug pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa'o/ /de la sdug pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa gang
371a7(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gang lus mi gtsang ba grogs med pa 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku/ chos kyi sku/ bsod nams kyi sku/ ye shes kyi sku/ rdo rje'i sku/ mi shigs pa'i sku/ zag
371b1(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa'i sku/ 'jig rten gsum las bye brag tu 'phags pa'i sku/ gzugs mthong na sems can thams cad tshim par 'gyur ba'i sku thob par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni sdug pa'i rnam par so sor
371b2(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ste/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam pa gnyis su so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bsgom pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang
371b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bsgom pa na chos gnyis yongs su sbyong ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / rtag pa'i
371b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa'o/ /de la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa ni/ gang zhe na/ kye ma lus 'di ni mi rtag pa'i rnam pa ste/ ring por mi gnas pa/ tha mar 'chi ba yin par shes nas/ lus kyi phyir mi mthun pa'i 'tsho ba
371b5(dkon brtsegs): mi spyod cing snying po nyid len to/ /de snying po gsum yin te/ gsum gang zhe na/ lus kyi snying po dang / longs spyod kyi snying po dang / 'tsho ba'i snying po dang gsum mo/ /de lus mi rtag go snyam nas
371b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyi bran dang slob mar khas blangs te/ ci bya'o cog la 'bad pa yin/ lus mi rtag go snyam nas lus kyi nyes pa yon po dang / g.yo dang / tshul 'chos pa thams cad mi byed
371b7(dkon brtsegs): do| |lus mi rtag go snyam nas srog la bag mi rton par 'gyur te/ srog gi phyir yang sdig pa mi byed do/ /lus mi rtag go snyam nas longs spyod la sred cing chags par mi byed de/ bdog pa
372a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yongs su gtong ba yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi rtag pa'i rnam pas lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ de las
372a2(dkon brtsegs): yon tan gyi phan yon rab tu thob bo/ /de la rtag pa'i rnam pa gang zhe na/ gang lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dge ba dang ldan pa'i sems kyi
372a3(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa'i ye shes skyes shing byung ba de dag sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi 'chad pa dang / chos kyi rigs mi 'chad pa dang / dge 'dun gyi rigs mi 'chad pa dang / sems can gyi khams
372a4(dkon brtsegs): mtha' dag yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ste/ sems can thams cad la btang ba/ sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byed pa 'di ni
372a5(dkon brtsegs): rtag pa'i rnam pa zhes bya'o/ /gang mi zad pa ni rtag pa zhes bya ste/ 'dus ma byas ni mi zad pa zhes bya'o/ /'dus ma byas ni rtag pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge
372a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba rtsom pa thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'dus ma byas nyid du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni rtag pa'i rnam pa zhes bya'o/ /stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa
372a7(dkon brtsegs): med pa ni rtag pa zhes bya ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid kyi spyod yul dang / mtshan ma med pas nges par brtags pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rgyu mthun pas brtson 'grus
372b1(dkon brtsegs): brtsam pa thams cad rtsom pa 'di ni rtag pa'i rnam pa zhes bya'o/ /nam mkha' ni rtag pa zhes bya ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sems rnam par mi rtog pas
372b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di ni rtag pa'i rnam pa zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bsgom pa/
372b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi lus de sems can thams cad kyi lus nye bar 'dogs shing / bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi lus sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gnas la gnas par bya'o snyam ste/ ji ltar de bzhin
372b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i sku zag pa med pa ltar rang gi lus kyi chos nyid la yang de bzhin du rtog go / de zag pa med pa'i chos la mkhas pas sems can thams cad kyi lus kyang de'i mtshan nyid du rab
372b5(dkon brtsegs): tu shes so/ /de zag pa med pa'i chos thob pas zag pa las 'byung bar mi byed do/ /zag pa rnams gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa'i zag pa dang / srid pa'i zag pa dang / ma rig pa'i zag
372b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / lta ba'i zag pa'o/ /de la 'dod pa'i zag pa yongs su shes pa dang ldan pas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bsam bzhin du 'dod pa'i khams su skye'o/ /srid pa'i
372b7(dkon brtsegs): zag pa yongs su shes pa dang ldan pas dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i phyir bsam bzhin du srid pa yongs su 'dzin to/ /ma rig pa'i zag pa dang / lta ba'i zag pa de gnyis rtsa ba nas 'don
373a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor la 'jug go / lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bsgom pa de lus la sngon gyi mtha'
373a2(dkon brtsegs): nas kyang ma byung bar so sor rtog go / lus la phyi ma'i mthar yang mi 'pho bar so sor rtog go /lus la da ltar byung ba na rang bzhin gyis dben par yang so sor rtog go /de
373a3(dkon brtsegs): de ltar lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pas las dang ldan pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba mi bskyed do/ /'jig tshogs la lta ba dang bral bas bdag gir mi byed do/ /
373a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag gir byed pa med pas yongs su 'dzin pa la yongs su mi 'dzin to/ /yongs su 'dzin pa med pas rtsod pa med pa rab tu thob bo/ /rtsod pa spangs pas gnod sems med
373a5(dkon brtsegs): do| |gnod sems med pas bzod pa rab tu thob bo/ /bzod pa rab tu thob pas phyir khengs par mi 'gyur/ 'dud par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /khengs par yang mi 'gyur/
373a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dud par yang mi 'gyur bas chos nyid la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /chos nyid la gnas pas phyir yang chos ma yin pa spyod par mi 'gyur ro/ /chos spyod pas chos dang ldan pa'i
373a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gros su song ngo / /chos kyi 'gros su song bas chos dang ldan pa'i grogs po rab tu rnyed do/ /chos dang ldan pa'i grogs pos yongs su bzung bas chos dang ldan pa'i mnyan
373b1(dkon brtsegs): pa thos par 'gyur ro/ /chos thos pa dang ldan pas phyir yang yul rnams la zag par mi 'gyur ro/ /yul la bsrungs pas ting nge 'dzin sgrub bo/ /mnyam par bzhag pas yang
373b2(dkon brtsegs): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin tu rab tu shes pas phyir yang rtog par mi byed do/ /rnam par rtog par mi byed do/ /rnam par mi rtog pas mi 'gyur
373b3(dkon brtsegs): ro| |mi 'gyur bas phyir yang mi byed do/ /rnam par mi byed do/ /nam mi byed/ rnam par mi byed pa de ni chos mnyam pa nyid kyis chos ji lta ba bzhin thob nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
373b4(dkon brtsegs): rab tu thob pa 'di ni/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la byang chub sems
373b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i
373b6(dkon brtsegs): rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bsgom pa ni/ tshor ba la bde bar gnas pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po thob par 'gyur ro/ /de 'di ltar gang la tshor ba med pa de ni bde
373b7(dkon brtsegs): ba yin no zhes slob ste/ de sems can thams cad kyi tshor ba spong ba'i phyir tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bsgom mo/ /de sems can rnams kyi tshor ba
374a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gog pa'i phyir go cha bgos kyang bdag gi tshor ba yang 'gog par mi byed do/ /des tshor ba gang ci myong yang tshor ba de dag thams cad snying rje chen pos
374a2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bzung zhing myong bar byed do/ /de nam bde ba'i tshor ba myong ba de na 'dod chags la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po rnyed de/ bdag gi 'dod chags kyi bag la nyal yang
374a3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu spong ngo / /nam sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong ba de na zhe sdang la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po rnyed de/ bdag gi zhe sdang gi bag la nyal yang rab tu spong ngo / /nam
374a4(dkon brtsegs): bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba myong ba de ni gti mug la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po rnyed de/ bdag gi gti mug gi bag la nyal yang rab
374a5(dkon brtsegs): tu spong ngo / /de bde ba'i tshor ba la rjes su chags par mi 'gyur te/ rjes su chags pa legs par 'joms par yang byed do/ /sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba la khong khro bar mi 'gyur te/ khong
374a6(dkon brtsegs): khro ba legs par 'joms par byed do/ /sdug bsngal yang ma yin/ bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba la ma rig pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur te/ ma rig pa legs par 'joms par
374a7(dkon brtsegs): yang byed do/ /des tshor ba gang ci myong yang de dag thams cad kyang mi rtag par shes shing myong bar byed do/ /sdug bsngal du shes shing myong bar byed do/ /de bde ba'i tshor ba la ni mi
374b1(dkon brtsegs): rtag par shes par 'gyur ro/ /sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba la ni zug rngur shes par 'gyur ro/ /sdug bsngal yang ma yin/ bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba la ni zhi bar shes par 'gyur
374b2(dkon brtsegs): ro| |de ltar na gang bde ba de ni mi rtag pa'o/ /gang sdug bsngal ba de ni sdug bsngal nyid do/ /gang bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa de ni bdag med pa'o/ /rigs
374b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' de ltar tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing gnas pa de chos thams cad skyes pa dang / zhig pa dang / zhu ba dang / gnas pa med par shes so/ /
374b4(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad la skye ba dang / 'jig par yang so sor rtog go /so sor rtog pa na chos skye ba de dag gang nas 'ongs/ 'gag pa rnams gang du gsog par 'gyur snyam du chos rnams kyi
374b5(dkon brtsegs): skye ba dang 'jig pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /des chos rnams gang nas kyang mi 'ong / gang du yang mi 'gro bar shes nas tshor ba thams cad rgyun chad par bsgrub bo/ /bsgrubs
374b6(dkon brtsegs): nas kyang nan tan du mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can thams cad kyi tshor ba 'gag par byed kyi/ bdag 'ba' zhig gi tshor ba 'gag par byed pa ni ma yin te/ rigs kyi bu/
374b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa thabs mkhas pa dang snying rje chen pos yongs su zin pa'o/ /gang tshor ba 'gag pa yang rab tu
375a1(dkon brtsegs): shes la/ tshor ba 'gag pa mngon sum du yang mi byed de/ tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bsgom pa la gnas pa de
375a2(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba rnams dben pa dang / rnam par dben par yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /'di la ni myong ba gang yang med do/ /'di la ni tshor bar byed pa gang yang med do/ /
375a3(dkon brtsegs): chos de dag thams cad ni stong pa ste/ bdag dang bdag gi dang bral ba'o/ /byed pa po dang tshor ba po dang mi ldan pa'o/ /rgyu dang rkyen la rag lus pa'o/ /bdag po med pa'o/ /nga
375a4(dkon brtsegs): yi ba med pa'o/ /yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'o/ /des yang dag par rgyu dang rkyen de dag gi dngos po mi dmigs so/ /des ma dmigs nas 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar rkyen
375a5(dkon brtsegs): stong pa yin pa de bzhin du rkyen las byung ba'i chos rnams kyang stong pa'o snyam nas de stong pa nyid kyi don rig pas lus dben pa dang / sems dben pa dang / don shes pa dang /
375a6(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams shes pa dang / ye shes rig pas tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bsgom pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshor ba rnams la tshor
375a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la byang chub sems dpa'i sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag
375b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pas gnas pa byang chub kyi sems
375b2(dkon brtsegs): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa shin tu nye bar bzhag ste/ sems dran pa ye shes kyis sems kun tu tshol lo/ /de sems kun du tshol ba na sems nang na yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
375b3(dkon brtsegs): sems phyi rol na yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / sems phyi dang nang na yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / phung po rnams la yang sems yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / khams
375b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams la yang sems yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / skye mched rnams la yang sems yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /des sems yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas sems
375b5(dkon brtsegs): ga las byung zhes sems kyi rgyun kun tu tshol zhing de 'di snyam du sems te/ dmigs pa yod pa las sems 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ ci dmigs
375b6(dkon brtsegs): pa de yang gzhan la/ sems de yang gzhan nam/ 'on te dmigs pa gang yin pa de nyid sems yin/ gal te dmigs pa yang gzhan la/ sems kyang gzhan yin na ni sems
375b7(dkon brtsegs): de gnyis su 'gyur ro/ /'on te dmigs pa gang yin pa de nyid sems yin na ni/ sems kyis sems de ji ltar mthong bar 'gyur te/ sems kyis sems mthong bar mi rung ngo / /'di
376a1(dkon brtsegs): lta ste/ dper na/ ral gri'i so de nyid kyis ral gri'i so de nyid gcad par mi nus pa dang / sor mo'i rtse mo de nyid kyis sor mo'i rtse mo de nyid la reg par
376a2(dkon brtsegs): mi nus pa de bzhin du sems de nyid kyis kyang sems de nyid mthong bar mi nus so snyam nas/ de 'di ltar tshul bzhin du rab tu sbyor ba la gang sems mi gnas pa/ chad pa ma yin
376a3(dkon brtsegs): pa| rtag pa ma yin pa/ ther zug tu mi gnas pa/ rgyu med pa ma yin pa/ rkyen dang mi 'gal ba/ de las kyang ma yin/ gzhan las kyang ma yin pa/ de nyid kyang ma yin/ gzhan
376a4(dkon brtsegs): yang ma yin pa'i sems kyi rgyud/ sems kyi 'khri shing / sems kyi chos nyid/ sems mi gnas pa dang / sems rgyu ba med pa dang / sems snang ba med pa dang / sems kyi rang gi mtshan
376a5(dkon brtsegs): nyid ji ltar de bzhin nyid du 'khrug par mi byed pa de ltar shes so/ /de ltar mthong ngo / /de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du sems de dag dben pa nyid du rab tu shes/ de bzhin du mthong
376a6(dkon brtsegs): ba de na/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang sems la cung zad tsam
376a7(dkon brtsegs): yang mi mthong / rnam par mi mthong / mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog /g.yo med/ rlom sems med/ spros pa med pa 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran
376b1(dkon brtsegs): pa nye bar gzhag pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang ji ltar sems gzugs med pa de bzhin du sems kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang gzugs med pa'o/ /
376b2(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar sems kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams gzugs med pa de bzhin du/ byang chub kyi sems yongs su bsngos pa yang gzugs med pa'o/ /ji ltar byang chub kyi
376b3(dkon brtsegs): sems su bsngos pa gzugs med pa de bzhin du byang chub de yang gzugs med de/ de'i phyir sems ji lta bar spyod pa yang de bzhin no/ /spyod pa ji lta bar byang chub kyang de bzhin no/ /byang
376b4(dkon brtsegs): chub ji lta bar yongs su bsngo ba yang de bzhin zhes bya ste/ sems kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo/ /byang chub kyi rang bzhin ni chos thams cad de/ gang 'di ltar sems rab tu rnam par 'byed pa
376b5(dkon brtsegs): shes pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang gang mgyogs pa/ rab tu mgyogs pa/ mi gnas par rgyu
376b6(dkon brtsegs): ba| spre'u dang / rlung 'dra ba/ 'bab chu'i rgyun dang / 'bru mar gyi mar me dang 'dra ba/ rgyang ring por 'gro ba/ lus med pa/ yul la brkam pa/ skye mched drug la spyod yul ba/ gzhan dang
376b7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyi shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems gnas pa/ rtse gcig pa/ mi 'phro ba/ rnam par mi 'phro ba/ zhi gnas la rtse gcig pa/ g.yeng ba med pa 'di ni sems gnas pa zhes bya'o/ /de la
377a1(dkon brtsegs): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa yongs su rdzogs pa gang zhe na/ sems la rnam par 'byed par shes pa dang / sems la chos kyi dbyings su gnas par shes pa
377a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / sems la sems gnas par shes pa dang / sems la rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar shes pa dang / sems la ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa dang / sems la mngon sum gyi
377a3(dkon brtsegs): shes pas rab tu shes pa dang / sems la sgyu ma'i chos su shes pa dang / sems la dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang / sems la de kho nar shes pa dang / sems la
377a4(dkon brtsegs): g.yo ba med cing gzung ba med par shes pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya'o/ /de rang gi sems kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa sems can thams
377a5(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi sems kyi rang bzhin yang de yin par rab tu shes so/ /sems kyi rang bzhin de yongs su shes nas de bzhin du chos ston to/ /rang gi sems kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin
377a6(dkon brtsegs): pa sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi ngo bo nyid kyang de yin par rab tu shes so/ /sems kyi ngo bo nyid shes nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston to/ /rang gi sems kyi mtshan nyid
377a7(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyang de yin par rab tu shes so/ /sems kyi mtshan nyid de shes nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston to/ /ji ltar
377b1(dkon brtsegs): rang gi sems stong pa de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi sems kyang stong par rab tu shes so/ /sems de dag stong pa nyid du shes nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston to/ /de rang gi sems
377b2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par 'du ba gang yin pa sems can thams cad kyi sems yang dag par 'du ba yang de yin par rab tu shes so/ /sems yang dag par 'du ba de dag shes nas kyang de bzhin
377b3(dkon brtsegs): du chos ston to/ /de rang gi sems mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyi sems mnyam pa nyid du rab tu shes so/ /sems can thams cad kyi sems mnyam pa nyid kyis chos thams
377b4(dkon brtsegs): cad mnyam pa nyid du rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid du rab tu shes shing / sems kyis 'gyur bar mi byed de rnam par mi 'gyur ro/ /sems
377b5(dkon brtsegs): gnas pas chos kyi dbyings gnas par rjes su shes kyang / sems gnas pa'i chos nyid de las kyang mi g.yo ste/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sems la sems kyi rjes
377b6(dkon brtsegs): su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i spyod pa
377b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa la gnas pa 'di snyam du sems te/ chos kho na
378a1(dkon brtsegs): skye ba rnams skye/ chos kho na 'gag pa rnams 'gag ste/ 'di la bdag gam/ sems can nam/ srog gam/ skye ba po'am/ gso ba'am/ skyes
378a2(dkon brtsegs): bu'am/ gang zag gam/ shed las skyes pa'am/ shed bu'am/ gang skye ba'am/ rga ba'am/ 'chi ba'am/ 'pho ba'am/ skye bar 'gyur ba gang yang med do/ /'di ni chos
378a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi chos nyid do/ /gal te bsgrubs na ni 'grub/ gal te ma bsgrubs na ni mi 'grub ste/ dge ba yang rung / mi dge ba yang rung / mi g.yo ba yang rung / ji lta bur bsgrubs
378a4(dkon brtsegs): pa de lta bur 'grub mod kyi/ chos rnams la sgrub par byed pa yang med la/ chos rnams rgyu ba med par yang gang gis kyang mi skye'o snyam du nye bar brtags na/ 'di ltar chos
378a5(dkon brtsegs): dran pa'i ye shes skye ste/ gang bsod nams dang / bsod nams ma yin pa dang / mi g.yo ba mngon par 'du byed pa dang gsum mo/ /de la bdag gis ni bsod nams
378a6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'du byed pa la brtson par bya'o/ /'di ni bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa/ mchog /dam pa/ rab/ khyad par du 'phags pa bcu'i rgyur 'gyur te/ bcu po
378a7(dkon brtsegs): de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus yongs su dag pas mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang / spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba dang / pha rol gyi gnod pa byas pa thams cad las
378b1(dkon brtsegs): shin tu 'das pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa/ rnam pa drug cu shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa dang / sems
378b2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pas sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med cing / rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par ting nge 'dzin mi 'khrugs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa yongs su dag pas
378b3(dkon brtsegs): don dang / chos dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / spobs pa mi zad pa dang / byams pa chen po yongs su dag pas sems can thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam la rab tu 'god
378b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / snying rje chen po yongs su dag pas bskal pa dpag tu med par 'khor bas yongs su mi skyo ba dang / stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs pas sems can thams cad kyi dbang po
378b5(dkon brtsegs): mchog dang / mchog ma yin pa shes pa dang / mi 'jigs pa yongs su rdzogs pas bar du gcod pa dang / bar du gcod pa'i chos ma yin pa rab tu rtogs pa dang / sangs rgyas
378b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs pas 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / dus gsum la mi chags pa'i ye shes mthong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
378b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yongs su rdzogs pas rang byung gi ye shes rab tu rtogs pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa dam pa/ bzang po/ mchog /rab/ bye brag tu 'phags pa bcu po de dag gi rgyur
379a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ /des don gyi dbang 'di mthong bas/ bsod nams kyi tshogs gsog pa la chog mi shes par 'gyur ro/ /de bsod nams ma yin pa'i 'du byed
379a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i phyir ji ltar bdag la mi dge ba'i chos rnams thams cad kyi thams cad du bag chags su yang mi 'gyur bar bya'o snyam nas brtson par byed do/ /
379a3(dkon brtsegs): de mi g.yo ba'i 'du byed rnams rab tu shes nas mi g.yo ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa bskyed kyang / ting nge 'dzin de la snying por 'du shes par yang mi 'gyur la/ ting nge 'dzin gyi
379a4(dkon brtsegs): dbang gis kyang mi skye ste/ bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam gyi dbang gis 'dod pa'i khams su yang skye'o/ /
379a5(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pas/ chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa la gnas shing byang chub tu sgrub pa'i chos
379a6(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa de dag sgom la/ byang chub kyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi chos gang yin pa de dag spong yang dge ba'i chos mngon par 'du byed pas rtag par lta bar mi ltung / mi dge
379a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos spong yang chad par lta bar yang mi ltung ste/ gang la chad pa med cing rtag pa med pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rtag pa dang chad pa yongs su spangs pa'i dbu ma'i lam mo/ /
379b1(dkon brtsegs): de yang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gang tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang / ma rig pa de gnyi ga yang mtha' ste gang de gnyis kyi dbu ma de ni btags pa med cing gdags par
379b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba ma yin te/ 'di ni chos rnams kyi dbu ma'i lam zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du ma rig pa dang / 'du byed rnams dang / 'du byed med pa rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / rnam par
379b3(dkon brtsegs): shes pa med pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / ming dang gzugs med pa dang / skye mched drug dang / skye mched drug med pa dang / reg pa dang / reg pa med pa dang / tshor ba dang / tshor
379b4(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa dang / sred pa dang / sred pa med pa dang / len pa dang / len pa med pa dang / srid pa dang / srid pa med pa dang / skye ba dang / skye ba med pa dang / rga shi dang / rga shi med pa
379b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa zhes bya ba de gnyi ga yang mtha' ste/ gang de gnyis kyi dbu ma de ni btags
379b6(dkon brtsegs): pa med cing gdags par 'gyur ba ma yin te/ 'di ni chos rnams kyi dbu ma'i lam zhes bya'o/ /chos rnams kyi dbu ma'i lam de ni 'di 'dra'o/ /de 'dra'o zhes bstan par mi rung ste/
379b7(dkon brtsegs): dbu ma'i lam la ni btags pa med pa/ gdags par 'gyur ba ma yin pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ gnas pa med pa/ gzung ba med pa/ kun gzhi med pa/ zhi ba/ rab tu zhi ba/ nye bar
380a1(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mda' gang nas 'phangs pa dang / gang du phog pa de gnyi ga yang mtha' ste/ gang phigs pa dang /
380a2(dkon brtsegs): phog pa de ni dbu ma de ni btags pa med cing gdags par 'gyur ba ma yin te/ blta ba'am reg par mi nus pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu/ dmigs pa gang gis rnam par
380a3(dkon brtsegs): shes pa skye ba dang / gang du so sor rnam par rig pa gnas pa de gnyi ga yang mtha' ste/ gang de gnyis kyis dbu mar bstan par mi nus pa ni/ rigs kyi bu/ brda tsam du dbu ma'i
380a4(dkon brtsegs): lam zhes bya'i/ don dam par ni ma yin no/ /don dam pa gang yin pa de ni brjod du med de/ de la ni nyung ngu yang med/ mang po yang med do/ /gang la nyung ngu yang med/ mang po
380a5(dkon brtsegs): yang med pa de ni dbu ma'i lam mo/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang bdag dang / bdag med pa zhes bya ba de gnyi ga yang mtha' ste/ bdag dang / bdag med pa'i ngo bo nyid rnam par
380a6(dkon brtsegs): dag pa ni dbu ma'i lam mo/ /srog dang / gang zag ces bya ba de gnyi ga yang mtha' ste/ srog dang / gang zag gi ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa ni dbu ma'i lam mo/ /mtshan ma dang /
380a7(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma med pa zhes bya ba de gnyi ga yang mtha' ste/ mtshan ma med par rtog pa ni dbu ma'i lam mo/ /dmigs pa dang / mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba de gnyi ga yang mtha' ste/ rtog
380b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / 'jig pa med pa de ni dbu ma'i lam mo/ /rdzun pa dang / bden pa zhes bya ba de gnyi ga yang mtha' ste/ brjod du med pa ni dbu ma'i lam mo/ /tshu rol dang / pha rol ces bya
380b2(dkon brtsegs): ba de gnyi ga yang mtha' ste/ 'jig tshogs 'gag pa ni dbu ma'i lam mo/ /'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas zhes bya ba de gnyi ga yang mtha' ste/ spyod pa med pa ni dbu ma'i lam mo/ /'khor ba
380b3(dkon brtsegs): dang | mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba de gnyi ga yang mtha' ste/ rnam par rig pa med pa ni dbu ma'i lam mo/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing dran
380b4(dkon brtsegs): pa nye bar bzhag pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i phyir dran pa la gnas te/ de chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings su 'du bar rab tu
380b5(dkon brtsegs): shes so/ /chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa de nyid sems can gyi khams so/ /de chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pas sems can gyi khams dbyer med par khong du chud do/ /chos kyi
380b6(dkon brtsegs): dbyings gang yin pa dang / sems can gyi khams gang yin pa de gnyi ga yang nam mkha'i dbyings dang mtshungs par rab tu shes so/ /des chos thams cad dbyings gcig
380b7(dkon brtsegs): tu shes nas chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas kyang chos la mngon par chags shing lta bar yang mi 'gyur ro/ /de nam mi mthong ba de na chos rnams la tha dad du mi byed do/ /
381a1(dkon brtsegs): des chos rnams la mthong yang sha'i mig gis mthong ba ma yin/ lha'i mig gis mthong ba ma yin/ shes rab kyi mig gis mthong ba ma yin no/ /
381a2(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i mig mtshan mar 'du shes pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir de sha'i mig gis mthong ba ma yin/ de'i mig mngon par 'du byed par ltung ba ma yin te/ de'i phyir de
381a3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i mig gis mthong ba ma yin no/ /de'i mig spros pa la spyod pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir de shes rab kyi mig gis mthong ba ma yin no/ /chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing
381a4(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa de chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du mthong nas chos gang la yang mi gnas so/ /de chos thams cad mi gnas par shes nas chos rjes su dran pa des sngon gyi smon lam mi
381a5(dkon brtsegs): gtong ba 'di ni/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rjes su dran pa sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'o/ /gang cung zad chos zab mo la so sor rtog kyang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
381a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi byang chub kyi sems rjes su dran pa de yang mi 'dor ba 'di ni/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i spyod pa
381a7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa'o/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi po de dag la gnas pa de phyin ci log bzhi rab tu spong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing
381b1(dkon brtsegs): gnas pas mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes pa'i phyin ci log rab tu spong ngo / /tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing gnas pas sdug bsngal la bde bar 'du shes pa'i
381b2(dkon brtsegs): phyin ci log rab tu spong ngo / /sems la sems kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pas mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa'i phyin ci log rab tu spong ngo / /chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta
381b3(dkon brtsegs): zhing gnas pas bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa'i phyin ci log rab tu spong ngo / /de phyin ci log med pas yang dag pa nyid bsgrub bo/ /yang dag pa nyid la zhugs nas byang
381b4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa de yang dag par spong ba'i spyod pa yongs
381b5(dkon brtsegs): su dag pa rab tu 'thob ste/ yang dag par spong ba'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' de 'bad pa med cing lhun gyis grub pas dge ba'i chos la sbyor ba la
381b6(dkon brtsegs): sems 'jug gi/ mi dge ba la ni ma yin no/ /de phyir zhing sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams
381b7(dkon brtsegs): mi bskyed pa'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas pa dang nyams par mi
382a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dang / phyir zhing 'byung ba dang / yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa'
382a2(dkon brtsegs): de sngon gyi las yongs su dag pa'i phyir rang gi ngang nyid kyis dge ba'i chos rnams mngon du 'gyur te/ 'bad ba med cing lhun gyis grub pas dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams
382a3(dkon brtsegs): ni skye'o/ /dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams ni nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa de yang dag par spong ba bzhi po 'di
382a4(dkon brtsegs): dag sems kyis dbang bsgyur bar 'gyur gyi/ brtson 'grus kyis dbang bsgyur bar 'gyur ba ni ma yin no/ /de dag pa dang / dri ma med pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /
382a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gnang ba'i byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba 'jug ste/ yang dag pa la zhugs pa de ni yang
382a6(dkon brtsegs): dag par spong ba la gnas pa zhes bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i spong ba mnyam pa yin gyi/ mi mnyam pa ni ma yin no/ /de'i sbyor ba mnyam pa yin gyi/ mi mnyam pa ma yin
382a7(dkon brtsegs): no| |yang dag par spong ba zhes bya ba ni mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par sbyor ba dang / mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par bsgrub pa ste/ de'i phyir yang dag par spong ba zhes bya'o/ /de
382b1(dkon brtsegs): ltar yang dag par zhugs pa de'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dun pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu
382b2(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / sems kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
382b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / dpyod pa'i ting 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o/ /de byang chub kyi sems kyi lhag pa'i bsam pas 'dun pa yang bar 'gyur ro/ /mi dge ba'i chos
382b4(dkon brtsegs): spong bas brtson 'grus yang bar 'gyur ro/ /snying rje chen po rab tu thob pas sems yang par 'gyur ro/ /thabs mkhas pa rab tu thob pas spyod pa yang par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang
382b5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' de rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi po de dag gis byang chub kyi rnam pa mngon par bsgrubs pas dbang bzhi rab tu 'thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshe la dbang ba thob
