411a5(dkon brtsegs): me tog na bza' spos dang bdug pa thogs/ /dri ma med par snang ba skyes bu'i mchog /rgyal ba de yi drung du nye bar song / /bde bar gshegs kyi gan du mchis nas kyang / /
411a6(dkon brtsegs): zhabs la phyag 'tshal de nas mchod byas te/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de yi spyan sngar 'dug /rgyal bu des ni tshig ni 'di smras so/ /gang phyir skyon med sems kyis bskul
411a7(dkon brtsegs): bas na/ /brtson 'grus 'bar ba bdag gis ston pa mgon/ /ji ltar de ni mchod pa'i 'os lags na/ de la lan du phan pa bya mi nus/ /bdag ni 'jig rten mgon la bzod
411b1(dkon brtsegs): par gsol/ /chos kyi rgyal la gus pa gang ma bgyis/ /de dag thams cad de ring so sor bshags/ /bdag ni nongs pa 'jig rten mgon mkhyen mdzod/ /sems can don du snying
411b2(dkon brtsegs): rje bskyed nas su/ /bdag ni byang chub mchog la rab zhugs te/ /byang chub dam mchog ma thob bar du ni/ /slan chad bag med spyod par mi bgyi'o/ /rgyal bu de yis rgyal srid rnam
411b3(dkon brtsegs): spangs te/ /sems can bye ba brgyad cu rnams kyis bskor/ /byang chub dam pa 'di ni yongs tshol zhing / /sngon byung rgyal ba'i bstan la rab tu byung / /rgyal ba de dag gis ni bsam mkhyen
411b4(dkon brtsegs): nas| |byang chub lam mchog rab tu bstan pas na/ /chos thos sems can rtag tu dag pa rnams/ /thams cad kyis kyang rjes mthun bzod pa thob/ /rigs kyi bu/ ngas bskal pa'am/
411b5(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa las lhag par de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba de'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bsngags pa brjod cing / gang chos bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de yongs
411b6(dkon brtsegs): su brjod kyang yon tan gyi mtha' zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus 'bar zhes bya bar gyur pa de/ gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du
411b7(dkon brtsegs): dogs shing the tshom za'am yid gnyis su gyur na'ang de ltar mi lta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i tshe de'i dus na nga nyid byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus 'bar zhes bya ba der gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de'i
412a1(dkon brtsegs): tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu nor dpal zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du dogs shing the tshom za'am yid gnyis su gyur na'ang de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i
412a2(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di ni de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu nor dpal zhes bya bar gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar sngon byang chub sems
412a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la mi skyo zhing / 'di ltar shin tu stobs dang ldan te brtson 'grus nye bar ston to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa'
412a4(dkon brtsegs): sems can yongs su smin par byed 'dod pas ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus 'bar zhes bya ba de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ sems
412a5(dkon brtsegs): can yongs su smin par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ bzhi po 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' las yin
412a6(dkon brtsegs): te| sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad sdud par 'gyur ba'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdud kyi las las shin tu 'das pa byang chub sems dpa'i las dang / sangs rgyas kyi
412a7(dkon brtsegs): zhing yongs su sbyong ba byang chub sems dpa'i las dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid brgyan pa byang chub sems dpa'i las dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub
412b1(dkon brtsegs): pa byang chub sems dpa'i las te/ rigs kyi bu/ bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i las yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad sdud par
412b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i las sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sdud par 'gyur ba bzhi ste/
412b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhi gang zhe na/ bsam pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes dang / dbang po yongs su shes pa'i ye shes dang / nad thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i sman sbyin pa'i ye shes dang / nyon mongs pa'i
412b4(dkon brtsegs): nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa mi 'khrugs pa'i ye shes te/ rigs kyi bu/ bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i las yin te/ sangs rgyas
412b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sdud par 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po ches gang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med
412b6(dkon brtsegs): grangs med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas mngon par grub pa/ gang stong gsum gyis stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bcu nor bu rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu bkang bas kyang rin du mi
412b7(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa'i gtsug gi nor bu rin po che de/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phul nas tshig 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi gtsug na mchis pa'i nor bu rin po che
413a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di de bzhin gshegs pa la phul ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi spyi gtsug bltar mi snang ba thob pa dang / bdag sangs rgyas
413a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi ye shes spyi bor gyur pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dang ldan par gyur cig / de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
413a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos nyid de/ nam 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog du ma/ kha dog sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po
413a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu byung ste/ de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa de dag 'od kyis khyab par byas nas/
413a5(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags te/ zla ba dang nyi ma rnams kyi gzi brjid kyang gzi brjid kyis yongs su zad par byas nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das la
413a6(dkon brtsegs): lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyi gtsug tu nub par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa myur ba zhes bya ba stan las langs te/ bla
413a7(dkon brtsegs): gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs
413b1(dkon brtsegs): su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i don zhus so/ /mi mnyam mnyam pa'i dam pa 'jig rten mig sbyin 'jig rten mchog /shAkya'i rgyal sras dbang po zhi zhing dri gsum dri
413b2(dkon brtsegs): ma spangs/ /mtshungs med mtshungs 'das byams pas 'phags pa rgyal ba ri rab bzhin/ /ci slad 'dir 'dzum ye shes 'byung gnas bdag la lung bstan gsol/ /gya gyu mi mnga'
413b3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu gnyen la shin tu snyan pa'i gsung / /skyes bu dam pa bde rab sbyin pa dran mchog blo gros thugs/ /bde gshegs mos pa'i mchog dang ldan pa lha dang mis mchod pa/ /ci slad
413b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum pa 'di mdzad phan pa mdzad pas bstan du gsol/ /stobs bcu'i stobs mnga' 'dom gang 'od dang bsod nams gzi brjid 'od/ /'khor gyi nang du seng ge lta bur rab grags
413b5(dkon brtsegs): rgol ba bcom/ /thub pa srid gsum khyod dang mnyam pa'am lhag pa gang yang med/ /chos kyi dbang phyug ci slad 'dzum pa mdzad pa bstan du gsol/ /rab tu bzhad cing mchog tu dges
413b6(dkon brtsegs): pa shin tu dri med zhal/ /zla ba lta bur nam mkhar gshegs nas phyogs su lam me bar/ /mun pa bcom zhing rdul bcom 'od dang dpal ni rab rgyas pas/ /bde bar gshegs pa 'dzum
413b7(dkon brtsegs): mdzad phan par mdzad pas bka' stsol cig / gser ri 'od 'dra brtul zhugs grub pa bsod nams ye shes 'phro/ /mkhas pas rtag tu rab bsngags 'jig rten ngo mtshar mchod pa'i
414a1(dkon brtsegs): 'os| |srid pa'i dam pa 'jig rten 'das pa sbyin gnas mi zad cing / /nam mkha'i ngos rab snang bar shAkya seng ge 'dzum pa bstan/ /lha dang mis mchod khyod 'dra
414a2(dkon brtsegs): sa dang lha yul dag na'ang med/ /yid mnyam mos pa mnyam pa khrel yod dpal gyis rab tu rgyas/ /yon tan brgya rnams shin tu rgyas pa'i mtshan ni rab rdzogs pa/ /bde gshegs 'dzum
414a3(dkon brtsegs): pa mdzad pa thub pa dam pa bka' stsol cig / kun tu khyod kyi ye shes dus gsum chags pa med par 'jug /sems dang yid sbyor dbang po gang dang sems can bsam pa gang / /
414a4(dkon brtsegs): sems can kun gyi bsam pa ci 'dra thams cad skad cig mkhyen/ /mi yi seng ges gang slad 'dzum mdzad rigs don bdag la gsungs/ /nam mkhar gnas pa'i lha mang yid kyang
414a5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu dga'/ /mi tshogs sa la gnas pa thal sbyar phyag 'tshal gyis/ /gang thos lha mi mun pa'i rdul rnams sel 'gyur ba/ /mi mchog gis ni bdud rtsi'i ro mchog dbye bar gsol/
414a6(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa myur ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis byang
414a7(dkon brtsegs): c hub sems dpa' gtsug na rin po che 'dis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes spyi bor gyur pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ched du gang gtsug gi nor bu rin po che 'di de bzhin gshegs pa la
414b1(dkon brtsegs): phul ba mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na
414b2(dkon brtsegs): rin po che 'dis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mnyes par byas/ bsti stang du byas/ btsun par byas/ ri mor byas shing mchod nas thams cad du
414b3(dkon brtsegs): yang tshangs par spyod pa spyad de sems can dpag tu med pa dag kyang theg pa gsum po dag la yongs su smin par byas so/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' gtsug na rin po
414b4(dkon brtsegs): c he 'di bskal pa grangs med pa brgya stong na bskal pa dri ma med pa la 'jig rten gyi khams 'od dri ma med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
414b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas| rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan
414b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das rin po che 'byung ba zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams 'od dri ma med pa de'i sa gzhi rin po che sna bdun du 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi khams de nas 'od
414b7(dkon brtsegs): gang byung ba des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa rnams snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'od de yang gser gyi kha dog lta bur 'gyur ro/ /sems can gang dag 'od des reg par
415a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba de dag kyang / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi gzir bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi khams 'od dri ma med pa de yang 'byor pa rgyas pa byang chub
415a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' 'ba' zhig gi gnas su 'gyur ro/ /der byang chub sems dpa' rin po che ma gtogs par rin po che gzhan 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa
415a3(dkon brtsegs): de'i ming ni rin po che 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang mngon par shes pa rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de dag gi longs spyod dang / kun spyod pa thams
415a4(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang bsams pa tsam gyis 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /gang 'jig rten gyi khams der lha dang / mi 'byung ba de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges
415a5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro/ /de na mi khom pa dang / ngan song rnams kyi ming yang med par 'gyur ro/ /de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che 'byung ba bla na med pa'i chos kyi rgyal po
415a6(dkon brtsegs): ma gtogs par rgyal po gzhan 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /lha dang / mi de dag thams cad kyang brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi khams de na bud med dang 'khrig cing 'du ba'i
415a7(dkon brtsegs): ming yang med par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can long ba'am/ zhar ba'am/ zha bo'am/ sgur po'am/ yan lag ma tshang bar 'gyur ba gang yang med de/ de dag
415b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang lus mtshan gyis legs par brgyan par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe'i tshad kyang bskal
415b2(dkon brtsegs): pa ba'am bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis thub par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de yang byang chub dang rab tu ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa dang rab tu ldan pa/ snying rje chen po dang rab tu ldan pa/ theg
415b3(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po dang rab tu ldan pa ma gtogs par gtam gzhan ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang dbang po rno ste/ zur tsam gyis go bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag
415b4(dkon brtsegs): kyang chos kyi sgo'i tshig re res sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub rjes su rtogs par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de yang byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rdo rje'i tshig gi gzungs rab tu
415b5(dkon brtsegs): ston par 'gyur ro/ /de la rdo rje'i tshig gi gzungs gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshig gcig gis tshig thams cad la 'jug pa'o/ /tshig gcig po de yang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshig mi
415b6(dkon brtsegs): zad pa'o/ /tshig mi zad pa de yang gang zhe na/ tshig mi zad pa zhes bya ba ni gang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang zad par byed mi nus pa'o/ /tshig mi zad pa de yang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
415b7(dkon brtsegs): a zhes bya ba de ni mi zad pa ste/ a zhes bya ba la zhugs na yig 'bru thams cad la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar na yi ge thams cad ni mi zad pa ste/ yig 'bru gnyis snga phyi med par
416a1(dkon brtsegs): thos par bya mi nus so/ /yi ge 'bru re re nas brjod kyi/ yi ge yang yi ge gnyis dang 'brel ba ma yin no/ /de bas na tshig gcig pa de nyid rnam par rig
416a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshig ste/ gang rnam par rig pa'i tshig de yang rnam par rig pa'i tshig ces rtog par mi byed/ rnam par rtog par mi byed de/ de ltar tshig de mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog par dgos pa
416a3(dkon brtsegs): byed de/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni rdo rje'i tshig gi gzungs la 'jug pa'o/ /de ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che 'byung ba med de byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rdo
416a4(dkon brtsegs): rje'i tshig gi gzungs yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ ngas bskal pa'am/ bskal pa las lhag par 'jig rten gyi khams 'od dri ma med pa de'i bsngags pa brjod
416a5(dkon brtsegs): c ing | de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che 'byung ba de'i chos bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de yongs su brjod kyang yon tan yongs
416a6(dkon brtsegs): su brjod pa zad par mi 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der ni yon tan gyi rnam pa bkod pa tshad med pa de snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
416a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po ches bdag nyid lung bstan pa thos nas dga' mgu yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ bde ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan
416b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das la tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs/ /chos rnams kun gyi pha rol gshegs/ /'khrul
416b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i skyon rnams thams cad las/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu 'das/ /ye shes chen po khyod re mtshar/ /sangs rgyas bye ba de snyed la/ /bdag gis sngon mchod gang bgyis pa//
416b3(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad mngon par mkhyen/ /'das dang ma 'ongs dus dag dang / /de bzhin da ltar byung ba yi/ /bdag gi spyod dang de bzhin du/ /srog chags kun gyi rab tu mkhyen/ /thub pa
416b4(dkon brtsegs): ci 'dra de 'dra bar/ /'jig rten sangs rgyas bdag 'gyur zhes/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bdag lung bstan/ /bdag ni the tshom yongs ma mchis/ /sa rnams thams cad 'gags
416b5(dkon brtsegs): kyang gda'/ /nyi zla mkha' las ltung yang gda'/ /bcom ldan khyod kyi zhal sgo nas/ /phyin ci log gi gsung mi 'byung / /ye shes ldan la shes rab che/ /des ni bdag
416b6(dkon brtsegs): la bden tshig gis/ /byang chub mchog tu lung bstan pas/ /sangs rgyas bla na med par 'gyur/ /thugs kyis yid ni mkhyen pas na/ /bdag gi spyod pa ci 'dra dang / /sangs
416b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas zhing yang ci 'dra ba/ /de 'dra nyid du kun bstan to/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gsung thos nas/ /the tshom ma mchis dbang po tshim/ /sems can rnams la phan pa'i rgyur//
417a1(dkon brtsegs): mchog gi spyod pa spyad par bgyi/ /bdag gi spyod pa ci 'dra ba/ /sngon gyi mthar ni rnam sbyangs pa/ /de bas shin tu dpag yas par/ /bdag
417a2(dkon brtsegs): gi spyod pa spyad par bgyi/ /'di ni le los mi 'da' bas/ /brtson 'grus brtan pa'i spyod pa 'di/ /zhum pa ma mchis sems kyis su/ /byang chub spyod pa spyad par bgyi/ /bdag
417a3(dkon brtsegs): ni byang chub lung bstan pa/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni spro ba stsal/ /ji srid 'dren par ma gyur par/ /de srid brtson 'grus mi gtong ngo / /rtag tu byang chub mchog gzhol te/ /sems
417a4(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad gnyer bar bgyi/ /byang chub dam pa don du btsal/ /de dag bdag gis bskyang bar bgyi/ /byang chub sems dpa' gtsug na rin po ches tshigs su bcad
417a5(dkon brtsegs): pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ srog chags stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od
417a6(dkon brtsegs): dri ma med par skye bar sems kyis smon te/ tshig 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das nam de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che 'byung ba des byang chub thob par gyur pa de na bdag
417a7(dkon brtsegs): cag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar gyur cig ces smras pa dang / de thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar lung bstan to/ /de nas bcom
417b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung zhig /chongs shig /lhogs shig /kun chub par gyis shig/
417b2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig /kun dga' bo/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ngam klog pa de dag ni bla na
417b3(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston to/ /kun dga' bo/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
417b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la lo stong du ci bzhes zhes sbyin pa byin pa pas/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos te/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam
417b5(dkon brtsegs): de kho na bzhin du nan tan byed na/ 'di ni de bas bsod nams ches mang ste/ tshad med grangs med par khong du chud par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun
417b6(dkon brtsegs): dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung lags na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung
417b7(dkon brtsegs): bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa zhes bya bar gzung zhig/
418a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i man ngag ces bya bar yang gzung zhig /gtsug na rin po ches zhus pa zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad
418a2(dkon brtsegs): ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po che dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo
418a3(dkon brtsegs): dang | lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa dkon
418a4(dkon brtsegs): mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ 'phags pa gtsug na rin po ches zhus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ 'dus pa bzhi bcu bdun pa rdzogs so// //
418a5(dkon brtsegs): rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de d+harma tA shI las bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab
418a6(dkon brtsegs): pa|| / /rgya gar skad du/ AR+Ya shrI mA la de bI sing ha nA da nA ma mahA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lha mo dpal phreng gi seng ge'i sgra zhes bya
418a7(dkon brtsegs): ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom
418b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de nas de'i tshe yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / btsun mo dam
418b2(dkon brtsegs): pa btsun mo phreng ldan mas lha mo dpal phreng chos rtogs nas ring po ma lon pa'i bar skabs su gtam glengs pa/ rgyal po chen po/ kye ma khyed kyi sras mo lha mo dpal phreng ni mdzangs
418b3(dkon brtsegs): shing gsal la zab cing mkhas te/ gal te ngas bcom ldan 'das mthong ba lta na tshegs chung ngus chos rtogs la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa la yang the tshom ma mchis
418b4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro/ /de nas yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis btsun mo phreng ldan ma la 'di skad ces smras so/ /phreng ldan ma/ 'u bu cag gis lha mo dpal phreng la pho nya nus pa
418b5(dkon brtsegs): shig btang gor ma chag go / de skad ces smras pa dang / btsun mo phreng ldan mas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi tshig de mnyan nas/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / btsun mo phreng
418b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan mas bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan gyi bsngags pa rnam pa du ma bris te/ nang kor ma yid brtan pa zla ba lta bu zhes bya ba de'i lag tu 'phrin yig bskur nas de mthar gyis song ste/
418b7(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer 'thab med du phyin nas btsun mo'i 'khor du song ste/ lha mo dpal phreng la phyag 'tshal nas phan tshun kun dga' ba'i gtam byas te/ lha mo dpal phreng gi lag tu 'phrin
419a1(dkon brtsegs): yig byin no/ /de nas lha mo dpal phreng gis pha ma la gus pas 'phrin yig de lag pa gnyis kyis blangs nas mgo bo la gtugs te/ bdag nyid
419a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'phrin yig bklags nas/ 'phrin yig gi don bzang po zhes nges par bzung ste/ don du nges par bzung nas/ mgo bo lcogs te ya mtshan du bzung nas lha mo dpal phreng
419a3(dkon brtsegs): gi nang kor ma zla ba lta bu la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sangs rgyas zhes bya'i sgra 'di ni/ /'jig rten dag na shin tu dkon/ /gal te tshig 'di bden gyur na//
419a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis khyod la bgo ba sbyin/ /gal te bcom ldan sangs rgyas de/ /'jig rten don du byung gyur na/ /de ni bdag la thugs rje yis/ /bstan pa'i ched du 'dir sbyon
419a5(dkon brtsegs): cig / de nas de yi skad cig la/ /mgon po gshegs nas mkha' la bzhugs/ /bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas sku/ /'od zer 'gyed cing bzhugs pa mthong / /de
419a6(dkon brtsegs): nas de'i tshe lha mo ni/ /gus pas 'khor bcas langs nas kyang / /spyi bor thal mo sbyar byas nas/ /smra ba'i mchog la bstod pa ni/ /mgon po khyod kyi sku gzugs dang / /dpal
419a7(dkon brtsegs): dpe gang na'ang yod ma mchis/ /bsam yas dpe zla ma mchis pa'i/ /'jig rten mgon la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mgon po khyod kyi sku gzugs dang / /ye shes la yang bas
419b1(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis/ /khyod kyi sangs rgyas chos mi bas/ /de bas thub khyod skyabs kyang lags/ /bsam yas rtsal ldan khyod kyis ni/ /sku gsung thugs kyi skyon rnams bsal/ /nyams ma mchis
419b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sa brnyes pa/ /chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shes bya thams cad khyod kyis mkhyen/ /ye shes sku yi dbang phyug ste/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams thams cad kyi/ /mthar phyin khyod
419b3(dkon brtsegs): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzhal yas khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpe las 'das la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bsam yas chos khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /mtha' yas gzugs khyod phyag 'tshal
419b4(dkon brtsegs): lo| |bdag ni da ltar mgon pos bskyabs/ /byang chub sa bon rnam par bskyed/ /slan chad srid pa gzhan dag dag tu/ /thub pas bdag la phan gdags mdzod/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
419b5(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ /sngon tshe rnams su lha mo khyod/ /ngas ni byang chub sbyor bar byas/ /phyis kyang tshe rabs gzhan dag tu/ /ngas ni rjes su gzung bar bya/ /lha mo dpal phreng gis gsol pa//
419b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis 'di dang gzhan dag tu/ /bsod nams gang dang gang bgyis pa/ /bsod nams de yis mgon po khyod/ /rtag tu bdag gis mthong bar shog /de nas lha mo dpal phreng dang
419b7(dkon brtsegs): lhan cig tu btsun mo kun dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dus pa'i nang du lha mo dpal
420a1(dkon brtsegs): phreng bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te/ lha mo khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la yang dag pa'i yon tan dag gis mngon par bstod
420a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bsod nams bsags pa gang yin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ lha mo khyod bskal pa tshad med grangs med par lha dang mi'i rgyal srid phun tshogs pa myong bar 'gyur te/ tshe rabs
420a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad du yang nga mthong ba dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur zhing / nga la mngon sum du 'di lta bu'i bstod pa bsngags pas bsngags par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag
420a4(dkon brtsegs): tu med grangs med pa rnams la yang mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /da phyin chad bskal pa brgya stong grangs med pa nyi shu na/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
420a5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ de'i tshe yang lha mo khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der ngan song dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe sems can rnams
420a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la gnas par 'gyur te/ sems can de dag la nad kyang med/ rga ba yang med/ yid du mi 'ong ba'i gnod pa yang med de/ mi dge ba'i las kyi lam
420a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi ming yang mi grag par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang dag 'byung ba de dag gis ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyang 'di ltar bde ba dang /
420b1(dkon brtsegs): gzugs dang / kha dog dang / dpal dang / gzi brjid dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / longs spyod thams cad kyis zil gyis gnon par 'gyur te/
420b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can de dag shin tu bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /lha mo/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang dag 'byung ba de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la yang dag par
420b3(dkon brtsegs): zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /lha mo/ de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba dag byas pa'i sems can rnams de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing der 'du bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha mo dpal phreng gi lung
420b4(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa phun sum tshogs pa thos nas lha dang mi dpag tu med pa dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam btab bo/ /de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams der skye
420b5(dkon brtsegs): bar bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan to/ /de nas lha mo dpal phreng gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon sum du bdag nyid lung bstan pa thos nas thal mo sbyar te/ yid dam
420b6(dkon brtsegs): chen po bcu yang dag par blangs so/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ da slan chad bdag gi tshul khrims kyi dus las 'da' ba'i sems bskyed par mi bgyi ste/
420b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das/ yid dam dang po 'di ni byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das/ da slan chad bdag gis bla ma
421a1(dkon brtsegs): dag la ma gus pa'i sems bskyed par mi bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ yid dam gnyis pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du
421a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das/ da slan chad bdag gis gang du'ang sems can la khro ba dang gnod sems kyi sems bskyed par mi bgyi ste/ bcom
421a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das/ yid dam gsum pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das/ da slan chad bdag gis gzhan
421a4(dkon brtsegs): gyi dpal dang / gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa dag la phrag dog gi sems bskyed par mi bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ yid dam bzhi pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar
421a5(dkon brtsegs): thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das/ da slan chad bdag gis tha na kham slad ma tsam la yang ser sna'i sems bskyed par mi bgyi ste/ bcom
421a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das/ yid dam lnga pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das/ da slan chad bdag gis bdag nyid kyis
421a7(dkon brtsegs): longs spyod pa'i slad du nor yongs su bzung bar mi bgyi ste/ 'on kyang / bcom ldan 'das/ sems can dbul po sdug bsngal zhing mgon ma mchis pa yongs su smin par bgyi
421b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i slad du yongs su gzung bar 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das/ yid dam drug pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo / /bcom ldan
421b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das/ da slan chad bdag gis bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa na bdag la sman du re ba'i slad du sems can bsdu bar mi bgyi ste/ 'on kyang / bcom ldan
421b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das/ zang zing ma mchis pa'i sems dang / chog par mi 'dzin pa dang / ldog pa ma mchis par sems can yang dag par bsdu bar 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das/ yid dam bdun
421b4(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das/ da slan chad bdag gis sems can mgon ma mchis pa dang / go rar
421b5(dkon brtsegs): stsal ba dang / bcings pa dang / nad kyis nyam thag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / dbul po dang / phongs par gyur pa dang / tshigs chen pos 'tsho ba dag mthong na de dag la sman ma
421b6(dkon brtsegs): btags par gom pa gcig kyang dor bar mi bgyi'i/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis sems can sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag pa de dag mthong na sdug bsngal de dang de dag las yongs
421b7(dkon brtsegs): su thar par bgyis la/ nor gyi bsdu bas bsgrubs nas slad kyis bdag mchi bar bgyis te/ bcom ldan 'das/ yid dam brgyad pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi
422a1(dkon brtsegs): bar du bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das/ da slan chad bdag gis phag tshong dang / bya la sogs pa'i sdig pa'i las kyis 'tsho zhing
422a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa'i chos 'dul ba las nyams pa'i tshul can dag mthong na yal bar mi 'dor gyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong
422a3(dkon brtsegs): brdal dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gang dang gang dag na bdag gi mchid nyan pa de dang de dag tu tshar dgum pa'i rigs pa rnams ni tshar dgum/ sman gdags
422a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rigs pa rnams ni sman gdags par 'tshal lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ tshar dgum pa dang / sman gdags pas ni 'jig rten du dam pa'i chos yun ring du
422a5(dkon brtsegs): gnas par 'gyur ba'i slad du ste/ dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas na lha dang mi rnams kyi lus rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur zhing / ngan song rnams yongs su 'grib par 'gyur te/
422a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i rjes su bskor bar bgyid pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ yid dam dgu pa 'di yang byang
422a7(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das/ da slan chad bdag gis dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba las bskyud par bgyi
422b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sems gcig tsam yang bskyed par mi bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ dam pa'i chos bzung ba las bskyud na theg pa chen po bskyud par 'gyur ro/ /bcom
422b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das/ theg pa chen po bskyud na/ pha rol tu phyin pa bskyud par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa bskyud na/ theg pa chen po la mi 'dun par 'gyur ro/ /bcom
422b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang theg pa la ma nges pa de ni dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa la mi 'dun par 'gyur zhing / rang nyam du gnas par
422b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni byis pa so so'i skye bo'i sar mchi ba'i skal ba can du 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ni bdag gis nyes dmigs dang / gnod pa chen
422b5(dkon brtsegs): por mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa las ni/ bdag dang ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phan yon dpag tu ma mchis
422b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i don yongs su grub par mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba'i yid dam bcu pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang
422b7(dkon brtsegs): dag par blang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi yid dam chen po bcu po 'di dag ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar blangs pa lags te/ 'di la chos kyi rje nyid bdag gi dpang du
423a1(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ston pa mngon sum du gyur tu lags kyang sems can dge ba'i rtsab chung ngu la la dag /kye ma yid dam chen po bcu po
423a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag ni/ lcogs par dka'o snyam du bdag la the tshom za'am/ yid gnyis 'tshal ba de dag ni/ bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyis yun ring por gnod pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / phung
423a3(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das/ de dag nyid la phan gdags pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs 'di bgyi bar 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das/
423a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis yid dam chen po bcu po gang dag blangs pa'i yid dam chen po bcu po 'di dag la/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te bdag ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bgyid par 'gyur ba lta na/
423a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi bden pa'i tshig 'dis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir lha'i me tog gi char 'bab par gyur cig /lha'i sgra grag par gyur cig /des kyang bdag gi bden
423a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byin gyi rlabs 'di len par gyur cig / lha mo dpal phreng gis tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu/ de'i tshe lha'i me tog gi char chen po bab nas/ bar snang las lha'i sgra grag par
423a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur te/ des bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs de mnos nas/ lha mo/ de de bzhin no/ /ji ltar khyod kyis bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs byas pa de ni/ de bzhin du 'gyur te gzhan du ma yin no/ /
423b1(dkon brtsegs): zhes byas so/ /de nas rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul de yang mthong / lha'i sgras mnos pa de yang thos nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor the tshom med cing mchog tu dga' bar gyur te/ lha mo
423b2(dkon brtsegs): dpal phreng dang mi 'bral zhing 'grogs par smon lam btab bo/ /'khor de thams cad kyang de bzhin du 'bral bar mi 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan to/ /de nas lha mo dpal
423b3(dkon brtsegs): phreng gis bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar smon lam chen po gsum btab bo/ /gsum gang zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs 'dis sems can dpag tu ma
423b4(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa dag la sman btags pa gang lags pa'i bsod nams bsags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag tshe rabs thams cad du dam pa'i chos rtogs pa thob par
423b5(dkon brtsegs): gyur cig / bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ni bdag gi smon lam chen po dang po lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis dam pa'i chos rtogs pa de thob nas kyang ngal ba dang yongs su skyo ba ma
423b6(dkon brtsegs): mchis par sems can rnams la chos ston par gyur cig / bcom ldan 'das/ de ni bdag gi smon lam chen po gnyis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis dam pa'i chos bstan pa de yang
423b7(dkon brtsegs): lus dang srog la mi lta bar dam pa'i chos bsrung ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ni bdag gi smon lam chen po gsum pa lags te/ bcom ldan
424a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das/ bdag ni smon lam chen po gsum po de dag 'debs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo dpal phreng gi smon lam chen po yul che ba gsum pa 'di
424a2(dkon brtsegs): dag lung ston pa mdzad de/ lha mo/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gzugs su gtogs pa thams cad ni nam mkha'i khams kyi khongs su 'dus shing khongs su gtogs la khongs su chud do/ /lha
424a3(dkon brtsegs): mo| de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag kyang smon lam chen po 'di gsum gyi nang du 'dus shing khongs su gtogs la khongs su chud do/ smon lam
424a4(dkon brtsegs): chen po gsum po de dag ni de ltar yul che'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo dpal phreng gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di la smon lam chen po'i yul
424a5(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus bdag gis spobs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha mo/ khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas gnang gi /
424a6(dkon brtsegs): khyod spobs par gyis shig /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo dpal phreng gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
424a7(dkon brtsegs): snyed gang lags pa de dag thams cad kyang 'di ltar dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba'i smon lam chen po gcig gi khongs su 'dus shing khongs su chud de/ bcom ldan 'das/ dam pa'i
424b1(dkon brtsegs): chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni de ltar yul che ba lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo dpal phreng la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ legs so/ /legs so/ /lha mo khyod ni shes
424b2(dkon brtsegs): rab zab ste/ thabs kyis yongs su bsgos pa'i shes rab dang ldan no/ /lha mo/ sems can gang dag khyod kyis chos bstan pa'i don rtogs pa de dag ni dkon pa yin te/ yun ring po nas
424b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas du ma la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed bskyed pa yin no/ /lha mo khyod kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba bstan pa ji skad bshad pa de bzhin du 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da
424b4(dkon brtsegs): star byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba bstan pa de nyid bshad do/ /'chad do/ /'chad par 'gyur ro/ /lha mo/ nga yang da ltar mngon par rdzogs
424b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub mchog thob nas dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba bstan pa rnam pa du mar ston te/ lha mo/ da ltar dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba bstan pa ngas rnam pa du mar bshad kyang /
424b6(dkon brtsegs): dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i yon tan rnams kyi mtha'am mu thug pa med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs pa la yang mtha'am mu thug pa med do/ /lha mo/ dam pa'i chos
424b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su 'dzin pa ni de ltar don che'o/ /lha mo/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni de ltar phan yon che'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo dpal phreng gis 'di skad ces gsol
425a1(dkon brtsegs): to| |bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus don chen po bstan pa gzhan yang bdag gis spobs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
425a2(dkon brtsegs): pa| lha mo/ da de'i dus la bab par shes na khyod spobs par gyis shig /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo dpal phreng gis 'di skad ces gsol
425a3(dkon brtsegs): to| |bcom ldan 'das/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu ma mchis pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/
425a4(dkon brtsegs): dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni chos kyi sgo brgyad khri bzhi stong sdud pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dper na/ 'chags pa'i dus kyi tshe sprin chen po ni kha dog mtha' yas
425a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rgyun dang / rin po che mtha' yas pa'i rgyun dang ldan pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa yang bsod nams kyi rnam par smin
425a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chab kyi rgyun dpag tu ma mchis pa dang / ye shes rin po che'i rgyun dpag tu ma mchis pa dang ldan pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dper na/ 'chags pa'i dus kyi tshe chab kyi
425a7(dkon brtsegs): phung po chen po stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi skye gnas de las ni gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya kha dog sna tshogs dang dbyibs sna tshogs pa 'byung zhing / 'khor gyi gling
425b1(dkon brtsegs): phran bye ba brgya phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi chab kyi phung po chen po de las 'byung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa theg pa chen po la yang dag par grub pa'i
425b2(dkon brtsegs): 'byung khungs dang / skye gnas su gyur pa de las byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad dang / chos snang ba'i sgo rnam pa sna tshogs dang / 'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pa
425b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang phyug thams cad dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde ba lha dang mi rnams kyi sngon ma myong ba gang lags pa thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom
425b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das/ dper na/ sa chen po ni khur chen po bzhi'i rten bgyid pa lags te/ bzhi po de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chab kyi phung po chen po rgya mtsho dang / ri mang po thams cad dang / gnas
425b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / lo tog dang / nags tshal thams cad dang / sems can gyi tshogs thams cad kyi rten bgyid de/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar sa chen po khur chen po
425b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po 'di dag gi rten bgyid pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni sa chen po bas kyang ches khur chen po bzhi khyer ba lags
425b7(dkon brtsegs): so| |bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo sems can dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral zhing thos pa dang mi ldan la/ chos can ma lags pa rnams lha dang mi'i phun
426a1(dkon brtsegs): sum tshogs pa 'thob par bgyid pa'i dge ba'i rtsab dag la sbyor ba ni sa chen po bas kyang ches khur chen po khyer ba lags so/ /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu
426a2(dkon brtsegs): mo sems can kha cig nyan thos kyi theg pa la sbyor bar bgyid pa ni sa chen po bas kyang ches khur chen po khyer ba lags so/ /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo sems can kha cig rang
426a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sbyor bar bgyid pa ni sa chen po bas kyang ches khur chen po khyer ba lags so/ /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo sems can kha cig theg pa chen po la sbyor bar
426a4(dkon brtsegs): bgyid pa ni sa chen po bas kyang ches khur chen po khyer ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ bzhi po de dag ni khur chen po lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu
426a5(dkon brtsegs): mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni khur chen po 'di bzhi khyer ba lags te/ sa chen po bas kyang ches rten du gyur pa dang / sa chen po pas kyang ches khur chen po khyer ba dang / khur
426a6(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas pa khyer ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi gzhi rten du gyur pa dang / byams pa bgyis pa dang / snying rje can dang / sman par 'tshal ba dang / snying brtse ba dang / chos kyi 'jig
426a7(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi ma zhes bgyi ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dper na/ sa chen po ni rin po che sna bzhi'i 'byung gnas lags te/ sna bzhi po de dag gang zhe na/ rin po che rin thang ma
426b1(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa dag gi 'byung gnas dang / rin po che rin thang mchis pa dag gi 'byung gnas dang / rin po che de bas chung ba dag gi 'byung gnas dang / rin po che de bas kyang chung ba dag gi 'byung
426b2(dkon brtsegs): gnas lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar sa chen po rin po che sna bzhi po 'di dag gi 'byung gnas su gyur pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dam
426b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa la brten nas sems can rnams kyi rin po che'i mchog chen po/ rin po che thams cad kyi mchog dam par gyur pa bzhi'i khe rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe
426b4(dkon brtsegs): n a| dge ba'i bshes gnyen rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de la brten nas sems can rnams kyi lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa thob par bgyid pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi khe
426b5(dkon brtsegs): rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos kyi theg par nye bar 'gro ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thob par bgyi ba rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par nye bar 'gro ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thob
426b6(dkon brtsegs): par bgyi ba rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su nye bar 'gro ba'i bsod nams kyi tshogs ches mthon po thob par bgyi ba rnyed par 'gyur ba ste/ bcom ldan 'das/
426b7(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa la brten nas sems can rnams kyis rin po che thams cad kyi mchog ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i rin po che chen po bzhi'i
427a1(dkon brtsegs): khe rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gter chen po rin po che mtha' yas pa'i 'byung gnas zhes bgyi ba de ni/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i tshig bla
427a2(dkon brtsegs): dwags lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bgyi ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das/ dam pa'i chos kyang gzhan ma
427a3(dkon brtsegs): lags la/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po nyid dam pa'i chos lags so/ /bcom
427a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags la/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ dam pa'i chos yongs su
427a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa po nyid pha rol tu phyin pa rnams lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni sems can
427a6(dkon brtsegs): gang sbyin pas yongs su smin par bgyi ba de dag ni sbyin pas yongs su smin par bgyid de/ tha na lus kyi yan lag dang / nying lag yongs su gtong bas kyang yongs su smin par bgyid
427a7(dkon brtsegs): de/ de ltar yongs su smin par bgyis pa rnams dam pa'i chos la gnas par 'gyur ba 'di ni de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sems can gang
427b1(dkon brtsegs): dag tshul khrims kyis yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i sems can de dag ni/ dbang po drug bsdams pa dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las yongs su dag pas
427b2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su smin par bgyid de/ tha na spyod lam gyis kyang de dag gi sems bsrung zhing yongs su smin par bgyid de/ de dag de ltar yongs su smin par bgyis pas dam pa'i chos
427b3(dkon brtsegs): la gnas par 'gyur ba 'di ni de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sems can gang dag bzod pas yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i sems
427b4(dkon brtsegs): can de dag la ni/ de dag gis de la spyos/ brgyad de gtses pa bgyis kyang gnod sems ma mchis shing sman par 'tshal ba dang / bzod pa'i stobs dam pa dang ldan pas yongs
427b5(dkon brtsegs): su smin par bgyid de/ tha na bzhin gyi mdangs kyis kyang de dag gi sems bsrung zhing yongs su smin par bgyid de/ de dag yongs su smin par bgyis pas dam pa'i chos la
427b6(dkon brtsegs): gnas par 'gyur ba 'di ni de'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sems can gang dag brtson 'grus kyis yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i sems
427b7(dkon brtsegs): can de dag ni sems ma zhum zhing le lo ma mchis pa dang / 'dun pa chen po dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa mchog dang ldan pas yongs su smin par bgyid de/ tha na rang gi spyod
428a1(dkon brtsegs): lam bsgrims pas kyang de dag gi sems bsrung zhing yongs su smin par bgyid de/ de dag de ltar yongs su smin par bgyis pas dam pa'i chos la
428a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas par 'gyur ba 'di ni de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sems can gang dag bsam gtan gyis yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i sems can
428a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag ni sems mi g.yeng ba dang / yid phyi rol du mi rgyu ba dang / dran pa 'khrul pa ma mchis pa mchog dang ldan pas yongs su smin par bgyid de/ tha na bgyis nas yun ring du lags pa dang /
428a4(dkon brtsegs): smras nas yun ring du lags pa mi bskyud pas kyang de dag gi sems bsrung zhing yongs su smin par bgyid de/ de dag de ltar yongs su smin par bgyis pas dam pa'i chos la gnas
428a5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba 'di ni de'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sems can gang dag shes rab kyis yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i sems can de dag
428a6(dkon brtsegs): ni sems can gyi don 'dri ba dag las le lo ma mchis par lung ston pa dang / bstan bcos thams cad dang / rig pa dang bzo'i gnas thams cad kyi mthar phyin pas yongs su
428a7(dkon brtsegs): smin par bgyid de/ tha na bzo gra'i gnas chen po dag tu yang de dag gi sems bsrung zhing yongs su smin par bgyid de/ de dag de ltar yongs su smin par bgyis pas dam pa'i
428b1(dkon brtsegs): chos la gnas par 'gyur ba 'di ni de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de lta lags pas pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags la/ dam pa'i
428b2(dkon brtsegs): chos yongs su 'dzin pa po yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po nyid pha rol tu phyin pa rnams lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di la de
428b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus don chen po bstan pa gzhan yang bdag gis spobs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha mo/ de bzhin gshegs pas gnang gi khyod kyis spobs
428b4(dkon brtsegs): par gyis shig / de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo dpal phreng gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin
428b5(dkon brtsegs): pa po zhes bgyi ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po nyid dam pa'i chos yongs su
428b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa des ni/ bcom ldan 'das/ dam pa'i chos yongs su
428b7(dkon brtsegs): gzung ba'i slad du yan lag gsum yongs su gtong bar 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di ltar lus dang / srog dang / longs spyod rnams te/ bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs
429a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu mo lus yongs su gtong bas ni sangs rgyas kyi sku 'khor ba'i phyi ma'i mtha'i mu dang mnyam pa rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang bral ba/ mi shigs pa/ rtag
429a2(dkon brtsegs): pa| brtan pa/ zhi ba/ ther zug pa/ 'chi 'pho dang bral ba/ mtha' yas pa/ yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs
429a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu mo srog yongs su gtong bas ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam par 'phrul par gnas par 'khor ba'i phyi ma'i mtha'i mu dang mnyam pa 'chi 'pho dang bral ba/ mtha' yas pa/ rtag pa/
429a4(dkon brtsegs): yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo longs spyod yongs su gtong bas ni sems can thams
429a5(dkon brtsegs): cad kyis mchod pa 'khor ba'i phyi ma'i mtha'i mu dang mnyam pa/ sems can thams cad dang thun mongs ma lags pa/ bas par mi 'gyur ba/ rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa/ rtag
429a6(dkon brtsegs): par rgyun mi 'chad cing rtag tu gnas pa/ yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dam pa'i chos
429a7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su 'dzin pa yan lag gsum po 'di dag yongs su gtong bas ni yon tan shin tu rmad du byung ba gsum po de dag thob par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyang lung ston par
429b1(dkon brtsegs): mdzad do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa'i tshe/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams
429b2(dkon brtsegs): bye zhing gnyis su gyur la/ sde sder chad de/ phyogs phyogs su gyes nas rtsod par gyur pa na/ g.yo ma mchis shing gya gyu ma mchis la/ sgyu ma mchis par chos la dga' zhing dam pa'i
429b3(dkon brtsegs): chos yongs su gzung ba'i slad du chos can gyi phyogs la 'jug par bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de zhugs pa nyid kyis sangs rgyas thams cad las
429b4(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan pa nges par thob par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni de ltar brtson 'grus chen po lags pa snyam bdag bgyid de/ 'di la bcom ldan
429b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das nyid spyan du gyur pa lags te/ ye shes su gyur pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ mnga' bdag lags/ bcom ldan
429b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das ni/ ston pa lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo dpal phreng gis dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa bstan pa la rjes su yi rang ba mdzad do/ /lha mo/ de de bzhin
429b7(dkon brtsegs): te| lha mo/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni brtson 'grus chen po yin no/ /lha mo/ dper na/ mi stobs dang ldan pas gnad du mi grag par bsnun du zin kyang snad par 'gyur
430a1(dkon brtsegs): zhing nad skyed par byed do/ /lha mo/ de bzhin du dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni chung du zin kyang bdud sdig can la gnod par 'gyur zhing mya ngan bskyed
430a2(dkon brtsegs): la| smre sngags 'don par byed do/ /lha mo/ ngas ni bdud sdig can la dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ji ltar gnod par 'gyur zhing mya ngan bskyed la/ smre sngags 'don par byed
430a3(dkon brtsegs): pa de ltar gnod par 'gyur ba dang / de ltar mya ngan bskyed pa dang / de ltar smre sngags 'don par byed pa'i dge ba'i chos gzhan gcig kyang ma mthong ngo / /lha mo/ dper na/ ba glang gi
430a4(dkon brtsegs): mchog khyu mchog gis ni/ 'di ltar 'phang mtho ba dang / chu zheng gis ba glang gi tshogs thams cad zil gyis mnan te/ mngon par brjid cing yang dag par mngon par brjid do/ /lha mo/
430a5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du theg pa chen po'i dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa yang chung du zin kyang 'di ltar rgyas pa dang / rgya chen por gyur pas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa
430a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi dge ba'i chos thams cad zil gyis gnon to/ /lha mo/ dper na/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyis ni 'di ltar mtho ba dang / rgya che bas ri nag po thams cad zil gyis gnon cing
430a7(dkon brtsegs): mngon par lhag ger 'dug go / lha mo/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po pa'i lus dang srog la mi lta zhing phan gdags pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa
430b1(dkon brtsegs): yang 'di ltar rgyas pa dang / rgya chen por gyur pas/ theg pa chen po pa theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa lus dang srog la lta ba rnams kyi dge ba'i chos thams cad zil gyis gnon na gzhan dag
430b2(dkon brtsegs): gi lta ci smos te/ lha mo/ de bas na sems can rnams dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba nyid yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya/ yang dag par bsten par bya/ yang dag par gzengs bstod
430b3(dkon brtsegs): par bya/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bya/ gzud par bya/ dgod par bya'o/ /lha mo/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni don che'o/ /de ltar 'bras bu che'o/ /de ltar phan yon che'o/ /lha mo/
430b4(dkon brtsegs): gal te bskal pa grangs med dpag tu med par dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i yon tan dang phan yon ngas bshad du zin kyang / lha mo/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i yon tan dang
430b5(dkon brtsegs): phan yon bshad pa de dag gi mtha' ma mur thug par mi 'gyur ro/ /lha mo/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni de ltar yon tan mtha' yas pa dang ldan no/ /lha mo/ dam pa'i chos yongs su
430b6(dkon brtsegs): bzung ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bzhed pa ngas bstan pa de khyod kyis bshad par spobs par gyis shig / de nas lha mo dpal phreng gis bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol nas bcom
430b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bskul ba mnos te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dam pa'i chos zhes bgyi ba de ni theg pa chen po'i tshig bla dwags lags so/ /de ci'i
431a1(dkon brtsegs): slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i chos thams
431a2(dkon brtsegs): cad ni theg pa chen pos rab tu phye ba'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ klung chen po bzhi ni mtsho ma dros pa las 'byung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du nyan
431a3(dkon brtsegs): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi thag pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i chos thams cad kyang theg pa chen po las 'byung ngo / /bcom ldan
431a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das/ dper na/ sa bon gyi rnam pa gang ci yang lags pa dag dang / rtswa dang / shing gel pa dang / sman dang / nags tshal de dag thams cad ni sa chen po la brten cing sa chen po la
431a5(dkon brtsegs): gnas te/ skye zhing 'phel la rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa gang lags pa dag dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig
431a6(dkon brtsegs): rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i chos gang lags pa de dag thams cad ni theg pa chen po la brten cing theg pa chen po la gnas te/ skye shing 'phel la rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/
431a7(dkon brtsegs): de ltar lags pas theg pa chen po la gnas shing theg pa chen po yongs su bzung na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las
431b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa'i dge ba'i chos thams cad kyang brtan cing gnas te yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dam pa'i chos gnas pa dang / dam pa'i chos nub pa
431b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / so sor thar pa dang / 'dul ba dang / rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen pa rdzogs pa gnas drug po 'di dag dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan cing brtags pa gang lags pa'i gnas
431b3(dkon brtsegs): drug po de dag kyang theg pa chen po'i dgongs pa las byung ba lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ dam pa'i chos gnas pa zhes bgyi ba'i btags pa 'di ni theg pa
431b4(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i dgongs pa can lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ theg pa chen po la gnas pa nyid ni dam pa'i chos gnas pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur
431b5(dkon brtsegs): ba zhes bgyi ba'i btags pa de ni theg pa chen po'i dgongs pa can lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ theg pa chen po nub pa nyid ni dam pa'i chos nub pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ so
431b6(dkon brtsegs): sor thar pa dang / 'dul ba zhes bgyi ba'i chos 'di gnyis ni don gcig ste/ yig 'bru ni tha dad lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'dul ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ni theg pa chen po pa rnams kyi
431b7(dkon brtsegs): bslab pa lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi slad du rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen pa rdzogs pa lags pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das
432a1(dkon brtsegs): de lta lags pas 'di ltar 'dul ba zhes bgyi ba dang / rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen pa rdzogs pa zhes bgyi ba'i btags pa 'di ni theg pa chen po'i cho ga'i
432a2(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims kyi phung po lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen pa rdzogs pa ma mchis so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/
432a3(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi slad du rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa ni ma mchis kyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi slad du nyan thos rnams dang /
432a4(dkon brtsegs): rang sangs rgyas rnams rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa lags pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs
432a5(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid la skyabs su mchi ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'jigs pa dang bcas pa lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
432a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das/ dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'du byed thams cad la mi bzad par 'jigs pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas pa lags pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom
432a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das/ dper na/ bshed mas ral gri gzas pa bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta lags pas de dag kyang nges par 'byung ba shin tu bde ba thob pa ma lags so/ /bcom
432b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ skyabs su gyur pa ni skyabs gzhan tshol ba ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar sems can skyabs ma mchis pa rnams gang
432b2(dkon brtsegs): dang gang gis 'jigs skrag pa'i 'jigs skrag pa de dang de las 'byung ba tshol ba de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das/ dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams la yang 'jigs
432b3(dkon brtsegs): pa de mchis te/ 'jigs pa des skrag pas dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang / bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su mchi bar khas len pa lags so/ /bcom ldan
432b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das/ dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'jigs pa dang bcas pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta lags pas dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs
432b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas rnams kyang skye ba'i chos kyi lhag ma dang bcas pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ de dag gi skye ba bas pa yang ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de dag ni bsten par bgyi ba'i
432b6(dkon brtsegs): lhag ma dang bcas pa lags te/ des na de dag ni dag pa ma lags/ las mthar phyin pa ma lags te/ de dag gi bgyis pa ma lags so/ /de dag gi spang bar bgyi ba'i chos gzhan yang
432b7(dkon brtsegs): mang du mchis te/ de dag ma spangs pas dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings dang ring ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ yongs su mya
433a1(dkon brtsegs): ngan las 'das pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs lags te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa
433a2(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni mya ngan las 'das pa rnyed pas yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa lags la/ bcom ldan 'das/ dgra bcom pa
433a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams ni yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni de
433a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs lags te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni
433a5(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'das pa brnyes pas yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa lags la/ bcom ldan 'das/ dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams ni yon tan
433a6(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs
433a7(dkon brtsegs): lags te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni mya ngan las 'das pa brnyes pas
433b1(dkon brtsegs): spang bar bgyi ba'i skyon thams cad spangs shing mchog tu yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa lags la/ bcom ldan 'das/ dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams ni skyon
433b2(dkon brtsegs): gyi lhag ma rnams dang bcas pa yongs su ma dag pa'i chos can lags pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa
433b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi thabs lags te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni mya ngan las 'das pa
433b4(dkon brtsegs): brnyes pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta lags pas dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings dang ring ba lags so/ /bcom

433b6(dkon brtsegs): de dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das/ dgongs pa can dang / lhag ma dang bcas pa dang / drang ba'i don dang / rnam par phye ste lung bstan par bgyi ba lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/
433b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das/ 'chi 'pho ni 'di nyid lags te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ rgyun chad pa'i 'chi 'pho ba dang / yongs su bsngos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'chi 'pho ba lags so/ /

434a2(dkon brtsegs): su bsngos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'chi 'pho ni dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang thob pa
434a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / yid kyi lus rnams lags te/ byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de la 'chi 'pho 'di gnyis las rgyun chad pa'i 'chi 'pho'i
434a4(dkon brtsegs): dbang du bgyis te/ bdag gi skye ba zad do snyam du dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes pa 'byung lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar lhag ma
434a5(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis pa la brten nas bdag gis tshangs par spyad pa bsten to snyam du dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi
434a6(dkon brtsegs): shes pa 'byung lags so/ /byis pa so so'i skye bo dang / lha dang mi bgyi ba dang bcas pa thams cad dang / slob pa bdun po dag gis nying mtshams sbyor ba dang bcas
434a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams spang ba sngon ma bgyis pa de spangs pa la brten nas bya ba byas so snyam du dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes pa 'byung
434b1(dkon brtsegs): lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta bu nyid las gzhan mi shes so zhes bgyi ba ni dgra bcom pas spang bar bgyi ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang yang srid par nying mtshams
434b2(dkon brtsegs): sbyor ba'i dbang du bgyis nas/ 'di lta bu nyid las gzhan mi shes so snyam du dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes pa 'byung lags so/ /bcom ldan

434b4(dkon brtsegs): byung ba yang ma lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams la yang nyon mongs pa rnams ma spangs pa dang / skye
434b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams yongs su ma 'tshal ba yang ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ nyon mongs pa dag ni rnam pa gnyis te/ gnas kyi sa'i nyon mongs pa
434b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / kun nas ldang ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gnas kyi sa yang rnam pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di ltar lta ba gcig la gnas pa'i
434b7(dkon brtsegs): gnas kyi sa dang / 'dod pa'i 'dod chags la gnas pa'i gnas kyi sa dang / gzugs kyi 'dod chags la gnas pa'i gnas kyi sa dang / srid pa'i 'dod chags la gnas pa'i

435a3(dkon brtsegs): nas mchis pa ni sems dang mi ldan pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gnas kyi sa bzhi po de dag gi nang na stobs che ba gang lags pa de ni nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams
