438b7(dkon brtsegs): cing ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa la gnas te skye zhing 'phel la rgyas par 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa spangs shing sbyangs te ma mchis par gyur na ni
439a1(dkon brtsegs): s pang bar bgyi ba'i chos gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pa snyed gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes kyis gzhom par bgyi ba de dag thams cad
439a2(dkon brtsegs): spangs shing sbyangs te ma mchis par 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa de dag thams cad spangs shing sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis
439a3(dkon brtsegs): mi khyab pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pa snyed brnyes pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis chos thams cad la sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i mngon par mkhyen pa brnyes te/ thams
439a4(dkon brtsegs): cad mkhyen pa dang / thams cad gzigs pa dang / skyon thams cad spangs pa dang / yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa dang / chos kyi rgyal po chos kyi dbang phyug chos thams cad la
439a5(dkon brtsegs): mnga' bsgyur ba'i sar gshegs nas nga'i skye ba zad do/ /tshangs par spyad pa bstan to/ /bya ba byas so/ /'di lta bu nyid las gzhan mi shes so zhes seng ge'i sgra sgrogs par mdzad do//
439a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das/ de lta lags pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi seng+ge'i sgra 'di ni nges pa'i don lags te/ don 'di ni mgo gcig tu lung bstan par bgyi ba yang lags
439a7(dkon brtsegs): so| |bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta bu nyid las gzhan mi shes so zhes bgyi ba'i ye shes la yang rnam pa gnyis te/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas
439b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam par rgyal ba bla na ma mchis pa'i bdud bzhi bcom ste/ pham par mdzad nas chos kyi sku 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa sems can thams cad kyis
439b2(dkon brtsegs): lta bar bgyi ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa brnyes te/ shes bya'i sa thams cad la thogs pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi dbang phyug mdzad pa na/ 'di las lhag par bya ba'am rtogs par
439b3(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i sa med do zhes yang dag par gzigs te/ stobs bcu po dag gi stobs dang ldan zhing / mi 'jigs pa'i sa bla na med pa'i mchog tu yang dag par gshegs te/ shes bya
439b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la bsgrib pa mi mnga' ba'i ye shes kyis rnam par gzigs nas 'di lta bu nyid las gzhan mi shes so zhes bgyi ba'i ye shes kyis seng+ge'i sgra sgrogs par mdzad do/ /bcom
439b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das/ dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa las brgal ba de ma thag tu rnam par grol ba dag gis bde ba nyams su myong ba rnams ni 'di ltar
439b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa rnams las yongs su grol gyi/ bdag gis ni phyin chad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar mi 'gyur ro snyam du yang dag par mthong ste/ bcom
439b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das/ dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams 'di lta bu nyid las gzhan mi shes so zhes bgyi bar rtogs nas dbugs phyin pa'i mchog mya ngan las 'das
440a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sa la so sor rtog go / bcom ldan 'das/ de dag gis rtogs nas kyang sa de la rmongs pa ma mchis pa'i chos can du 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das/ de dag
440a2(dkon brtsegs): gis kyang gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par bdag gis ni 'di ltar lhag ma dang bcas pa'i sa thob ste/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to snyam du 'tshal
440a3(dkon brtsegs): lo| |de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnams ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par 'du ba'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ theg pa
440a4(dkon brtsegs): chen po zhes bgyi ba de ni sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i tshig bla dwags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar na theg pa gsum po 'di dag ni theg pa gcig kho na'i grangs su mchi'o/ /bcom ldan
440a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das/ theg pa gcig rtogs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rtogs par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bgyi
440a6(dkon brtsegs): ba de ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings kyi tshig bla dwags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings zhes bgyi ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku'i tshig bla dwags
440a7(dkon brtsegs): lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi sku rtogs pa'i mtha' ni theg pa gcig pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang gzhan ma lags/ chos kyi sku yang gzhan
440b1(dkon brtsegs): ma lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid chos kyi sku lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi sku rtogs pa'i mtha' ni theg pa gcig gi mtha' lags so/ /bcom ldan
440b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das/ theg pa gcig gi mtha' zhes bgyi ba de ni theg pa gcig gi mthar sbyar ba'i tshig bla dwags lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni dus
440b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi mtha' mchis pa la gnas pa ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par
440b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni 'jig rten la sman pa'i slad du dus kyi mtha' mchis pa'i thugs rje can dang / dus kyi mtha' mchis pa'i thugs dam
440b5(dkon brtsegs): mnga' ba ma lags te/ kye 'jig rten la phan pa'i phyir dus kyi mtha' med par snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dus kyi mtha' med par yi dam bcas pa'i sems can a la la zhes mchi ba dag
440b6(dkon brtsegs): ni| bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la yang dag par smra bas smra ba lags so/ /kye 'jig rten la phan pa'i phyir chos mi zad pa dang / chos rtag pa dang / chos brtan pa dang /
440b7(dkon brtsegs): skyabs kyi sems can a la la zhes mchi ba dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la yang dag par smra bas smra ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de lta lags pas 'di ltar de bzhin
441a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni skyabs ma mchis pa dang / skyob pa ma mchis pa'i 'jig rten na phyi ma'i mthar
441a2(dkon brtsegs): thug par skyabs mi zad pa dang / skyabs rtag pa dang / skyabs brtan pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos zhes bgyi ba de ni theg pa gcig gi lam bstan pa'i tshig bla dwags lags
441a3(dkon brtsegs): so| |bcom ldan 'das/ dge 'dun zhes bgyi ba de ni theg pa gsum pa'i tshogs kyi tshig bla dwags lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ skyabs 'di gnyis ni de'i yan lag gi
441a4(dkon brtsegs): skyabs zhes bgyi ste/ skyabs kyi rab ma lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ theg pa gcig gi lam bstan pa'i chos kyang chos kyi sku rtogs pa'i mtha' lags te/
441a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das/ de'i pha rol na theg pa gcig gi lam bstan pa'i chos kyis ni bgyi ba ci yang ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ theg pa gsum pa'i tshogs kyang 'jigs pa
441a6(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas pas de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabs su mchi ba dang / 'byung ba'i thabs tshol ba dang / slob pa dang / bgyi ba dang bcas pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
441a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub la zhugs pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar na skyabs 'di gnyis ni skyabs kyi rab ma lags te/ dus kyi mtha' mchis pa'i skyabs lags so/ /bcom
441b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das/ sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pas btul ba de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabs su mchi ba na/ chos nyid kyi rgyu mthun pa la mngon par dad pas
441b2(dkon brtsegs): chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la yang skyabs su mchi ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos nyid kyi rgyu mthun pa la mngon par dad pas skyabs su mchi ba ni gnyis la skyabs su mchi bar bgyi
441b3(dkon brtsegs): ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabs su mchi ba ni chos nyid kyi rgyu mthun pa la mngon par dad pas mchi bar bgyi ba ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/
441b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabs su mchi ba ni skyabs su mchi ba yang dag pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ skyabs su mchi ba gnyis kyang yang dag par na de bzhin gshegs pa
441b5(dkon brtsegs): la skyabs su mchi zhes bgyi ba'i mtha' lags par khong du chud par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang gzhan ma lags/ skyabs gnyis
441b6(dkon brtsegs): po yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid skyabs gsum lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ theg pa gcig gi lam bstan pa'i
441b7(dkon brtsegs): chos 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog gi gsung dang / de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i sgra so sor yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ldan pa lags pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan
442a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das/ mos pa ji lta ba dag la de bzhin gshegs pas theg pa gnyis po thabs kyi bsgrub pas bsgrubs pa de dag kyang / theg pa chen po bdag nyid kyi slad du
442a2(dkon brtsegs): lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ theg pa 'di gnyis kyi ming ni ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das/ yang dag par na 'di la theg pa gcig po ni theg pa yang dag pa lags te/ theg
442a3(dkon brtsegs): pa gsum yang dag par 'du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'phags pa'i bden pa thog mar mngon par rtogs pa'i shes pa gcig pus ni
442a4(dkon brtsegs): gnas kyi sa de snyed cig spong bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes pa de gcig pus yongs su 'tshal ba la sogs pa'i yon tan bzhi po rnams mngon sum du bgyid par
442a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhing / don bzhi po bdag nyid chos nyid kyis shin tu so sor rtogs par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes pa la shes pa bzhi 'pho ba dang /
442a6(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa bzhi 'pho ba ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten las 'das pa shes pa rdo rje lta bu ni mi 'pho ba'i chos can lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar 'di
442a7(dkon brtsegs): la nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas kyi sa spong ba'i 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa dang po ni yang dag pa'i shes pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ de
442b1(dkon brtsegs): dag la 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa rnam pa gnyis kyi sa gnas kyi sa spong ba ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
442b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas rnams ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul ma lags pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi sbubs spong lags
442b3(dkon brtsegs): so| |bcom ldan 'das/ nyon mongs pa'i sbubs thams cad 'byed pa'i mthar phyin pa'i ye shes gang lags pa de ni yang dag pa'i ye shes zhes bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'phags pa'i
442b4(dkon brtsegs): bden pa 'tshal ba dang po ni mthar phyin pa'i shes pa ma lags te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa'i shes pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'phags pa'i don de
442b5(dkon brtsegs): ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshig bla dwags ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams ni yon tan tshad mchis pa lags te/ bcom
442b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das/ de'i yan lag gi yon tan dang ldan pa'i slad du nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams la 'phags pa zhes bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhes
442b7(dkon brtsegs): bgyi ba de dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi bden pa ma lags/ nyan thos dang sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan ma lags te/ bden pa 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa
443a1(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis thog mar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing mngon par mkhyen la/ so sor rtogs nas
443a2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par mkhyen pa'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs su bcug pa'i 'jig rten la bstan cing btags te/ de'i slad du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
443a3(dkon brtsegs): zhes bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don bshad pa ni zab cing phra la brtag par dka' ste/ khong du chud par dka' zhing brtag mi nus la/ rtog ge'i spyod pa
443a4(dkon brtsegs): ma lags te/ mkhas shing mdzangs pas rig pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ zab mo bstan pa bshad pa
443a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po lags pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul lags te/ nyan thos dang
443a6(dkon brtsegs): rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don bshad pa 'di'i gnas lags so/ /bcom
443a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i gnas zab pas na 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don yang zab cing phra la brtag par dka' ste/ rtogs par dka' zhing brtag mi nus la/ rtog
443b1(dkon brtsegs): ge'i spyod yul pa ma lags te/ mkhas shing mdzangs pas rig pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa zhes bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi sbubs
443b2(dkon brtsegs): k yi mthas dkris pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la the tshom ma mchis pa de ni nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi sbubs nas rnam par grol ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku la yang
443b3(dkon brtsegs): the tshom ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang gi yid de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi
443b4(dkon brtsegs): khyab pa'i dgongs pa'i mthar phyin pa de ni/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don bshad pa rnam pa 'di gnyis la yid ches shing dad de mos pa lags so/ /bcom ldan
443b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das/ de ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don bshad pa rnam pa gnyis ni rig par dka' zhing rtogs par dka' ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'phags pa'i bden
443b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i don bshad pa rnam pa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don bshad pa bgyi ba mchis pa dang / bgyi ba ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de la
443b7(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don bshad pa bgyi ba mchis pa ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhis bstan pa dang / btags pa tshad ma mchis pa lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/
444a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan gyis bgyid du stsal kyang sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su 'tshal ba dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba thams cad spang
444a2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa thams cad mngon sum du bgyi ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam thams cad bsgom par mi nus te/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta lags
444a3(dkon brtsegs): pas 'khor ba la yang 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas pa mchis so/ /mya ngan las 'das pa la yang 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas pa mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'phags
444a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bden pa'i don bshad pa bgyi ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das/ de la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi bstan pa dang / btags pa dag dpag tu ma mchis pa
444a5(dkon brtsegs): lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag nyid kyis bsal kyang zin pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su 'tshal ba dang / zin pa'i sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba
444a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad spang ba dang / zin pa'i sdug bsngal 'gog pa thams cad mngon sum du bgyi ba dang / zin pa'i sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam bsgom par nus pa'i slad du ste/
444a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi bstan pa bshad pa gang lags pa de dag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam pa brgyad du 'gyur ro/ /
444b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don bstan par bgyi ba ma mchis pa bzhi po dag
444b2(dkon brtsegs): la rdzogs par mdzad pa lags so/ /nyan thos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams ni rdzogs par bgyid pa ma lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ rab 'bring tha
444b3(dkon brtsegs): ma'i chos rtogs pas mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rtogs pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
444b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i don bshad par bgyi ba ma mchis pa dag la rdzogs par mdzad pa lags she na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa
444b5(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma 'ongs pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad ni yongs su mkhyen/ bcom ldan 'das/ nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon
444b6(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa thams cad 'du ba'i sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba thams cad ni spangs/ bcom ldan 'das/ yid kyi phung po thams cad 'gog pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad 'gog pa ni mngon
444b7(dkon brtsegs): sum du mdzad de/ bcom ldan 'das/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa ni chos chud gson pa ma lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku thog ma
445a1(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa'i dus nas mchis pa/ ma bgyis pa/ ma skyes pa/ mi bas pa/ bas pa ma mchis pa/ rtag pa/ brtan pa/ rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa/
445a2(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi sbubs nas nges par grol ba/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tha dad du mi gnas pa/ grol bar shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma las 'das
445a3(dkon brtsegs): pa snyed dang ldan pa ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i ming gis bstan pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ de nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i chos kyi sku nyon mongs pa'i sbubs
445a4(dkon brtsegs): nas nges par grol ba zhes bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po shes pa nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyi ye shes lags te/ de bzhin
445a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i snying po ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sngon ma mthong / ma rtogs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis ni thugs su chud cing mngon sum du mdzad do//
445a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po stong pa nyid shes pa ni 'di gnyis lags te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
445a7(dkon brtsegs): snying po nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi sbubs dang tha dad du gnas pa ma grol bas shes pa rnams kyis stong pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po sangs
445b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos tha dad du mi gnas shing grol bas shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pa snyed dag gi mi stong pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs
445b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i snying po stong pa nyid shes pa rnam pa 'di gnyis la nyan thos chen po dag kyang bcom ldan 'das nyid la yid ches pas 'jug par bas te/ bcom ldan 'das/ nyan thos
445b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stong pa nyid shes pa ni/ phyin ci log gi dmigs pa bzhi po dag la 'jug lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de lta lags pas nyan thos dang / rang
445b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sdug bsngal 'gog pa thams cad sngon ma mthong / sngon ma rtogs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ni thugs su chud cing mngon sum du mdzad do/ /nyon mongs
445b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sbubs thams cad 'joms pa sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam thams cad kyang bsgoms so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di dag la bden pa
445b6(dkon brtsegs): gsum ni mi rtag pa lags so/ /bden pa gcig ni rtag pa lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das/ bden pa gsum ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid du gtogs pa'i slad
445b7(dkon brtsegs): du ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid du gtogs pa de ni mi rtag pa lags so/ /gang mi rtag pa de ni rdzun pa slu ba'i chos can lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang
446a1(dkon brtsegs): rdzun pa slu ba'i chos can de ni mi bden pa dang / mi rtag pa lags te/ sbubs ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de lta lags pas 'phags pa'i sdug
446a2(dkon brtsegs): bsngal bden pa dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba bden pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa yang / yang dag par na mi bden pa dang / mi rtag pa
446a3(dkon brtsegs): lags te/ skyabs ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di la bden pa gcig ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid kyi yul las 'das pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang 'dus
446a4(dkon brtsegs): byas kyi mtshan nyid kyi yul las 'das pa de ni rtag pa lags so/ /gang rtag pa de ni mi slu ba'i chos can lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang mi slu ba'i chos can de ni bden pa dang /
446a5(dkon brtsegs): rtag pa dang / skyabs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de lta lags pas 'di la sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i bden pa ni yang dag par na bden pa dang / rtag pa dang / skyabs lags
446a6(dkon brtsegs): so| |bcom ldan 'das/ sems can thams cad kyi rnam par shes pa'i yul las 'das pa sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i bden pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs
446a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas thams cad kyi shes pa'i spyod yul ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dper na/ dmus long gzugs la lta mi nus pa dang / bu btsa' pa'i gnas na mchis pa'i byis pa
446b1(dkon brtsegs): dgung bdun lags pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la lta mi nus pa bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i bden pa yang byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi rnam par shes
446b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yul yang ma lags/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes pa'i yul yang ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi rnam par shes
446b3(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bgyi ba de ni mtha' gnyis la lta ba'i phyin ci log pa rnams kyi tshig bla dwags lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes pa zhes bgyi
446b4(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni shes pa dag pa'i tshig bla dwags lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mtha' gnyis su lta ba zhes bgyi ba de ni nye bar len pa'i phung po dag la bdag tu mngon par zhen pa'i byis pa
446b5(dkon brtsegs): so so'i skye bo rtog ge pa dag gi tshig bla dwags lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di gnyis ni mthar lta ba zhes bgyi ste/ gnyis gang zhen/ chad par lta ba dang / rtag par lta ba lags
446b6(dkon brtsegs): so| |bcom ldan 'das/ gal te 'du byed rnams la mi rtag par lta na de ni de'i chad par lta ba ma lags te/ de ni de'i yang dag pa'i lta ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te
446b7(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'das pa la rtag par lta na/ de ni de'i rtag par lta ba ma lags te/ de ni de'i yang dag pa'i lta ba lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ rtog ge pa dag gi
447a1(dkon brtsegs): lta ba ni 'di lta bu lags te/ lus dang / dbang po dang / tshor ba dang / sems pa rnams tshe 'di nyid la 'jig par mthong nas srid pa'i mtshams sbyor ba la
447a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jug par mi bgyid cing ma 'tshal bas ldongs par gyur pa skad de/ chad par lta bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rtog ge pa dag gi lta ba ni sems kyi rgyud la rmongs shing sems
447a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi skad cig 'jig pa la yang 'jug par mi bgyid la/ rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul du ma gyur pa skad de/ rtag par lta bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar rtog ge pa dag gi
447a4(dkon brtsegs): lta ba ni de lta bu dag lags pa skad de/ de dag ni don de las thal ba'i lta ba dang / don de'i tha chad kyi lta ba dang / gzhan gyi mtshan nyid dang 'dres pa'i lta bas chad par rlom sems
447a5(dkon brtsegs): bgyid pa dang / rtag par rlom sems bgyid pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sems can rnams ni zin pa'i phung po lnga po dag la phyin ci log par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das/
447a6(dkon brtsegs): de dag ni mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa dang / sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes pa dang / bdag ma mchis pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa dang / mi gtsang ba la gtsang bar 'du
447a7(dkon brtsegs): shes pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes
447b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dag pas kyang sngon ma mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa la dad pas rtag par 'du shes pa dang / bde bar 'du shes pa dang / bdag tu 'du
447b2(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / gtsang bar 'du shes pa'i sems can de dag ni/ bcom ldan 'das/ phyin ci log tu 'gyur ba ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ sems can de dag ni yang dag pa'i lta ba can
447b3(dkon brtsegs): du 'gyur ba lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku nyid rtag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bde ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bdag gi pha rol
447b4(dkon brtsegs): tu phyin pa dang / gtsang ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku la de ltar mthong ba de dag ni yang dag par
447b5(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ yang dag par mthong ba gang lags pa de dag ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sras thugs las skyes pa dang / zhal nas skyes pa dang / chos las skyes
447b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / chos kyi sprul pa dang / chos kyi bgo skal la spyod pa zhes bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes pa dag pa zhes bgyi ba ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes pa'i pha
447b7(dkon brtsegs): rol tu phyin pa lags te/ 'di ltar shes pa dag pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i bden pa ni shes pa dag pa de'i spyod yul yang ma lags/ yul yang ma lag
448a1(dkon brtsegs): na| bcom ldan 'das/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i bden pa rton pa bzhi'i shes pa can dag gi spyod yul ma lags shing yul ma lags pa lta smos kyang ci
448a2(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ theg pa gsum pa'i las dang po pa rmongs pa ma mchis pa'i chos can dag gis don de khong du chud par 'gyur zhing / don de rtogs
448a3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis rton pa bzhi bshad cing btags pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rton pa bzhi po 'di dag ni 'jig rten pa lags so/ /bcom ldan
448a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das/ rton pa gcig pu 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i bden pa ni rton pa thams cad kyi mchog 'jig rten las 'das pa lags te/ de ni yang dag par rton par bgyi ba dang /
448a5(dkon brtsegs): skyabs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni 'khor ba na rton pa lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po nyid kyi dbang du bgyis nas/ bcom ldan
448a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis sngon gyi mtha' med do zhes bshad cing btags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po mchis na 'khor ba zhes mchi na ni tshig de rigs pa lags
448a7(dkon brtsegs): so| |bcom ldan 'das/ 'khor ba zhes bgyi ba ni zin pa dag gi dbang po rnams 'phos ma thag tu zin pa dag gi dbang po rnams len pa la 'khor ba zhes bgyi'o/ bcom ldan
448b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das/ 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba zhes bgyi ba'i chos gnyis kyi ming de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i tshig bla dwags lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gum zhes bgyi ba dang / skyes
448b2(dkon brtsegs): zhes bgyi ba 'di ni 'jig rten tha snyad lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gum zhes bgyi ba ni dbang po 'gags pa 'di lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ skyes zhes bgyi ba ni dbang
448b3(dkon brtsegs): bo sar pa rnams byung ba 'di lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la ni skye ba'am/ 'gum pa'am/ 'pho ba'am/ 'byung ba yang ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/
448b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid kyi yul las 'das pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni rtag pa dang / brtan pa dang / ther
448b5(dkon brtsegs): zug pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de lta lags pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni tha dad du mi gnas shing 'brel la sbubs nas grol ba'i shes pa can dag gi gzhi dang / rten dang /
448b6(dkon brtsegs): gnas lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni 'brel pa ma mchis shing tha dad du gnas la shes pa grol ba ma lags pa phyi rol gyi 'dus byas kyi
448b7(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams kyi gzhi dang / rten dang / gnas kyang lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ma mchis na ni sdug bsngal la skyo ba dang / mya ngan las
449a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa la 'dod cing don du gnyer ba dang / smon pa yang ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnam par shes pa drug po
449a2(dkon brtsegs): gang lags pa 'di dag dang / rnam par shes pa gang lags pa 'di dang / bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar chos bdun po 'di dag ni mi gnas pa dang / skad cig pa dang / sdug bsngal
449a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams myong ba ma lags pas/ chos de dag ni sdug bsngal la skyo ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la 'dod cing don du gnyer ba dang smon par mi rigs so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de
449a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni thog ma dang tha ma ma mchis pa'i mthar mchis pa dang / mi skye ba dang / mi 'gag pa'i chos can sdug bsngal myong ba ma lags pas/ bcom ldan
449a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni sdug bsngal la yang skyo ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa yang 'dod cing don du gnyer ba dang smon par 'os so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de
449a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yang bdag ma lags/ sems can ma lags/ srog ma lags/ gang zag ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni
449a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can 'jig tshogs la lta bar lhung ba dag dang / phyin ci log gis nyams par gyur pa dag dang / stong pa nyid las sems g.yeng ba rnams kyi spyod yul ma lags so/ /
449b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po 'di ni dam pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po lags so/ /chos kyi sku'i snying po lags so/ /'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi snying po
449b2(dkon brtsegs): lags so/ /rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i chos kyi snying po lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying por rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa glo bur gyi nye ba'i
449b3(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pas nye bar nyon mongs pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul te/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo snyam bdag bgyid do/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ dge ba'i
449b4(dkon brtsegs): sems ni skad cig pa ste/ nyon mongs pa rnams kyis kun nas nyon mongs pa ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ mi dge pa'i sems kyang skad cig pa ste/ sems de yang nyon mongs
449b5(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyis kun nas nyon mongs pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ nyon mongs pa rnams ni sems la mi reg /sems kyang nyon mongs pa rnams la mi reg pa
449b6(dkon brtsegs): lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di la ji ltar sems mi reg pa'i chos can nye bar nyon mongs par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa yang mchis la/ sems
449b7(dkon brtsegs): nye bar nyon mongs pa yang mchis pas/ bcom ldan 'das/ sems rang bzhin kyis yongs su dag pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i don ni khong du chud par dka' ba lags te/ bcom
450a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das/ 'di la bcom ldan 'das nyid spyan du gyur pa lags te/ ye shes su gyur pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba lags
450a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ni/ mnga' bdag lags/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ ston pa lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo dpal phreng gis rtogs par dka' ba'i don
450a3(dkon brtsegs): bshad pa gsan nas rjes su yi rang bar mdzad de/ lha mo/ de de bzhin no/ /lha mo/ de de bzhin te/ sems rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa rtogs par dka' ba dang / sems
450a4(dkon brtsegs): de'i nye bar nyon mongs pa rtogs par dka' ba'o/ /lha mo/ chos 'di gnyis nyan nus pa ni khyod dam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos chen po dang ldan pa gzhan dag yin no/ /lha
450a5(dkon brtsegs): mo| nyan thos rnams ni chos 'di gnyis la de bzhin gshegs pa la dad pas 'gro bar zad de/ /lha mo/ nga'i nyan thos gang dag dad pa dang ldan zhing dad pa'i dbang du byed pa
450a6(dkon brtsegs): de dag ni dad pa'i snang ba la brten nas/ chos dang mthun par sdud pa'i shes pas 'di la nges par 'gyur ro/ /lha mo/ chos dang mthun par sdud par shes pa zhes bya ba ni/
450a7(dkon brtsegs): lha mo/ dbang po'i rnam par rig pa yid kyi spyod yul la rnam par lta ba dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa la rnam par lta ba dang / dgra bcom pa rnams kyi gnyid la rnam par
450b1(dkon brtsegs): lta ba dang / sems la dbang du gyur pa rnams kyi bsam gtan la dga' ba dang bde ba la rnam par lta ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'phags pa'i rdzu 'phrul la rnam
450b2(dkon brtsegs): par lta ba ste/ lha mo/ rnam par lta ba'i rang bzhin rnam pa lnga la mkhas pa 'di dang ldan na/ lha mo/ da ltar dang / nga 'das pa'i 'og ma 'ongs pa'i dus na nga'i nyan thos dad pa dang ldan
450b3(dkon brtsegs): zhing dad pa'i dbang du byed pa de dag dad pa'i snang ba la brten nas chos dang mthun par sdud pa'i shes pas rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa dang / sems kyis nye bar nyon mongs pa la
450b4(dkon brtsegs): nges par 'gyur ro/ /lha mo/ de dag gi nges pa'i de nyid ni theg pa chen po'i lam du 'jug pa'i rgyur 'gyur te/ lha mo/ de ltar na 'di lta ste/ chos zab mo mi spong ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs
450b5(dkon brtsegs): pa la dad pas 'gro ba ni phan pa mang po yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo dpal phreng gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di la sman pa mang ba'i don
450b6(dkon brtsegs): bshad pa gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus bdag spobs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha mo/ khyod spobs par gyis shig /de nas bcom ldan 'das
450b7(dkon brtsegs): la lha mo dpal phreng gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gsum po 'di dag ni rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo chos zab mo dag la ma rmas ma nyams par bdag
451a1(dkon brtsegs): nyid la bsrung ba dang / bsod nams kyang mang du bskyed ba dang / theg pa chen po'i lam du yang zhugs par gyur pa lags so/ /gsum gang zhe na/
451a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag rang gis rig pa'i chos zab mo dang ldan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag
451a3(dkon brtsegs): chos dang mthun par sdud pa'i shes pa dang ldan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos zab mo dag la bdag nyid kyi shes pa zhum par
451a4(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal nas 'di bdag gis mi shes te/ don 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen par zad do zhes bcom ldan 'das la sems rnam par gtod par bgyid de/
451a5(dkon brtsegs): sems rnam par gtod pa de dang ldan pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gsum po 'di dag ni rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo chos zab mo dag la ma rmas ma nyams par
451a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag nyid la bsrung ba dang / bsod nams kyang mang du bskyed pa dang / theg pa chen po'i lam du yang dag par zhugs par 'gyur ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs
451a7(dkon brtsegs): k yi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gsum po 'di dag las gzhan pa'i sems can gang lags pa de dag ni chos zab mo dag la nan tan gyis mchog tu bzung nas go lob kyi sems
451b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin cing mngon par zhen te ston par bgyid/ kun tu smra bar bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni de dag la dam pa'i chos la rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang / gzhan mu stegs can
451b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / sa bon rul pa lags te/ rgyal po'i thad du'ang mchi la brlag par bgyi'o zhes mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sa bon rul par gyur pa de dag ni lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin
451b3(dkon brtsegs): du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis legs par tshar bcad par bgyi ba lags so/ /de nas lha mo dpal phreng gis de skad ces gsol nas 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das
451b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhabs la gtugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo dpal phreng la legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin te/ lha mo khyod kyis dus dang skabs su chos zab mo dag la bdag nyid
451b5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par bsrung ba'i thabs kyis don bstan pa bshad pa dang / dam pa'i chos kyi dgra tshar bcad pa bshad pa legs so/ /legs so/ /lha mo/ khyod ni sangs rgyas 'bum
451b6(dkon brtsegs): phrag bye ba mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa yin pas khyod kyis don bshad pa 'di las ngo mtshar che ba med do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal 'bar bas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
451b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi lus la 'od kyis khyab par mdzad nas ta la bdun srid tsam du nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ zhabs kyi gom pa 'dor ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyis mnyan yod kyi grong
452a1(dkon brtsegs): khyer ga la ba der gshegs so/ /de nas lha mo dpal phreng 'khor dang bcas pas spyi bor thal mo sbyar nas blta bas chog mi shes shing mig mi 'dzum
452a2(dkon brtsegs): pas blta bas bcom ldan 'das la lta zhing 'khod par gyur to/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mig rgyang gis mi sleb par gyur pa de'i tshe lha mo dpal phreng 'khor
452a3(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas pa mchog tu dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i bzhin dang ldan pas/ gcig gis gcig gi mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rnams rnam pa du mar bsngags
452a4(dkon brtsegs): shing sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa yid la byed pa ma brjed bzhin du grong khyer 'thab med du dong ngo / /de nas lha mo dpal phreng gis rang gi khyim thab rgyal po grags pa'i
452a5(dkon brtsegs): bshes gnyen theg pa chen po la nges par bcug go / grong khyer chen po'i bud med kyi tshogs bu mo lo bdun lon pa yan chad thams cad theg pa chen po la btsud do/ /rgyal po
452a6(dkon brtsegs): grags pa'i bshes gnyen gyis kyang grong khyer chen po'i skyes pa'i 'khor khye'u lo bdun lon pa yan chad thams cad theg pa chen po la btsud par gyur te/ de ltar grong khyer
452a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad theg pa chen po la mngon par phyogs par byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyang rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du byon te/ nang du gshegs nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo
452b1(dkon brtsegs): la yang bka' stsal cing / lha'i dbang po brgya byin la yang dgongs so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid la lha'i tshogs kyis yongs su
452b2(dkon brtsegs): bskor te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la chos kyi rnam grangs
452b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di rgya cher yang dag par bstan te/ kau shi ka /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod kyis gzung zhig /kau shi ka /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod kyis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la/
452b4(dkon brtsegs): shod cig /kun dga' bo khyod kyis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung zhig /kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang /
452b5(dkon brtsegs): dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dag la shod cig /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi rnam
452b6(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni yon tan mtha' yas pa dang ldan te/
452b7(dkon brtsegs): ko'u shi ka /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang mdo sde 'di'i don thams cad ma lus par shes pa'am/ blta ba'am/ nye bar brtag par mi nus na sems

459b3(dkon brtsegs): rtsed mo dang / gtam dang / dga' bar bya ba'i phyir rol mo mkhan rnams la sbyin pa sbyin na/ sbyin pa de yongs su ma dag pa yin no/ /gang gza'i mtshan ma'i phyir skar mkhan la sbyin
459b4(dkon brtsegs): pa gtong bar byed pa dang / gang gzhan gyi nor mdza' bo la sbyin pa dang / gang gi khyim mam zhing la gzhan gyi 'bru'i phung po'am/ nas dang gro'i phung po la ri dwags dang / bya za ba la de
459b5(dkon brtsegs): de la dga' ba dang mgu ba bskyed na de yang sbyin pa yongs su ma dag pa yin no/ /gang bzo'i phyir sbyin pa sbyin pa dang / gang yang lus mi bde bas 'jigs pa'i phyir sman pa la sbyin
459b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / gang yang slong ba rnams la spyos brgyad de tshig pa za bar byas nas sbyin pa byin na de yang yongs su ma dag pa yin no/ /gang yang sbyin pa byin pa 'di'i rnam par smin pa
459b7(dkon brtsegs): yod dam med ces the tshom za na de yang yongs su ma dag pa yin no/ /gang sbyin pa byin nas gdung ba dang 'gyod pas gdungs na de yang yongs su ma dag pa yin no/ /gang yang sbyin
460a1(dkon brtsegs): p a byin nas gang bdag las khyer ba thams cad kyis tshe phyi ma la slar sbyin par 'gyur ro snyam du 'di lta bu'i sems bskyed na de yang yongs su ma dag pa
460a2(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ /gang bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa 'di ni bdag nyid kyis spyad kyi/ sems can gzhan gang la yang ma gyur cig snyam du de ltar sems bskyed na de yang yongs
460a3(dkon brtsegs): su ma dag pa yin no/ /gang lang tshol bab pas sbyin pa byin pa dang / phyis dar phyid pa dang / rga ba'i gnas dang / na bas gzir ba dang / 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe dang / gnad du phog
460a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sdug bsngal ba dang / snad pa dang 'chi ba'i mya ngan du gyur pa na sangs rgyas pa la dga' ba dang / dad pa med par rtsa lag rnams kyis byed du bcug ste/ sbyin gnas rnams
460a5(dkon brtsegs): la sbyin pa byin na de yang yongs su ma dag pa yin no/ /gang yul gzhan na gnas na yang yul dang / gnas ga ge mo zhes bya ba na bdag sbyin bdag tu grags par 'gyur ro//
460a6(dkon brtsegs): snyam du grags pa'i rgyur sbyin pa byin na de yang yongs su ma dag pa yin no/ /gang yang kha zas gtong mi phod pa la 'jig rten pa mi dga' bar mthong nas sbyin phod pa'i nyes pa
460a7(dkon brtsegs): ni 'jig rten gyis bzod do snyam ste sbyin pa byin na de yang yongs su ma dag pa yin no/ /gang yang bud med snying du sdug ste chung mar blang bar bya ba'i don du bud med kyi gzhi las
460b1(dkon brtsegs): mdza' bshes dang / gnyen 'dab dang 'brel ba'i phyogs la nor bu dang / gser dang / dngul dang / rdo rje dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dar dang / byi ru dang / du ku la'i ras la sogs pas mgu
460b2(dkon brtsegs): bar byed na de yang yongs su ma dag pa yin no/ /gang yang 'di ltar bdag la nor ni mang du yod la/ bdag la bu med de/ bdag gis gang rigs pa la gtang bar bya'o snyam ste sbyin
460b3(dkon brtsegs): pa byin na de yang yongs su ma dag pa yin no/ /gang yang tshe 'dir byin pas 'jig rten pha rol tu rnyed par 'gyur ro snyam pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa byin na de yang yongs su ma dag pa
460b4(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ /gang me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / zang zing 'dod pas dbul ba dang / bkren pa dang / sdug phongs pa gos dengs shing dri ma can rnams bkol te bor la/ phyug pa rgya chen po
460b5(dkon brtsegs): thob pa dag la sbyin pa byin na de yang sbyin pa yongs su ma dag pa yin te/ drang srong chen po/ rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag ni sbyin pa byin yang yongs su ma dag pa yin par
460b6(dkon brtsegs): lta'o/ /drang srong chen po/ de dag gi rnam par smin pa ni tshwa sgo can gyi zhing la sa bon ngan pa btab pa'i myu gu skyes pa bzhin du lta ste/ sbyin pa de'i rnam par smin pa ni med pa ma yin
460b7(dkon brtsegs): mod kyi / 'on kyang zhing dang / sa bon gyis nyes pas me tog dang 'bras bur mi 'gyur ro/ /drang srong chen po/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu la la zhig gang 'dod pa'i sa bon khyer te/
461a1(dkon brtsegs): ma rmos ma bsal ba'i zhing la btab na de'i sa bon sa la gnas pa de la char pa bab nas bangs na gdon mi za bar myu gu skye nus par 'gyur te/ 'on kyang me tog
461a2(dkon brtsegs): dang 'bras bur mi 'gyur ro/ /drang srong chen po/ de bzhin du sbyin pa de'i rnam par dbye ba de yang bsam pa dang sbyor ba kun nas nyon mongs pa can du gyur pas 'bras bu rnam par
461a3(dkon brtsegs): smin pa grung por mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas drang srong chen po rgyas pas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad mkhyen pa
461a4(dkon brtsegs): dang mthun pa'i rnam par smin pa skye dgu rnams la phan pa dang bde bar bgyid pa ni bstan lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar tshul khrims 'chal ba dang / tshul khrims dang
461a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa la stsal na sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa chab mi 'tshal ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po khyod sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa la 'jug pa
461a6(dkon brtsegs): nyon cig / drang srong chen po/ dad pas gang cung zad ci byin pa de dag thams cad ni sbyin pa zhes bya'o/ /drang srong chen po/ gang yang 'jig rten pha rol gyis 'jigs pas snod la
461a7(dkon brtsegs): mi rtog par ma bslangs par yang tshul khrims dang ldan pa'am/ ngan pa'i tshul khrims 'chal ba la dad pa bskyed nas mig phye ste/ sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems
461b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis sbyin pa byin na drang srong chen po de ni sbyin bdag yin no/ /drang srong chen po/ gzhan yang sbyin pa lnga yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /lnga gang zhe na/ mgron po dang / nad pa dang /
461b2(dkon brtsegs): nad g.yog dang / chos smra ba dang / yul gzhan du 'gro ba la dus su sbyin pa ste/ lnga po de dag go /gzhan yang lnga ste/ chos sbyin pa dang / zang zing sbyin pa dang / gnas sbyin pa dang /
461b3(dkon brtsegs): mar me sbyin pa dang / spos dang phreng ba sbyin pa'o/ /drang srong chen po rgyas pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ sbyin pa yongs su dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
461b4(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ gang dad pa bskyed de/ sems can thams cad la dmigs shing byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gus par byas te/ dul bas sbyin pa byin pa de thams cad ni yongs
461b5(dkon brtsegs): su dag pa yin no/ /thar par bsngos te sbyin pa byin pa ni yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang sbyin pa bla na med par lta ba lnga ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la sbyin pa
461b6(dkon brtsegs): byin pa ni bla na med pa yin no/ /dge 'dun la sbyin pa byin pa ni bla na med pa yin no/ /chos smra ba la sbyin pa byin pa ni bla na med pa yin no/ /nad pa la sbyin pa byin pa ni bla na med pa
461b7(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ /pha ma la sbyin pa byin pa ni bla na med pa yin no/ /gzhan yang sbyin pa chen por 'gyur ba ni rgyal po rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug las nyams pa la sbyin pa byin na sbyin pa
462a1(dkon brtsegs): chen po yin no/ /rgyal pos mnar ba dang / mgon med pa dang / nad pa la sbyin pa byin na sbyin pa chen po yin no/ /rgyal pos spangs nas gzhan na
462a2(dkon brtsegs): yang nyam nga zhing srog chad la khad pa 'chi la thug pa las gsos na sbyin pa chen po yin no/ /na ba la sman byin na sbyin pa chen po yin no/ /tshul khrims phun sum tshogs
462a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la dus su sbyin pa byin na 'bras bu chen po yin no/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang / shes rab phun sum tshogs pa dang / rnam par
462a4(dkon brtsegs): grol ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba phun sum tshogs pa la sbyin pa byin pa ni sbyin pa chen po yin no/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba bya
462a5(dkon brtsegs): rog dang / 'ug pa dang / ri dwags la sogs pa la mi 'jigs pa byin na sbyin pa chen po yin no/ /gang la gang dgos pa dang / mi bdog pa de'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par
462a6(dkon brtsegs): byed pa ni sbyin pa chen po yin te/ drang srong chen po/ de ltar na sbyin pa byin pa yongs su dag pa dang / sbyin pa chen po yin no/ /sbyin pa yongs su dag pa 'di dag 'dod pas
462a7(dkon brtsegs): de ltar sbyin pa yongs su dag par bsgom par bya'o/ /sems can gang dag gzhan dag gis da ltar bskul nas dad pa dang / dang ba bskyed de/ sbyin pa yongs su dag pa
462b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di la rjes su yi rang bar 'gyur ba de dag mtshungs par bsod nams skyed pa po dang / sbyin bdag tu 'gyur te/ de ltar na gang rjes su yid rang ba dang / gang bskul ba de dag
462b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad bsod nams skyed pa por mtshungs par 'gyur ro/ /drang srong chen po/ gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa na bsod nams kyi rnam
462b3(dkon brtsegs): par smin pa ji ltar 'gyur/ ji ltar sbyin pa'i bsod nams zad par 'gyur zhes khyod kyis smras pa/ drang srong chen po/ de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la gzung zhig dang / ngas
462b4(dkon brtsegs): bshad do/ /drang srong chen po/ gang la la zhig bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang / da ltar bzhugs pa la mchod pa byed pa de'i rnam par smin pa ni mtshungs
462b5(dkon brtsegs): mnyam zhing 'dra'o zhes nga 'chad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni gzugs chos kyi skus rab tu phye ba yin gyi/ chos gzugs kyi skus rab tu phye ba ma yin
462b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir ro/ /gang la la zhig nga 'dug pa'am/ nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la mchod na sems mtshungs pa'i phyir 'di gnyis la bsod nams kyi khyad par cung zad
462b7(dkon brtsegs): kyang med do/ /drang srong chen po/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos ris su gtogs pa rnams la bsgo ba/ nga'i gang gis kyang deng phyin chad srog gcod pa dang /
463a1(dkon brtsegs): ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pa log par g.yem pa dang / rdzun gyi tshig 'byin pa dang / phra ma dang / ngag rtsub po dang / tshig kyal pa 'byin par mi bya'o/ /
463a2(dkon brtsegs): brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba'i sems bskyed par mi bya'o zhes bsgo la/ de la mi la las rgyal pos bsgo ba de thos nas bsgo ba rnams rjes su bsrungs
463a3(dkon brtsegs): na| rgyal po de'i lus la mchod pa byed pa ma yin mod kyi/ rgyal po ngas bsgo ba bzhin du de dag gis kyang byas so snyam ste dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag rgyal po des bstan
463a4(dkon brtsegs): cing bsgo ba rab tu bsrung zhing srog gcod pa la sogs pa kun bsrung ba de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye ba yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /gang
463a5(dkon brtsegs): dag rgyal po des bstan cing bsgo ba mi bsrung zhing / mi dge ba'i las la sbyor ba de dag mi dge ba'i las byed pas tshe 'di la rgyal po de las sdug bsngal rjes su 'thob par
463a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ de 'di nas shi ba'i dus byas nas kyang log par ltung bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /drang srong chen po/ de bzhin du gang dag gis nga la gzugs kyi skur mthong la bslab pa
463a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams rjes su mi bsrung ba de dag gis ci 'thob par 'gyur zhe na/ de dag gis log par lta ba bskyed nas lhas byin bzhin du sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /
463b1(dkon brtsegs): gang dag nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa na bslab pa rnams bsrung ba dang / mchod pa yang byed par 'gyur ba de dag ni ngas mchog dam par shes so/ /drang srong chen po/ de
463b2(dkon brtsegs): ltar nga mchog tu phyin te sems can thams cad las khyad par du 'phags shing / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob pas ma nges pa'i sems can rnams la ming bsgrags
463b3(dkon brtsegs): pas kyang bslab pa phun sum tshogs par bya'o/ /drang srong chen po/ gang la la zhig nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/ 'das pa'i 'og tu mchod pa byed pa de nga 'dug pa la
463b4(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /drang srong chen po/ sems can de dag bsod nams lhag par bya ba gang byed pa thams cad ni bsod nams chen po'i 'phen pa byang chub tu 'gyur
463b5(dkon brtsegs): bar byas pa yin no/ /drang srong chen po/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ chu ngogs kyi 'dam bu stug po'i nang du me btang na char pa'i rgyun 'bab pa'i chus de zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /drang
463b6(dkon brtsegs): srong chen po/ de bzhin du sbyin bdag sbyin pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po sdud par 'gyur ro/ /sbyin pa'i tshogs de yang sbyin pa po nyid kyi rgyud la dad pa'i char pa
463b7(dkon brtsegs): bab na sbyin pa po nyid kyi rgyud la gsog par 'gyur mod kyi/ sbyin pa byin pa de yang phung por gnas pa'am/ spungs par gnas pa'am/ phyogs na gnas pa mi 'gyur ro//

464a2(dkon brtsegs): par smin pa de mthong yang bsod nams de khong du mi chud do/ /drang srong chen po/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgun rlon dang / bu ram shing ma btsir ba de la khu ba mi dmigs kyi/
464a3(dkon brtsegs): btsir nas dmigs te rgun 'bru dang / bu ram shing de'i khu ba de yang phung por gnas pa'am/ spungs par gnas pa'am/ phyogs na gnas par mi snang ngo / /khu ba de ni rgun 'bru
464a4(dkon brtsegs): re re dang / bu ram shing gi dum bu re re'i nang du 'dus pa yang ma yin no/ /drang srong chen po/ de bzhin du sbyin pa byin pa de yang sbyin pa po'i lag pa'i rtse mo dang / snying dang / brang la rnam

465a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgyal po grong khyer gyi dbus na 'dug na pha rol gyi dmag tshogs
465a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'jigs pas thog ma nyid du 'obs rko zhing rdzas dang / sman dang / 'phong gi slob dpon dang / skyes bu dpa' bo sdud par byed cing / rgyal mtshan bsgrengs nas gzhon
465a3(dkon brtsegs): nu rnams la smra'o/ /glang po che dang / ba glang mo chang gis ra ro bar byed do/ /rigs dang nags na gnas pa thams cad dang / zhang blon la sogs pa thams cad sdud do/ /
465a4(dkon brtsegs): dmag mi rnams kyang nor gyis bsdus nas/ 'di skad du thams cad kyang 'thab 'dod par gyis te so so'i lag cha thogs la ral gri phyung ste/ nyin mtshan ma nyal bar 'dug
465a5(dkon brtsegs): cig ces bsgos nas/ pha rol gyi dmag rta dang / glang po che dang / mir 'dres pa 'ongs pa dang / 'di ltar rgyal po des bdag gi dmag dbugs 'byin cing / pha rol gyi dpung
465a6(dkon brtsegs): rang gi bsod nams zad pa dang / mthu rtsal zad pa dang / mtshon gyis rmas pa dang / pham par ma gyur gyi bar du 'khor la glags mi rnyed par srung bar byed do/ /drang srong chen
465a7(dkon brtsegs): po| de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i rgyal po lus kyi grong khyer du song nas/ skye mched kyi grong khyer la mi rtag pa'i ngo bor gnas par mthong nas de'i tshe dad pa'i 'obs rko bar byed/
465b1(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus la gnas te 'dug /bzod pa'i go cha gyon/ brtsam pa chen po rtsom/ chos kyi glang po che rgyags par byed/ ye shes kyi rta yang zhon zhing rgyug ste/ skye mched kyi grong khyer la
465b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces bag yod par ci bya ba dus su gyis shig / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi dpung thub par dka' ba mi rtag pa'i dmag dpag tu med pa 'ong gi /de myur du sbyin pa'i go cha gyon
465b3(dkon brtsegs): cig / ye shes kyi mtshon cha thogs shig /ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa'i sgyogs sbyor cig /tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gtong ba'i srung ma zhog cig ces bskul lo/ /de
465b4(dkon brtsegs): dag kyang pha rol gyi dmag nye bar gnas pa de dang phan tshun mi mthun pas 'bros so/ /de dag dang mi mthun pas skye mched kyi grong khyer de zhi gnas rnam par shes pa'i rgyal po de lus
465b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi grong khyer bor te/ de yul la phyogs nas 'bros so/ /rnam par shes pa bros nas lus dang dbang po'i tshogs khams kyi sbrul gyis gang bas skye mched drug zhig nas bdag po
465b6(dkon brtsegs): med pa/ yid brtan du mi rung ba'i lus kyi grong khyer 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /drang srong chen po/ de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i rgyal pos lus kyi grong khyer bor nas lus gzhan
465b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su 'dzin par byed de/ de ltar na rnam par shes pa ni rgyal po ltar blta'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la drang srong chen po rgyas pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
466a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das/ rnam par shes pa bsod nams su nye bar mchi ba'am/ bsod nams ma lags pa nye bar mchi ba'am/ mi g.yo bar nye bar mchi
466a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i lus ji ltar rab tu 'tshal/ rnam par shes pa 'di nyid kyis bdag gi lus 'di yongs su btang ngam/ ma btang snyam du ji ltar rab tu 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das
466a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu rgya mtsho chen po rgal bar 'dod pas/ gzings chen po'i steng du 'dug nas chu'i nang du zhugs
466a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rgya mtsho chen po'i chu rlabs rgyud mar 'byung bas dkrugs pa mthon dman can/ kum+b+hi ra ma rungs pa dang / 'dzin khri dang / chu srin byis pa gsod dang / sbrul
466a5(dkon brtsegs): yod pa'i chu de'i tshu rol gyi 'gram nas rlung gis phul nas 'bang mi dgos shing / gnod pa med la bde bar gnas te/ pha rol gyi 'gram du phyin par gyur to/ /chu bo'i klung
466a6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'jigs pa de las thar bas gzings de la dga' ba bskyed nas/ gzings 'dis bdag mtsho chen po 'di las brgal to snyam bsams nas/ gzings de la
466a7(dkon brtsegs): lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ gzings de la rab tu mchod pa byas so/ /drang srong chen po/ de bzhin du gang bsod nams byas pa'i sems can 'di nas shi 'phos pa de'i
466b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa de 'di snyam du sems te/ lus 'dis bdag bde 'gro lha dang mir skye ba yongs su bzung ba dang ldan pas bdag don yod pa mi'i lus thob par 'gyur te/ lus
466b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dis bdag ngan song du 'gro ba'i rgya mtsho las brgal te/ 'dis lhar skye ba'i gnas yongs su bzung ngo zhes 'di ltar lus de la dga' ba bskyed nas/ bdag gis 'di la
466b3(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa legs par bya'o snyam mo/ /phyis lus de gzings bzhin du bor nas 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro'o/ /gang rang gi lus kyis bsod nams ma byas pa de'i rnam par shes
466b4(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni ji ltar skyes bu gzings rul bas mtsho chen po de'i nang du 'bying zhing zhig ste ma rungs par gyur nas/ skyes bu de yang nyam thag ste gzings zhig pa des 'jigs bzhin du
466b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gram du phyin nas kyang / seng ge dang / stag yod pa'i 'jigs sar phyin par gyur nas de la 'di skad ces zer ro/ /gzings rul pas nyon mongs kyi steng du log par sod nas
466b6(dkon brtsegs): mtsho chen po'i chu rlabs kyis dkrugs pa/ sbrul gyis klongs par zhugs so zhes gzings de la de skad smra'o/ /de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i 'di bsod nams ma yin pa byas
466b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lus la brten nas ngan song gi sar song nas lus de la 'di skad zer ro/ /sdig pa'i lus 'dis ci zhig rnyed na sdig pa can gyi lus mngon par grub nas bdag khur lta bus
467a1(dkon brtsegs): non par gyur/ bdag lus rul pa 'di'i rgyus ngan song du mngon par phyogs shing zhugs te mchil bas nya zin pa bzhin no snyam mo/ /de ltar rnam par
467a2(dkon brtsegs): shes pa de legs par byas pa'i bsod nams kyis gzings bzang po bzhin du 'khor ba las rgal bar byed do/ /bsod nams ma yin pas ni log par ltung par byed do/ /de ltar na
467a3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pas bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba dang / bsod nams ma yin par nye bar 'gro ba'i lus rnam pa 'di gnyis rab tu shes so/ /yang rnam par shes pas lus 'di yongs
467a4(dkon brtsegs): su btang nas gzhan lus gnyis par 'gro zhing nye bar 'gro'o/ /de mngal na gnas pa'i tshe zhag bdun gyi bar du rnam par shes pas bdag 'di nas shi 'phos nas 'dir 'ongs so/ /
467a5(dkon brtsegs): las 'di byas so/ /bdag gis las 'di byas so zhes de dran nas/ de legs par byas pa'i las kyis dga' bzhin du 'gro'o/ /de rum na gnas pa na de'i ma la mtshan ma gsum
467a6(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ngo / /gsum gang zhe na/ bzhin 'dzum zhing / de'i bzhin rnyi rnyi po ma yin pa dang / bzhin lha'i kha dog lta bur 'gyur zhing / rkang pa g.yas pa la rab tu gnon la/ dku g.yas pa
467a7(dkon brtsegs): la lan du mar nyug pa dang / de gos dkar po dang rab tu mdzes pa ste/ bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba'i rnam par shes pa ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ ma'i gzugs de lta bur blta'o//
467b1(dkon brtsegs): drang srong chen po/ gang bsod nams ma yin pa'i rnam par shes pa bskyed par gyur pa de zhag bdun gyi bar du bdag de nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes so/ /sdig pa'i las ni 'di byas so
467b2(dkon brtsegs): zhes de lta bu dran par 'gyur ro/ /de de lta bu dran nas yid mi bde ba skye'o/ /yid mi bde ba skyes pa de'i ma la ltas mang du 'byung bar lta ste/ lus dri mi zhim par 'gyur ba dang / lus rid
467b3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba dang / lus la sems pas khyab par 'gyur ba dang / yang dang yang du bzhin khro gnyer sdud par 'gyur ba dang / gang tshun chad sems can de mngal du skyes par gyur pa de tshun chad
467b4(dkon brtsegs): khyim der nyon mongs pa dang / gnod pa dang / nad mang por 'gyur ro/ /sems can de btsas pa'i tshe yang na ni ma 'chi ba'i dus byed pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /yang na ni bdag nyid mngal na
467b5(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa'i tshe ma rungs par 'gyur te/ drang srong chen po/ de lta bu ni bsod nams ma yin pas nye bar 'gro ba'i sems can du blta'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la drang srong chen po rgyas
467b6(dkon brtsegs): pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di la rnam par shes pa de thog ma mngal du skyes pa'i tshe ci dran/ ci rnam par shes par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
467b7(dkon brtsegs): drang srong chen po/ 'di la rnam par shes pa thog ma skyes pa'i tshe 'di lta bu dran par 'gyur te/ kun dga' ra ba dang / skyed mos tshal dang / nags tshal dang / rdzing dang / lu ma dang / gser gyi
468a1(dkon brtsegs): gzhal med khang mthong zhing / 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir skye bo mdza' ba 'du bas gang ba dang / mchog tu yid du 'ong ba'i bsod nams byed pa'i sems can gyis
468a2(dkon brtsegs): gang bar mthong ngo / /lha'i shes pa'i snang bas tshe rabs brgya stong du ma rjes su dran no/ /rjes su dran zhing rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba bskyed de/ 'di ni skye ba lnga brgyar bdag gi mar gyur
468a3(dkon brtsegs): to zhes de ltar rab tu shes te/ de ltar rjes su dran nas ma de la chags par mi byed cing / 'dod chags dang bral ba bskyed de/ kye ma'o/ /'di ltar yang skye ba dang 'byung ba ni sdug bsngal te
468a4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor bas ni chog go/ yongs su 'dzin pa 'dis kyang chog go snyam mo/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / drang srong chen po rgyas pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
468a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das/ sems can de ni mi chags na 'khor ba las 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po/ thams cad de lta bu ni ma yin te/ rnam par shes pa
468a6(dkon brtsegs): de ni gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ snang ba med pa'o/ /gang rnam par shes pa'i khams chags pa med par gyur pa/ 'khor bar mi skye ba de lta bu'i gnas med do/ /bsod nams
468a7(dkon brtsegs): su nye bar 'gro ba dang / mi g.yo bar 'gro ba dang / mya ngan las 'das par nye bar 'gro ba thams cad de ltar 'gyur ro/ /drang srong chen po/ de dag ni 'di ltar lta ste/ rnam par shes pa
468b1(dkon brtsegs): gang de ltar sems pa de ni rnam par shes pa'i shas che bar lta ste/ lus kyi shas che bas ni mi nus so/ /rnam par shes pa ni tshor bar byed pa/ rnam par shes pa ni sems par byed pa ste/
468b2(dkon brtsegs): de'i phyir rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o/ /drang srong chen po khyod kyis rnam par shes pa de de ltar khong du chud par bya'o/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
468b3(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal to/ /dgra rnams thams cad shin tu bsrung / /nyon mongs gsog par byed pa po/ /shes dang mi shes shes pa po/ /shes rab dang ni gti mug ldan/ /lta dang nga rgyal ma rig dang / /
468b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa kun la yod/ /rnam par shes pa med par ni/ /gang yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par shes pa med par ni/ /de dag 'du bar mi 'gyur te/ /cig car gyur na 'du bar 'gyur//
468b5(dkon brtsegs): gcig min 'khor lo shing rta bzhin/ /skyes bu mnyam du 'du ba ni/ /nyid dang gzhan dang gnyis kas min/ /gcig gis ma yin gzhan gyis min/ /glang gnyis ji lta bzhin du'o/ /shing rta
468b6(dkon brtsegs): sna bsgyur gnyis dang ni/ /'khor lo gnyis su ldan pa dang / /theg pa dag gis bcings byas pa/ /shing rta zhes ni yongs su grags/ /de ltar lus kyi shing rta yang / /khams kyi 'du 'phrod rnams
468b7(dkon brtsegs): las 'byung / /de las dbang po ldan 'gyur te/ /rnam par shes pas rab tu bstan/ /gnad dang mtshams su sbyor ba dang / /de ltar rtsa dang 'jing chu dang / /skra dang rus pa so dang mgo /sen
469a1(dkon brtsegs): mo pags pas mdog byas dang / /rgyu ma glo ba mkhal ma dang / /snying dang 'tsher pa tshil bu dag/ thams cad mnyam du 'dus pa las/ /lus ni shin tu gnas pa yin//
469a2(dkon brtsegs): de la khams ni lus can te/ /sems las dngos po kun 'byung bas/ /de phyir rnam par shes kyir 'dod/ /de ni 'khor los bsgyur bar 'dod/ /drang srong chen po/ gzhan yang rnam par shes
469a3(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di ni phra ba/ gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ mi mngon pa ste/ 'di ni kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / gzugs kyi dbang po ma yin no/ /dbang po rags pa bor ba'i phyi na rnam par
469a4(dkon brtsegs): shes par lta ba gzhan med de/ mi'i snying 'phar ba dang / 'jigs pa gang las byung ba dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa gang yin pa de thams cad ni rnam par shes
469a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i shas che ba yin gyi/ lus kyi shas che ba ma yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la drang srong chen po rgyas pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sems can rnams kyi
469a6(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi rang bzhin ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ sems can dmyal bar nye bar mchi ba dang / yi dwags su nye bar mchi ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su nye bar mchi ba'i rang bzhin ji
469a7(dkon brtsegs): ltar blta bar bgyi/ ji ltar lhar nye bar mchi ba dang / ji ltar mir nye bar mchi ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams gang lags par blta bar bgyi/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
469b1(dkon brtsegs): gang dag gis lha dang / mir skye bar 'gyur/ mi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags su skye bar 'gyur ba 'di dag bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan
469b2(dkon brtsegs): du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po khyod sems can rnams kyi rang bzhin dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dang / 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba nyon cig /yang thams cad
469b3(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa'i yul 'di ni mngon par shes pa lnga'i yul ma yin no/ /'di ni lha rnams dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa 'og min la thug pa rnams kyi ma yin te/ 'di ni nyan thos rnams kyi
469b4(dkon brtsegs): skabs kyang ma yin na sems can gzhan rnams kyi lta gal yin/ drang srong chen po/ gang dri ma gsum spangs pa'i chos nyid dang po thob pa/ nga'i bstan pa la rgyun du zhugs pa'i rnam par
469b5(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i yul ni 'di yin te/ de lha dang / drang srong thams cad kyis ni ma yin no/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / drang srong chen po rgyas pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
469b6(dkon brtsegs): to| |bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni rgas 'khogs gtugs pas da 'bras bu rnams la btsal ba'i rngo mi thogs so/ /bdag da khur chen po bskur ba'i rngo mi thogs so/ /bdag da bcom ldan 'das
469b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / chos dang / tha ba thams cad spangs pa'i 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/ /bdag deng slan char slob ma dang bcas/ g.yog dang bcas te gsum la skyabs su mchi'o/ /
470a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das/ lha'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos nas 'gro ba gang du 'gyur ba de bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po/
470a2(dkon brtsegs): de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la gzung zhig dang / lha'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa dang / ltas gang yin pa ngas bshad do/ /drang srong chen po/ 'di la me
470a3(dkon brtsegs): tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba sbyin pa dang / bsten pa dang / bsgoms pa dang / mang du byas pa dad pa dang ldan pa'i skyes bu ni 'chi ba'i dus byas na phreng thogs kyi lha'i nang du skye'o/ /drang
470a4(dkon brtsegs): srong chen po/ de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe de lus dri rab tu zhim pa'i spos kyis bsgos pa'i me tog bzhin du snang ngo / /drang srong chen po/ de la me tog gi char mang po rab tu bab nas 'chi ba'i dus byed par
470a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ /de'i lus la me tog kha dog sna tshogs rab tu 'thob par 'gyur/ de'i rtsa lag snying du sdug pa gang yin pa de dag kyang me tog thogs shing mya ngan byed par 'gyur/ de'i bzhin gyi
470a6(dkon brtsegs): mdog snum par 'gyur/ de'i mig ha cang btsums pa yang ma yin/ ha cang phye ba yang ma yin par 'gyur/ rkang lag legs par brkyang nas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur te/ de 'chi ba'i
470a7(dkon brtsegs): dus kyi tshe 'di lta bu'i rtags 'di dag 'byung ngo / /'di lta bu'i ltas kyang mthong bar 'gyur te/ khang pa brtsegs pa me tog sna tshogs rab tu dpyangs pa/ me tog tha dad pas mdzes par byas
470b1(dkon brtsegs): pa bud med brgya stong gis bskor ba mthong nas rtsa lag rnams la 'di skad ces smra ste/ bdag gi rmi lam na khang pa brtsegs pa lha'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dang / me tog gi lda ldi dpyangs pa/
470b2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i me tog bkram pa/ bud med brgya stong gis bskor ba de lta bu mthong ngo zhes bdag gis rtsa lag de dag la smras nas/ de dag gis kyang phreng thogs kyi lha'i nang du skye bar rig go /de 'chi ba'i dus byas
470b3(dkon brtsegs): nas phreng thogs kyi lha'i nang du skye ba na pha dang ma 'dus par mthong nas skye ba yongs su 'dzin to/ /phreng ba thogs pa de dag kyang gnyis kyi dbang po gnyis sprod par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'dzam
470b4(dkon brtsegs): bu gling pa'i mi bzhin no/ /de la de dag gi rnam par shes pa phan tshun 'dres shing dga' ba tsam gyis non pas 'jug par 'gyur gyi/ de dag khu ba 'byung ba ni ma yin no/ /drang srong chen po/ lha de dag ni
470b5(dkon brtsegs): lha mos mngal na zhag bdun du 'dzin to/ /zhag bdun 'das pa nas dku g.yas pa nas 'byung ngo / /drang srong chen po/ de de'i mngal nas byung nas lha'i me tog dri rab tu zhim pa mchog tu yid du 'ong ba
470b6(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs pa brgyus pa'i phreng ba/ brang las 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /drang srong chen po/ de'i phreng ba'i dri rab tu zhim pa'i ngad rlung gis ba das nas phyogs kun tu dpag tshad tsam du 'gro'o/ /phreng ba de la
470b7(dkon brtsegs): kha dog bdun yod pa 'di lta ste/ dkar po dang / dmar po dang / ser po dang / sngon po dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / rma dang / pad+ma rA ga las lhag pa ste/ blta na sdug pa sna tshogs kyi phreng ba de dag de ma shi bar
471a1(dkon brtsegs): du ma rnyis par thogs par 'gyur te/ de'i phyir phreng thogs zhes bya'o/ /drang srong chen po/ phreng thogs kyi lha de dag gi gnas de na/ shing ljon pa ha cang yang mi ring ba/ ha
471a2(dkon brtsegs): cang yang mi thung ba/ 'bras bu sna tshogs ha cang yang mi skyur/ ha cang yang mi mngar la/ bdud rtsi dang 'dra ba'i ro bro ba mang po bzang po lha'i ro bro ba yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa dag yod do/ /drang
471a3(dkon brtsegs): srong chen po/ shing de dag gi 'bras bu de dag gi tshad ni shing tog bil pa tsam mo/ /de dag gi nang nas lha rnams gang dang gang za bar 'dod pa'i zas de dang de dag la nye bar gnas te/ lha de dag
471a4(dkon brtsegs): ni 'bras bu za bar lta'i/ kham gyis za ba'i zas can ma yin no/ /drang srong chen po/ lha de dag gi phyogs ni rab tu rno ba'i tsher ma'i bag med pa/ me tog gis mdzes par byas pa/ ne'u gsing gis
471a5(dkon brtsegs): khebs pa/ gser dang dngul gyi phreng ba sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa/ yid tsam ser ba lta bur snang ba'o/ /drang srong chen po/ gnas de na phreng ba thogs pa'i lha de dag lha'i bu mo
471a6(dkon brtsegs): mchog tu 'bar ba'i gos dang rgyan can/ skar khung dang / kha khyer dang / pu shu'i ngos la rgyu ba/ bde ba dang yid bde ba mchog dang ldan pa dag dang gnas so/ /de na de dag gi tshe'i tshad ni lo nyis
471a7(dkon brtsegs): stong thub bo/ /de nas tshe zad pa'i ltas 'byung ba ni shing gang gi drung na 'dug 'dug pa'i shing de lo ma rnyis pa dang / yal ga 'phyang ba dang / me tog dang dri yang med par 'gyur te/ sems can
471b1(dkon brtsegs): de yang shing drung de na mi dga' ba rnyed par 'gyur/ de'i phreng ba sngon ma rnyis pa de yang rnyis par 'gyur/ lha'i 'jig rten gyi rlung bsil zhing bde bar ldang ba de yang dro bar ldang bar 'gyur ba ste/ de'i
471b2(dkon brtsegs): gnas de dag mthong nas lha'i bu mo de dag nga ro gcig tu snying rje rje skad du smre sngags 'don te/ sems can de yang mtho ris kyi grong khyer lha'i shing dang / me tog dang / 'bras bus mdzes
471b3(dkon brtsegs): par byas pa dang / lha'i bu mo'i tshogs dang 'dre ba yongs su btang nas bsod nams zad bar 'gyur ba 'di ni mtho ris kyi nyes pa'o/ /drang srong chen po/ de nas lha'i bu mo de dag gis de'i mtha'
471b4(dkon brtsegs): bskor nas nyam thag pa chen po'i sgrar dus te/ kyi hud/ mi rtag pa 'di ni snying rje med pa'o/ /'di ltar snying la dga' ba skyes shing 'khod 'khod pa las mi 'dod bzhin du dbang med par mtho
471b5(dkon brtsegs): ris nas lhung ngam/ e ma'o/ /lha gzhon nu da myur du mi'i 'jig rten du skye bar gyur cig /ces mya ngan byed pa na rims drag pos btab nas de rims drag pos non te/ de'i lus gcig tu
471b6(dkon brtsegs): 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /lus 'bar bas gnas de nas 'chi 'pho bar 'gyur te/ de'i 'bar ba de khar zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas shi 'phos nas pha dang ma 'dus pa mthong bas skye ba yongs su 'dzin
471b7(dkon brtsegs): to/ /drang srong chen po/ phreng thogs su nye bar 'gro ba'i lha'i bu de 'di ltar skye bar lta ste/ ma'i mngal na gnas ba'i tshe ltas 'byung ba ni mngal na gnas pa na me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba 'dod
472a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs pa 'dod pa dang / nags tshal sna tshogs stug po nyams dga' bar 'dod par 'gyur/ bde ba thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur/
472a2(dkon brtsegs): lus la na ba med par mngal na 'dzin par 'gyur/ rmi lam na bsod nams sna tshogs kyi tshong 'dus me tog gi phreng ba dpyangs pa'i grong khyer mthong ste/ 'di dag ni de'i mas ltas mthong
472a3(dkon brtsegs): ngo| |drang srong chen po/ gzhan yang lha gzhon nu de btsas nas phreng ba thogs pa'i lha las shi 'phos pas shin tu dga' ba chen po skye'o/ /gos dkar po la dga' bar 'gyur/ mdzes pa
472a4(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan par 'gyur/ shes pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ 'dod pa la rab tu chags shing 'gro ba dang / rgyu ba 'char bag can dang / dus ston dang / ltad mo dang / phra ba'i gos la mngon par dga'
472a5(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur/ kun dga' ra ba la dga' ba dang / pha rol 'byor pa mthong na 'dod pa ste/ drang srong chen po/ 'di dag ni phreng thogs kyi lha las mir skye ba'i snga ltas su blta ba dag go// //
472a6(dkon brtsegs): bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma'o/ /drang srong chen po/ gzhan yang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba'i ltas dang / 'chi 'pho ba'i ltas su blta ba ni/ drang srong chen po/ 'di la dman pa dang /
472a7(dkon brtsegs): mgon med pa la zas bzang po dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / kun 'thung ba'i chu grang mo dang / chu mig dang / mtshe'u dang / lteng ka dang / lu ma dang / rdzing bu dang / khron chu byin nas dad pa dang /
472b1(dkon brtsegs): yid rab tu dga' zhing 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/ nyon mongs pa'i 'bar ba med pa'i lus su gyur/ de'i lus ring par mi 'gyur/ mdog ngan par mi 'gyur/ rdul dang dri ma chags par mi 'gyur/ de'i
472b2(dkon brtsegs): lus la nyams pa'i tshor ba mi 'byung / skad dman pa dang / rtsa lag dang bral zhing gdung ba dang ldan par mi 'gyur/ de bkres pa dang skom pas nyen par mi 'gyur/ de'i lus bskum pa dang
472b3(dkon brtsegs): smyang ba la sogs pas sdug bsngal bar mi 'gyur/ bshang gci 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ yul las yongs su nyams pas sgyid lug par mi 'gyur/ de'i dbang po zhum par mi 'gyur ba ste/
472b4(dkon brtsegs): de lta bu na mtho ris kyi bde ba dang ldan zhing 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro/ /de'i lus yongs su btang nas rnam par shes pa da rab tu dga' bar rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i nang du skyed
472b5(dkon brtsegs): mos tshal dang / nags tshal stug po'i nang du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de 'chi gar lha'i ris mthong nas bzhin me tog pad+ma lta bur 'gyur/ de'i kha nas dri zhim po 'byung bar 'gyur/ de la me tog
472b6(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs dri dang ldan pa'i rlung rjes su mthun pa dang ldang bar 'gyur/ de shi nas kyang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i nang du pha ma 'dus nas skyed mos tshal na rtse zhing 'dod ba myong bas rgyags
472b7(dkon brtsegs): dregs nas lag pa g.yas pas lha mo'i lte ba la reg par mthong nas de'i rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa lha mo de'i phang par skye ba yongs su 'dzin to/ /de zhag bdun 'das nas dri ma med pa'i rna
473a1(dkon brtsegs): cha mgul ba'i mgo dang ldan pa'i gzhon nur mngon par 'grub ste/ rgod pa dang / gar byed pa dang / glu len pa dang / 'dod pa'i longs spyod bskyed nus so/ /drang
473a2(dkon brtsegs): srong chen po/ de la rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi sa phyogs ni dngul dang ldong ros rnam par bkra ba sna tshogs kyis spras shing mdzes par byas pa/ lha mo brgya stong gis legs par
