479a6(dkon brtsegs): cu rtsa gsum gnas kyi lha'i ris de na shi ri sha ka zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal yal ga dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pa/ shing brgya stong sna tshogs sdug pa stug
479a7(dkon brtsegs): po'i mthong na shel ltar dri ma med pa'i rdo leb shin tu byi dor byas pa phun sum tshogs pa zhi zhing rab tu zhi ba'i thub pa 'dod chags dang bral bas bsten pa yod de/ de na 'dod pa'i
479b1(dkon brtsegs): longs spyod can gyi lha'i bu dang lha'i bu mo'i tshogs mi gnas so/ /drang srong chen po/ skyed mos tshal dam pa shi ri sha ka de na me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa mang po las rtag tu lha'i
479b2(dkon brtsegs): gtam brjod pa'i sgra 'byung ngo / /drang srong chen po/ de na nyan thos dge 'dun 'dus pa'i gnas brtan ba lang bdag bram ze'i rigs su skyes pa bsam gtan la gnas pa/ snying rje dang / dga'
479b3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / btang snyoms la gnas pa/ byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'dug go /drang srong chen po/ de zhag bdun gyi bar du dbugs phyi nang du mi rgyu'o/ /drang srong chen po/ de byams
479b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'i tshe 'dod na rlung mi ldang ngo / /drang srong chen po/ sreg pa'i bskal pa'i tshe sa me lce gcig tu gyur pa na yang de'i lus yungs 'bru tsam yang tshig par mi
479b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshigs kyis ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyang phigs so/ /klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo stobs che ba cher 'dug pa'i shugs can rdzu 'phrul che ba dbugs kyis kyang ri'i
479b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po ri rab 'jig pa/ rgya mtsho chen po bzhi yang skem par byed pa/ gtum zhing cher gdug pa'i shugs can klu'i rgyal po de gnyis kyang dge slong ba lang bdag de'i ting 'dzin gyis mthus gdug pa
479b7(dkon brtsegs): med par 'gyur ro/ /drang srong chen po/ gnas brtan ba lang bdag skyed mos tshal shi ri sha ka na gnas shing bsam gtan la gnas par lha gzhon nu de dag dang / lha'i bu mo de dag gis mthong
480a1(dkon brtsegs): nas gus pa dang bcas/ ri mo dang bcas pas gnas brtan de la dga' ba dang / dad pa skyes nas lha'i me tog man da ra ba dang / man da ra ba chen po
480a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / many+dzu sha ka dang / many+dzu sha ka chen po dang / ut+pa la dang / ku mu ta dang / dri mchog dang / pad+ma dkar pos gtor nas thal mo sbyar ba byas te/ phyag 'tshal nas sum cu
480a3(dkon brtsegs): rtsa gsum ris kyi lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyis gnas brtan ba lang bdag la yongs su bskor te/ mchod pa chen po byas nas mdun gyis bltas te gnas nas/ lha'i zas
480a4(dkon brtsegs): bdud rtsi'i ro dang ldan pas tshim par byed cing ci bder byed do/ /gnas brtan ba lang bdag de lha'i bu de dag la chos ston pa ni 'di lta ste/ mdo'i sde dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad
480a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sde dang / lung bstan pa'i sde dang / tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang / ched du brjod pa'i sde dang / gleng gzhi'i sde dang / de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang / skyes pa rabs kyi sde dang /
480a6(dkon brtsegs): shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang / rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sde dang / 'dul ba'i sde dang / mdo sde lung gi phyogs yang dag par rab tu ston te/ de dag dga' ba dang / dad pa bskyed do/
480a7(dkon brtsegs): de lha'i skyed mos tshal de na bsam gtan la gnas te/ thams cad bde ba dang ldan par skyed mos tshal shi ri sha ka na rten cing gnas so/ /drang srong chen po/ gzhan yang
480b1(dkon brtsegs): sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i ris de na lha'i mdun sa chos bzang zhes bya ba yod do/ /de'i ka ba brgyad khri bzhi stong gser dang / dngul dang / rdo rje dang / spug dang / rdo'i snying po las byas pa/ tsan
480b2(dkon brtsegs): dan mchog shing gi snying po la sogs pa dril bu g.yer ka sgra snyan pa'i dra bas khebs par byas pa/ sa phyogs gser gyi bye ma brdal ba'o/ /lha'i mdun sa chos bzang lha'i ras rab
480b3(dkon brtsegs): tu sbyangs pa/ rgyal mtshan dang / gdugs dang / ba dan bsgreng ba dang / lha'i rol mo khong hu dang / pi wang dang / gling bu dang / rdza rnga dang / rnga pa Ta ha dang / lcags kyi sil khrol dang / dung
480b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / pi wang rgyud gsum pa rab tu sgrogs pa ga zha dang / sil khrol dang / ca co'i sgra snyan pa 'byin pa dang ldan pa/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / yal ga dang / khu byug gnas shing
480b5(dkon brtsegs): phan tshun nas sgra 'byin pa de na lha dang lha mo de dag dga' ba dang bde ba skye ba'i bzhin gyis gnas so/ /drang srong chen po/ lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang de'i sa'i ngos nor bu rin po ches
480b6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu spras pa/ ljang khus byugs pas mdog snum zhing be DUR+Ya ltar dri ma med de/ me long gi ngos lta bur byas pa/ rab tu 'jam pa na spos kyi phye ma dang / me tog rnam pa sna tshogs
480b7(dkon brtsegs): 'thor ba/ rlung dang / nyi ma dang / sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu dang / sbrul gyi nyes pa yongs su spangs pa/ ngang gis gnyid dang / snyoms pa dang / le lo rnam par spangs pa/ mthongs khung dang /
481a1(dkon brtsegs): skar khung zla gam lta bu'i dra ba'i bu gnas reg na bde ba'i rlung gtong ba/ rta babs dang / yang thog dang / yang thog chung ngu nas bde ba'i rlung gtong ba/ rin po
481a2(dkon brtsegs): che'i phreng ba bres pa'i sgras rtag tu mdzes par byas pa/ dri rab tu zhim pa 'byung ba'i spos dang / me tog gi sil ma 'thor ba yid du 'ong ba/ bzhin zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / me long gi
481a3(dkon brtsegs): dkyil 'khor lta bu/ lha'i khyad par gyis gzugs rab tu brgyan pa'i lha'i bu mo dag gnas te/ drang srong chen po/ lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang de na lha'i bu mo rol mo'i dbyangs
481a4(dkon brtsegs): sgra sgrogs so/ /lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang de ni gru bzhi lham pa/ shin tu rnam par phye ba/ ngos yangs pa/ shing ljon pa dang / skyed mos tshal dang / nags dang / nags tshal
481a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa/ rgyar khor yug tu dpag tshad brgya yod pa/ gser dang dngul bkram pa/ me tog sil ma bkram pa/ glu dbyangs kyi sgra
481a6(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba/ pad+ma dang / shing yongs 'du sa rtol gyis mdzes par byas pa'o/ /lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang de ni yo byad kyi khyad par thams cad gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang /
481a7(dkon brtsegs): spug dang / rdo'i snying po las byas pa/ rin po che'i phung po yongs su bzung ba/ gser gyi snying pos kun tu khyab pa/ ri rnam pa ngu mas nye bar bskor cing sna tshogs rnam par
481b1(dkon brtsegs): bkra bas mdzes par byas pa/ ngos skyed mos tshal brgya stong gis mdzes par byas pa ste/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha mya ngan dang nad kyi rnam pa'i nyes pa las grol ba dag skyed mos tshal
481b2(dkon brtsegs): mchog tu dga' 'dun myong nas/ lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang der 'dus te rtse ba rjes su myong ngo / /drang srong chen po/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris de na blta na sdug ces bya ba'i gzhal med
481b3(dkon brtsegs): khang zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / me long gi ngos ltar dri ma med pa/ dri rab tu zhim pa'i spos dang / me tog gis mdzes par byas pa/ phreng ba dang / byug pas bres pas mdzes par byas pa/
481b4(dkon brtsegs): bud med brgya stong gis mdzes par byas pa/ 'jo zhing sgeg pa/ mig zur gyis blta zhing khro gnyer gyi rim pa g.yo ba'i cha byad can 'khod pa/ ngos me tog rnam pa sna tshogs phal po ches
481b5(dkon brtsegs): mdzes par byas pa/ nor bu'i skyang nul byas pa/ dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas bres pas mdzes par byas pa/ rta dang / glang po che dang / shing rta'i rmig pa reg na gser gyi rdul ldang ba dang /
481b6(dkon brtsegs): cod pan chags shing 'byor pas mdzes par byas pa yod do/ /drang srong chen po/ blta na sdug ces bya ba'i gzhal med khang de la ka ba drug khri yod de/ ka zhu lha'i gser dang / dngul
481b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa sna tshogs kyi 'phras rnam par spras pa/ shing ta ma la'i lo ma dang / a ka ru dang / bdug pa'i phreng ba dri rab tu zhim par byas pa'i khyad par can no/ /gzhal
482a1(dkon brtsegs): med khang de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gnas te/ lha'i bud med brgya stong gis bskor ba gser dang / rdo rje'i myu gus lus mdzes par byas pa/ lha'i 'dod pa la rtse ba
482a2(dkon brtsegs): rjes su myong ba/ glang po che dgu khri'i stobs dang ldan pa/ lag pa glang po che'i sna lta bu mdog gser dri ma med pa ltar ser ba/ lus grims pa/ ro stod seng ge 'dra ba/ rna cha dri ma med pa
482a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gul pas lus snang bar byas pa/ gos mchog tu phra la ring zhing nar ba/ dbang po'i brda sprod pa 'don cing bstan bcos shes shing mkhas pa/ lha'i bu brgya stong du ma rjes su 'brang zhing
482a4(dkon brtsegs): lha'i gser gyi gzhal med khang gi gnas na rgyu ba/ gser gyi skud pa dang / se mo do dang / do shal gyis brang brgyan cing mdzes par byas pa/ ha cang tsho ba'ang ma yin/ ha cang ring pa yang
482a5(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa rkang pa shin tu gnas pa/ bdud rtsi'i ro dang ldan pa'i kha zas za ba/ mkhur tshos bud med brgya stong gis zur gyis blta ba dang ldan pa/ glang po che sa srung gi bu rgyags pa'i
482a6(dkon brtsegs): rna ba'i rlung gis sgra phyung ba ste/ drang srong chen po/ lha'i dbang po'i rgyal po de'i lus la rus pa med do/ /de'i lus la nad thams cad med de/ dri rab tu zhim pa dang ldan la/ gdangs shin
482a7(dkon brtsegs): tu snyan cing 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang ldan no/ /lha'i rgyal po de'i lus kyi dris phog na spos kyi glang po che rab tu rgyags shing bdo ba yang rgyags pa yongs su 'bri bar 'gyur ro/ /drang
482b1(dkon brtsegs): srong chen po/ lha'i dbang po de'i lus kyi tshad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i tshad tsam mo/ /de'i gzugs che ba gser gyi mdog lta bu de mthong nas/ 'phags pa nyan thos rnams kyang
482b2(dkon brtsegs): de'i gan du 'dong ste/ lha'i dbang po'i gzugs phun sum tshogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra'o zhes brjod do/ /de nas drang srong chen po rgyas pas lha'i dbang po'i lus kyi tshad thos nas
482b3(dkon brtsegs): ngo mtshar du gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po/ dbang po chen po'i lus chung du mi rtag pa'i lus rjes su 'breng ba/ gar mkhan gyi cha byad lta bur shin tu spras
482b4(dkon brtsegs): pa| glegs shing gi las dang / shing gi las dang / 'khrul 'khor gyi las lta bur byas pa/ me tog gi las lta bur yud tsam zhig mdzes pa/ me long gi nang gi gzugs brnyan lta bu la khyod ci'i
482b5(dkon brtsegs): phyir ngo mtshar du byed/ drang srong chen po khyod dge slong ma 'gags pa'i lus pha dang ma las skyes pa'i tshigs tshigs mtshams mtshams re re la yang dbang po chen po 'dun par 'gyur
482b6(dkon brtsegs): ba la ltos/ drang srong chen po/ gzhan yang dge slong ma 'gags pa'i lus la rdzu 'phrul gyi sgyu ma la da ltos/ de nas dge slong ma 'gags pa bcom ldan 'das kyi bskul bar shes
482b7(dkon brtsegs): nas ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus dge slong ma 'gags pa lha'i gser 'bar ba dang / byi ru'i sdong po'i kha dog mchog dang ldan pa/ gtsug
483a1(dkon brtsegs): gi nor bu dang cod pan 'phyang ba'i gtsug phud dang ldan la/ mkhur ba rgyas shing mdangs snum pa'i mdog can/ mig lha'i ut+pa la sngon po 'dra la nor bu
483a2(dkon brtsegs): dang spug dang rdo'i snying po dang ldan pa'i klu'i rgyal po lta bur kun tu snang ste/ de'i gzugs chen por mngon par grub pa'i lha'i dri dang gzugs kyis 'khor thams cad snang bar byas
483a3(dkon brtsegs): pas ngo mtshar dang dga' bar gyur te/ dri rab tu zhim pa'i dri dang ldan par gyur to/ de'i cho 'phrul de drang srong chen po rgyas pas mthong nas snying 'phar zhing stan las langs te
483a4(dkon brtsegs): thal mo sbyar nas/ rab tu ngo mtshar du gyur par sgra cher kye a la la legs so/ /gang gi phyir bdag de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad cing 'dus la/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sgo
483a5(dkon brtsegs): nas 'di lta bu sngon ma mthong ba'i cho 'phrul mthong ba mi nyid thob pa bdag don mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong chen po rgyas pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /
483a6(dkon brtsegs): drang srong chen po/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ dbang po chen po'i lus dang / gang 'di dge slong ma 'gags pa'i lus gser 'bar ba dang / nor bu mchog las grub pa 'di
483a7(dkon brtsegs): gnyis gang bzang / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / drang srong chen po rgyas pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang 'di dge slong ma 'gags pa'i lus de la
483b1(dkon brtsegs): dbang po chen po'i lus kyis brgya'i char yang nye bar mi mchi/ stong gi cha'am/ brgya stong gi cha'am/ grangs sam/ char ram/ bgrang bar ram/ dper yang mi bzod do/ /drang srong chen po/
483b2(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams las grub pa'i lus la dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngos pa'i khyad par ni de ltar lta'o/ /drang srong chen po/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris de na brgya byin gyi chung ma dam pa bde sogs
483b3(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba lha'i bu mo brgya stong gis yongs su bskor cing dga' tshal na 'dug ste/ lus spos dang / phreng ba dang / me tog gis brgyan cing 'bar ba/ lha'i me tog pad+ma dang / ut+pa la
483b4(dkon brtsegs): dri rab tu zhim pa'i dri dang ldan pa / mchu gser dang / bim pa 'dra ba/ mchog tu 'bar ba'i cha byad 'dzin pa/ gos mchog tu phra la 'tsher ba/ skyed mos tshal dang / nags na rgyu ba/ lha'i rgyan dang /
483b5(dkon brtsegs): rkang gdub dang / gdub bu dang / gdu bu sgril dang / do shal dang / se mo dos lus dud pa/ dpral ba dang mkhur ba che la shin tu rnam par phye ba/ nor bu dang gser shin tu rnam par phye ba'i ska rags kyis bcing pa/
483b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jo zhing sgeg pa'i rjes su chags pa/ mig ring zhing che la 'jam pa/ lag pa'i nang ri mo ring pos khyab pa/ lte ba zab pa/ khro ba dang / ser sna dang / phrag dog dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa'i nyes
483b7(dkon brtsegs): pa spangs pa/ bzhin khro gnyer gyi rim pa g.yo ba dang bral ba/ mngal 'dzin pa'i skyon rnam par spangs pa'i lus dang ldan pa'o/ lha'i bu mo bde sogs zhes bya ba de shin tu 'dod pa la chags
484a1(dkon brtsegs): pa las byung ba'i sgeg pa/ ri rab la yod pa'i gzhal med khang dang / shing gel pa dang / 'khri shing gi bla res khebs par byas pa las byung ba'i 'dod pa skyes
484a2(dkon brtsegs): pas byung ba/ me tog 'thor ba dang bcas pa'i rlung ldang ba/ ha cang ring ba'ang ma yin/ ha cang thung ba'ang ma yin pa/ dku ha cang sbom pa'ang ma yin/ ha cang phra ba'ang ma yin pa/ lus ha cang
484a3(dkon brtsegs): sbom pa'ang ma yin/ ha cang phra ba'ang ma yin pa/ bzhin mdangs can/ gtsang zhing mdzes pa/ pad+ma 'dod pa/ dri rab tu zhim pa'i dri'i ngad rlung gis bdas pa rmad du byung bas mdzes par
484a4(dkon brtsegs): byas pa'o/ /drang srong chen po/ de ltar sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris kyi lha de dag ni nad med pa/ rims nad med pa/ skyed mos tshal dang / nags tshal dang / gzhal med khang gi gnas kyi nang
484a5(dkon brtsegs): na gnas shing rgyu ba'o/ /de dag gi tshe ni lha'i lo stong thub bo/ /de dag lha'i gnas de na gnas pa las/ bsod nams zad nas tshe zad par 'gyur ba'i tshe shi 'pho ba'i ltas sngon ma byung ba lnga
484a6(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ste/ rdzing bu shel ltar gsal ba reg na bde ba'i rlung ldang ba/ rdzing bu'i 'gram 'khri shing gi bla re dang / shing gel pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par zhugs pa na 'bru mar gyis
484a7(dkon brtsegs): gtor ba lta bu 'byung ngo / /des 'bru mar gyis gtor ba de mthong nas snying dngangs skrag ste/ rdzing bu de nas byung nas nags stug por rgyug cing bros so/ /de rings par 'gro ba lha'i bu mo
484b1(dkon brtsegs): de dag gis mthong nas phyi bzhin du 'brangs pa dang / de nags stug po de'i nang na shing drung zhig na gnas shing 'dug go /de nas lha'i bu mo de dag snying rje rje skad du ga chad par du zhing 'di
484b2(dkon brtsegs): skad ces/ jo bo bdag cag bor te gcig pu shing drung 'di na ci dga' zhes 'dzer to/ /de ngu zhing dman pa'i sgras slar 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag 'di na sngon ma byung ba 'bru mar gyis
484b3(dkon brtsegs): gtor ba lta bu lus la byung ngo zhes de skad ces smras pa dang / mchan khung gnyis nas rdul byung nas/ de dag gis rdul byung ba mthong ba dang lha'i bu mo de dag ring du dong ste yongs su spangs
484b4(dkon brtsegs): so| |des yongs su spangs par shes nas mya ngan gyis reg go/ de mya ngan gyis reg pas dbugs drag tu rgyu'o/ /dbugs rgyu ba'i rgyus lus la gdung ba skyes so/ /de lus dang sems
484b5(dkon brtsegs): gdungs pas me tog gi thod sngon rnyis mi srid pa'ang rnyis/ phreng ba'ang yongs su rnyis/ sngon rnyings mi srid pa'i gos kyang rnyings/ lha'i gding ba bting ba'i mal cha la yang dga' ba mi
484b6(dkon brtsegs): rnyed do/ /de nas lha'i bu mo de dag gis 'chi 'pho ba'i ltas kyis nyen par shes nas de'i dri de mi bzod de ring du spangs nas snying rje rje skad ga chad par bdag la dbang med par du'o/ /
484b7(dkon brtsegs): 'bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen nas rab tu ngu zhing / kyi hud lus mchog shin tu 'jam pa lha'i skyed mos tshal dang / nags tshal na rgyu ba/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gling na ngur pa dang
485a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dra ba/ lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang na ngang pa'i rgyal po dang 'dra ba/ dga' tshal na bya ka ran da ka lta bu/ rdzing bu na spos kyi glang po che 'dra ba/ shing
485a2(dkon brtsegs): yongs 'du sa brtol dang / skyed mos tshal na bung ba lta bu/ 'dres pa'i tshal na me tog rna rgyan lta bu bdag cag bor te da gar song / gang na gnas zhes 'dzer cing bdag la dbang
485a3(dkon brtsegs): med par du'o/ /de bdag la dbang med par rims nad kyis btab ste/ rims nad des lus dang sems dkrugs nas mgron po mgron pa mang po dang bral te 'brog 'chol ba
485a4(dkon brtsegs): dang mtshungs/ lam grogs gru zhig pa dang 'dra/ rgyal po yid bzhin gyi nor bu stor ba dang mtshungs/ ri zhig pa dang 'dra bar mi rtag pa'i rlung gis gtor nas lus sa'i steng
485a5(dkon brtsegs): na 'dre ldog ste/ nam mkha' lding gi mchus klu gzhon nu zin pa dang 'dra bar 'dar bzhin du myur ba myur bar thal mo sbyar ba nas/ lha'i bu mo de dag la gsol ba btab pa/
485a6(dkon brtsegs): tshur shog la lag pa'i thal mos nga'i lus la reg par gyis shig ces snying 'dar la gdungs bzhin du smre sngags 'don cing gsol ba btab pa dang / lha'i bu mo de dag gis bltas
485a7(dkon brtsegs): nas mi nye bar spangs te yan lag la reg pa lta ga la byed kyi/ me tog can gyi yal ga thogs te 'chi 'pho bar 'gyur ba'i lha'i bu de'i snying gar bzhag nas 'di skad ces 'dzer
485b1(dkon brtsegs): to| |tho ris kyi bsod nams yongs su nyams te da myur du 'dzam bu'i gling du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes de skad smras pa dang / lha'i bu de bdag lus kyis yongs su btang bar shes
485b2(dkon brtsegs): nas/ kyi hud/ kyi hud/ ces sgra cher snying rje rje skad du ngu zhing / kye ma'o mtho ris lha'i gnas 'di lha'i yo byad dang / rkyen dang / skyed mos tshal mchog na rtse ba rjes su myong zhing /
485b3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu mo 'di dag la bdag gis sdug par bsam pa las/ da bdag 'chi ba'i dus la phyogs shing zhugs pa'i tshe de dag nye bar mi gnas shing / 'di skad ces khyod 'dzam bu'i
485b4(dkon brtsegs): gling du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes 'dzer to snyam nas/ yang dang yang du bdag gi gnas la lta zhing sa la 'gyel nas snying rje rje skad du smre sngags 'don te/ kyi hud/ dga' tshal dang /
485b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dres tshal dang / ar mo nig ltar 'jam pa'i rdo leb dang / kyi hud/ lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang dang / shing yongs 'du dang / rnam par mdzes dang / dga' tshal dang / skyed mos
485b6(dkon brtsegs): tshal dang / rdzing bu dang / gzhal med khang dam pa sgo mang po 'di dag dang / lha yul pa'i lha'i gnas 'di dag bor te/ da ni mtho ris kyi g.yang sa nas gdon mi za bar lhung
485b7(dkon brtsegs): ngo zhes skrag pa skyes nas/ de rang gi gnas la lta zhing / kyi hud/ bdag gi mdza' bo byams pa rnams nga 'chir nye na ci'i phyir mi smra/ 'di ltar nga ni de 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon
486a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dgongs mal ring por chas kyi tshur shog / nga la 'khyud/ phyis ngas kyang khyod mi mthong / khyod kyis kyang nga mi mthong ngo / /kyi hud/ mtho ris
486a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di nas bsod nams kyi 'bras bu zad pas/ 'pho bar 'gyur pa'i tshe bdag la mun pa lta bur snang ngo / /ci mtho ris 'di stong ngam/ 'di na yang rol mo dang / sil snyan kyang
486a3(dkon brtsegs): mi len nam/ de dag gis sgra yang mi grag go /las kyi nyes pas bdag ni 'dir nyams par gyur to zhes de skad smras nas yang smre sngags 'don to/ /kyi hud/ mtho ris lha dang /
486a4(dkon brtsegs): dri zas mdzes par byas pa na/ gang mig stong pa'i lha'i 'khor du 'gro ba dang / phyis yang de mthong bar 'gyur ba ni bsod nams che'o/ /kun nas skyes pa'i me tog nga'i klad pa
486a5(dkon brtsegs): la 'dug pa ci'i phyir rnyings zhes lha'i bu des smras pa dang / lha'i pu de sems dman pa dri ma med pa'i rna cha'i gdu bu 'gul ba thogs pa/ de dag thams cad me tog khyer te/
486a6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha'i bu brgya stong gis yongs su bskor cing lha mo bde sogs dang / lha mo dag phyi bzhin 'brang ba/ mi sbyin gyi bu dang / smig rgyu dang / sna tshogs rgyan
486a7(dkon brtsegs): dang | gtsug phud lnga pa dang / tum pu ru la sogs pa'i lha dang / dri za rnams lha'i glu dbyangs len cing 'dong ba dag gis ltas lnga po des nyam thag par gyur pa
486b1(dkon brtsegs): mthong nas/ snying rje bskyed de nga ro gcig tu/ kyi hud/ mi rtag pa 'di ni rab tu drag cing mi bzod do zhes tshig smra'o/ /lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang lha'i bu de la bltas nas
486b2(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis 'di skad ces smras so/ /chog go /lha'i bu/ bdag cag thams cad kyi 'gro ba'ang 'di 'dra'i/ sred par ma byed/ ngan 'gror ma gnas shig /lha'i
486b3(dkon brtsegs): bu de dag gis dbyangs gcig tu smras pa/ grogs po/ dge ba byed pa'i 'jig rten mi'i 'jig rten du song zhig ces byas pa dang / lha'i bu des bdag ni nges par 'chi yang dag snyam
486b4(dkon brtsegs): du bsams te/ thal mo sbyar nas lha mang po de dag la 'di skad ces gsol ba btab bo/ /bdag ni 'chi 'pho ba'i dus la nye bar gnas kyi/ lha'i bu thams cad bdag la
486b5(dkon brtsegs): bzod par mdzod cig/ de'i tshe shugs ring du phyung nas ltas gnyis 'byung ste/ mig pad+ma'i lo ma lta bur 'gyur ba dang / rgyan thams cad mi snang bar 'gyur ba'o/ /de
486b6(dkon brtsegs): nas lha'i bu de dag gis rgyan mi snang bar gyur ba mthong nas me tog man da ra ba dang / pad+ma la sogs pas mngon par gtor/ pi wang dang / gling bu dang / sil snyan gyi sgra yang
486b7(dkon brtsegs): byas nas/ rgyan de dag kyang lhas bsdus par mthong nas/ 'dzam bu'i gling la dga' ba bskyed de/ de mchi ma zag cing ga chad par ngu ste/ 'chi ba'i dus kyi chos rnams sbyor ro/ /
487a1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bsod nams dang / tshe yongs su zad nas rlung drag po langs so/ /rlung dri rab tu zhim pa dang ldan pa des de'i lus la phog nas
487a2(dkon brtsegs): gtor te/ lha'i bu de gnas de nas 'chi 'pho bar 'gyur ro/ /gnas de nas 'pho ba na lus kyi gnas mi shes so/ /de gnas de nas shi 'phos nas mir skye ba yongs
487a3(dkon brtsegs): su len to/ /mir skyes te ma'i mngal du gnas pa'i tshe ma la mtshan mar blta ba ni/ de nyid glu dang / gar dang / rtse ba dang / rgod pa la dga' ba'i dbang por 'gyur
487a4(dkon brtsegs): me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / dgon pa la dga' bar 'gyur/ kha dog sna tshogs 'tsher ba'i gos 'chang bar 'gyur/ lha'i kha zas shin tu bzang po la sred par
487a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur| de ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe ma 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis kun nas bskor bar mi 'gyur/ de dri rab tu zhim pa'i cha lugs la dga' bar 'gyur/
487a6(dkon brtsegs): gnyid log na yang rmi lam na lha'i don bskul ba mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /drang srong chen po/ de mngal na gnas pa na phyin ci ma log pa'i rmi lam mthong ngo / /btsas
487a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dus na yang 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnam par spangs nas btsas te/ de gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ rkang pa shin
487b1(dkon brtsegs): tu gnas pa/ shis pa'i yan lag dang / nying lag 'brel ba/ lag pa dang / rkang pa ring la sbom pa/ ro stod seng ge'i lta bu/ so thags bzang ba/ shin tu 'jam pa'i
487b2(dkon brtsegs): lus so/ /de gcig tu 'dod pa'i 'dod chags la chags par 'gyur/ 'dod chags mi bzad pa/ gos phra ba la dga' ba/ skyed mos tshal la dga' ba/ lha'i dri dang /
487b3(dkon brtsegs): rol mo la dga' bar 'gyur/ de gser dang / nor thams cad 'byor ba'i rigs chen por skye ste/ sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / yang dag par sdom pa la dga' bar
487b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur| gal te 'dod pa la shin tu chags nas sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims la mi dga' bar gyur na/ de phyir gcig nas gcig tu dbul po'i rigs su skye bar
487b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ ser sna can dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams la bstod pa dang / ha cang sngo ba yang ma yin pa dang / ha cang dkar ba'ang ma yin pa dang / skye bo thams
487b6(dkon brtsegs): cad dang / gzhan gyi chung ma la chags shing / bdag gi chung ma la mi lta ba dang / rtsa lag gi skye bo la dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /drang srong chen po/ 'di ni sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i
487b7(dkon brtsegs): ris nas 'chi 'pho ba'i ltas 'byung ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ drang srong chen po rgyas pa dang / drang srong chen po de dag dang / lha dang /
488a1(dkon brtsegs): mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa
488a2(dkon brtsegs): dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ drang srong rgyas pas zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa rdzogs
